name: 科林涅姆堡垒
mystery: 第二帝国在黑沼泽外围取得了一些进展，但他们并没有停留太久。科林涅姆堡垒曾经是帝国的堡垒，现在则被幽深沼泽的居民——甚至更奇怪的东西所占领。
des:
Arx Corinium is a group dungeon found in southwestern Shadowfen.
While previously constructed and held by the Imperials, the fort has fallen into disrepair and is overrun with Lamias. A group of nereids now occupy the flooded fort and focus on restoring balance to the land. Rumors say the fort is home to a great source of power, although it is perverse, corrupted.  You can learn about its location from Mindil the Untested in Marbruk, Abzag the Monster in Shornhelm, or Maela the Crone in Stormhold.
Its dungeon sets are Lamia's Song, Medusa, and Undaunted Infiltrator.
There are always 4 treasure chests available to find in this dungeon, which may contain weapons, armor or jewelry from the dungeon's sets.

BOSS.name: 风暴加纳卡顿
BOSS.des: Ganakton the Tempest is a large Wamasu and the first boss in Arx Corinium. Its unique drop is Belisaro's Bolt, a unique item in the Lamia's Song item set.

skills.name: 碎片闪电
skills.des: The boss deals moderate shock damage over time to all players. This attack cannot be avoided.

skills.name: 震荡之息
skills.des: The boss breaths lightning from its mouth dealing moderate shock damage over time in front of itself as indicated by a red cone.

skills.name: 束缚电矢
skills.des: The boss pins a player down dealing moderate shock damage, this can be broken free from.

skills.name: 雷鸣喷吐
skills.des: The boss releases a fast moving lightning whirl toward a player dealing high shock damage and stunning them afterwards. It may be difficult to avoid this if you are standing too near the boss.

BOSS.name: 歌者斯里克尼娅
BOSS.des: Sliklenia the Songstress is a Lamia boss found in Arx Corinium (here) with her pet snake. Upon defeating her, there will be a small chance to earn Sweetsong  (epic-level quality in Veteran), a unique item in the Undaunted Infiltrator item set.

skills.name: 斩击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 猛毒啃咬
skills.des: A heavy melee attack that does high physical damage and knocks the target back.

skills.name: 噪音
skills.des: The boss screams dealing high magical damage over time throughout the room. To counter this, stand in the bubble the pet snake creates as this will prevent all damage done from this attack. The cue for this is when the boss says "Hide from my song, my pet". The snake will then run and create a bubble around itself. If the snake is killed, it will no longer provide a bubble, resulting in players having no shelter from the attack.

BOSS.name: 蛇人女王塞利斯特利克斯
BOSS.des:
Sellistrix the Lamia Queen is the leader of the lamias invading Arx Corinium. She is the final boss players must defeat to complete the dungeon. During the battle, the Sisters of Floods, Rain, and Waves will be available to assist you.
Her unique drops are the Fang of the Lamia Queen and Sellistrix's Siphon, both items in the Medusa item set. It is also the namesake of the Sellistrix set, style, and the basis of a trophy and bust.

skills.name: 利爪挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does high physical damage. If taunted, the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 穿刺尖啸
skills.des: The boss screams, doing high physical damage over time and staggering all players in front of her as indicated by a red cone. Avoid standing in front of her unless you are the tank.

skills.name: 闪电壁垒
skills.des: The boss arena consists of islands (illuminated by light) and the water in between. If she stands in the water she will electrify it, causing the water to do moderate shock damage over time to all players standing in it. The tank should try to hold the boss on one of the islands to avoid this. Do note that when she is in the water, her damage shield is removed.

skills.name: 闪电释放
skills.des: The boss summons a storm, causing debris to fall from the ceiling over the islands, doing moderate physical damage over time as indicated by red circles. To avoid this, stand in the water while she is performing this attack. Note that if she is standing in the water, Lightning Bulwark will activate as well, meaning that both the water and the islands will now be unsafe.

skills.name: 新目标
skills.des: The boss ignores taunt and runs off to attack a random player for a few seconds. Again, to minimize the movement of the boss, the group should stay close behind her, while the healer heals any damage she may cause.

achievement.name: 科林涅姆堡垒胜利者
achievement.des: Defeat the Ancient Wamasu, the Lamia Songstress, and the Lamia Queen.

achievement.name: 科林涅姆堡垒征服者
achievement.des: 通过击败尖牙巨蛇、风暴加纳卡顿、歌者斯里克尼娅、伊克斯尼雅夫人、远古木傀儡和蛇人女王塞利斯特利克斯，完成（老兵模式）科林涅姆堡垒。

achievement.name: 毒蛇剥皮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）科林涅姆堡垒中，在召唤光辉战斗卷轴之后击败蛇人女王塞利斯特利克斯。

achievement.name: 蛇人杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）科林涅姆堡垒中击败400个蛇人。

achievement.name: 毒蛇杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）科林涅姆堡垒中击败175个巨蛇。

achievement.name: 科林涅姆堡垒幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）科林涅姆堡垒中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败尖牙巨蛇、风暴加纳卡顿、歌者斯里克尼娅、伊克斯尼雅夫人、远古木傀儡和蛇人女王塞利斯特利克斯。

achievement.name: 科林涅姆堡垒刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）科林涅姆堡垒中，在开启地下城后20分钟内击败尖牙蝮蛇、风暴加纳卡顿、歌者斯里克尼娅、伊克斯尼雅夫人、远古木傀儡和蛇人女王塞利斯特利克斯。当玩家遭遇第一批盘踞的蝮蛇时开始计时。

name: 放逐地牢 I
location: At the northern tip of Auridon
mystery: 高精灵寿命很长，而且魔法天赋高。有时候高精灵对魔法力量的追寻会触及禁忌知识，以及和邪恶的魔族做交易。而放逐地牢建设之初就是为了关押越界的人。
des:
The Banished Cells I is a group dungeon found at the northern tip of Auridon.
In this version, Keeper Cirion needs your help binding the spirit of a dangerous Altmer, High Kinlord Rilis.
You can learn about its location from Turuk Redclaws in Vulkhel Guard, Abzag the Monster in Daggerfall, or Roaring Ramavel in Davon's Watch.
The final boss, High Kinlord Rilis, has a chance to drop the Nilumin River Pearls antiquity lead for the Pearls of Ehlnofey.
See also: Banished Cells II

BOSS.name: 影裂
BOSS.des: Shadowrend is a shadowy clannfear encountered in the Banished Cells I. It is the namesake of the Shadowrend set, but does not drop any set pieces.

skills.name: 尖刺头槌
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 尾巴打击
skills.des: The clannfear swings its tail dealing high physical damage around itself as indicated by a red circle. This attack will also stun the player briefly.
The boss summons a clone of itself that attacks the group. This clone has little health and should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

skills.name: 突袭
skills.des: The boss jumps on a player and pins them down, dealing moderate physical damage. The player will be stunned for a moderate time after this. This attack is only used against players standing far away from Shadowrend.

skills.name: 进食
skills.des: While on top of the player, the boss feeds on them to heal itself up. This also deals moderate physical damage over time to the player. To escape this, the player can break free; allies can also interrupt the boss to free their allies.

BOSS.name: 利里斯亲王
BOSS.des: High Kinlord Rilis is the spirit of an ancient Altmer found in the Banished Cells I, of which he is the final boss.  He has a chance to drop two unique items, Guilehammer, and High Kinlord's Revenge.

skills.name: 斩击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does moderate physical damage. If taunted, the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 破碎一击
skills.des: A heavy melee attack that does high physical damage as well as knocking down the target. This attack can be blocked to reduce the damage taken, as well as preventing the knockback. If taunted, the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 灵魂爆轰
skills.des: The boss will fire an orb at a random player, doing high magic damage and knocking the player back. This attack can be blocked or dodged to prevent the knockback.

skills.name: 魔族风暴
skills.des: The boss will raise his sword in the air, and pools of blue fire will appear under each player's feet. The fire does high flame damage over time, and should be avoided by stepping out of the red circle.

skills.name: 盛宴魔球
skills.des: Feast orbs will appear from the altar where he first spawns and move towards him. If they touch him, he will be substantially healed. When an orb appears, the party should focus on it to destroy it quickly. To prevent them from reaching Rilis before they are destroyed, either Rilis should be kited to the opposite wall or a DPS should immediately destroy them. They are not immune to knockback or crowd control effects, which should be used on them if they are not destroyed before reaching Rilis.

achievement.name: 放逐地牢 I 胜利者
achievement.des: 在放逐地牢 I 中，击败影裂和利里斯亲王。

achievement.name: 放逐地牢 I 征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）放逐地牢 I 中，击败地牢怒灵、影裂、惊惧兽操控者安嘉塔、骷髅毁灭者和利里斯亲王。

achievement.name: 灵魂分裂者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）放逐地牢 I 中，在召唤光辉战斗卷轴之后击败利里斯亲王。

achievement.name: 碎骨者 I（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）放逐地牢 I 中击败350个骷髅。

achievement.name: 魔族杀戮者 I（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）放逐地牢 I 中击败100个魔族。

achievement.name: 放逐地牢 I 幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）放逐地牢 I 中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败地牢怒灵、影裂、惊惧兽操控者安嘉塔、骷髅毁灭者和利里斯亲王。

achievement.name: 放逐地牢 I 刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）放逐地牢 I 中，在20分钟内击败地牢怒灵、影裂、惊惧兽操控者安嘉塔、骷髅毁灭者和利里斯亲王。计时从有小队成员进入第一个走廊时开始。

name: 放逐地牢 II
location: At the northern tip of Auridon
mystery: 高精灵寿命很长，而且魔法天赋高。有时候高精灵对魔法力量的追寻会触及禁忌知识，以及和邪恶的魔族做交易。而放逐地牢建设之初就是为了关押越界的人。
des:
The Banished Cells II is a group dungeon found at the northern tip of Auridon.
The story started in Banished Cells I is continued in this version; High Kinlord Rilis has escaped again, and Keeper Cirion once again needs help banishing him for good.
You can learn about its location from Turuk Redclaws in Vulkhel Guard, Abzag the Monster in Daggerfall, or Roaring Ramavel in Davon's Watch.
Hazards include: Flame Wall
See also: The Banished Cells I

BOSS.name: 炼狱巨口
BOSS.des:
The Maw of the Infernal is a colossal daedroth boss of the Banished Cells II. When first seen, it is tied up by chains and will break them off to enter combat. It has the ability to create fire obstacles every time it strikes. Combined with its high health, this ability can quickly fill the room with fire if this boss isn't kited carefully. It has a chance to drop the Staff of Conflagration, a unique item in the Sanctuary set.
It is also the namesake of the Maw of the Infernal set and the basis of a trophy and bust.

skills.name: 挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does minor physical damage.

skills.name: 烈焰吐息
skills.des: The boss breathes fire out dealing moderate flame damage over time as indicated by a red cone.

skills.name: 献祭噬咬
skills.des: The boss bites the tank causing flaming AOEs to appear at the target's location. A new AOE appears every few seconds. This AOE persists for a long time and thus the room will eventually fill with fire if the boss is not killed quickly enough.

BOSS.name: 看守者伊米里尔
BOSS.des: Keeper Imiril is a High Elf and a member of the group tasked with keeping High Kinlord Rilis' spirit inside The Banished Cells I.  At some point after defeating Rilis, they form a pact with High Kinlord Rilis, and serve as a boss of The Banished Cells II.  After defeating her in Banished Cells II, there is a small chance that she will drop Firetooth, a unique item in the Jailbreaker item set.

skills.name: 斩击
skills.des: A basic attack that does moderate physical damage. If taunted the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: Corruption
skills.des: The boss summons orbs of magic that bounce around the room, dealing moderate magical damage over time as indicated by a red circle.

The boss disappears and summons five Banekin to attack the party. The next time the boss does this she will summon four Winged Twilights, and the next time she will summon three Clannfear. These should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

skills.name: 魔族爆轰
skills.des: After summoning the creatures, the boss will reappear and cast an explosion around herself that does high magical damage around herself as indicated by a red circle.

BOSS.name: 利里斯亲王
BOSS.des:
High Kinlord Rilis is the spirit of an ancient Altmer found in the Banished Cells I, of which he is the final boss. For all intents and purposes, he is actually a Xivilai, the form he takes when he possesses Keeper Cirion. He has a chance of dropping two unique items: the Staff of the Banished and the Corruptor's Maul.
He also has a rare chance to drop the antiquity lead for the Silverthread Stitching mythic item fragment for Syrabane's Ward.

skills.name: 魔族之箭
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor magic damage.

skills.name: 魔族风暴
skills.des: The boss causes lightning to strike two random players, dealing moderate flame damage and causing flame AoEs to appear under them for a short time, dealing moderate flame damage as indicated by red circles.

At regular intervals throughout the fight, the boss summons Daedroth and Feast orbs from the altar. Killing the Feast orbs is necessary to prevent him from healing, while killing the Daedroth will simplify the fight. Having three or more Daedroth alive at the time the boss is defeated will net players the hard mode achievement on Veteran.

skills.enName: Curse of Suffering and Curse of Dominance
skills.des: The boss will levitate a random player in the air. When the player lands, they will be inflicted with a random curse as indicated by red or blue runes around them, dealing moderate magical damage over time. The damage can only be removed by going to the cleanse pads of the corresponding color at the side of the room.

skills.name: 传送
skills.des: The boss teleports around to avoid your attacks.

achievement.name: 放逐地牢 II 胜利者
achievement.des: 在放逐地牢 II 中，击败看守者阿蕾杜尔、炼狱巨口、看守者沃拉尼尔、看守者伊米里尔、席娜和维拉姐妹和及利里斯亲王。

achievement.name: 放逐地牢 II 征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）放逐地牢 II 中，击败炼狱巨口、伊米里尔和利里斯亲王。

achievement.name: 被诅咒的英雄
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）放逐地牢 II 中，在三个或更多魔鳄兽存活的情况下击败利里斯亲王。

achievement.name: 碎骨者 II（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）放逐地牢 II 中击败120个骷髅。

achievement.name: 利里斯魔人杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）放逐地牢 I I中击败300个魔人。

achievement.name: 放逐地牢 II 幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）放逐地牢 II 中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败看守者伊米里尔、阿蕾杜尔和沃拉尼尔，以及炼狱巨口、席娜和维拉姐妹，并最终击败利里斯亲王。

achievement.name: 放逐地牢 II 刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）放逐地牢 II 中，在20分钟内，击败看守者伊米里尔、阿蕾杜尔和沃拉尼尔，以及炼狱巨口、席娜和维拉姐妹，并最终击败利里斯亲王。当遭遇第一批被放逐的骷髅时开始计时。

name: 黑心港口
mystery: 在进入伊利亚克湾后，波西河的河面变得宽阔起来，流经数十个小岛，这些小岛长期以来一直是走私者和海盗的避难所。这些藏身处中最臭名昭著的就是黑心港口。
des:
Blackheart Haven is a group dungeon found in Bangkorai.
The island is the hideout of the infamous Captain Blackheart and his crew. A pirate, Shifty Tom, wants you to help him turn over a new leaf by defeating his former captain and crewmates.  You can learn about its location from Tiny Talisse in Rawl'kha, Mighty Mordra in Evermore, or Ferocious Jakidi in Riften.
Its final boss, Captain Blackheart, has a chance to drop the Torc Strand of Song antiquity lead for the Torc of Tonal Constancy.

BOSS.name: 阿塔鲁斯
BOSS.des: Atarus is an Ogrim found in Blackheart Haven. When defeated, it has a chance to drop Atarus' Masher, a unique weapon in the Undaunted Unweaver item set.

skills.name: 敲击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does minor physical damage.
Atarus vomits green slime in front of itself dealing moderate poison damage over time as indicated by a red cone.
Atarus summons a ball of stew from the nearby pot which lands on the ground where a player is standing dealing moderate poison damage over time and snaring as indicated by a red circle.

skills.name: 擒拿
skills.des: Atarus charges at a player in a straight line, dealing physical damage and knocking down targets hit as indicated by a red rectangle.

skills.name: 震地践踏
skills.des: The boss stomps dealing moderate physical damage, knocking back and stunning all targets around itself as indicated by a red circle.

skills.name: 野蛮生长
skills.des: At around 20% health, Atarus drums on its chest and glows green, growing to twice his size. This also heals Atarus back to around 60% health (Fleshheal), and causes its stomp, tackle, stew and vomit AoE attacks to become larger but retain the same damage. It is possible to kill Atarus before the transformation completes if the group's damage is high enough.

BOSS.name: 乌鸦之母
BOSS.des: The Roost Mother is a Hagraven encountered in Blackheart Haven, where she serves as a boss. When defeated, they have a small chance to drop Roost Mother's Branch, a unique weapon in the Undaunted Unweaver item set. You do not need to kill her in order to progress to Blackheart's Cove.

skills.name: 火之霆击
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that does minor flame damage.

skills.name: 烈焰之息
skills.des: The boss releases fire in front of itself dealing high flame damage as indicated by a red cone. Avoid standing in front of the boss unless you are the tank.

skills.name: 渡鸦风暴
skills.des: The boss charges up and releases a line of flaming ravens in front of itself dealing high flame damage and stumbling any players hit. This attack has no red indicator to keep an eye out for it.

skills.name: 火焰献祭
skills.des: The boss breathes fire in the air and causes ravens to fall to the ground around players, dealing high flame damage on impact and moderate flame damage over time as indicated by red circles.

skills.name: 传送
skills.des: The boss teleports around to avoid your attacks.

BOSS.name: 黑心船长
BOSS.des:
Captain Blackheart is the skeleton leader of the pirates of Blackheart Haven. He can be found in the cove at the final part of the dungeon, next to his ship, the Black Death. During the battle with him, he will be accompanied by Bone Scouts and Undying Pillagers.
Blackheart came to be in this state after making a deal with Molag Bal. His log can be found on the beach.

skills.name: 刺击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals moderate physical damage.

Captain Blackheart temporarily turns a group member into a Skeleton, where they are unable to cast abilities. This attack cannot be escaped using Precognition, but it can be avoided by being in Werewolf form.

skills.name: 横劈
skills.des: Captain Blackheart crouches then spins around, dealing moderate physical damage around himself as indicated by a red circle.

skills.enName: Summon Bone Scout and Undying Pillager
skills.des: Captain Blackheart summons Bone Scouts and Undying Pillagers to attack the party. These adds while weak will spawn constantly, and thus players may want to clear them out while damaging the boss if possible.

achievement.name: 黑心港口胜利者
achievement.des: 在黑心港口击败阿塔鲁斯、乌鸦之母和黑心船长。

achievement.name: 黑心港口征服者
achievement.des: 击败铁踵、阿塔鲁斯、大副斩浪、乌鸦之母、空洞之心和黑心船长，完成（老兵模式）黑心港口。

achievement.name: 洗劫一空
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）黑心港口中，在召唤光辉战斗卷轴之后击败黑心船长。

achievement.name: 鹰妖杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）黑心港口中击败400个鹰妖。

achievement.name: 海盗杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）黑心港口中击败500个港口海盗。

achievement.name: 黑心港口幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）黑心港口中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败铁踵、阿塔鲁斯、大副斩浪、乌鸦之母、空洞之心和黑心船长。

achievement.name: 黑心港口刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）黑心港口中，在开启地下城后20分钟内击败铁踵、阿塔鲁斯、大副斩浪、乌鸦之母、空洞之心和黑心船长。当第一名玩家离开起始码头时开始计时。

name: 受佑熔炉
mystery: 来自泰姆瑞尔各地的战士都在悄声议论着那个隐藏在天际省群山深处的竞技场，受佑熔炉。在那里，强者们争夺着名誉、财富和传说中的硫磺王冠。
des:
The Blessed Crucible is a group dungeon found in the Rift.
This dungeon takes place in a vast daedric ruin repurposed as a gladiatorial arena. In it, you must help Talres Voren pay off his debts by winning the tournament and becoming the Champion of the Crucible.  You can learn about its location from Vlesyl the Skin-Stealer in Rawl'kha, Sluz the Beryl-Chested in Evermore, or Kailstig the Axe in Riften.
Bottomless Pits and Lava Pools serve as environmental hazards in the dungeon.
A letter is located on the top bunk of one of the beds to the right of the entrance to the Gladiators' Quarters. There is a chest to the left of this room's exit.
Several books are located on the plaques of statues in the chamber preceding the Lava Queen's arena, which tell of the Crucible's ten champions: Aleris the Shroud, Crow Bringer, Hagrof the Righteous, The Thousand Arrows, Lucius the Stalwart, Whitebear, Ferian Darkstorm, Felhorn, Sanarel the Great and The Lava Queen. The tale of Josef the Intolerant is located in the previous room.

BOSS.des:
Werewolves are monstrous, half-man, half-wolf hybrid creatures. They are taller and broader than man and mer, and are capable of moving on two limbs or sprinting on all four. They have a weakness to poisons, but are incredibly strong, and very fast. Some werewolves, often through alchemical or magical augmentation, can evolve into behemoths.
Players can become a werewolf if infected. This unlocks the ability to transform, as well as an associated Lycanthropy skill line. For more information, see the lore page.

skills.name: 挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack where the werewolf slashes its target, dealing low physical damage.

skills.name: 利爪斩击
skills.des: A basic double-hitting melee attack where the werewolf swipes at its target with its claws twice, the first hit dealing low physical damage and the second hit dealing minor physical damage.

skills.name: 狂野之跃
skills.des: The werewolf leaps into the air and delivers a crushing blow on its target, dealing moderate physical damage and staggering them. This can be blocked to negate the stagger and to set the werewolf off-balance.

skills.name: 嚎叫
skills.des: The werewolf rears back before howling fiercely at its target, indicated by a red cone, dealing low physical damage and knocking them down for a long time, though Break Free can be used. Blocking negates the knockdown.

skills.name: 鞭笞怒火
skills.des: Following Howl, the werewolf slashes its target with its claws several times, indicated by a red cone, dealing low physical damage with each hit, and ends with a bite, dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 血腥气息
skills.des: The werewolf howls, buffing the damage done by itself and nearby werewolves and making their back pelt glow red. (Only used by black werewolves, and only if another werewolf is nearby)

skills.name: 吞噬
skills.des: The werewolf rushes over to a slain ally and eats its corpse to quickly regain health.

skills.name: 自然之握
skills.des: When werewolves die in Dragonstar Arena, they leave two areas on top of each other. One deals high damage over time and the other restores your magicka and stamina. The damaging one increases its damage with each tick you take with stacks that last 10 seconds.

BOSS.name: 驯兽大师
BOSS.des: The Beast Master is a huge Nord who has trained beasts from all over Tamriel, and is competing with some of them at the Blessed Crucible: a herd of Incineration Beetles, the Stinger, and the Troll King. She will eventually be crushed by the Troll King once he frees himself from his cage.

Incineration Beetles are a magically corrupted strain of shalk that have been gathered for use in the Blessed Crucible. The Beast Master brought them from the ashlands of Morrowind. You will face four of them at once as the first challenge the Beast Master has prepared for you.

skills.name: 巨颌噬咬
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does minor physical damage.

skills.name: 火之喷吐
skills.des: When hit, the beetle releases three balls of fire onto the ground around itself dealing moderate flame damage over time. These fire pools persist for a long time and thus players should ensure they have enough damage to kill the beetles before the entire arena is covered.

BOSS.name: 毒刺
BOSS.des: The Stinger is a Giant Scorpion trained by the Beast Master of the Blessed Crucible. She will announce it with the words, "Prepare yourself, combatants! Pray to your gods and make your peace. You face the Stinger!" After you slay him, she will say: "What? Impossible? How did you win?"

skills.name: 双重打击
skills.des: Two basic melee attacks that does minor physical damage each.

skills.name: 毒素喷涌
skills.des: The boss stabs its stinger into the ground causing poison to erupt from under the players as indicated by red circles dealing moderate poison damage.

skills.name: 施毒
skills.des: The boss shoots a ball of poison at a target causing them to take moderate poison damage.

skills.name: 投射毒素
skills.des: Getting hit by Envenom will cause the target and all players near them to take minor poison damage over time.

BOSS.name: 巨魔王
BOSS.des: The Troll King is a giant armored troll trained by the Beast Master of the Blessed Crucible. She will announce it with the words, "From the volcanic island of Vvardenfell. A creature of fury that knows no mercy. The vicious ... the cruel ... the Troll King!" They have a chance to drop Beastmaster's Crop, a unique item.

skills.name: 挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does minor physical damage.

skills.name: 大地强袭
skills.des: The boss pounds the ground releasing shockwaves in front of itself that deal moderate physical damage to all players hit.

skills.name: 跳跃震压
skills.des: The boss jumps on a target dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 冰冻之环
skills.des: The boss releases a wave of frost from itself dealing continuous moderate frost damage and snaring as indicated by a large red circle.

skills.name: 再生
skills.des: The Troll King passively regenerates ~0.3% of its max health every two seconds. (~6,600 in Veteran)

BOSS.name: 熔岩女王
BOSS.des:
The Lava Queen is a Dark Elf and the current champion of the Blessed Crucible, as well as one of its greatest as she has remained undefeated for over four centuries with her powerful fire magic.
She has a two unique items that may be dropped, Brimstone Staff, and Claymore of the Crucible.

skills.name: 挥扫
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does minor physical damage.

skills.name: 压制挥击
skills.des: A heavy melee attack that does high physical damage and knocks the target down. This can be blocked to stagger The Lava Queen instead.

skills.name: 烈火烧身
skills.des: The boss shoots a fireball at a target dealing moderate flame damage then moderate flame damage over 6 seconds..

skills.name: 致爆
skills.des: The boss stabs the ground and summons many lava lines that travel outwards from her location dealing very high flame damage to all players hit. This must be avoided at all costs, so keep a distance from her when she does this attack.

At 75%, 50% and 25% health, the boss will summon 1, 2, and 3 lava atronachs to shield her respectively. While they are alive, she is immune to damage in the form of damage shields and thus they must be killed as soon as possible. Follow the beams that they channel towards the boss to find them quickly and defeat them. Note that if she skips a health threshold by doing a lot of damage quickly to her, the skipped thresholds will not activate at all. If the DPS is especially high and she gets under 25% health before any Lava Atronachs have been spawned, only 3 Lava Atronachs will appear.

achievement.name: 受佑熔炉胜利者
achievement.des: 在受佑熔炉击败兽群、驯兽大师和熔岩女王。

achievement.name: 受佑熔炉征服者
achievement.des: Complete Veteran Blessed Crucible by defeating Grunt the Clever, the Pack, Teranya the Faceless, Troll King, Captain Thoran, and Lava Queen.

achievement.name: 火之加冕礼
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）受佑熔炉中，在召唤光辉战斗卷轴之后击败熔岩女王。

achievement.name: 地精犬杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）受佑熔炉中击败150个地精犬。

achievement.name: 角斗士杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）受佑熔炉中击败500个角斗士。

achievement.name: 受佑熔炉幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）受佑熔炉中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败聪明的格朗特、兽群、无面者特兰雅、巨魔王、索兰队长和熔岩女王。

achievement.name: 受佑熔炉刺客
achievement.des: 在开启地下城后20分钟内击败（老兵模式）受佑熔炉中的每个Boss。当任意小队成员通过岩浆上的第一座桥时开始计时。

name: 灰烬之城 I
mystery: 不是所有的木精灵都乐于见到瓦伦伍德加入先祖神州。一些人为他们心爱的森林担忧，而另一些人则担心他们的遗产和传统会被淡化或取代。几群木精灵退入了丛林深处的避难所。
des:
The City of Ash I is a group dungeon found in Greenshade.
Formerly known as the graht-oak city Whisper Grove, a recently opened Oblivion Gate and hordes of Daedra have turned the Bosmeri city into a dangerous burning ruin. The city's desperate inhabitants have even resorted to breaking the Green Pact, constructing barriers of fallen wood to stem the flow of invading Daedra.
You can learn about its location from Mindil the Untested in Marbruk, Abzag the Monster in Shornhelm, or Roaring Ramavel in Stormhold.
See also: City of Ash II

BOSS.name: 炼狱守护者
BOSS.des: The Infernal Guardian is a burning Lurcher encountered in the City of Ash I, where it serves as a boss. The Infernal Guardian Monster Helm Set is named after it, although it doesn't drop any pieces. It does, however, have a chance to drop a unique item named Wildmaul.

skills.name: 双重强袭
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does moderate physical damage. If taunted the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 荆棘反击
skills.des: The boss slaps the target, dealing moderate physical damage and inflicting Bleeding, which is a minor physical damage over time.

skills.name: 大地强袭
skills.des: The boss slams the ground, dealing moderate physical damage around itself as indicated by a red circle. This also staggers all enemies within.

skills.name: 炽烈爆炸
skills.des: The boss spews fire in front of itself as indicated by red circles. This does high flame damage and should be avoided by standing behind the boss.

skills.name: 吞噬之火
skills.des: While casting Fiery Explosion, the boss will deal minor flame damage around itself.

skills.name: 掘地根须
skills.des: The boss stomps sending roots to hit a player far away from it. This deals moderate physical damage and staggers the target.

BOSS.name: 神龛守望者
BOSS.des: The Warden of the Shrine is a Dremora encountered in City of Ash I, where he serves as a boss. He is clad in Daedric style medium armor, apart from his hat which is in Xivkyn style. His maces are both in Daedric style. He has a chance to drop either Staff of the Grove or Aegis of Ash.

skills.name: 轻型横扫
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does moderate physical damage. If taunted the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 精准升天击
skills.des: A heavy melee attack that does high physical damage as well as knockback. Players should block this attack to prevent the knockback and reduce damage taken. If taunted the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 炽热火焰
skills.des: The boss spins around releasing pools of fire on the ground dealing high flame damage over time as indicated by red circles. There are two versions of this attack, one where all the circles are next to him, and one where the circles are a bit further out. For the one that is further out, the player may choose to stand in the middle of the AOEs, which is safe.

skills.name: 传送打击
skills.des: The boss teleports onto players far away from him, dealing moderate damage and stunning them.

BOSS.name: 利刃大师厄尔萨斯
BOSS.des: Razor Master Erthas is a Wood Elf leading the cult devouted to Mehrunes Dagon located in the City of Ash I. Gilraen says he was their original leader, convincing the community to reject the Dominion and build the city of Whisper Grove, masquerading as a decent elf for years before revealing true colors as the leader of the Dagon Cell. His unique loot is the Bow of the Deadlands and Betrayer's Axe.

skills.name: 快速拔取
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that does minor physical damage.

skills.name: 熔岩场
skills.des: The boss throws a ball of fire on the ground that spreads out into 4 fire lines. Avoid these.

skills.name: 烈焰之箭
skills.des: The boss shoots a flaming arrow at a target, dealing moderately high flame damage over time for a very long time. This DOT cannot be purged, but can be removed by swimming in the water between islands in the boss arena.

skills.name: 召唤烈焰侍灵
skills.des: The boss summons a flame atronach to attack the party. These should be killed quickly to simplify the fight. At around 20% health, he will summon 4 at once.

skills.name: 传送
skills.des: The boss will teleport between islands occasionally. Simply follow him around accordingly and save ultimates for just after he teleports to ensure they will not be wasted.

achievement.name: 灰烬之城 I 胜利者
achievement.des: 在灰烬之城 I 中，击败炼狱守护者、神龛守望者和利刃大师厄尔萨斯。

achievement.name: 灰烬之城 I 征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）灰烬之城 I 中，击败炼狱守护者、灾星操控者格罗尔、神龛守望者、黑暗余烬、罗莎里尔·焰心和利刃大师厄尔萨斯。

achievement.name: 救火队
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）灰烬之城 I 中，在召唤光辉战斗卷轴之后击败利刃大师厄尔萨斯。

achievement.name: 死地灾星杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）灰烬之城 II 中击败550个灾星。

achievement.name: 烈焰侍灵杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）灰烬之城 II 中击败60个烈焰侍灵。

achievement.name: 灰烬之城 I 幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）灰烬之城 I 中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败炼狱守护者、神龛守望者和利刃大师厄尔萨斯。

achievement.name: 灰烬之城 I 刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）灰烬之城 I 中，在开启地下城后20分钟内击败炼狱守护者、神龛守望者和利刃大师厄尔萨斯。当玩家遭遇第一批魔族时开始计时。

name: 灰烬之城 II
mystery: 灰烬之城早已再次被大自然占据。那里还有一个传送门没有封死，存在着威胁，只有少数人留下来抵御它。
des:
The City of Ash II is a group dungeon found in Greenshade.
The storyline continues from the events of City of Ash I. In this version, Fingaenion intends to travel to the Deadlands to rescue his wife Gilraen from Mehrunes Dagon, and he needs your help.
You can learn about its location from Mindil the Untested in Marbruk, Abzag the Monster in Shornhelm, or Roaring Ramavel in Stormhold.
Centipedes and scorpions are found in numbers inside. Hazards include: Bottomless Pits and Lava Pools
See also: City of Ash I

BOSS.name: 火焰巨口霍凡塔德
BOSS.des:
Horvantud the Fire Maw is a gigantic armored Daedroth found in City of Ash II. Horvantud has a chance to drop the unique item Fire Maw's Fang.
During the fight, Dremora Beldakyn, Harstryls, Kynlurkers, Kynval, and Morikyn will drop down in the arena to assist him it the fight.

skills.name: 锯齿之爪
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does minor physical damage.

skills.name: 烈焰巨颚
skills.des: The daedroth bites the player, doing moderate physical damage. This attack also applies the "Burning" effect, which does minor flame damage over time.

skills.name: 烈焰吐息
skills.des: The daedroth breathes fire, doing moderate flame damage over time to all players in front of it as indicated by a red cone.

skills.name: 大地震颤
skills.des: The boss pounds the ground causing quakes to appear under the player's feet and around the arena, dealing moderate physical damage as indicated by red circles.

skills.name: 战栗
skills.des: The boss stomps, causing shockwaves to travel out from itself dealing moderate physical damage and staggering all players hit.

skills.name: 召唤魔人
skills.des: Throughout the fight as its health drops, various Dremora will jump down to attack the group. They will disappear once the boss dies. The group should balance damaging the boss and killing the Dremora summoned. Alternatively, if damage is high enough, the group can choose to focus the boss only before the damage from the adds becomes overwhelming.

skills.name: 盾牌
skills.des: At 20% health, the boss summons a shield around itself that must be broken by damaging it.

BOSS.name: 灰烬泰坦
BOSS.des:
The Ash Titan is Daedric Titan which serves Mehrunes Dagon and has been imbued with destructive flame. It serves as a guardian for Valkyn Skoria and is a boss for the City of Ash II.
It may drop the unique Splitting Axe of the Titan, part of the Sunderflame set.

skills.name: 熔岩箭
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor flame damage. This attack will hit anyone standing in front of the boss (not just the tank) so players are advised to keep behind the boss if possible.

skills.name: 喷薄烈焰
skills.des: Getting hit by Lava Bolt will cause a flame AOE to appear under you dealing moderate flame damage over time.

skills.name: 骇人顺劈斩
skills.des: The boss swings its arm dealing high flame damage and knockback to all enemies in front of it as indicated by a red cone.

skills.name: 炽焰降雨
skills.des: The boss shoots flame in the air causing fireballs to rain down on players and the general area dealing moderate flame damage as indicated by red circles. Some of the fireballs are unavoidable, and so players should be ready to shield up or heal up once the attack occurs.

skills.name: 烈火涌动
skills.des: The boss flaps its wings knocking back nearby players. Following that the boss releases waves of flame that deal high flame damage and stunning any players hit. Stay far away from the boss during this to avoid being hit. If you are hit, break free immediately so you can avoid any other incoming waves.

At 60 and 30% health, the boss becomes invulnerable and walks to a nearby pad to activate an Air Atronach to attack the party. The atronachs will continuously spin and chase a target. A common strategy is to have the tank taunt the atronachs as they spawn and kite them around the edge of the arena while the rest of the group kills the boss. Alternatively, it is also possible to kill the atronach first before killing the boss, although this will take longer.

BOSS.name: 瓦尔金·斯科里亚
BOSS.des: Valkyn Skoria is a minion of Mehrunes Dagon. He leads the attack on the graht-oak city formerly known as Whisper Grove in Greenshade.

skills.name: 火焰打击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor flame damage.

skills.name: 流星打击
skills.des: A heavy melee attack that deals high physical damage.

skills.name: 火焰突刺
skills.des: The boss summons a flaming pool at its location that releases lines of flame dealing moderate flame damage. Stay away from it to avoid the fire lines.

skills.name: 平台引爆
skills.des: After an amount of time, he will move to the center of the platform he's standing on and drive his claymore into it, breaking the platform and forcing players to migrate to a new one to avoid the lava. He will summon a few flame atronachs after teleporting to a new platform. This will continue until no platforms remain. Players should ensure the group has enough damage to kill the boss before all platforms are gone.

skills.name: 火焰迸射
skills.des: After teleporting, the boss summons a shield around himself that shoots fireballs continuously as long as its up dealing moderate flame damage over time to all players.

skills.name: 熔岩囚牢
skills.des: The boss throws rocks at two random players stunning them for a long time. While stunned, players will take moderate flame damage over time. Break free to counter this.

skills.name: 烈焰霆击
skills.des: The boss will randomly target a player and channel a fireball in one hand that will knock back (called Flame Bolt Knockdown) its target if it hits.

skills.name: 流星
skills.des: Throughout the fight meteors will randomly strike the platform dealing moderate flame damage as indicated by red circles.

achievement.name: 死地洞察
achievement.des: 完成与老兵灰烬之城 II 相关的下列成就。

achievement.name: 灰烬之城 II 征服者
achievement.des: 通过击败火焰巨口霍凡塔德、灰烬泰坦和瓦尔金·斯科里亚完成（老兵模式）灰烬之城 II。

achievement.name: 小菜一碟
achievement.des: 探索魔人的烹饪传统。

achievement.name: 无畏者救星
achievement.des: Rescue all of the members of the failed Undaunted expedition to the Deadlands of Mehrunes Dagon.

achievement.name: 燃烧的世界
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）灰烬之城 II 中，与严寒之书达成契约，然后击败瓦尔金·斯科里亚。

achievement.name: 梅鲁涅斯魔人杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）灰烬之城 II 中击败300个魔人。

achievement.name: 火焰巨像杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）灰烬之城 II 中击败50个火焰巨像。

achievement.name: 致命死地幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）灰烬之城 II 中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，击败鲁克汗、玛尔鲁兹、阿克泽尔、尤拉塔军团、火焰巨口霍凡塔德、灰烬泰坦以及通往瓦尔金·斯科里亚的桥上的魔族，并最终击败瓦尔金·斯科里亚。

achievement.name: 灰烬之城 II 刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）灰烬之城 II 中，在33分钟内，击败鲁克汗、玛尔鲁兹、阿克泽尔、尤拉塔军团、火焰巨口霍凡塔德、灰烬泰坦，修复桥梁，并最终击败瓦尔金·斯科里亚。当玩家进入内部树林时开始计时。

achievement.name: 灰烬之城 II 胜利者
achievement.des: 在灰烬之城 II 中，击败火焰巨口霍凡塔德、灰烬泰坦和瓦尔金·斯科里亚。

name: 心灵地穴 I
mystery: 这里令人生畏的黑塔从几里外就能看到，即便是破碎尖顶的流雾也无法遮蔽它们的身影。然而当地的居民却从不提及这个地方，就像它根本不存在一样。但心灵地穴绝非什么幻象或是幻影——它实实在在存在于世。
des:
The Crypt of Hearts I is a group dungeon found in Rivenspire.
Formerly a school teaching Destruction magic, sword fighting, alchemy, and possibly even Daedric summoning, the crypt is now home to some of the tortured souls of its teachers and of its students. In this version Alanwe needs you to piece together her soul which is currently contained in three phylacteries scattered throughout the Crypt.
You can learn about its location from Eraegaer the Kill-Happy in Marbruk, Ilmindil the Incendiary in Shornhelm, or Roaring Ramavel in Stormhold.
The final bosses, Ilambris-Athor and Ilambris-Zaven, have a chance to drop the Thirsting Girdle antiquity lead for the Bloodlord's Embrace.
See also: Crypt of Hearts II

BOSS.name: 大师斯聂尔
BOSS.des: Archmaster Siniel is a powerful High Elf necromancer found in the Crypt of Hearts I. During the fight he will summon hordes of zombies, temporarily becoming invulnerable until each wave is defeated. He may drop the Archmaster's Ritestaff when defeated.

skills.name: 幻影箭
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor magical damage.
The boss summons three Zombies to attack the party. These should be killed quickly to simplify the fight. The Archmaster summons zombies

skills.name: 恐惧术
skills.des: The bosss summons a large specter that deals moderate magical damage and fears all players it hits.

skills.name: 死灵仪式
skills.des: The boss summons an AOE on the ground that deals moderate magical damage over time as indicated by a red circle.

skills.name: 尸爆
skills.des: The boss channels a large explosion that deals unavoidable magical damage that will reduce you to low health, regardless of your defenses. Healers should keep their party's health high before the attack completes to prevent deaths.

BOSS.name: 死神的利维坦
BOSS.des: Death's Leviathan is a powerful Bone Colossus found in the Crypt of Hearts I. It may drop the Bonehammer when defeated.

skills.name: 反手一击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does minor physical damage.

skills.name: 踩踏
skills.des: The boss rushes forward dealing moderate physical damage and knocking players down as indicated by a red circle. The tank should face the boss towards a wall to minimize the chance that it hits anyone when charging. After the boss gets Ignited, this attack will leave behind a burning trail.

skills.name: 火之轨迹
skills.des: A wall of fire that deals moderate flame damage over time created by Trample after the boss is Ignited.

skills.name: 麻痹猛击
skills.des: The boss stomps dealing high physical damage as indicated by a large red circle. This attack can be blocked to reduce damage taken. After the boss is Ignited, the stomp will also produce an unavoidable wave of fire that knocks all players down. Blocking is even more crucial at this stage as the player will get hit by both the stomp and the fire wave simultaneously, which can be lethal if unblocked.

skills.name: 引燃
skills.des: When at around 50% health, the boss runs to a nearby brazier to pick up some flaming embers granting itself a buff that increases its damage done.

BOSS.name: 伊拉姆布里斯·亚索尔
BOSS.des:
Ilambris-Athor is a Xivilai shock mage found in the Crypt of Hearts I. Together with his twin Ilambris-Zaven, he was summoned by Nerien'eth to torture Alanwe and keep the shards of her soul from reuniting.
He is one of the final bosses of this dungeon, and killing him and his brother dispels their magic, allowing Alanwe to reform, completing the dungeon. He has a chance to drop the Thirsting Girdle antiquity lead for the Bloodlord's Embrace.
Ilambris-Athor and Zaven reappear in Crypt of Hearts II at a suspected ritual site. Early into the fight, they merge together to become the Ilambris Amalgam.

skills.name: 穿刺挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does minor shock damage.

skills.name: 斧头打击
skills.des: A heavy melee attack that does high physical damage while knocking the target down. This should be blocked or dodged if possible.

skills.name: 雷电之牢
skills.des: The boss summons a pool of lightning (called a Lightning Rod) on top of a player that lasts for a long time and deals moderate shock damage. Players should ensure they have enough damage to kill the boss before the entire arena fills up with AOEs.

skills.name: Call Lightning
skills.des: If Ilambris-Zaven is killed first, Ilambris-Athor will start summoning many lightning bolts that deal moderate shock damage as indicated by red circles. Simply keep moving to avoid being hit.

achievement.name: 心灵地穴 I 胜利者
achievement.des: 在心灵地穴 I 中，击败大师斯聂尔、死神的利维坦和伊拉姆布里斯双子。

achievement.name: 心灵地穴 I 征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）心灵地穴 I 中，击败大法师、大师斯聂尔、死神的利维坦、尤尔卡·骨手、狂战士多加斯和伊拉姆布里斯双子。

achievement.name: 双子的墓穴
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）心灵地穴 I 中，在召唤光辉战斗卷轴之后击败伊拉姆布里斯双子。

achievement.name: 地穴骷髅杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）心灵地穴 I 中击败400个骷髅。

achievement.name: 地穴僵尸杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）心灵地穴 I 中击败400个僵尸。

achievement.name: 心灵地穴 I 幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）心灵地穴 I 中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败大法师、大师斯聂尔、死神的利维坦、尤尔卡·骨手、狂战士多加斯和伊拉姆布里斯双子。

achievement.name: 心灵地穴 I 刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）心灵地穴 I 中，在开启地下城后20分钟内击败大法师、大师斯聂尔、死神的利维坦、尤尔卡·骨手、狂战士多加斯和伊拉姆布里斯双子。当玩家遭遇第一批不死族时开始计时。

name: 心灵地穴 II
mystery: 这里令人生畏的黑塔从几里外就能看到，即便是破碎尖顶的流雾也无法遮蔽它们的身影。然而当地的居民却从不提及这个地方，就像它根本不存在一样。但心灵地穴绝非什么幻象或是幻影——它实实在在存在于世。
des:
The Crypt of Hearts II is a group dungeon found in Rivenspire.
Formerly a school teaching Destruction magic, sword fighting, alchemy, and possibly even Daedric summoning, the crypt is now home to some of the tortured souls of its teachers and of its students.
The storyline continues from the events of Crypt of Hearts I. In this version, Alanwe once again needs your help defeating her former husband, who has returned to torment her following her escape from torture.
You can learn about its location from Eraegaer the Kill-Happy in Marbruk, Ilmindil the Incendiary in Shornhelm, or Roaring Ramavel in Stormhold.
The final boss, Nerien'eth, has a chance to drop the Great Eltheric Pearl antiquity lead for the Pearls of Ehlnofey.
See also: Crypt of Hearts I

BOSS.name: 鲁索祖扎帕玛
BOSS.des:
Ruzozuzalpamaz is a Spider Daedra found within the Crypt of Hearts II. She serves as the first boss the players have to defeat to progress.
Her unique drop is Ruzozuzalpamaz's Charged Barb.

skills.name: 吐口水
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deal moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 闪电猛攻
skills.des: Ruzozuzalpamaz releases streaks of lightning from itself as indicated by red circles. This attack does moderate shock damage and thus the tank should face the boss away from the party to reduce the chance of them being hit.

skills.name: 蠕变风暴
skills.des: Ruzozuzalpamaz places a large AOE under a random player. This attack does high shock damage over time as indicated by a red circle. This AOE will move along with the player it is targeting, thus that player should lead the AOE away from the rest of the party by running a lap along the side of the room until it dissipates.

Ruzozuzalpamaz wraps a random player in a cocoon. This attack deals low shock damage on-hit then moderate poison damage over time. Other party members must go near the trapped player and press the synergy key to free them. This attack can also be escaped using Precognition.

skills.name: 蛛群
skills.des: Ruzozuzalpamaz summons many spiders to attack the party. They should be killed as soon as possible to simplify the fight.

BOSS.name: 伊拉姆布里斯混合体
BOSS.des: The Ilambris Amalgam is a Bone Colossus found in Crypt of Hearts II that serves as the second boss of the dungeon. It is summoned after Ilambris-Athor and Ilambris-Zaven merge together early in the fight.

skills.name: 炎火地狱
skills.des: When swapping to the fire phase, the boss stomps dealing moderate flame damage and knocking down all players near it as indicated by a red circle. This will also summon 2 flaming skeletons to attack the party. They should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

skills.name: 炽烈爆炸
skills.des: The flaming skeletons will also explode when killed, dealing minor flame damage and knocking down all players nearby. Break free to counter this.

skills.name: 敲击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 骸骨闪光
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor flame damage.

skills.name: 火雨
skills.des: The boss channels spell that causes large flame AOEs to appear all around the arena doing moderate flame damage over time as indicated by large red circles. Keep moving to avoid them, and healers should be ready to heal any damage done. After this, the boss tends to swap to the shock phase.

skills.name: 电击践踏
skills.des: When swapping to the fire phase, the boss stomps dealing moderate shock damage and knocking down all players near it as indicated by a red circle. This will also summon 2 shock mage skeletons to attack the party.

skills.name: Shock
skills.des: The mages will attack the party dealing minor shock damage.

skills.name: 敲击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 白骨电击
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor shock damage.

skills.name: 雷霆之拳
skills.des: The boss slams the ground dealing moderate shock damage in front of it as indicated by a red cone.

skills.name: Call Lightning
skills.des: The boss causes lightning to strike all around the arena as indicated by red circles. Keep moving to avoid this. After this, the boss tends to swap to the flame phase.

skills.name: 最终风暴
skills.des: The boss uses both Call Lightning and Rain fire at once, and summons 2 shock and 2 fire skeletons to attack the group. The group should save ultimates to burn the boss quickly at this phase if possible.

BOSS.name: 奈恩斯
BOSS.des: Nerien'eth is a High Elf lich found inside the Crypt of Hearts II. The chamber he is in contains the Ebony Blade and is accessed from a portal guarded by Mezeluth. He has a chance to drop Nerien'eth's Forsaken Staff.

skills.name: 死灵之矛
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor magical damage.

skills.name: 死灵爆轰
skills.des: The boss face his target, charges up and shoots a large skull at a random player. The player should block or dodge this if possible. If not dodged the target gets "Necrotic Remnant"

skills.name: 死灵残迹
skills.des: Deals magic damage over time.

The boss summons lich crystals under all players dealing moderate magical damage over time as indicated by red circles (Cursed Ground). At the same time, smaller projectiles will shoot out towards all players dealing moderate unavoidable magical damage over time (Necrotic Swarm). Healers should be prepared to heal any damage done, while players move around to avoid Cursed Ground.

skills.name: 力量脉动
skills.des: The boss teleports to a random target and channels a large explosion around himself dealing very high magical damage equivalent to 75% of the target's maximum health. Avoid this if possible by moving as soon as you see him teleporting near you. Healers should be ready to heal any damage taken quickly.
Occasionally, the boss will teleport to a grate in the arena and summon 2 wraiths to attack the party. They should be killed quickly to simplify the fight, unless going for the hard mode achievement.

skills.name: 萎靡光辉
skills.des: The boss will first stun everyone dealing minor magical damage.

skills.name: 嗜血狂欲
skills.des: The boss teleports to a random target and grabs them, draining life from them while dealing minor magical damage over time. At the same time, a damage shield appears around the boss. Players must break the shield around the boss quickly to free the grabbed player. The grabbed player must use the Resist Necrosis synergy to minimize the damage done.

skills.name: 血腥行刑
skills.des: If players do not break the shield fast enough, the boss will kill the grabbed player in one hit.

At the same time, lich crystals will spawn under players dealing moderate magical damage over time (Cursed Ground) followed by high magical damage when it explodes (Soul Surge) as indicated by red circles. Keep moving to avoid this while damaging the boss.

skills.name: 敏锐打击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 重劈
skills.des: A charged heavy melee attack that deals high physical damage and knocks the target down. Block or dodge this if possible.

skills.name: 致命突刺
skills.des: The boss stabs a target, dealing moderate oblivion damage.

skills.name: 致命切割
skills.des: Getting hit by Lethal Stab will apply a moderate magical damage over time.

skills.name: 乌木旋风斩
skills.des: The boss charges at a target and spins around dealing high physical damage around them and staggering targets. The target's arms will glow red to telegraph this. Block or dodge this attack if possible. If blocked you get snared instead.

achievement.name: 心灵地穴 II 胜利者
achievement.des: 在心灵地穴 II 中，击败伊贝尔加斯特、鲁索祖扎帕玛、密室守护者、伊拉姆布里斯兄弟和伊拉姆布里斯混合体、梅泽露丝和奈恩斯。

achievement.name: 心灵地穴 II 征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）心灵地穴 II 中，击败鲁索祖扎帕玛、伊拉姆布里斯兄弟和伊拉姆布里斯混合体，以及奈恩斯。

achievement.name: 利刃边缘
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）心灵地穴 II 中，允许4名奈恩斯的学生全部存活到他获得乌木刃，并最终将他们全部击败。

achievement.name: 血肉侍灵杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）心灵地穴 II 中击败50个血肉侍灵。

achievement.name: 蛛魔人杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）心灵地穴 II 中击败250个蛛魔人。

achievement.name: 致命洞穴幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）心灵地穴 II 中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，击败伊贝尔加斯特、鲁索祖扎帕玛、密室守护者、伊拉姆布里斯混合体和梅泽露丝，并最终击败奈恩斯。

achievement.name: 心灵地穴 II 刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）心灵地穴 II 中，在开启地下城后30分钟内，击败伊贝尔加斯特、鲁索祖扎帕玛、密室守护者、伊拉姆布里斯混合体和梅泽露丝，并最终击败奈恩斯。当入口大门开启时开始计时。

name: 暗影洞穴 I
mystery: 这些洞穴是迪沙安最有名的克瓦玛虫矿洞。暗精灵认为克瓦玛虫蛋是一种美味，从暗影洞穴采集的克瓦玛虫蛋特别受到暗精灵美食家的追捧。
des:
Darkshade Caverns I is a group dungeon found in southeastern Deshaan.
As Deshaan's largest kwama mine, the caverns' ownership remains hotly contested. The caverns also contain the hidden Dwemer ruin of Rkugamz. In the normal version, Tervur Sadri wants you to help him reclaim his mine from the thugs within.
You can learn about its location from Mad Zebba outside Elden Root, Lady Blade outside Wayrest, or Hranir Icy-Mane outside Mournhold.
The following item sets will drop both Darkshade Caverns I and II: Armor of Truth, Netch's Touch, and Strength of the Automaton.

BOSS.name: 洛斯安工头
BOSS.des: Foreman Llothan is a Dark Elf kwama miner found in Darkshade Caverns I, acting as the dungeon's first boss. He has a chance of dropping Llothan's Burning Crutch. He is clad in Dwemer Style light armor and robes, and his staff is in the same style.

skills.name: Shock
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor shock damage.

skills.name: 毒素萃取物
skills.des: The boss throws a bottle of poison at the ground near a target dealing moderate poison damage over time as indicated by a red circle.

skills.name: 爆炸分流
skills.des: The boss releases an explosion around himself dealing high shock damage and knocking players back as indicated by an expanding red circle, after which he then runs away. He only uses this when players are too close to him for too long. If you are fighting him at range, chances are he'll never use this attack.
Occasionally, the boss summons a small swarm of Kwama Scribs to attack the party. These should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

BOSS.name: 虫巢领主
BOSS.des: The Hive Lord is a kwama warrior found in Darkshade Caverns I. It serves as an optional boss, and has a chance of dropping the Hive Lord's Shell.

skills.name: 双重挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does moderate physical damage. If taunted, the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 高空粉碎
skills.des: An attack that staggers and damages all enemies within the red cone in front of the boss. This attack can be difficult to dodge as it is very fast. The tank may want to face the boss away from the group to reduce the chance of them getting hit.

skills.name: 防御本能
skills.des: The boss will pound the ground, dealing high physical damage over time to all enemies in a circle around it. This attack can be interrupted or avoided, although interrupting is easier as the red circle telegraph is very large.

skills.name: 跳跃打击
skills.des: The boss will randomly leap on a player, dealing moderate physical damage and stunning him or her. The boss will only target players that are at a long distance from it, thus players may want to stay near the boss to avoid getting hit by this attack.

skills.name: 召唤克瓦玛幼虫
skills.des: The boss will summon kwama scribs to assist it in battle, and thus they should be killed quickly. The scribs will emerge from the ground as indicated by a red circle, and any player standing on that area when the scribs emerge will be damaged and stunned.

BOSS.name: 库加姆的哨兵
BOSS.des:
The Sentinel of Rkugamz is a Dwarven centurion found in Darkshade Caverns I. It serves as the third and final boss, and it must be defeated to complete the dungeon.
It has a chance to drop the Imperial Arm-Cleaver, the Imperial Warhammer, head pieces from the Sentinel of Rkugamz set (Veteran mode only), and the Antiquity lead for Dwarven Articulated Paws.

skills.name: 锤击
skills.des: The boss strikes you with its hammer arm.

skills.name: 粉碎
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does moderate physical damage. It has the ability to hit all enemies in front of the boss as indicated by a red cone, and thus the tank may want to face the boss away from the party to reduce the chance of them getting hit. If taunted, the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only. Occurs during the green phase.

skills.name: 斩首挥击
skills.des: A charged up swing that does very high physical damage. Getting hit will also knock the player back. Blocking will reduce the damage taken and prevent the knock back. If taunted, the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only. Occurs during the green phase.

skills.name: Steel Cyclone
skills.des: The centurion turns red in color and spins around continuously, while chasing a random player. This attack does high physical damage over time to any players near the boss, thus the player being chased should kite the boss around to prevent damage.

skills.name: 炮火网
skills.des: The centurion turns blue in color and fires bolts of electricity. These will land on the ground as indicated by the red circles doing moderate shock damage to all players within. Players should move to avoid this. Occurs during the blue phase.

The centurion turns green and summons a few Centurion Spiders. These spiders emit a healing aura as indicated by the green circles. If the boss stands in these green circles, it will be substantially healed. The party should either kite it away from these spiders or kill them.

achievement.name: 暗影洞穴 I 胜利者
achievement.des: 在暗影洞穴 I 中，击败洛斯安工头、虫巢领主和库加姆的哨兵。

achievement.name: 暗影洞穴 I 征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影洞穴 I 中，击败牧者首领内罗伦、洛斯安工头、虫巢领主、洞穴头领、库加姆的哨兵和切割之球。

achievement.name: 超出保修期
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影洞穴I中，在召唤光辉战斗卷轴之后击败库加姆的哨兵。

achievement.name: 克瓦玛虫杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影洞穴 I 中击败300个克瓦玛虫。

achievement.name: 矿坑鼠杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影洞穴 I 中击败175个矿坑鼠恶棍。

achievement.name: 暗影洞穴 I 幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影洞穴 I 中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败牧者首领内罗伦、洛斯安工头、虫巢领主、洞穴头领、库加姆的哨兵和切割之球。

achievement.name: 暗影洞穴 I 刺客
achievement.des: Defeat Head Shepard Neloren, Foreman Llothan, the Hive Lord, the Cavern Patriarch, the Sentinel of Rkugamz, and the Cutting Sphere in Veteran Darkshade Caverns I within twenty minutes of starting the dungeon. Timer starts when a group member descends into the caverns.

name: 暗影洞穴 II
mystery: 这些洞穴是迪沙安最有名的克瓦玛虫矿洞。暗精灵认为克瓦玛虫蛋是一种美味，从暗影洞穴采集的克瓦玛虫蛋特别受到暗精灵美食家的追捧。
des:
Darkshade Caverns II is a group dungeon found in southeastern Deshaan.
As Deshaan's largest kwama mine, the caverns' ownership remains hotly contested. The caverns also contain the hidden Dwemer ruin of Rkugamz.
The storyline continues from the event of Darkshade Caverns I. In this version, a Mages Guild researcher named Shatasha needs your help destroying a dangerous Dwemer mechanism within Rkugamz, before it corrupts Deshaan above.
You can learn about its location from Mad Zebba outside Elden Root, Lady Blade outside Wayrest, or Hranir Icy-Mane outside Mournhold.
Its dungeon sets are Armor of Truth, Netch's Touch, and Strength of the Automaton. Darkshade Caverns II is accessible starting at level 42.

BOSS.name: 变异虫巢领主
BOSS.des: The Transmuted Hive Lord is a kwama warrior found in Darkshade Caverns II, of which it is a boss. It is an alternate version of The Hive Lord, a miniboss from the same dungeon.

skills.name: 陷落
skills.des: The Hive Lord smashes the ground, causing damage to all players. He also gains a small damage shield. When this shield is burned down, he stops using this ability. His scribs dig underground when he starts this attack.

skills.name: 震动粉碎
skills.des: The Hive Lord smashes the ground with its fists.

skills.name: 尖爪
skills.des: The Hive Lord swipes at you with its claws.

BOSS.name: 变异格罗布尔
BOSS.des: Grobull the Transmuted is a netch that serves as the second boss in Darkshade Caverns II. Although at first it appears to be wounded, Grobull will rise up and attack once you approach.

skills.name: 反射结界
skills.des: Grobull puts up a shield around him that makes him reflect all incoming damage back onto the player.

skills.name: 传送
skills.des: Grobull chases after a random player, teleporting around to close the distance.

skills.name: 发射闪电
skills.des: Once on top of the player, the boss releases a burst of lightning under itself as indicated by a red circle. This attack does very high shock damage and should be avoided at all costs.

skills.name: 衰弱陷阱
skills.des: The boss throws lightning balls that form pools of blue lightning on the ground. Standing in it will stun the player, and thus players should avoid it or break free from it.
The boss summons many netchlings to attack the party. Killing them will slowly deplete the boss's shield.

BOSS.name: 引擎守护者
BOSS.des:
The Engine Guardian is a giant Dwarven Spider that serves as the final boss of Darkshade Caverns II. It is found behind the door to Rkugamz.
It has a chance to drop an Ancient Great Axe and the Antiquity lead for Dwarven Horngrip. In Veteran mode it can drop an Engine Guardian set helmet.

achievement.name: 暗影洞穴 II 胜利者
achievement.des: 在暗影洞穴 II 中，击败堕落工头、变异虫巢领主、变异鳄蜥、变异格罗布尔、引擎守军和引擎守护者。

achievement.name: 暗影洞穴 II 征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影洞穴 II 中，击败变异虫巢领主、变异格罗布尔和引擎守护者。

achievement.name: 致命工程师
achievement.des: Defeat the Engine Guardian in Darkshade Caverns II without anyone in your group activating an Engine Lever.

achievement.name: 构造体杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影洞穴 II 中击败800个矮人构造体。

achievement.name: 克瓦玛虫杀戮者  II（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影洞穴 II 中击败200个克瓦玛虫。

achievement.name: 暗影洞穴 II 幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影洞穴 II 中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败堕落工头、变异虫巢领主、变异鳄蜥、变异格罗布尔、引擎守军和引擎守护者。

achievement.name: 暗影洞穴 II 刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影洞穴 II 中，在20分钟内，击败堕落工头、虫巢领主和它的克瓦玛幼虫、变异鳄蜥、变异格罗布尔、引擎守军和引擎守护者。遭遇第一批克瓦玛虫时开始计时。

name: 恐霜要塞
mystery: 作为远古时代恐霜氏族的家园，这座冰冻的城堡一直处于与外界隔绝的状态，其主人们已经有几个世代以来都没有丝毫消息。由某种未知的邪恶力量召唤出来的山间风暴在城堡上空肆虐。
des:
Direfrost Keep is a group dungeon found in Eastmarch.
Once the ancestral home of the witch hunting Direfrost clan, the castle has been abandoned following an attack by the ice witch Drodda. A surviving member of the clan, Eboric Direfrost, needs your help to reclaim his home.  You can learn about its location from Untouchable Naim outside Velyn Harbor, Twice-Lucky in Sentinel, or Felvyn the Swordarm in Windhelm.
Its dungeon sets are Draugr Hulk, Magicka Furnace, and The Ice Furnace.
A chest can spawn under the bridge leading to the keep's main gate, and on top of the sewer grate that leads into the dungeon.
Its final boss, Drodda of Icereach, has a chance to drop the Snowy Sabre Cat Fur Strip antiquity lead for the Snow Treaders.

BOSS.name: 烈焰守护者
BOSS.des: The Guardian of the Flame is a powerful Draugr which guards the Direfrost Flame within Direfrost Keep.

BOSS.name: 寒冰之心
BOSS.des:
Iceheart, a Frost Atronach, is one of the bosses of Direfrost Keep. He has a chance of dropping the Shard of Iceheart. This boss is not required to complete the dungeon but is required for the associated pledge.
It is also the namesake of the Iceheart set and style, and the basis of a trophy and bust. Iceheart also has an equivalent Opal Undaunted style.

skills.name: 升天击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does moderate frost damage.

skills.name: 冻结践踏
skills.des: The boss stomps dealing moderate frost damage around itself and staggering players as indicated by a red circle.

skills.name: 痛击
skills.des: The boss swings its fist dealing high frost damage and knocking players back as indicated by a red cone in front of itself.

skills.name: 极地复苏
skills.des: The boss jabs its fist in the ground, causing icicles to erupt under the player's feet dealing moderate frost damage as indicated by red circles. After a while, the icicles explode to summon ice skeletons. These should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

BOSS.name: 冰境的德萝达
BOSS.des: Drodda of Icereach is a Nord witch who took control of Direfrost Keep many years ago from the family of witchhunters who owned it.

skills.name: 寒冰霆击
skills.des: A basic attack that does high frost damage. This attack is untauntable and the boss will attack anyone at will.

skills.name: 生命冻结
skills.des: The boss channels a beam that stuns a random player doing high magic damage over time. This skill will also heal the boss for very large amounts over time. Players should break free as soon as possible to avoid damage, and to stop the boss from healing.

skills.name: 穿刺碎片
skills.des: The boss teleports over to a random player and channels a large explosion around her as indicated by a red circle. This attack does very high frost damage and should be avoided at all costs. On Hard Mode this attack does significantly more damage.

skills.name: 召唤冰霜怒灵
skills.des: The boss summons two Ice Wraiths to attack the party. These should be tanked and killed quickly to simplify the fight.

skills.name: 强化寒冰箭
skills.des: This attack now does more frost damage and will hit anyone in front of the boss. Similarly, it is untauntable as before.

skills.name: 生命冻结
skills.des: The boss channels a beam that stuns a random player doing high magic damage over time. This skill will also heal the boss for very large amounts over time. Players should break free as soon as possible to avoid damage, and to stop the boss from healing.

skills.name: 穿刺碎片
skills.des: The boss teleports over to a random player and channels a large explosion around her as indicated by a red circle. This attack does very high frost damage and should be avoided at all costs.

skills.name: 召唤寒霜侍灵
skills.des: The boss summons two Frost Atronachs to attack the party. These should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

achievement.name: 恐霜要塞胜利者
achievement.des: 在恐霜要塞击败烈焰守护者、强化寒霜侍灵和冰境的德萝达。

achievement.name: 恐霜要塞征服者
achievement.des: 通过击败冰冻的碎牙者、烈焰守护者、德萝达的学徒、德萝达的恐怖领主、寒冰之心和冰境的德萝达，完成（老兵模式）恐霜要塞。

achievement.name: 尘埃落定
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐霜要塞中，在召唤光辉战斗卷轴后击败冰境的德萝达。

achievement.name: 尸鬼杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐霜要塞中击败325个尸鬼。

achievement.name: 冰冻骷髅杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐霜要塞中击败350个冰冻骷髅。

achievement.name: 恐霜要塞幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐霜要塞中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败冰冻的碎牙者、烈焰守护者、德萝达的学徒、德萝达的恐怖领主、寒冰之心和冰境的德萝达。

achievement.name: 恐霜要塞刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐霜要塞中，在开启地下城后20分钟内击败冰冻的碎牙者、烈焰守护者、德萝达的学徒、德萝达的恐怖领主、寒冰之心和冰境的德萝达。从任意玩家进入第一个有熊的洞穴时开始计时。

name: 艾尔登洞穴 I
mystery: 崇拜魔族的野精灵在阿莱西亚的奴隶起义中被驱逐出了西罗帝尔，其中一些野精灵氏族躲到了瓦伦伍德避难。而最先抵达的一支氏族抓住了机会，在艾尔登之根下面挖出了栖身之地。
des:
Elden Hollow I is a group dungeon found under Elden Root in central Grahtwood.
In this version, the Mages Guild is looking into reports of a strange ritual happening within Elden Hollow and need protection from the hostile Wood Orcs of the Darkfern Clan.
You can learn about its location from Venomous Fauridil outside Elden Root, Hel Ra'Lala outside Wayrest, or Thongar the Stout outside Mournhold.
Its final boss, Canonreeve Oraneth, has a chance to drop the Face of the Serpent antiquity lead for the Ring of the Wild Hunt.

BOSS.name: 阿卡什·格拉-玛尔
BOSS.des: Akash gra-Mal is an Orc warrior of the Darkfern Clan found in Elden Hollow I. She can be found in the second room after the waterfall, in front of a blacksmith's forge and a flaming altar of bone. She is clad in Wood Elf Style heavy armor. She and Canonreeve Oraneth are in an intimate relationship, as is evident from a letter from the canonreeve and Akash's dialogue.

skills.name: 迅捷打击
skills.des: A basic melee ability that deals low physical damage.

skills.name: 战吼
skills.des: Akash shouts in a cone-shaped radius in front of her, dealing minor physical damage, staggering anyone in range.

skills.name: 跳跃打击
skills.des: If Akash's target moves too far away from her, she leaps at them to close the gap, dealing physical damage when she lands.

skills.name: 狂战士之怒
skills.des: Akash swings her battleaxe around her, dealing moderate physical damage to anyone standing in range.

skills.name: 处决打击
skills.des: A heavy attack that deals major physical damage and knocks back the target if it isn't blocked.

BOSS.name: 窒息荆棘
BOSS.des: Chokethorn is a gigantic strangler found in Elden Hollow I, of which it is a boss. Its unique loot is Chokethorn's Healing Root. It must be defeated in order to unseal Canonreeve Oraneth's room.

skills.name: 穿刺打击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 拉拽之握
skills.des: The boss pulls in players that are far away, stunning them briefly.

skills.name: 真菌爆发
skills.des: The boss releases a burst of poison around itself as indicated by a large red circle. This attack deals high poison damage and should be blocked or avoided.
The boss summons saplings that will heal it over time. They should be interrupted or killed quickly to prevent this.

BOSS.name: 奥拉内斯族长
BOSS.des:
Canonreeve Oraneth is a disgruntled Wood Elf (see note below) member of the Thalmor. She is extremely unhappy with the number of Altmer dying on behalf of the Aldmeri Dominion in the Alliance War. As her proposal to abdicate the Altmer from the Dominion was strongly opposed, Oraneth started to search for other means to save her people. She has now come to the point where she is prepared to do something that might make her an enemy of her own people in order to end the war.
She is also a former member of the Mages Guild, but quit to take up a career in politics as she found manipulating people and policy to be more satisfying. After becoming frustrated with the number of Altmer dying during the war, she started working on a secret project to end the war swiftly.
The Mages Guild discovered her plans but not the exact nature of the ritual she planned to perform, so they sent three mages, Bakkhara, Dracien Montue, and Speaks-With-Lights, to look into the situation and stop her if they could. They arrived at Elden Hollow but were unable to make any progress because of the Thalmor. They ask for your help to kill the enemies within, and they will follow and disrupt the ritual. By the third altar you will find and have to defeat the Canonreeve, but she managed to progress the ritual enough to release the evil in the cave.
She has a chance to drop the Face of the Serpent antiquity lead for the Ring of the Wild Hunt.

skills.name: 幻影箭
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor magical damage.

skills.name: 死灵爆发
skills.des: The boss releases a burst of magic around itself that deals very high magical damage as indicated by a red circle.

The boss occasionally summons a shield around itself that absorbs all incoming damage before being broken. This occurs periodically so the party should ensure they have enough damage to break the shield and damage the boss in a timely manner.

skills.name: 死灵圆环
skills.des: The boss places a rune under a player that roots whoever falls into it in place dealing moderate magical damage over time.

skills.name: 腐坏箭
skills.des: The boss winds up and shoots a projectile that deals high poison damage over time to a random target. This must be dodged if possible.
When Necrotic Circle ends, several Darkfern Skeletons will be summoned from the circle to attack the party. They should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

achievement.name: 艾尔登洞穴 I 胜利者
achievement.des: 击败艾尔登洞穴 I 中的阿卡什·格拉-玛尔、窒息荆棘和迦农丽芙·奥拉内斯。

achievement.name: 艾尔登洞穴 I 征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）艾尔登洞穴 I 中，击败阿卡什·格拉-玛尔、远古树精、窒息荆棘、奈内什·格罗-玛尔、涌叶和迦农丽芙·奥拉内斯。

achievement.name: 迦农丽芙击杀者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）艾尔登洞穴 I 中，在召唤光辉战斗卷轴之后击败迦农丽芙·奥拉内斯。

achievement.name: 鳄蜥杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）艾尔登洞穴 I 中击败100个鳄蜥。

achievement.name: 黑蕨兽人杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）艾尔登洞穴 I 中击败400个黑蕨兽人。

achievement.name: 艾尔登洞穴 I 幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）艾尔登洞穴 I 中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败阿卡什·格拉-玛尔、远古树精、窒息荆棘、奈内什·格罗-玛尔、涌叶和迦农丽芙·奥拉内斯。

achievement.name: 艾尔登洞穴 I 刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）艾尔登洞穴 I 中，在开启地下城后20分钟内击败阿卡什·格拉-玛尔、远古树精、窒息荆棘、奈内什·格罗-玛尔、涌叶和迦农丽芙·奥拉内斯。当玩家遭遇第一批梭默的时候开始计时。

name: 艾尔登洞穴 II
mystery: 崇拜魔族的野精灵在阿莱西亚的奴隶起义中被驱逐出了西罗帝尔，其中一些野精灵氏族躲到了瓦伦伍德避难。而最先抵达的一支氏族抓住了机会，在艾尔登之根下面挖出了栖身之地。
des:
Elden Hollow II is a group dungeon found under Elden Root in central Grahtwood.
The story continues from the events of Elden Hollow I. In this version, Kargand needs your help rescuing his sister Bakkhara from a Daedric realm. She has been trapped there because of the ritual performed by Canonreeve Oraneth earlier.
You can learn about its location from Venomous Fauridil outside Elden Root, Hel Ra'Lala outside Wayrest, or Thongar the Stout outside Mournhold.

BOSS.name: 黑暗之根
BOSS.des:
The Dark Root is a shadowy spriggan found within Elden Hollow II. It is summoned from the first portal that Kargand enters from after Dubroze the Infestor's defeat, and is the first boss.
Its unique drop is the Dark Root of Restoration.

skills.enName: Summon Mystic Guardian and Frenzied Guardian

BOSS.name: 邪光
BOSS.des:
The Murklight is a shadowy lurcher found within a pocket Daedric realm guarding Bakkhara. The realm is accessed during the events of Elden Hollow II, and Murklight serves as the second boss.
Its unique drop is the Murkhammer.

skills.name: 双重强袭
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does high physical damage.

skills.name: 吞噬暗影
skills.des: The boss summons pools of shadow under each player's feet. This does high magical damage over time as indicated by the red circles. This attack is usually followed by Eclipse.

skills.name: 日蚀
skills.des: The boss envelops the room in shadow, and the red circles turn white. Players should now stand within the white circles, as the area outside the white circles now do high magical damage over time.

BOSS.name: 夜火波格丹
BOSS.des:
Bogdan the Nightflame is a Daedric Titan that serves as the third and final boss of Elden Hollow II.
Bogdan is the ruler of a plane of Oblivion that specializes in shadows. In an attempt to bring the Three Banners War to a quick end, Canonreeve Oraneth made a deal with him, promising to grant his forces passage into Nirn in exchange for power. When the Khajiit mage Bakkhara is imprisoned in Bogdan's realm in the aftermath of Oraneth's defeat, her brother Kargand leads a rescue attempt with the player's help.
You must save Bakkhara and kill Bogdan, but as he dies the Titan's spirit possesses Kargand; forcing you to choose between killing Kargand and ending Bogdan's threat forever, or sparing him in the hopes that Bakkhara can help her brother. If Kargand is spared, then Bogdan, through Kargand, will mock you for your mercy; claiming that it is only a matter of time before he takes complete control over Kargand's body, and vowing that you will be his first target once he does so.

skills.name: 挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does minor physical damage.

skills.name: 烧毁
skills.des: The boss breathes fire dealing high flame damage to a single target, usually the tank.

skills.name: 魔族火焰
skills.des: Bogdan spews fire that lands and stays on various areas around the platform, dealing high flame damage to those that touch it. The fire persists for a very long time, and the only time it is cleared is during Pulverize. The party should ensure they have enough damage to bring the boss to the respective health checkpoints before the fire covers the entire ground.

skills.name: 碾碎
skills.des: At 75, 50 and 25%, the boss jumps up and lands dealing unavoidable high flame damage to all players. Healers should be prepared to top up the party's health when that happens. In addition, this attack will remove all Daedric Flame AOEs on the ground and kill all Shadow Tendrils/Nova Tendrils currently alive.

skills.name: 召唤卷须
skills.des: The boss summons Shadow Tendrils from below to fear random players, and should be killed if possible. On hard mode, Nova Tendrils that heal the boss will also be summoned. The heal can be interrupted or the tendril killed to stop this.

achievement.name: 艾尔登洞穴 II 胜利者
achievement.des: 在艾尔登洞穴 II 中，击败感染者杜布罗泽、黑暗之根、恐怖存在阿扎拉、邪光、暗影守卫和夜火波格丹。

achievement.name: 艾尔登洞穴 II 征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）艾尔登洞穴 II 中，击败黑暗之根、邪光和夜火波格丹。

achievement.name: 关闭书籍
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）艾尔登洞穴 II 中，在阅读折磨之书后击败夜火波格丹。

achievement.name: 灾星杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）艾尔登洞穴 II 中击败140个灾星。

achievement.name: 木傀儡杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）艾尔登洞穴 II 中击败60个木傀儡。

achievement.name: 艾尔登洞穴 II 幸存者
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，击败感染者杜布罗泽、黑暗之根、恐怖存在阿扎拉、邪光、暗影守卫和夜火波格丹。

achievement.name: 艾尔登洞穴 II 刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）艾尔登洞穴 II 中，在开启地下城后20分钟内击败感染者杜布罗泽、黑暗之根、恐怖存在阿扎拉、邪光、暗影守卫和夜火波格丹。当玩家遭遇第一批魔族时开始计时。

name: 真菌岩洞 I
mystery: 这些石落下方火山岩中的广阔洞穴，曾经为古代北地精灵用来进行未知的活动。被精灵遗弃了很长的岁月后，现在这些洞穴成了哥布林和其他地下居民的居所。
des:
Fungal Grotto I is a group dungeon located northwest of Iliath Temple.
The cave is infested with goblins and dreugh, though the goblins are scared of something dark lurking deep within the grotto. In this version, Vila Theran wants you to clear the path to a shrine hidden within the grotto.
You can learn about its location from Mindil the Untested in Vulkhel Guard, Abzag the Monster in Daggerfall, or Kailstig the Axe in Davon's Watch.
Its dungeon sets are Dreugh King Slayer, Spider Cultist Cowl, and Viper's Sting.

BOSS.name: 战争酋长奥佐扎伊
BOSS.des: War Chief Ozozai is a goblin found in Fungal Grotto I, of which he is a boss. He for the most part is clad in Heavy Armor in the Nord Style, apart from his gauntlets and sabatons which are in the Primal Style. His sword is also in the Primal Style.

skills.name: 斩击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does minor physical damage.

skills.name: 震慑咆哮
skills.des: A crowd control ability that staggers all players near him dealing minor physical damage.

skills.name: 魔族爆轰
skills.des: The boss channels a beam at a target causing them to explode dealing moderate magical damage around themselves as indicated by a red circle. Try to run away from teammates if this attack is cast on you to minimize damage done.

skills.name: 重拳强击
skills.des: A heavy melee attack that does high physical damage while also knocking the target back. This attack should be blocked if possible.

skills.name: 恶毒冲锋
skills.des: The boss can rush towards targets that are far away to close the gap, dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 震荡突袭
skills.des: When the fight starts, the boss will jump from his platform on top of a player, dealing minor physical damage.

BOSS.name: 蟹灵王克拉格
BOSS.des: Kra'gh the Dreugh King is a dreugh and the final boss of Fungal Grotto I. It is the namesake of the Kra'gh set and the basis of a trophy, bust, and outfit style.

skills.name: 入口
skills.des: When Kra'gh the Dreugh King appears, it busts through a rock wall. Any player too close will get knocked back.

skills.name: 锯齿挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 猛扑撞击
skills.des: A heavy melee attack that does high physical damage and knocks the target back. This can be blocked to stagger Kra'gh the Dreugh King instead.

skills.name: 疾风乱舞
skills.des: Kra'gh the Dreugh King channels a series of swipes at a target in front of it, dealing moderate shock damage over time.

skills.name: 闪电牵引
skills.des: Kra'gh the Dreugh King pulls a target that is far away toward himself.

skills.name: 闪电力场
skills.des: Kra'gh the Dreugh King summons a large storm around himself, dealing very high shock damage as indicated by a red circle. Blocking doesn't reduce damage taken.

skills.name: 召唤泥沼蟹
skills.des: At 66% and 36% health, the boss will run to a fixed location in the arena to summon a few weak mudcrabs to attack the party. These should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

achievement.name: 真菌岩洞 I 胜利者
achievement.des: 在真菌岩洞 I 中击败哥布林战争酋长和蟹灵王。

achievement.name: 真菌岩洞 I 征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）真菌岩洞 I 中，击败族群大师塔兹卡德、战争酋长奥佐扎伊、育母蟹灵、响螯和蟹灵王克拉格。

achievement.name: 当日收获
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）真菌岩洞 I 中，在召唤光辉战斗卷轴之后击败蟹灵王。

achievement.name: 蟹灵杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）真菌岩洞 I 中击败50个蟹灵。

achievement.name: 哥布林杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）真菌岩洞 I 中击败450个哥布林。

achievement.name: 真菌岩洞 I 幸存者
