achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）真菌岩洞 I 中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败族群大师塔兹卡德、战争酋长奥佐扎伊、育母蟹灵、响螯和蟹灵王克拉格。

achievement.name: 真菌岩洞 I 刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）真菌岩洞 I 中，在15分钟内击败族群大师塔兹卡德、战争酋长奥佐扎伊、育母蟹灵、响螯和蟹灵王克拉格。在第一批哥布林之后，当任意玩家进入隧道时开始计时。

name: 真菌岩洞 II
mystery: 这些石落下方火山岩中的广阔洞穴，曾经为古代北地精灵用来进行未知的活动。被精灵遗弃了很长的岁月后，现在这些洞穴成了哥布林和其他地下居民的居所。
des:
Fungal Grotto II is a group dungeon located northwest of Iliath Temple
The storyline continues from the events of Fungal Grotto I. In this version, Defender Two-Blades needs you to defeat the Spider Cultists who have taken control of a dangerous artifact called the Obsidian Husk.
You can learn about its location from Mindil the Untested in Vulkhel Guard, Abzag the Monster in Daggerfall, or Kailstig the Axe in Davon's Watch.
Its dungeon sets are Dreugh King Slayer, Spider Cultist Cowl, and Viper's Sting.

BOSS.name: 加梅尼·班杜
BOSS.des:
Gamyne Bandu is a Dark Elf member of the Spider Cult found in both Fungal Grotto I, as well as Fungal Grotto II. While she is initially friendly, she later serves as the first boss of Fungal Grotto II.
In Fungal Grotto II, she will be frozen in place on a boulder, being awoken by four mages after the spider cultists in the room are killed.

skills.name: 斩击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does moderate physical damage. If taunted, the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 撕裂者
skills.des: A heavy melee attack that does high physical damage as well as knocking the target back. Blocking will reduce the damage taken and prevent the knockback. If taunted, the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 刑求
skills.des: The boss damages and stuns a random player, and four Shadow Tormentors chain the player to the ground. A sword appears above the player's head and slowly descends. This attack cannot be avoided, and players cannot break free from it. To escape, the other members only need to kill one of the Shadow Tormentors in order to free the player.

skills.name: 暗影行刑
skills.des: If the players fail to free the trapped party member in time, the sword will impale that player resulting in an instant death.

skills.name: 阴影锁链
skills.des: The boss throws a purple orb at a random player. If the orb hits, that player will take moderate magical damage. On top of that, a purple beam may form between that player and another player. The purple orb can be dodged by rolling to ensure the beam does not form.

The beam does high magical damage over time. To break the beam, the two players must move away from each other until the beam breaks. To minimize the damage done by this attack, players should spread apart so the beam breaks faster.

At various points throughout the fight, the boss will vanish and summon four Obsidian Aspects to attack the party. These enemies do moderate physical damage. Once all four have been defeated, the boss reappears. There appears to be no time limit to this stage of the fight, and players can keep one of the aspects alive to buy them time to recover resources before resuming the fight.

BOSS.name: 梅法拉的后裔
BOSS.des:
The Spawn of Mephala is a large spider daedra that serves as the second boss of Fungal Grotto II.
Its unique drops are the Webspinner's Brace and Debaser.
This boss has a small leashing radius to prevent exploits. It cannot be led onto the small bridge nearby, as this will reset the fight. Originally the boss could be taunted onto the bridge to avoid all damage.

skills.name: 刺穿
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does high physical damage.

skills.name: 魔族爆炸
skills.des: The boss's arms glow blue and it charges up a large burst of energy around itself. This attack does high magical damage as indicated by a red circle.

skills.name: 暗影箭
skills.des: The boss spits a purple bolt at a random player. This attack does high magical damage and knocks the player back. This attack can be avoided by rolling.

skills.name: 魔族毁灭
skills.des: Lasers will appear from the altars above the arena and target the ground near a random player, causing an explosion at the point of contact. This attack does high magical damage and is indicated by an expanding red circle. Players should note that the laser will move in an attempt to focus on you, and thus constant movement will help the player avoid this attack.

skills.name: 死亡是你唯一的解脱
skills.des: The boss will summon a portal at the back of the arena. This portal will suck the nearest player in and transport them to a small cave. To escape, the player has to kill all the spiders within. To make the fight easier, one of the DPS should stand near the portal, so as to prevent the tank or the healer from getting sucked in. Note that if the boss is low on health (roughly 10%), any player currently inside the cave will be transported back regardless of whether any spiders remain. No more portals will appear after that point as well.

BOSS.name: 维拉·瑟兰
BOSS.des: Vila Theran is the head of the expedition searching for the Spinner's Shrine within Fungal Grotto. While she is initially friendly in Fungal Grotto I, she serves as the third and final boss of Fungal Grotto II.

skills.name: 蔓延腐蚀
skills.des: The boss teleports to three random players and drops black circles on them. These black circles grow in size and do high magical damage over time as indicated by red circles. To minimize the area covered, players should stay near each other so that the circles overlap as much as possible. A common strategy is for the party to stay near the entrance and wait for her to teleport over and drop the circles. When that happens, the party moves over to her starting position. When she teleports back, the party moves back to the entrance and so on.

skills.name: 暗影管路
skills.des: This attack is telegraphed by a pillar of light appearing over the boss's head. The boss will then fire lasers at all players, dealing high magical damage over time. To stop this, players can run into the protective bubble around the nearby wayshrine. Alternatively, if the party has enough healing, the players may choose to outheal the damage instead. Killing Vila Theran without using the protective bubble will net players an achievement.

achievement.name: 真菌岩洞 II 胜利者
achievement.des: 在真菌岩洞 II 中，击败梅法拉的獠牙、加梅尼·班杜、牧蛛人西蕾纳斯、梅法拉的后裔、雷格尔·暗晨和维拉·瑟兰。

achievement.name: 真菌岩洞 II 征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）真菌岩洞 II 中，击败加梅尼·班杜、梅法拉的后裔和维拉·瑟兰。

achievement.name: 无畏攻击者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）真菌岩洞 II 中，在没有任何小队成员使用黑曜石之壳的保护的情况下，击败维拉·瑟兰。

achievement.name: 蜘蛛杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）真菌岩洞 II 中击败200个蜘蛛。

achievement.name: 黑曜石杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）真菌岩洞 II 中击败425个黑曜石战士。

achievement.name: 真菌岩洞 II 幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）真菌岩洞 II 中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败梅法拉的獠牙、加梅尼·班杜、牧蛛人西蕾纳斯、梅法拉的后裔、雷格尔·暗晨和维拉·瑟兰。

achievement.name: 真菌岩洞 II 刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）真菌岩洞 II 中，在开启地下城后20分钟内击败梅法拉的獠牙、加梅尼·班杜、牧蛛人西蕾纳斯、梅法拉的后裔、雷格尔·暗晨和维拉·瑟兰。当玩家遭遇第一批蜘蛛邪教徒时开始计时。

name: 夕月之网
location: South of the Maw of Lorkhaj
mystery: Even by the standards of
des:
Selene's Web is a group dungeon found in Reaper's March.
A group of Mages Guild members led by Warlock Carindon are exploring Selene's Web in search of a mysterious forest spirit, and need protection from hostile natives and wildlife.
You can learn about its location from Thulga, Empress of Bone in Rawl'kha, Slays-By-Moon in Evermore, or Kailstig the Axe in Riften.
Hazards include: Bear Traps and Bottomless Pits.

BOSS.name: 长爪
BOSS.des: Longclaw is a Khajiit hunter who serves as the first main boss in Selene's Web. He is found with his Senche-Tiger pack, consisting of Shadowhiskers, Nighteyes, Heartstalker, and Silentpaw. When they are killed, he will raise them as Senche Spirits.

skills.name: 迅捷射击
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 箭雨
skills.des: The boss shoots arrows in the air dealing moderate physical damage over time as indicated by a red circle.

skills.name: 镜像结界
skills.des: The boss maintains a shield that reflects all incoming damage back to the attacker.

skills.name: 毒素射击
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor poison damage.

skills.name: 毒素喷发
skills.des: The boss releases poison around himself stunning nearby players and dealing moderate poison damage over time as indicated by red circles.

skills.name: 翻滚闪避
skills.des: The boss occasionally rolls to avoid your attacks.

BOSS.name: 恶皮
BOSS.des: Foulhide is an enormous bear found inside Selene's Web.

skills.name: 挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.
Throughout the fight, stranglers will spawn in large numbers to attack the group. They tend only to attack players near them and can be safely ignored if far away.

skills.name: 邪恶之槌
skills.des: The boss rears up and slams down dealing moderate physical damage in front of itself as indicated by a red cone. This will also instantly kill any Selene's Roses hit.

skills.name: 践踏冲锋
skills.des: The boss charges forward dealing moderate physical damage and knocking down all players hit as indicated by a red rectangle. This will also kill any Selene's Roses hit.

skills.name: 恐怖咆哮
skills.des: The boss roars fearing all players. Break free to counter this.

BOSS.name: 夕月
BOSS.des:
Selene is a Changeling priestess of Shagrath found in Selene's Web, serving as the matriarch of the Bosmer there. She has a chance to drop either Selene's Scepter or Webcutter. She is also the namesake of the Selene set and the basis of a trophy and bust. At the conclusion of the dungeon, her soul is bound by Warlock Carindon, and he traps her spirit to research it for his future experiments.
Selene returns in the Lair of Maarselok, having been subject to various experiments and painful bindings by Carindon. He brought her spirit and carcass to the Tenmar Valley until Maarselok awoke. The Stags of Z'en have enlisted Carindon's assistance to stop Maarselok, requiring him to unbind Selene at times to halt the effects of the Azureblight. Carindon worries that by loosening his hold on Selene, he risks allowing Maarselok to influence and corrupt her. Selene will use her magic to assist you and cleanse your group members of the Azureblight.

skills.name: 噬咬
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 撕裂毒液
skills.des: A heavy melee attack that deals moderate poison damage over time.

skills.name: 蛛网缠绕
skills.des: Selene selects a player and traps them in a cocoon, requiring them to break free

skills.name: 诱捕
skills.des: Upon reaching approximately 60% of her health, Selene webs the group and penetrates through her web to reach the bottom, dragging everyone down with her.

skills.name: 巴什
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

Selene will continuously bring forth Bosmer followers (Earth Mender, True Shot, and Root Guards). The menders are healers and should be killed quickly, while the guards have a knockback attack that should be blocked.

skills.name: 腾跃
skills.des: The boss summons a spectral Senche-Tiger to leap at a target dealing moderate physical damage and stunning them.

skills.name: 召唤原初之灵
skills.des: The boss summons a spectral bear that slams down in front of her, dealing very high physical damage which is usually a one-shot on vet. This damage must be blocked by the tank. Do not stand in front of the boss if you are not the tank.

skills.name: 诱捕
skills.des: The boss holds up her weapon and pulls all players in towards her. This stun cannot be broken.

skills.name: 召唤原初虫群
skills.des: The boss summons a swarm of bats dealing moderate magical damage over time as indicated by a red circle around her.

achievement.name: 夕月之网胜利者
achievement.des: 在夕月之网中击败长爪、恶皮和夕月。

achievement.name: 夕月之网征服者
achievement.des: 通过击败树子爵克尔宁、长爪、阿克拉雅女王、恶皮、多腿的孟妮尔和夕月，完成（老兵模式）夕月之网。

achievement.name: 一网打尽
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）夕月之网中，在召唤光辉战斗卷轴之后击败夕月。

achievement.name: 夕月的木精灵杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）夕月之网中击败250个夕月的木精灵。

achievement.name: 夕月的蜘蛛杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）夕月之网中击败250个蜘蛛。

achievement.name: 夕月之网幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）夕月之网中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败树子爵克尔宁、长爪、阿克拉雅女王、恶皮、多腿的孟妮尔和夕月。

achievement.name: 夕月之网刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）夕月之网中，在开启地下城后20分钟内击败树子爵克尔宁、长爪、阿克拉雅女王、恶皮、多腿的孟妮尔和夕月。当玩家遭遇第一批木精灵时开始计时。

name: 蛛丝之握洞穴 I
mystery: 德文纳斯的野精灵遗迹从鬼婆沼泽上方的断崖上横断而下，几代人以前就被洗劫一空了。但在德文纳斯最底层下面似乎有一些被遗忘的矿井隧道，里头可能还有东西。
des:
Spindleclutch I is a group dungeon found in northern Glenumbra.
The cave is infested with spiders, although something more sinister lurks within. Praxin Douare wants your help clearing the cave of spiders and other possible threats. In Spindleclutch I, a constant, pervasive whispering sound is present throughout the dungeon, and only gets louder as you descend through the caves.
You can learn about its location from Mindil the Untested in Vulkhel Guard, Mighty Mordra in Daggerfall, or Roaring Ramavel in Davon's Watch.
Its dungeon sets are Knightmare, Prayer Shawl, and Spelunker. Its final boss, The Whisperer, has a chance to drop the Goblet Gorget antiquity lead for the Bloodlord's Embrace.

BOSS.name: 蛛群之母
BOSS.des: Swarm Mother is a big spider found inside Spindleclutch I. It is also the namesake of the Swarm Mother set, style, and the basis of a trophy and bust.

skills.name: 噬咬
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does minor physical damage.

skills.name: 注入毒素
skills.des: A heavy melee attack that does moderate poison damage followed by minor poison damage over time. This can be blocked to stagger the Swarm Mother.

skills.name: 淬毒獠牙
skills.des: The Swarm Mother jumps on targets that are far away from it, dealing moderate poison damage. Stay near the Swarm Mother to prevent this.

skills.name: 召唤蜘蛛
skills.des: Occasionally, the Swarm Mother will summon a group of spiders to attack the party. These should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

skills.name: 阻碍之网
skills.des: The Swarm Mother spits a web on top of a player snaring all players within as indicated by a red circle.

BOSS.name: 低语者
BOSS.des:
The Whisperer is a powerful Spider Daedra that lives deep within Spindleclutch I. It can cause beings that enter the caves to turn on each other. It serves as the second and final boss of Spindleclutch.
Its unique drops are the Spindlecleave and the Whisperwoe. It also has a chance to drop the Goblet Gorget antiquity lead for the Bloodlord's Embrace.

skills.name: 刺穿
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 蛛网爆轰
skills.des: The Whisperer spits a green projectile at a player, doing high physical damage and knocking the player back.

skills.name: 魔蛛恐惧
skills.des: The Whisperer spits a blue orb at a player, doing moderate-high magic damage and stunning the player. The player is then snared and also sees many spiders attacking them, but that is only a hallucination. This cannot be blocked.

skills.name: 抓捕网
skills.des: The Whisperer pulls everyone in front of it towards itself using webs. This is usually followed by Daedric Explosion.

skills.name: 魔族爆炸
skills.des: The Whisperer charges up a large burst of magic around itself that when released deals high magical damage and knocks back as indicated by a red circle. This can be blocked to be staggered instead.

achievement.name: 蛛丝之握洞穴 I 胜利者
achievement.des: 在蛛丝之握洞穴 I 中，击败蛛群之母和低语者。

achievement.name: 蛛丝之握洞穴 I 征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）蛛丝之握洞穴 I 中，击败蛛丝眷属、蛛群之母、寡妇制造者瑟瑞斯、大拉布和低语者。

achievement.name: 终于安静了
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）蛛丝之握洞穴 I 中，在召唤光辉战斗卷轴之后击败低语者。

achievement.name: 腐化者杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）蛛丝之握洞穴 I 中击败350个腐化者。

achievement.name: 蜘蛛杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）蛛丝之握洞穴 I 中击败600个蜘蛛。

achievement.name: 蛛丝之握洞穴 I 幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）蛛丝之握洞穴 I 中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败蛛群之母和低语者。

achievement.name: 蛛丝之握洞穴 I 刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）蛛丝之握洞穴 I 中，在开启地下城后20分钟内击败蛛群之母和低语者。当玩家遭遇第一批蜘蛛的时候开始计时。

name: 蛛丝之握洞穴 II
mystery: 德文纳斯的野精灵遗迹从鬼婆沼泽上方的断崖上横断而下，几代人以前就被洗劫一空了。但在德文纳斯最底层下面似乎有一些被遗忘的矿井隧道，里头可能还有东西。
des:
Spindleclutch II is a group dungeon found in northern Glenumbra.
The storyline continues from the events of Spindleclutch I. In this version, Guardian Sud-Hareem needs help finding his son, who he believes has been captured by vampires within Spindleclutch.
You can learn about its location from Mindil the Untested in Vulkhel Guard, Mighty Mordra in Daggerfall, or Roaring Ramavel in Davon's Watch.
Its dungeon sets are Knightmare, Prayer Shawl, and Spelunker.

BOSS.name: 血裔
BOSS.des: The Bloodspawn is a Gargoyle found in Spindleclutch II, dropping down from above after Guardian Sud-Hareem finds Mereel. It is also the namesake of the Bloodspawn set, style, and the basis of a trophy and bust.

skills.name: 落穴
skills.des: After Bloodspawn smashes the ground, giant rocks by both exits crash down from the ceiling. This occurs the third time Bloodspawn smashes the ground. More rocks fill the arena the more Bloodspawn has the opportunity to smash the ground, getting closer and closer to the edge of Bloodspawn's large smashing AoE. and eventually, after the third time it causes a cave-in, Bloodspawn enrages, and will continuously smash the ground, using only Cave-In, until either it or the group dies. Bloodspawn should be killed quickly to prevent the group from being crushed by rocks.

skills.name: 粉碎之石
skills.des: If you stand in the aoes brought down by Cave-In, they will inflict devastating damage.

skills.name: 尖爪
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.
A heavy attack. The target needs to block this, or else they will take massive physical damage.

skills.name: 邪恶粉碎
skills.des: Bloodspawn leaps to the center of the room and smashes the ground. An AoE with a large radius opens up beneath it.

BOSS.name: 普拉辛·多莱
BOSS.des:
Praxin Douare is a Breton member of the Fighters Guild and one the few remaining sane persons that was part of the original expedition that went into Spindleclutch I. After the party defeats the Swarm Mother, Praxin and his soldiers suddenly go insane and attack them, forcing the party to slay them. This event reveals the true nature of the Whisperer and the threat she poses.
Praxin Douare is encountered again as a Wraith in Spindleclutch II, where he serves as the second boss. He is later raised as a deranged ghost by a coven of Vampires who took over the cave following the Whisperer's death. He believes he is still ensnared by the Whisperer. At first, he will be a ghostly version of his former self, but during the course of the fight, he will change into a wraith.

skills.name: 波次1
skills.des: A large number of Spider Swarms appear.

skills.name: 波次2
skills.des: Some Spider Swarms and the Swarm Mother Nightmare appear.

skills.name: 波次3
skills.des: A group of Corrupted Infantry Nightmares led by The Widow-Maker Nightmare and the Big Rabbu Nightmare appear.

skills.name: 波次4
skills.des: Two Corrupted Healer Nightmares and The Whisperer Nightmare appear. This section of the fight can be challenging as there is a fixed amount of time given to kill each wave before the next spawns. If players take too long, they risk being overrun by the various waves. Players should note that after the fourth wave spawns, Praxin himself will attack once the time is up. Thus, the DPS should have a mix of AOE and single-target abilities to make this phase easier. Tanks should taunt the named elite creatures as they do more damage.

skills.name: 扭曲之箭
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that does high magical damage. If taunted, the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 绝望
skills.des: Praxin releases three red lines that travel along the ground. The lines will be released in the direction he is facing, and is telegraphed by his arms glowing red. Each line does high magical damage, and thus the tank should face the boss away from the rest of the party to reduce the chance of them being hit. A simple way to avoid this attack is to ensure that you are behind or beside the boss when this attack is performed.

BOSS.name: 维雷诺尔·冬界
BOSS.des: Vorenor Winterbourne is a Nord vampire found within Spindleclutch II, where he serves as the third and final boss that players must defeat.

skills.name: 血液汲取
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does moderate physical damage. If taunted, the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 开放伤口
skills.des: The boss shoots a red beam at a random player. This attack does moderate physical damage over time.

skills.name: 血池
skills.des: The boss places a pool of blood under a random player. This attack does high physical damage over time as indicated by a red circle. The initial tick happens almost immediately, thus the healer should ensure that the party is fully healed before this attack is performed.

skills.name: 鲜血狂怒
skills.des: The boss teleports to each player and slashes them, doing high physical damage. This attack can be blocked to reduce the damage taken.

skills.name: 吸血鬼汲取
skills.des: The boss sucks blood from the captives around the room, healing himself over time. At first, only one captive will be used, but as the fight progresses, more and more captives will be involved, increasing the magnitude of the healing done. To prevent this, players may kill the captives to stop his healing. Alternatively, if damage is good enough, players can choose not to kill the captives. Doing so will net players the hard mode achievement.

achievement.name: 蛛丝之握洞穴 II 胜利者
achievement.des: 在蛛丝之握洞穴 II 中，击败疯莫汀、血裔、普拉辛·多莱、血肉侍灵三兄弟、尤尔凡·维勒斯和维雷诺尔·冬界。

achievement.name: 蛛丝之握洞穴 II 征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）蛛丝之握洞穴 II 中，击败血魔像、普拉辛的幽灵和维雷诺尔·冬界。

achievement.name: 悲悯的英雄
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）蛛丝之握洞穴 II 中，在不杀死维雷诺尔·冬界的巢穴中关押的任何无辜受害的情况下将他击败。

achievement.name: 血肉侍灵征服者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）蛛丝之握洞穴 II 中击败65个血肉侍灵。

achievement.name: 奴隶杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）蛛丝之握洞穴 II 中击败220个吸血鬼奴隶。

achievement.name: 蛛丝之握洞穴 II 幸存者
achievement.des: 咋（老兵模式）蛛丝之握洞穴 II 中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败疯莫汀、血裔、普拉辛·多莱、血肉侍灵三兄弟、尤尔凡·维勒斯和维雷诺尔·冬界。

achievement.name: 蛛丝之握洞穴 II 刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）蛛丝之握洞穴 II 中，在开启地下城后20分钟内击败疯莫汀、血裔、普拉辛·多莱、血肉侍灵三兄弟、尤尔凡·维勒斯和维雷诺尔·冬界。当玩家遭遇第一批受奴役的战士时开始计时。

name: 风暴岛
location: Strid Estuary, accessed by boat at Horseshoe Island
mystery: 这座位于斯特里德河口，被沙洲和流动的河道环绕着的岛屿一直都是海盗、劫掠者和躲避法律制裁的逃亡者的避风港。它从未被任何文明组织完全探索过。
des:
Tempest Island is a small island containing a group dungeon accessible from Malabal Tor.
It has been invaded by the Sea Vipers, who use it to hone their storm magic for a planned assault on the Valenwood coast. A group of Dominion soldiers led by Battlereeve Alduril needs your help defeating the Maormer invaders and their lamia allies.
You can learn about its location from Turuk Redclaws outside Velyn Harbor, Vyric the White in Sentinel, or Strong-With-Tail in Windhelm.

BOSS.name: 风暴召唤者瓦拉兰
BOSS.des: Valaran Stormcaller is a Maormer found at Tempest Island, of which he is a boss. He has a chance to drop Stormcaller's Blade. A "Sudden Storm" summoned near him will move around the room, electrocuting those who touch it, and should be avoided.

skills.name: 斩击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 破碎一击
skills.des: A charged heavy melee attack that deals high physical damage and knocking the target back. This attack should be blocked or dodged if possible.

skills.name: 衰弱箭
skills.des: The boss shoots a bolt of lightning that deals moderate shock damage and stuns the target. Break free to counter this.
The boss summons a Lightning Avatar to attack the party. This should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

skills.name: Shock
skills.des: A Storm will continuously roam the arena at random, dealing shock damage over time to all players as indicated by a red circle.

BOSS.name: 暴风拳
BOSS.des: The Stormfist is a storm atronach found at Tempest Island, of which it is a boss. Its unique loot is the Tempestshield or Raining Hammer He is brought in by short-lived Maormer Summoners near the island's peak, and will summon smaller Storm Atronachs in waves of three.

skills.name: 左十字
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 冲天强袭
skills.des: The boss stomps, dealing moderate physical damage and knocking all players hit up into the air as indicated by a red circle.

skills.name: 衰弱之石
skills.des: The boss slams its fist into the ground, dealing moderate shock damage and stunning any players hit as indicated by a red circle.

skills.name: 随时有可能爆炸
skills.des: At 20% health, the boss releases lightning constantly dealing unavoidable moderate shock damage over time to all players until it is killed.
The boss will occasionally summon three Storm Atronachs to attack the party. These should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

BOSS.name: 风暴首领内迪尔
BOSS.des:
Stormreeve Neidir is the Maormer leader of the Sea Vipers and the third and final boss of Tempest Island. She has a chance to drop the unique item, Neidir's Thundering Staff, and will drop a helmet in the Stormfist set on veteran.
During combat, she uses a variety of shock-based attacks and must be fought close-up, as she will use deadly abilities on group members who fight her from too far away. There will also be various twisters moving throughout the platform during battle.

skills.name: 闪耀打击
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor shock damage.

skills.name: 风之冲锋
skills.des: Neidir charges at a person far away from her and knocks them back, dealing a very high amount of physical damage usually enough to one-shot on vet. This should be blocked or dodged if possible. If all players stay relatively near the boss, this attack will not be used.

skills.name: 阵风
skills.des: The boss summons a large blast of wind that deals very high physical damage to all players around her and knocking them back as indicated by a red circle. This attack must be avoided on vet if possible as it is usually a one-shot.

skills.name: 闪电打击
skills.des: The boss shoots a bolt of lightning at a random target dealing high shock damage. This is unavoidable, so be prepared to heal after this is cast.

skills.name: 电击
skills.des: Many Twisters will roam the arena at random. Touching one will stagger and deal moderate shock damage to a player. As time passes, more Twisters will appear. The group should ensure they have enough damage to kill the boss before the damage from the Twisters is overwhelming. Do note that the Twisters can also push players into the boss's AOEs and interrupt rezzes, and may prove very dangerous if group damage is low.

achievement.name: 风暴岛胜利者
achievement.des: Defeat Valaran Stormcaller, Stormfist, and Admiral Neidir.

achievement.name: 风暴岛征服者
achievement.des: 通过击败族长索诺里娅、风暴召唤者瓦拉兰、发言人雅罗拉瑟、暴风拳、欧曼尼队长和风暴首领内迪尔，完成（老兵模式）风暴岛。

achievement.name: 海上葬礼
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）风暴岛I中，在召唤光辉战斗卷轴之后击败风暴首领内迪尔。

achievement.name: 海蛇杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）风暴岛中击败550个海蛇。

achievement.name: 风暴蛇人杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）风暴岛中击败600个蛇人。

achievement.name: 风暴岛幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）风暴岛中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败族长索诺里娅、风暴召唤者瓦拉兰、发言人雅罗拉瑟、暴风拳、欧曼尼队长和风暴首领内迪尔。

achievement.name: 风暴岛刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）风暴岛中，在开启地下城后20分钟内击败族长索诺里娅、风暴召唤者瓦拉兰、发言人雅罗拉瑟、暴风拳、欧曼尼队长和风暴首领内迪尔。当玩家遭遇第一批蛇人时开始计时。

name: 疯狂密室
mystery: 疯狂密室是臭名昭著的疯建筑师的代表作，后者据说是极少数同时效劳多个魔神并从中获益的人。关于他用什么代价来取得效劳的资格，向来都不缺乏野蛮和恐怖的猜测。
des:
The Vaults of Madness is a group dungeon found in Coldharbour.
Gasteau Chamrond needs you to help him and his friends escape from the Vaults by destroying the Mad Architect. You can learn about its location from Tubidan the Alarmist in the Hollow City. Hazards include: Bottomless Pits, Fires (In the room of The Ancient One and Iskra the Omen)

BOSS.name: 灵魂收割者乌尔古娜
BOSS.des:
Ulguna Soul-Reaver is a harvester found in the Vaults of Madness. She serves the first boss. Her unique drops are Maleficence and Soul-Reave.
She is responsible for tormenting Gasteau Chamrond, and has stolen his soul, which is witnessed when first reaching him.

skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals moderate flame damage.

skills.name: 虚幻爆发
skills.des: Purple magic starts glowing in Ulguna's hands, before she throws a purple-flame ball at a player, dealing high flame damage and knocking them away. The only way to avoid it is to dodge, and she cannot be interrupted during the casting.

skills.name: 灵魂火化
skills.des: Ulguna selects a player at random and tears their soul out from them, incapacitating them for a long duration, as they float off the ground and scream in pain. This attack cannot be dodged or blocked. It barely has a cooldown and Ulguna repeats this attack soon after completing Soul Flame.

skills.name: Soul Flame
skills.des: After keeping the trapped player for the entire duration of Soul Cremation, blue magic orbs appear in Ulguna's hands. After charging them, she slams them into the ground to create a large wall of blue flames in front of her, which expands outwards, causing very high flame damage. Once this move completes, the trapped player from Soul Flame is released.

skills.name: 盛宴魔球
skills.des: When hurt, Ulguna will grab your essence and attempt to steal it. When grabbed, you will take moderate magical damage and be briefly stunned. You may break free from this. Four Feast orbs will then appear around Ulguna and move towards her. If an orb touches her, she will be healed. To prevent this, you must destroy the orbs before they reach the Ulguna. Each orb will also heal you when destroyed.

BOSS.name: 格罗斯达尔
BOSS.des:
Grothdarr is a huge Flesh Atronach and one of the bosses of the Vaults of Madness. Grothdarr has three unique items that can be obtained, Grothdarr's Fist, Fleshsear, and Despair.
It is also the namesake of the Grothdarr set and style, and the basis of a trophy and bust.
The spirit of Reynelle Derone has been trapped within its flesh by the Mad Architect.

skills.name: 火之轨迹
skills.des: At the start of combat, Grothdarr throws two fireballs down onto the ground next to itself. They then transform into two long fire trails that will continuously snake around the arena, close to Grothdarr, inflicting high flame damage to those that stand in them. The fire trails won't go out until Grothdarr is dead.

skills.name: 钝击
skills.des: A basic melee attack causing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 高空粉碎
skills.des: Grothdarr winds up its mace hand before slamming it down, causing high physical damage and knocking down those hit. This attack can be blocked.

skills.name: 灼心恨意
skills.des: Grothdarr winds up its torch hand before throwing fire in front of itself, as indicated by a red cone, causing high flame damage.

BOSS.name: “预兆”伊斯克拉
BOSS.des: Iskra the Omen is a daedric titan found in the Vaults of Madness, of which it is a boss. Its unique loot is Ill Omen, Omen's Edge, or Ruin.

skills.name: 骇人利爪
skills.des: A basic melee attack causing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 崩落苍穹
skills.des: Iskra the Omen flies up a short distance into the air before crashing back down onto the ground as indicated by a wide, red circle growing in size, causing high physical damage and knocking those hit backwards. Leads into Ethereal Flame.

skills.name: 喷薄烈焰
skills.des: After recovering from Falling Sky, Iskra the Omen turns to face a player before breathing a long line of blue flames across the arena, in the form of multiple overlapping AoEs, causing very high flame damage when standing inside. The AoEs linger for a long time, long enough that two lines of fire can be active at the same time.

BOSS.name: 疯狂建筑师
BOSS.des:
The Mad Architect is the final boss in the Vaults of Madness. He has a chance of dropping Architect's Shield, The Mad Maul, or a helmet from the Grothdarr set in veteran mode.
In life his name was Dutheil and he was known as one of the best architects of the age, as well as for his eccentric nature. A plan hatched by one of his rivals, Gasteau Chamrond, saw to it that his designs were stolen and plagiarized and that he was discredited by the Wayrest nobility.
This led to his mental collapse and his reaching out to the Daedra, who offered him revenge in return for becoming their personal architect. He accepted and was transformed into the Mad Architect. While he initially started with the three that had ruined him, over time he captured many more souls and upon the player group entering the Vaults, he aims to do the same to them.
When he is approached in person, he will appear from the central skull door as a spectral skeleton, before transforming into a lich when he reaches the center of the room, in a massive burst of purple magic.

skills.name: 坏笑箭
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that does high Magical damage. If taunted the Mad Architect will be forced to use this on the tank only.

skills.name: 召唤不死族
skills.des: The Mad Architect summons Reanimated Atronachs, Reanimated Mages, Reanimated Monstrosities and Zombies to attack the party. These should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

skills.name: 夺取亡者
skills.des: After summoning the minions, the Mad Architect creates a large explosion around him for moderate magical damage. This cannot be avoided and should be healed through.

skills.name: 致命抓握
skills.des: The Mad Architect places magical runes on the ground that do moderate magical damage over time as well as snaring those who stand in them. These do not have red circle indicators, so players should look for blackened areas on the ground and avoid them instead.

skills.name: 不死族军团
skills.des: The Mad Architect lets out a flash of light and summons spirits from the ground around him. This does very high magical damage over time and should be avoided at all costs. This area will affect the circle he is standing on only, so players can use that as a guide.

skills.name: 抹杀
skills.des: The Mad Architect summons a bubble around himself and the windows around the room break. Any player standing outside his bubble when the explosion goes off will take extremely high magical damage, so players should watch for this and position themselves accordingly.

achievement.name: 疯狂密室胜利者
achievement.des: 在疯狂密室中，击败灵魂收割者乌尔古娜、格罗斯达尔、“预兆”伊斯克拉和疯建筑师。

achievement.name: 疯狂密室征服者
achievement.des: 通过击败被诅咒者、灵魂收割者乌尔古娜、死神头颅、格罗斯达尔、阿查莱祖尔、至古者、“预兆”伊斯克拉和疯建筑师，完成（老兵模式）疯狂密室。

achievement.name: 疯城的新市长
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）疯狂密室中，在召唤光辉战斗卷轴之后击败疯建筑师。

achievement.name: 魔人杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）疯狂密室中击败150个魔人。

achievement.name: 兽化傀儡杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）疯狂密室中击败750个兽化傀儡。

achievement.name: 疯狂密室幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）疯狂密室中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败被诅咒者、灵魂收割者乌尔古娜、死神头颅、格罗斯达尔、阿查莱祖尔、至古者、“预兆”伊斯克拉和疯建筑师。

achievement.name: 疯狂密室刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）疯狂密室中，在开启地下城后20分钟内击败被诅咒者、灵魂收割者乌尔古娜、死神头颅、格罗斯达尔、阿查莱祖尔、至古者、“预兆”伊斯克拉和疯建筑师。当玩家遭遇第一批苔魔时开始计时。

name: 沃伦费尔
mystery: 古老的矮人城市沃伦费尔早已消失在阿里克尔沙漠中。但它的遗迹最近刚被发现，这在学者和寻宝者之间引发了一场角逐，他们都想第一个去探索这座城市传说中的深处。
des:
Volenfell is a group dungeon found in Alik'r Desert.
The researcher Tharayya wants your help finding a Dwemer artifact called the Guardian's Eye.  You can learn about its location from Earrona Kneecapper outside Velyn Harbor, Magnifico Jalid in Sentinel, or Felvyn the Swordarm in Windhelm.

BOSS.name: 奎因图斯·韦雷斯
BOSS.des:
Quintus Verres is an Imperial leading a group of treasure hunters found in the Dwemer ruins of Volenfell. Prior to that, he was the husband of Tharayya, a Redguard scholar doing research on the ruins. When she asked him to return and help her in her excavations, he left her to take up treasure hunting instead.
He wears Imperial Style heavy armor and fights using a Dwarven battleaxe, using various two-handed attacks. When fought, he has a chance to drop Quintus' Exploding Staff. Around halfway through the fight, he switches to a flame staff, and towards the end of the fight, he awakens the Monstrous Gargoyle. It is likely that he will be killed before the gargoyle (who crushes him regardless if he's still alive), but even so, the gargoyle must be finished off as well.
His spirit later reappears in the Depths of Malatar, reluctantly helping Tharayya from a Pneumaria Chamber. Later on during the fight with King Narilmor, he will escape and Tharayya will attempt to capture him again.

skills.name: 斩击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does minor physical damage.

skills.name: 破碎一击
skills.des: A heavy melee attack that does high physical damage and knocks the player down. This attack should be blocked or dodged if possible.

skills.name: 扭曲之钢
skills.des: The boss swings his weapon around while chasing a player dealing moderate physical damage over time as indicated by a red circle around himself.

skills.name: 法杖拾取
skills.des: At around 66% health, he will run to a nearby crate to pick up the Rod of Kravari and use different abilities.

skills.name: 火之霆击
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that does minor flame damage.

skills.name: 燃烧之地
skills.des: The boss places multiple areas that deal continuous moderate flame damage as indicated by a red circle.

skills.name: 召唤怨灵
skills.des: The boss shoots a flaming specter towards a player causing them to run in fear for a brief moment.
At around 20% health, he will activate the gargoyle above the gate. The gargoyle will awaken and crush him, causing a transition to the next part of the fight.

BOSS.name: 战栗之鳞
BOSS.des:
Tremorscale is a duneripper boss of Volenfell, found in an oasis area of the dungeon guarding the door to The Guardian's Orbit.
It is also the namesake of the Tremorscale set and the basis of a trophy, bust, and style; however, it does not drop any of them, as they are instead obtained from killing the Guardian Trinity.

skills.name: 噬咬
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does minor physical damage.

skills.name: 出血撕裂
skills.des: A heavy melee attack that does moderate physical damage and moderate physical damage over time. This attack should be blocked if possible.

skills.name: 尾鞭横扫
skills.des: The boss swings its tail dealing moderate physical damage and knocking players back as indicated by a red cone.

skills.name: 裂断
skills.des: The boss burrows into the ground and emerges dealing moderate physical damage and knocking back as indicated by a red circle.

BOSS.des:
The Guardian Council refers to three Dwarven Centurions in The Eye's Chamber section of Volenfell:
Together they make up the final boss fight of the dungeon.
They have a chance to drop the Antiquity lead for the Dwarven Leather Saddle Seat and Volenfell Etching Tools. In Veteran mode, they will drop a Tremorscale set helmet.

achievement.name: 沃伦费尔胜利者
achievement.des: 在沃伦费尔击败奎因图斯·韦雷斯、战栗之鳞和守护者议会。

achievement.name: 沃伦费尔征服者
achievement.des: 通过击败沙漠狮、奎因图斯·韦雷斯和恐怖石像鬼、炙咬、战栗之鳞、不稳定构造体和守护者议会，完成（老兵模式）沃伦费尔。

achievement.name: 不再灵敏
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）沃伦费尔中，在召唤光辉战斗卷轴之后击败守护者构造体。

achievement.name: 矮人构造体杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）沃伦费尔中击败300个矮人构造体。

achievement.name: 宝藏猎手杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）沃伦费尔中击败250个宝藏猎手。

achievement.name: 沃伦费尔幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）沃伦费尔中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败沙漠狮、奎因图斯·韦雷斯和恐怖石像鬼、炙咬、战栗之鳞、不稳定构造体和守护者议会。

achievement.name: 沃伦费尔刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）沃伦费尔中，在开启地下城后20分钟内击败沙漠狮、奎因图斯·韦雷斯和恐怖石像鬼、炙咬、战栗之鳞、不稳定构造体和守护者议会。当玩家遭遇第一批宝藏猎手时开始计时。

name: 途歇城下水道 I
mystery: 途歇城有资格为其宽敞的现代下水道系统感到自豪，这些下水道能够将城市的废水排入伊利亚克湾。但是街道下方错综复杂的管道里也隐藏着黑暗的秘密，而那些走在大道上的人丝毫察觉不到。
des:
Wayrest Sewers I is a group dungeon found under the city of Wayrest in Stormhaven.
When you enter the sewers in the normal version, Investigator Irnand will request that you find and kill a rogue necromancer and his conspirators before they take over Wayrest above.
You can learn its location from Wandering Jakalor outside Elden Root, Lady Blade outside Wayrest, or Hranir Icy-Mane outside Mournhold.

BOSS.name: 调查员加隆
BOSS.des:
Investigator Garron is a Breton necromancer and a former officer of the Lion Guard who turned on his partners while they were looking for bandits located inside the Wayrest Sewers I. He has a chance to drop the unique item Garron's Cold Betrayal.
In Wayrest Sewers II, he comes back as a Lich named Garron the Returned.

skills.name: 死亡之拥
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that does moderate magical damage.

skills.name: 暗黑长矛
skills.des: A ranged attack that does moderate magical damage and knocks the target back if not blocked.

skills.name: 召唤死灵法球
skills.des: The boss summons a necrotic orb that follows the party around dealing moderate magical damage over time as indicated by a red circle.

skills.name: 传送
skills.des: The boss teleports around to avoid your attacks.

skills.name: 召唤不安之魂
skills.des: The boss summons Restless Souls from the altars around the arena to attack the party. They should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

BOSS.name: 瓦莱尼·佩林加尔
BOSS.des:
Varaine Pellingare is a Breton noble who, along with his sister, is the leader of a potential coup in Wayrest. Their forces have been preparing down in the Wayrest Sewers.
Varaine Pellingare is killed in Wayrest Sewers I, and as a result, his mourning father made a deal with Investigator Garron to have him raised from the dead. He returns in the final battle of Wayrest Sewers II, fighting alongside his sister. He will use a variety of melee attacks, while Allene uses ranged attacks.

skills.name: 斩击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does minor physical damage.

skills.name: 惩戒
skills.des: A heavy melee attack that deals high physical damage and knocks the target down. This attack should be blocked or dodged if possible.

skills.name: 旋转劈砍
skills.des: The boss spins around dealing moderate physical damage and knocking players down as indicated by a red circle around himself.

skills.name: 潮汐斩
skills.des: The boss smashes the ground causing a wave of water that deals moderate physical damage and knocks players back as indicated by a red cone. This attack has a fast cast time and can be hard to avoid if you are standing too near the boss.

skills.name: 淬毒之刃
skills.des: The boss throws a poisoned dagger at a target dealing moderate poison damage over time.

BOSS.name: 亚琳·佩林加尔
BOSS.des:
Allene Pellingare is a Breton noble and one of the two leaders of the bandits found in the Wayrest Sewers. She is Varaine Pellingare's sister and Master Pellingare's daughter. At around 30% health, she will transform into a shadowy version of herself.
When killed, Allene Pellingare may drop the Druidic Music Box Comb lead for the Music Box, Blessings of Stone antiquity.
Allene Pellingare is killed in Wayrest Sewers I, and as a result, her mourning father made a deal with Garron the lich to have her raised from the dead. She returns in the final battle of Wayrest Sewers II, fighting alongside her brother. She will use a variety of ranged attacks with her bow, while Varaine uses melee attacks using his sword.

skills.name: 敲击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 锋锐匕首
skills.des: A heavy melee attack that does very high physical damage and knocks the target down. This attack must be blocked by the tank or dodged by other roles at all costs especially on hard mode.

skills.name: 背刺
skills.des: The boss teleports onto a target dealing high physical damage. This attack is usually immediately followed by Razor Flourish. The high damage of these two attacks combined with their short cast times makes it likely that non tanks will die in two hits if they are not blocking or being healed. To prevent this, preemptively rolling immediately after getting hit by Backstab will help avoid the damage from Razor Flourish if it is cast by the boss.

skills.name: 绚烂刃花
skills.des: The boss spins around dealing high physical damage around itself. This attack has a fast cast time with no red telegraph indicator but has a short range, so avoid standing too near the boss if possible.

skills.name: 致幻迷雾
skills.des: At 75%, 50% and 25%, the boss disappears in puff of smoke and summons Fiendish Hallucinations to attack the party, with the amount of them increasing with each summoning. These should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

skills.name: 幽灵爆发
skills.des: After the final wave of bats are summoned, the boss will reappear in a ghostly shadowy form, dealing moderate magical damage in a short radius around her.

achievement.name: 途歇城下水道 I 胜利者
achievement.des: 在途歇城下水道 I 中，击败调查员加隆、瓦莱尼·佩林加尔和亚琳·佩林加尔。

achievement.name: 途歇城下水道 I 征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）途歇城下水道 I 中，击败黏爪、调查员加隆、鼠语者、饥饿的尤尔加格、瓦莱尼·佩林加尔和亚琳·佩林加尔。

achievement.name: 深入下水道
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）途歇城下水道 I 中，在召唤光辉战斗卷轴之后击败亚琳·佩林加尔。

achievement.name: 雇佣兵杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）途歇城下水道 I 中击败500个佩林加尔雇佣兵。

achievement.name: 雪鼠杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）途歇城下水道 I 中击败800个雪鼠。

achievement.name: 途歇城下水道 I 幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）途歇城下水道 I 中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败黏爪、调查员加隆、鼠语者、饥饿的尤尔加格、瓦莱尼·佩林加尔和亚琳。

achievement.name: 途歇城下水道 I 刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）途歇城下水道 I 中，在开启地下城后的15分钟内击败黏爪、调查员加隆、鼠语者、饥饿的尤尔加格、瓦莱尼·佩林加尔和亚琳·佩林加尔。当任意玩家进入入口房间右边的第一个通道时开始计时。

name: 途歇城下水道 II
mystery: 途歇城有资格为其宽敞的现代下水道系统感到自豪，这些下水道能够将城市的废水排入伊利亚克湾。但是街道下方错综复杂的管道里也隐藏着黑暗的秘密，而那些走在大道上的人丝毫察觉不到。
des:
Wayrest Sewers II is a group dungeon found under the city of Wayrest in Stormhaven.
The storyline continues from the events of Wayrest Sewers I. In this version, enemies you once thought dead have returned. Yahyif and Gedric Serre want you to find Master Pellingare, who has gone missing in the city sewers.
You can learn its location from Wandering Jakalor outside Elden Root, Lady Blade outside Wayrest, or Hranir Icy-Mane outside Mournhold.

BOSS.name: 天灾玛鲁贝斯
BOSS.des:
Malubeth the Scourger is a large harvester summoned by Master Pellingare. She serves as the first boss of Wayrest Sewers II.
Her unique drop is Malubeth's Stinger. She is also the namesake of the Scourge Harvester set, but doesn't drop any pieces.
When she is approached, she will shout "You'll not leave here alive." The Journal of Garron is found in front of her.

BOSS.name: 死而复生的加隆
BOSS.des:
Garron the Returned is a lich, and the risen form of Investigator Garron, found within Wayrest Sewers II. It serves as the second boss that players must defeat to progress.
His unique drop is Garron's Icy Grasp.

skills.name: 死灵之矛
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that does high magical damage. If taunted, the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 死灵漫天
skills.des: The boss launches many skulls that impact the ground around itself, as indicated by red circles. This attack does moderate magical damage.

The boss summons four lich crystals around the room that do moderate magical damage as indicated by red circles. After the crystals explode, Escaped Souls are summoned at their positions. The party should kill these as soon as possible to simplify the fight.

skills.name: 消耗生命
skills.des: The boss teleports to the center of the room and fires beams at all players. This attack does high magical damage over time and has to be healed through.

BOSS.name: 亚琳·佩林加尔
BOSS.des:
Allene Pellingare is a Breton noble and one of the two leaders of the bandits found in the Wayrest Sewers. She is Varaine Pellingare's sister and Master Pellingare's daughter. At around 30% health, she will transform into a shadowy version of herself.
When killed, Allene Pellingare may drop the Druidic Music Box Comb lead for the Music Box, Blessings of Stone antiquity.
Allene Pellingare is killed in Wayrest Sewers I, and as a result, her mourning father made a deal with Garron the lich to have her raised from the dead. She returns in the final battle of Wayrest Sewers II, fighting alongside her brother. She will use a variety of ranged attacks with her bow, while Varaine uses melee attacks using his sword.

skills.name: 敲击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 锋锐匕首
skills.des: A heavy melee attack that does very high physical damage and knocks the target down. This attack must be blocked by the tank or dodged by other roles at all costs especially on hard mode.

skills.name: 背刺
skills.des: The boss teleports onto a target dealing high physical damage. This attack is usually immediately followed by Razor Flourish. The high damage of these two attacks combined with their short cast times makes it likely that non tanks will die in two hits if they are not blocking or being healed. To prevent this, preemptively rolling immediately after getting hit by Backstab will help avoid the damage from Razor Flourish if it is cast by the boss.

skills.name: 绚烂刃花
skills.des: The boss spins around dealing high physical damage around itself. This attack has a fast cast time with no red telegraph indicator but has a short range, so avoid standing too near the boss if possible.

skills.name: 致幻迷雾
skills.des: At 75%, 50% and 25%, the boss disappears in puff of smoke and summons Fiendish Hallucinations to attack the party, with the amount of them increasing with each summoning. These should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

skills.name: 幽灵爆发
skills.des: After the final wave of bats are summoned, the boss will reappear in a ghostly shadowy form, dealing moderate magical damage in a short radius around her.

achievement.name: 途歇城下水道 II 胜利者
achievement.des: 在途歇城下水道 II 中，击败天灾玛鲁贝斯、骷髅死神、尤尔加格的骷髅、死而复生的加隆、被遗忘者以及瓦莱尼和亚琳·佩林加尔。

achievement.name: 途歇城下水道 II 征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）途歇城下水道 II 中，击败天灾玛鲁贝斯、死而复生的加隆和瓦莱尼和亚琳·佩林加尔。

achievement.name: 佩林加尔食尸鬼杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）途歇城下水道 II 中，在与亚琳·佩林加尔和瓦莱尼·佩林加尔战斗时，先击败15个僵尸，然后再击败佩林加尔双子。

achievement.name: 巨像杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）途歇城下水道 II 中击败40个骸骨巨像。

achievement.name: 僵尸杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）途歇城下水道 II 中击败350个僵尸。

achievement.name: 途歇城下水道 II 幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）途歇城下水道 II 中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败天灾玛鲁贝斯、死而复生的加隆以及瓦莱尼和亚琳·佩林加尔。

achievement.name: 途歇城下水道 II 刺客
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）途歇城下水道 II 中，在20分钟内，击败天灾玛鲁贝斯、骷髅死神、尤尔加格的骷髅、死而复生的加隆、被遗忘者和佩林加尔双子。当遭遇第一个死灵法师和他的仆从时开始计时。

name: 帝都监狱
mystery: 帝都的这一外部区域是帝都军团的总部，也用作帝都监狱。城市下水道从监狱下方穿过，污水排向卢马瑞湖——但当然，这些下水道是无法进入的。
des:
The Imperial City Prison is a group dungeon found northeast of the Imperial City's Memorial District.
It has been overrun by Daedra, who have turned it into a place of torment and slaughter. A large Daedra carried on black wings has declared itself the new "Lord Warden" of the prison, and he has decreed that the prisoners must be tortured for the glory of Molag Bal. Mortals who die in captivity have their flesh taken to be used in the creation of biological weapons crafted by the vile Flesh Sculptor.
The dungeon sets found here are Leeching Plate, Scathing Mage, and Sheer Venom.

BOSS.name: 血肉雕刻者伊波梅兹
BOSS.des: Ibomez the Flesh Sculptor is a xivilai found in the Imperial City Prison. He serves as the first boss of the dungeon, and has a chance to drop the unique item Toxic Cleaver.

skills.name: 毒池
skills.des: The center of the room contains a pool of acid that does moderate poison damage over time to players inside it. Players should avoid standing in the pool if possible.

Throughout the fight the boss will also summon Flesh Grenades throughout the room. These green blobs on the floor will explode after a while as indicated by a red circle, dealing minor poison damage as well as knocking back the player. These grenades can be thrown by players by standing near one and pressing the synergy button to aim and throw it. This is important for some of the other attacks the boss does.

skills.name: Summon Flesh Atronach
skills.des: At the beginning of the fight the boss will summon a Flesh Atronach to attack the party. This atronach will enrage and wipe the group if players take to long to kill it, so DPS should focus this down quickly. Throwing Flesh Grenades on the atronach will cause it to take more damage, this can help if many atronachs are up at once.

skills.name: 砍削
skills.des: The boss swings its weapon in front of itself, doing moderately high physical damage in a cone.

skills.name: 流血
skills.des: Being hit by "Hack" deals minor physical damage over time.

skills.name: 劈裂斩
skills.des: The boss swings its weapon upwards doing high physical damage and stunning the player hit. Players should block the reduce the damage taken and prevent the knockback.

The boss releases a wave of poison from itself as indicated by a red cone dealing high poison damage. The tank should face the boss away from the team to prevent them from being hit. All flesh grenades hit by Toxic Cleave will also explode, potentially hindering players during later phases of the fight.
The boss throws green blobs at all players in front of him, dealing minor poison damage over time.

skills.name: 嫩化
skills.des: The boss fears the whole group, and then runs to and stuns a random player with an unbreakable stun. The boss does multiple low physical damage strikes at the target then charges up a heavy swing, this can and must be interrupted by a teammate. Failure to do so will lead to high physical damage in Normal Mode and an instant death in Veteran Mode.

At 75%, 50%, and 25% health the boss will run to the pool in the middle and summon inmates from the gates along the walls. While summoning the inmates the boss will be invincible. The inmates will walk slowly to the acid pool in the center, and players will have to kill the inmates before they reach the pool and dissolve. If too many inmates reach the pool, a Flesh Atronach will be summoned to attack the party. Players have to throw the Flesh Grenades around the room on the inmates, which will kill them instantly, as they have too much health to kill them all in a timely manner using normal attacks.

BOSS.name: 血肉憎恶
BOSS.des: The Flesh Abomination is a massive armored flesh colossus found in the Imperial City Prison. It serves as the dungeon's second boss, and summons two necrotic hoarvors in combat.

skills.name: 出血打击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals moderate physical damage then moderate physical damage over time.

skills.name: 骇人顺劈斩
skills.des: The Abomination swings its heavy arms in front of it, indicated by a conal AoE, stumbling forward as it does. Its arms swing several times, and the momentum of its forward movement carries the beast. If you're hit by its clumsy strikes, you'll take high physical damage and get knocked back and stunned. If you block you get staggered each time instead.

skills.name: 毒井
skills.des: After some time, the boss places poison AOEs under each player that will follow them, dealing moderate poison damage and knocking them back. Block to prevent this. Following that, the boss places a ring around a random player. This ring deals very high poison damage over time and must be avoided, if you are within the ring simply wait for it to dissipate.
Throughout the fight, the boss summons Necrotic Hoarvors to attack the party. They should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

After Poison Well, the boss runs to the middle of the arena and summons 4 Necrotic Hoarvors. The boss them slams the ground stunning all players while the hoarvors explode dealing  high poison damage as indicated by large red circles. To avoid this, players should hug the walls of the arena to avoid the AOEs.

BOSS.name: 黄昏典狱长
BOSS.des:
Lord Warden Dusk is a large armored grievous twilight found in the Last Cell Block of the Imperial City Prison. He serves as the dungeon's third and final boss.
In combat he summons small draining portals and two large floor-bound portals. Stepping on one of the floor portals will lock your character in place before teleporting you high above the fighting area, where you will likely die if you don't use the "Brace For Impact" synergy. He can also split into four Shades, which the players must defeat in order to progress the fight.
He has a chance to drop the Warden's Courage, a one-handed sword. On veteran difficulty, he drops a helm from the Lord Warden set. His loot is found in a chest by the exit after his defeat.

skills.name: 暗影箭
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor magical damage.

skills.name: 暗影弹幕
skills.des: The boss shoots a series of orbs rapidly at a random player. The tank should get in front of the target and absorb the magic damage. If that is not possible, the player targeted should block or shield up to absorb the magic damage while healing up.

skills.name: 暗影法球
skills.des: The boss summons floating orbs that tether to nearby players dealing moderate magical damage over time and snaring them. The tether can be broken by keeping a distance from the orbs.

skills.name: 阴影打击
skills.des: The boss teleports onto whoever has aggro stunning them and dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 暗光震爆
skills.des: The Lord Warden flies up and channels a magical ball in his hands, shooting it down at everyone below. The only way to avoid it is to jump into the portals before he casts it. Only two people are allowed per portal. This attack deals ~95% of your max health as oblivion damage in normal difficulty while it is always lethal on veteran mode.

skills.name: 幽影召唤
skills.des: At 66 and 33% health, the boss disappears and summons 4 Shades to attack the party. Once all shades are defeated, the boss reappears.

skills.name: 冷港流星
skills.des: Lord Warden casts a meteor on one player during the Shade phase stunning them and dealing moderate magical damage. This attack must be blocked to negate the incoming damage.

The boss summons portals that move on the ground. Entering one will cause you to fall through and drop down from the ceiling. Do not enter the portals until Darklight Burst is cast, as using the portal early will waste a slot, causing a death later during Darklight Burst. In veteran HM, only two players are allowed per portal.

skills.name: 传送门反馈
skills.des: Falling into a portal after falling from another portal will deal lethal damage. Do not enter the portals until Darklight Burst is cast.

achievement.name: 帝都监狱胜利者
achievement.des: 在帝都监狱中，击败魂摄魔灵、血肉雕刻者伊波梅兹、鬼火哨兵、血肉可憎灵、典狱长议会和黄昏典狱长。

achievement.name: 劫狱高手
achievement.des: 将囚犯从帝都监狱的牢房中解救出来。

achievement.name: 暗光舞者
achievement.des: 在你和小队成员避开每一个暗光震爆的情况下击败帝都监狱的黄昏典狱长。

achievement.name: 无影无踪
achievement.des: 在帝都监狱中，全员在未被看守发现的情况下，击败魂摄魔灵、血肉雕刻者伊波梅兹、鬼火哨兵、血肉可憎灵和黄昏典狱长。

achievement.name: 帝都监狱征服者
achievement.des: 在模式的帝都监狱中，击败魂摄魔灵、血肉雕刻者伊波梅兹、鬼火哨兵、血肉可憎灵、典狱长议会和黄昏典狱长。

achievement.name: 警惕监视者杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）帝都监狱中击败50个警惕监视者。

achievement.name: 无期徒刑
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，击败（老兵模式）帝都监狱中的所有小boss和Boss。

achievement.name: 典狱长的报复
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）帝都监狱，摧毁典狱长之书，然后击败黄昏典狱长。

achievement.name: 失心傀儡杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）帝都监狱中击败300个失心傀儡。

achievement.name: 没有监狱可以关得住我
achievement.des: 在开启地下城后的45分钟内击败（老兵模式）帝都监狱中的所有小boss和Boss。当玩家进入棱堡时开始计时。

name: 白金塔
mystery: 由野精灵建造的白金塔是泰姆瑞尔中心神秘力量的聚焦点，长久以来一直之后建立的西罗帝尔帝国的象征。现在它正处于危险之中，可能会被吸收进冷武城——而且还可能会把泰姆瑞尔也吸进去！
des:
The White-Gold Tower is a group dungeon found in the center of the Imperial City.
Traditionally the seat of the Empire, the Tower has been overrun with Daedra and is being pulled into Coldharbour by Molag Bal. Empress Regent Clivia Tharn is attempting to retake the structure. White-Gold Tower has both a Normal and a Veteran mode.
The dungeon can be entered from the Irrigation Tunnels, the Lambent Passage, and the Harena Hypogeum.

BOSS.name: 审判员
BOSS.des: The Adjudicator is a large harvester found within the throne room of the White-Gold Tower. She serves as the first boss that must be defeated to continue. She has a chance to drop Harvest Dirk, a unique dagger.

skills.name: 懊悔
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that does moderate magical damage.

skills.name: 恐怖寒冬
skills.des: The boss releases rows of hands that travel along the ground in the direction she is facing, occasionally bouncing off the walls at the side of the room. This attack does very high magical damage and should be avoided at all costs. Holding block will reduce the damage done to the player.

skills.name: 灵魂涡流
skills.des: The boss stuns a player and places pools of fire around the room as indicated by red circles. This attack does moderate flame damage over time.

skills.enName: Summon Shriven Noble and Shriven Aristocrat
skills.des: The boss summons some Shriven Nobles and Shriven Aristocrats from the side doors. The party should kill them as soon as possible to simplify the fight.

skills.name: 审判霆击
skills.des: When these Nobles and Aristocrats are killed, their souls are stored in the pillars of judgement on both sides of the room. These pillars will occasionally shoot a bolt at all members of the party, doing moderate magical damage. This damage increases as the fight progresses and as more Nobles or Aristocrats die, thus the party has to defeat the boss before the damage becomes too great.

skills.name: 冷港正义
skills.des: The boss throws the furthest player into a cage, located at the sides of the room. The cage is locked with an intermediate lock, and the player inside takes continuous flame damage. The player, or an ally, has to pick (or force) the lock to escape. Players are advised to have at least one lockpick on them just for the Coldharbour Justice mechanic. Putting points into the Locksmith skill can help as it increases the chance to force the lock instead.

BOSS.name: 位面抑制者
BOSS.des: The Planar Inhibitor is a cold-flame atronach found in the White-Gold Tower. She serves as the dungeon's second boss. She has a chance to drop The Unbroken, a unique item.

skills.name: 炙烤
skills.des: The boss shoots fireballs at the player who closes the pinion doing minor flame damage. Players can stand near the boss without taking damage.

skills.name: 灼烧
skills.des: The pinion shoots fireballs at all party members if left open, doing moderate flame damage to all players.

skills.name: 热射病
skills.des: Closing the pinion will apply the Heat Stroke effect on the player, doing minor flame damage over time to him or her. This effect stacks as the fight continues, and can add up over time the longer the player holds the pinion. In the blue phase, the damage from Heat Stroke is increased. The Heat Stroke effect is removed from the player when the boss gets stunned later.

skills.name: 灾变喷涌球体
skills.des: The boss releases pillars of flame around itself, doing high flame damage as indicated by red circles.

skills.name: 光辉
skills.des: A flame burst attack inflicting minor damage that can stack up if used constantly.

skills.name: 莫斯幻象
skills.des: Sister Terran Arminus casts a spell on a player making their screen grayish, in the process revealing hidden portals around the room. The player must destroy these portals before they spawn enemies. Only the player with Moth Vision can damage the portals, although all players can see them. Destroying all portals before they spawn enemies will net players an achievement. It is advised that players with Moth Vision not touch the pinion, as dealing with both the boss and the portals can be overwhelming. As the fight progresses more portals will spawn, and more players will be given Moth Vision simultaneously.

skills.name: 熔岩潜者
skills.des: After the pinion is closed a few times, the boss dives into the ground, doing high flame damage in an area as indicated by a red circle.

skills.name: Daedric Catastrophe
skills.des: The player who closes the pinion is gradually snared over time, eventually becoming immobile. If the boss comes near that player, it will do very high flame damage to that player, almost always an instant kill. Other party members must close the pinion to distract the boss before it reaches its target.

skills.name: 眩晕
skills.des: After the pinion is closed a few times, the boss falls to the ground for a moment. All stacks of Heat Stroke are removed, and the party should take this chance to deal as much damage to the boss as possible. When the boss recovers, Normal Phase starts over, and the fight repeats.

BOSS.name: 莫拉格·科娜
BOSS.des:
Molag Kena is a Xivkyn who has been posing as Empress Regent Clivia Tharn. You will face her atop the White-Gold Tower as the third and final boss of the dungeon. She has a chance to drop Molag Kena's Touch.
In combat she can summon storm atronachs, Lightning Aspects, and rotating walls of lightning.

skills.name: 电击打击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does high shock damage. If taunted the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 闪电突袭
skills.des: The boss sends out lightning towards all players in front of her, dealing high shock damage over time and stunning them. The tank should rotate the boss so it faces away from the other group members during this attack.

skills.name: 闪电攻击
skills.des: The boss spins around causing lightning to strike all group members dealing minor shock damage.

skills.name: 电光疾驰
skills.des: Molag Kena shoots forward in a flash of lightning to close gaps or reach the center of the arena swiftly.

skills.name: 电击之矛
skills.des: A few moments after the fight begins, the boss throws a spear into the middle of the arena to summon a Shock Wall.

skills.name: 闪电墙
skills.des: The lightning wall summoned will slowly rotate, dealing very high shock damage over time to anyone caught in it as indicated by a red rectangle. On hard mode, the lightning wall rotates much faster. The tank should keep the boss taunted as close to the center of the arena as possible without actually being in the Storm Wall. This is to minimize the amount of movement the party needs to avoid the shock walls, as the speed of rotation is fastest near the outer edge. When the boss reaches 20%, two Storm Walls that rotate in opposite directions will be summoned. Players need to roll dodge over the Storm Walls to avoid getting caught in the middle.

skills.name: 风暴涌动
skills.des: The boss knocks players back using a large conal sweep dealing moderate shock damage. This attack can be blocked to reduce the damage and prevent the knock back. Players must be careful to avoid getting knocked off the edge of the arena when this attack occurs.

skills.name: 风暴之眼
skills.des: The boss releases small lightning storms that will roam the arena at random, dealing moderate shock damage over time to anyone who touches them.

skills.name: 绵延静电
skills.des: Getting hit by the rotating Storm Walls or the radiating Storm Walls during the Lightning Aspect phase will apply a moderately high shock damage over time to the player.

skills.name: 闪电涌动
skills.des: The boss summons a storm atronach to attack the party, dealing moderate damage and stunning players in the area where it lands. The atronach will then pick a random player (usually the furthest) and begin zapping them, dealing moderate shock damage over time while moving towards them.

skills.name: 伏特引爆
skills.des: Once the atronach reaches the target it will stun the target and explode, killing anyone within the explosion in one hit. The party should kill the atronach quickly to prevent this from happening.

At 66% and 33% health, Molag Kena will run to the center of the arena and summon four lightning copies of herself which will protect her from damage. When they are destroyed they will let off a circular AOE explosion which must be avoided as it will instantly kill anyone caught in it. These aspects must be defeated to progress through the fight.

skills.name: 风暴强袭
skills.des: During Lightning Aspect phase, Molag Kena will spend some time spilling lightning from the electric barrier surrounding her, and at set time intervals, she will jump, knocking back each player. With each passing Lightning Aspect phase, the knock-back from Kena's jump gets stronger. The knock-back from this ability is unavoidable although the damage can be clocked. Stay close to Kena when she jumps, or else you may be knocked off the edge of the arena.

skills.name: 突然牺牲
skills.des: If you hit the Cold Fire wall at the edge of the tower, your character will be sacrificed to Molag Bal. Your body will begin levitating in the air and disintegrate. It is common for players to be knocked back into the flames of sacrifice when Molag Kena jumps and knocks back each player during Lightning Aspect phase. Try to stay close to the middle of the arena to avoid this.

achievement.name: 白金塔胜利者
achievement.des: 在白金塔中，击败审判员、精英守卫、位面抑制者和莫拉格·科娜。

achievement.name: 帝都的罪行
achievement.des: 找到白金塔中所有会说话的石头并与它们交互。

achievement.name: 白金塔征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）白金塔中，击败审判员、精英守卫、位面抑制者和莫拉格·科娜。

achievement.name: 魔鳄兽除名者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）白金塔中击败75个魔鳄兽。

achievement.name: 拒绝进入
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）白金塔中，摧毁所有传送门以阻止位面抑制者的援军的到来。

achievement.name: 首个登顶
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）白金塔中，在开启地下城后的30分钟内击败审判员、摄政女皇的守卫、位面抑制者和莫拉格·科娜。当你进入绿色皇帝之路时开始计时。

achievement.name: 断角者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）白金塔中击败100个希维金。

achievement.name: 激怒萨恩
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）白金塔中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败审判员、摄政女皇的守卫、位面抑制者和莫拉格·科娜。

achievement.name: 风暴之怒
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）白金塔中，完成方尖碑之书中所列的仪式，然后击败莫拉格·科娜。

achievement.name: 火中逃生
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）白金塔中，在位面抑制者完成魔族天灾攻击之前，被它的热射病攻击的火焰完全吞噬。然后存活到位面抑制者被击败。

name: 暗影摇篮
mystery: 暗影摇篮是神秘人物蕾丝夫人所在的地方。其黑暗的面纱背后究竟有什么，只有她那些狂热的信徒才知道。
des:
The Cradle of Shadows is a group dungeon in Shadowfen.
It's part of the Shadows of the Hist dungeon pack DLC, along with Ruins of Mazzatun. The entrance can be found near Stillrise Village, southwest of Stormhold. Its dungeon sets are Gossamer, Hand of Mephala, and Widowmaker.
The Cradle of Shadows is an old Imperial fort that has been converted into the lair of the mysterious Silken Ring, a band of assassins who have defected from the Morag Tong, the Shadowscales and the Dark Brotherhood. They worship the Daedric Prince, Mephala. At first, the Silken Ring didn't appear to be a threat to the other assassin organizations, but now its members have taken to targeting former associates and killing their former employers' most reliable informants. They are led by ex-Morag Tong operative Dranos Velador and a strange figure known as the Lady of Lace.
A small contingent of Shadowscales, led by Tsatva-Lan and Geel-Ma, have recently entered the fortress with the intention of destroying the Silken Ring. Tsatva-Lan learned that the members of the Ring have tapped into a source of immeasurable power, leading him to bring many of his cohorts along with him in raiding Mephala's nest. Tsatva-Lan and his group haven't returned. His former student, Hides-the-Ashes, has come to investigate. She believes that Tsatva-Lan has been abducted by the Silken Ring. Her fears are justified when she arrives to find the fort's entryway filled with dead Shadowscales, and Tsatva-Lan is nowhere to be found.

BOSS.name: 科菲达恩
BOSS.des: Khephidaen is a Spiderkith who serves as the first boss of the Cradle of Shadows. Her Pull of Darkness can be felt throughout the Spider Caves, and she can be found in the end of the caves, after Sithera.

skills.name: 本影闪电
skills.des: The boss shoots at the player doing moderate magical damage. If taunted the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 枯萎打击
skills.des: The boss melees the player, doing moderate physical damage. If taunted the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 枯萎中
skills.des: A moderate magical damage over time applied by Withering Strike and Umbral Bolts.

skills.name: 熄灭
skills.des: The boss will put out the braziers around the room, and summon Gloom Wraiths to attack the party. The wraiths will summon two Swarming Beetles each. As long as the brazier is extinguished the beetles will continue to spawn. Players should go near the braziers and press the synergy key to relight them, as well as kill the wraiths.

skills.name: 阴影箭
skills.des: A ranged attack used by the Gloom Wraiths that deals minor magical damage.

skills.name: 蜘蛛之声
skills.des: The boss will channels a large magical explosion as indicated by a red circle. This splits into three smaller waves of magic that travel along the ground. The explosion must be avoided at all costs, as it will do massive damage even to tanks.

skills.name: 黑暗之潮
skills.des: The boss swings its staff around, releasing red magical projectiles that strike all players in front of her. This attack does massive damage, and should be blocked by the tank as indicated by the block telegraph. The tank should also ensure the boss is facing away from the team so they do not get hit. Dodge rolling will also help avoid this attack.

Khephidaen will teleport close to another brazier (usually on the opposite side of the room). She will channel a spell, and have red lines coming off of her, indicating an interruptible attack. If she is allowed to channel this ability, it will send players it hits flying back, knocking them over. Destruction Staff users can slot Crushing Shock or other ranged abilities that interrupt enemies on contact to help out. Alternatively, the tank can bash her.

skills.name: 黑暗拉拽
skills.des: Standing in the darkness will cause minor magical damage over time that increases over time. If the boss stands in the darkness she will take reduced damage.

BOSS.name: 德拉诺斯·维拉多尔
BOSS.des: Dranos Velador is a rogue Dark Elf assassin who founded the Silken Ring in service to Mephala. He can be found in the Cradle of Shadows, where he acts as the fourth boss.

skills.name: 劈裂斩
skills.des: Dranos slashes at the player with his dagger dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 流血
skills.des: A moderate physical damage over time applied by Carve.

skills.name: 铸剑工
skills.des: Dranos will spin around after a short windup, doing damage around him as indicated by a small red circle. Even though the block telegraph comes up it is recommended for all players especially non-tanks to dodge this attack, as it deals a massive amount of damage to tanks even when blocked.
Dranos teleports to each player and places a fiery glyph on the ground under their feet as indicated by red circles. This deals moderate magical damage over time.

skills.name: 梅法拉利齿
skills.des: Immediately after Searing Seal, Dranos will teleport to a player (usually the tank) and two Gloom Wraiths will appear and stun that player. Other players must interrupt these NPCs as soon as possible to free the player, and the targeted player has to block the incoming heavy attack. Again, this attack deals massive damage, and non-tanks are likely to die even if they block. Rolling at the moment he swings may help you avoid death.

At approximately 66% and 33% health Dranos will become invincible and four Shades of Dranos will appear around the room to attack the group. Killing the Shades will cause them to drop an Essence of Dranos. Touching the Essence will return it to the boss, and once all four Essences are collected the boss will be stunned momentarily, after which he will be vulnerable again. The boss will continue to attack the group as per normal, so this phase has to be dealt with quickly. If the boss himself touches the Shades they will return to him, this may allow the group to quickly bypass this phase if the tank uses Fiery Grip or similar abilities to pull all the adds towards the boss. Killing Dranos without killing the Shades will award an achievement.

skills.name: 怨恨法球
skills.des: The Statue of Mephala in the center will release orbs of magic that explode in a large area as indicated by a red circle, dealing high magical damage. This has to be avoided at all costs.

skills.name: 梅法拉之怒
skills.des: When the boss is low on health, the Statue of Mephala will instead emit constant waves of magic, dealing moderately high magical damage. Players are advised to stay near the edges of the room to avoid being hit by these waves.

BOSS.name: 薇利德雷斯
BOSS.des:
Velidreth, the Lady of Lace, is a grotesque Hoarvor Daedra who serves Mephala. She has been luring assassins to the Cradle of Shadows to create the Silken Ring, a group of assassins devoted to her mistress. She serves as the final boss of the dungeon.
She is the only enemy that drops Distilled Slowsilver.

skills.name: 垫步斩击
skills.des: The boss slashes at its target dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: Exsanguinate
skills.des: Getting hit by Lunging Slash deals minor physical damage over time.

skills.name: 乱舞
skills.des: The boss slashes rapidly at its target dealing moderate physical damage over time.

skills.name: 臃肿
skills.des: A charged heavy melee attack that deals high physical damage.

skills.name: 盛宴与饥荒
skills.des: The boss pulls a target in and drains their ultimate. Use ultimates when they are ready to counter this.

skills.name: 暗影感知
skills.des: After draining their ultimate, the boss tends to cast Shadow Sense. In this phase, the boss jumps onto the ceiling while saying "That's it! Don't move a muscle.". Players will need to stand still, if not they will take very high magical damage. This attack is lethal on veteran hard mode.

skills.name: 阴影脊刺
skills.des: After Shadow Sense, the boss jumps back down summoning spikes under each player as indicated by red circles. Quickly roll out of the AOE to avoid the spike. This attack is lethal on veteran hard mode.

The boss releases colored spores that roam the arena at random. The color of the spore is determined by the player drained during Feast and Famine, tanks will spawn red orbs, magicka builds will spawn blue, and stamina builds will spawn green orbs. Touching the spores will drain the corresponding resource, so they must be avoided.

After a moment, the boss summons two flesh atronachs to attack the party. They must be defeated quickly, following which two players should run over to their bodies to use the "Atronach's Light" synergy to pick up their torches. The group must do this before the boss reaches 60% and 30% health as the Banish mechanic is scripted to trigger at those points, and going into the catacombs without the light can be challenging.

skills.name: Banish
skills.des: At 60% and 30% health, the boss teleports the group into the catacombs connected to the arena. In normal, all four group members are together on the same side while on veteran the group is split into two pairs. The darkness within the catacombs will snare and damage players unless they stay within the Atronach's Light AOE or if they light the braziers found within. Hoarvors within the catacombs will spawn and attack the group endlessly, and players will need to run back towards the center to escape. Do note that the gates separating the catacombs from the center will be randomly locked, if one path is closed simply try another one.

Spike traps within the catacombs will deal moderate physical damage and snare to players that step on them. The Atronach's Light AOE can reveal which traps are active (glowing red) thus players can avoid them accordingly.

skills.name: 怒气痛风
skills.des: If a player attempts to resurrect a dead group member, the boss will channel a spell on them that deals moderate magical damage and stuns them interrupting the rez. Other group members should interrupt the boss so the rez can proceed safely. This only occurs on veteran hard mode.

skills.enName: Summon Shadow Weavers, Shadow Warriors and Marrow Fiends
skills.des: The boss summons minions to attack the party. They should be killed quickly to simplify the fight. This only occurs on veteran hard mode.

skills.name: 怨恨法球
skills.des: The Statue of Mephala at the side of the arena will fire orbs of magic on top of players occasionally dealing high magical damage. Players should block or shield up when targeted to reduce the damage taken. This is especially important during Shadow Sense, as players will be unable to move to avoid the AOE. This attack is only used on veteran hard mode.

skills.name: 少量暴露
skills.des: The boss bites its target lowering their armor and spell resistance momentarily. This is only used on veteran hard mode.

achievement.name: 希思特的暗影探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入马扎顿遗迹或暗影摇篮。

achievement.name: 蛛丝社样式大师
achievement.des: 学习蛛丝社样式书的每一章，该样式书偶尔作为完成暗影摇篮地下城的奖励出现。

achievement.name: 暗影摇篮挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）暗影摇篮的成就。

achievement.name: 暗影摇篮征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影摇篮中，击败希瑟拉、蛛魔人科菲达恩、薇利德雷斯的崇拜者、德拉诺斯·维拉多尔和蕾丝夫人薇利德雷斯。

achievement.name: 薇利德雷斯的复仇
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影摇篮中，通过亵渎薇利德雷斯的梅法拉雕像激怒她，然后击败她。

achievement.name: 根除者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影摇篮中，在开启地下城后的30分钟内击败希瑟拉、蛛魔人科菲达恩、薇利德雷斯的崇拜者、德拉诺斯·维拉多尔和蕾丝夫人薇利德雷斯。从进入初始洞穴时开始计时。

achievement.name: 夜晚的灯塔
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影摇篮中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败希瑟拉、蛛魔人科菲达恩、薇利德雷斯的崇拜者、德拉诺斯·维拉多尔和蕾丝夫人薇利德雷斯。

achievement.name: 暗影摇篮胜利者
achievement.des: 在暗影摇篮中，击败希瑟拉、蛛魔人科菲达恩、薇利德雷斯的崇拜者、德拉诺斯·维拉多尔和蕾丝夫人薇利德雷斯。

achievement.name: 闪避毒液
achievement.des: 在暗影摇篮中，在没有小队成员被毒腺命中的情况下击败薇利德雷斯。

achievement.name: 希思特的暗影探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）暗影摇篮和老兵马扎顿遗迹。

achievement.name: 破除者
