achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影摇篮中，摧毁50个薇利德雷斯的崇拜雕像。

achievement.name: 无惧黑暗
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影摇篮中，在不点燃超过两个火盆的情况下通过蜘蛛的洞穴。

achievement.name: 蜘蛛教派杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影摇篮中，击败600蛛丝社成员或他们的蛛魔人友方。

achievement.name: 暗影戏法
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影摇篮中，在不重新点燃任何已熄灭的火盆的情况下击败蛛魔人科菲达恩。

achievement.name: 分则败
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影摇篮中，在不吸收任何法球的情况下击败德拉诺斯·维拉多尔。

achievement.name: 蛛网行者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影摇篮中，在没有任何小队成员死在墓穴中的情况下击败薇利德雷斯。

achievement.name: 拥抱暗影
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影摇篮中，在没有使用侍灵之光协同技的情况下击败薇利德雷斯。

achievement.name: 看不到我
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）暗影摇篮中，在没有小队成员被薇利德雷斯的暗影感知捕获的情况下击败她。

name: 马扎顿遗迹
mystery: 任何亚龙人都会告诉你，“谜团之城”中心有些事情很不对劲，让人深感不安，让人起鸡皮疙瘩的那种，竖起警示意味的尖刺！
des:
Ruins of Mazzatun is a group dungeon in Shadowfen.
It's part of the Shadows of the Hist dungeon pack DLC, along with Cradle of Shadows. The ruins can be entered from a cave at Hei-Halai, west of Stormhold. The entrance to Cold-Blood Cavern lies beneath a trap door in the tunnel leading to Mazzatun's entrance. Pages from the Mazzatun Style and a lead for the Bog-Blue Jasper Fetish (required for the Harpooner's Wading Kilt) have a chance to drop from the last boss.
Similar to the Imperial City group dungeons, Mazzatun has an objective quest as well as a repeatable pledge from Urgarlag Chief-bane. Hist Ponds serve as traps in this dungeon. Monkeys and frogs can be found throughout the dungeon. Its dungeon sets are Amber Plasm, Aspect of Mazzatun, and Heem-Jas' Retribution.
The Ruins of Mazzatun make up an ancient Argonian city inhabited by the Xit-Xaht Tribe. The Xit-Xaht have an affinity for the stone and the roots, and have recently taken to raiding other villages and enslaving the inhabitants. Those they capture are put to work, being forced to construct the sprawling city of Mazzatun. The city's construction doesn't entirely make sense; there are hallways leading nowhere and staircases that climb up to dead end walls. Aptly nicknamed the "Puzzle City", the ruins of old Mazzatun are like a sprawling maze.

BOSS.name: 强大的楚丹
BOSS.des: Mighty Chudan is a giant female haj mota found in the Ruins of Mazzatun. She is the tree-minder's pet. Chudan is the namesake of the Mighty Chudan monster helm set, but doesn't actually drop any of the pieces.

skills.name: 碎击利爪
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 啃噬
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 血流成河
skills.des: A charged heavy melee attack that deals high physical damage to all players in front of the boss. This attack should be blocked or dodged if possible. Do not stand in front of the boss if you are not the tank.

skills.name: 粘液喷射
skills.des: Chudan barrages whoever she's targeting with a flurry of poisonous spit dealing high poison damage over time. The tank must block this ability, and the healer should focus heals on the tank when this ability is being used.

skills.name: 粘液池
skills.des: After Mucous Spray is used, the boss leaves behind poisonous pools that deal moderate poison damage over time as indicated by red circles.

skills.name: 泥沼突击
skills.des: Chudan targets one player digs towards them. She does this when an Argonian Shellbinder spawns. The Shellbinder prods Chudan with lightning in an attempt to control the beast. They throw lightning at your group in the process, dealing more and more damage the longer the Shellbinder is left alive. The indication that you have been targeted comes to you in the form of an aoe that spreads out from your feet and follows you everywhere. This means you have to run between Chudan and the Shellbinder (in other words, make sure Chudan "has line of sight" on them), and evade her charge when she digs towards you so she kills the Shellbinder that's tossing out lightning. Once Chudan begins to charge, she will not change directions; she will charge in a straight line without deviating from that path.

skills.name: 召唤哈吉鳄龟
skills.des: Two smaller Haj Mota will arrive to assist the boss in battle. They can use Swamp Spit to apply a toxic green AoE on the ground. They have high health but do not deal much damage and will respawn if killed, and hence can be ignored safely.
Throughout the fight, Xit-Xaht Trappers will attack the party, and should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

BOSS.name: 奴隶主夏尔-努尔
BOSS.des:
Xal-Nur the Slaver is a monstrous Argonian found in the Ruins of Mazzatun. Xal-Nur becomes invulnerable when he summons swamp spice, and a group member will need to walk into the green AoE circle and bring the spice debuff to a geyser in order to damage him again.
The behemoth is resurrected during the final battle against Tree-Minder Na-Kesh, who uses amber plasm to summon a Phantom of Xal-Nur.

skills.name: 狂野挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 野蛮噬咬
skills.des: The boss bites its target dealing moderate physical damage followed by minor physical damage over time.

skills.name: 残暴之吼
skills.des: The boss roars dealing moderate physical damage over time in front of him as indicated by a red cone. Do not stand in front of the boss unless you are the tank.

skills.name: 泥震
skills.des: The boss stomps causing shockwaves to travel out from himself dealing moderate physical damage and staggering all players hit.

skills.name: 奴隶强袭
skills.des: The boss slams both of his fists on the ground, dealing high physical damage and knocking players down as indicated by a red circle.

skills.name: 骇人闪击
skills.des: The boss charges at a target dealing high physical damage and knocking them back. The target will glow red to telegraph this. Group members can choose to hold block in front of the boss to intercept him before he reaches his target. If you are targeted and the boss reaches you, hold block to lessen the damage done and prevent the knockback.

skills.name: 沼泽香料
skills.des: At certain health intervals (75%, 50% and 25%), the boss will spit Swamp Spice. Cleansing the spice is necessary as the boss is invulnerable as long as the spice is up. At the same time, adds will spawn constantly to attack the party. To cleanse the spice, one player (usually the dps) will run into the spice's green AOE to pick it up and bring it to a geyser near the entrance or exit. It is advised tanks and healers not touch the spice as it will silence you as long as you are carrying it.

While the group is dealing with the Swamp Spice, adds will spawn to attack the group. If you're being overwhelmed by adds, kill one of the Argonian Wranglers holding the chained wamasu. They've been mistreated by the Xit-Xaht, so if you're struggling, free them and watch them pick off the adds. Keep in mind that Xal-Nur will eventually kill the freed wamasu.

skills.name: 愤怒咆哮
skills.des: Xal-Nur will roar angrily after the Swamp Spice is cleansed, dealing moderate physical damage to everyone in the arena. This is unavoidable and must be healed through.

BOSS.name: 树之牧者纳-凯石
BOSS.des:
Tree-Minder Na-Kesh is the leader of the Argonian Xit-Xaht tribe. She is responsible for tending the mad Hist at the Ruins of Mazzatun, and is performing cruel alchemical experiments with amber plasm. She serves as the final boss of the dungeon. She has written a journal, and wears the Amber Plasm skin.
She has a chance to drop Mazzatun Style pages on Veteran difficulty, with a guaranteed drop from Hard Mode and a 50% chance for a page to drop from non-Hard Mode. She has a chance to drop the Antiquity lead for Bog-Blue Jasper Fetish.

skills.name: 斩击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 回旋之刃
skills.des: The boss spins around, dealing moderate physical damage to all players around her. This attack is very fast with no telegraph, so be prepared.

skills.name: 树皮粉碎者
skills.des: A charged heavy melee attack that deals high physical damage and knocks back the target. This should be blocked or dodged if possible.

skills.name: 根茎强袭
skills.des: Na-Kesh calls roots from the earth to slam into the target in front of her, with a conal AoE that deals mild physical damage.

skills.name: 藤蔓抽击
skills.des: The boss charges up and summons vines to hit her target, dealing moderate physical damage as indicated by a red cone in front of her. She will turn to track her target as she is casting this, so the tank should stand still to avoid hitting other group members.

The boss summons a Siphoning Totem near a target that initially drains resources and health from them only. The totem must be killed as quickly as possible, as the siphoning speed will increase over time, together with multiple players getting siphoned at once. She tends to summon the totem at the start of the fight and every time Hist Hallucinations occurs.

skills.name: 希思特幻象
skills.des: The Tree-Minder targets one player and throws Amber at them, causing them to hallucinate. This makes the statues on the edge of the arena glow and the affected player's vision to go blue. The affected player will see Avatars of the Hist statues all around the edge of the arena. While targeted, all your skills and light attacks are replaced with a ranged sap ball attack. You must find the correct Avatar and use your light attack to destroy it. Your allies can activate a synergy to reveal the real avatar on normal, but on veteran hard mode, you need to communicate to find it. A good strategy without using voice communications is for the tank to run over to the real one, which will be glowing for those with normal vision. The achievement Blind Luck can be earned by not using the Reveal synergy to find the Empowered Tree-Minder Totem.

skills.name: 琥珀雨
skills.des: During Hist Hallucinations, amber will fall from the Hist above, dealing moderate magical damage as indicated by red circles. Sticky Situation Savvy can be earned by having no group members hit by Amber Rain during this fight on veteran difficulty.

skills.name: 召唤增加
skills.des: A wave of archer Xit-Xaht will spawn every time Hist Hallucinations is cast and should be killed as soon as possible. On hard mode, Stoneshapers and Root-Masons are summoned as well, and are high priority targets for the group.

Na-Kesh throws a glob of Amber onto the ground that creates a Hist Pool, which adds can run into. This empowers the enemies, causing them to deal more damage and become immune to crowd control. One player should run into the Hist Pool to grab it so the adds can't step into it. This is especially crucial during hard mode when Stoneshapers appear, as an empowered Stoneshaper can easily wipe the group with its uninterruptible boulder throw attack. The player that steps in the plasm will take moderate magic damage over time, which can be healed through fairly easily.

skills.name: 琥珀投影
skills.des: Na-Kesh will summon an amber shade of Mighty Chudan at 75% health and Xal-Nur at 50%. The boss is stunned and immune to damage while the shades are alive. Note that there is no time limit for killing the shades: your group can use these phases to charge ultimate or recover resources if needed.

skills.name: 索恩的灾厄
skills.des: At 25% health, Na-Kesh enters execute phase, wherein she causes vines to erupt in all directions in an alternating pattern, dealing moderate physical damage as indicated by large red cones. It is advised for the group to save ultimate to burn the boss down swiftly during this phase, as dealing with totems and adds together with the constant AoEs can be overwhelming.

achievement.name: 希思特的暗影探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入马扎顿遗迹或暗影摇篮。

achievement.name: 马扎顿样式大师
achievement.des: 学习马扎顿样式书的每一章，该样式书偶尔作为完成马扎顿遗迹地下城的奖励出现。

achievement.name: 马扎顿遗迹挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）马扎顿遗迹的成就。

achievement.name: 马扎顿遗迹征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马扎顿遗迹中击败断脊者扎祖、强大的楚丹、奴隶主夏尔-努尔和树之牧者纳-凯石。

achievement.name: 树之牧者的狂热
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马扎顿遗迹中，通过摧毁树之牧者纳-凯石关于琥珀浆体的炼金术笔记将她激怒，然后击败她。

achievement.name: 毁灭
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马扎顿遗迹中，在开启地下城后的30分钟内击败断脊者扎祖、强大的楚丹、奴隶主夏尔-努尔和树之牧者纳-凯石。在通过第一个拱门时开始计时。

achievement.name: 不屈
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马扎顿遗迹中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败断脊者扎祖、强大的楚丹、奴隶主夏尔-努尔和树之牧者纳-凯石。

achievement.name: 马扎顿遗迹胜利者
achievement.des: 在马扎顿遗迹中击败断脊者扎祖、强大的楚丹、奴隶主夏尔-努尔和树之牧者纳-凯石。

achievement.name: 马扎顿大屠杀
achievement.des: 在马扎顿遗迹，先消灭其他所有敌人，然后击败树之牧者纳-凯石。

achievement.name: 被压制的投掷兵
achievement.des: 在不允许任何投掷兵用琥珀浆体强化其友方的情况下完成马扎顿遗迹。

achievement.name: 希思特的暗影探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）暗影摇篮和老兵马扎顿遗迹。

achievement.name: 投掷兵杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马扎顿遗迹中击败50个席-夏特投掷兵。

achievement.name: 席-夏特杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马扎顿遗迹中击败席-夏特部落的600个成员。

achievement.name: 苏扎里的救星
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马扎顿遗迹中，从仪式密室解救出全部6名苏扎里长老。

achievement.name: 哈吉·莫塔斗牛士
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马扎顿遗迹中，在没有任何小队成员被泥沼突击命中的情况下击败强大的楚丹。

achievement.name: 服从性训练
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马扎顿遗迹中，在不释放任何雷光蜥蜴协助你的情况下击败奴隶主夏尔-努尔。

achievement.name: 洁癖
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马扎顿遗迹中，在只有一名小队成员净化沼泽香料的情况下击败奴隶主夏尔-努尔。其他小队成员仍然可以触碰沼泽香料。

achievement.name: 纯属运气
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马扎顿遗迹中，在没有任何小队成员使用察觉协同技识别真正的希思特化身的情况下，击败树之牧者纳-凯石。

achievement.name: 棘手情况应变
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马扎顿遗迹中，在没有小队成员被沸腾琥珀命中的情况下，击败树之牧者纳-凯石。

name: 血根熔炉
mystery: 这座神秘的锻造厂被诺德人视为邪恶之地，建造此地的是一支无人知晓的尼德人，他们崇拜的是被遗忘的黑暗神明。如今这里被瑞驰的恐角氏族重新启用，他们试图染指可怕的强大力量。
des:
Bloodroot Forge is a group dungeon in Craglorn.
It's part of the Horns of the Reach dungeon pack DLC, along with Falkreath Hold. The entrance is located west of Elinhir.
The dungeon itself takes place at an ancient Nedic site that is associated with Hircine, and is located high in the Jerall Mountains, where the Dreadhorn Clan of Reachmen are performing foul rituals with the ancient magic located here.

BOSS.name: 凯拉奥菲
BOSS.des: Caillaoife is a hagraven of the Dreadhorn Clan found in Bloodroot Forge. She initially summons Mathgamain to stop you, and then fights you herself at the entrance to the Sanguinary Veins, where she serves as the first boss of the dungeon.

skills.name: 酷夏之热
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor flame damage and causes weakness to frost, causing you to take more damage from Chill of Winter. The boss usually alternates between using this and Chill of Winter as a basic attack.

skills.name: 凛冬之寒
skills.des: The boss releases a wave of frost from itself dealing moderate frost damage and rooting players hit as indicated by a red circle. Getting hit by this also causes weakness to fire, causing you to take more damage from Scorch of Summer. Avoid the AOE if possible.

skills.name: 大地之波
skills.des: The boss shoots out a barrage of rocks from itself dealing moderate physical damage and stunning all players hit as indicated by a red cone.

skills.name: 自然守护
skills.des: At 75, 50, and 25% health the boss shields herself with Nature's Preservation, bringing forth three trees from the ground. While inside, she cannot be damaged. Players inside the circle, or players who touch the circle, will be stunned and thrown outwards dealing moderate magical damage, so don't stand too near the boss when her health reaches that amount. Any adds inside the circle will also be invulnerable, so the tank should bring them away for the group to deal with them. Simply wait for the circle to disappear while dealing with the adds.

At the same time, Cailloaife summons Nirnblooded Bears, Guars, and Senches to attack you at around 75%, 50%, and 25% of her health. Each wave increases in number. Kill them quickly to simplify the fight. The bears and stranglers are priority targets.

skills.name: 传送
skills.des: Once Nature's Preservation ends, the boss teleports away and the fight repeats.

BOSS.name: 盖尔卓巴尔
BOSS.des:
Galchobhar is a minotaur of the Dreadhorn Clan found in Bloodroot Forge, serving as the second boss of the dungeon.
He is on island surrounded by molten nirncrux, guarding the entrance to the forge. When first encountered, a group of rebelling captives attempt to take him down before he smashes his cleaver, throwing them all into the lava.

skills.name: 砍剁
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 烈焰大地
skills.des: When hit by Chop, flame AOEs will spawn under the tank dealing moderate flame damage over time as indicated by red circles.

skills.name: 横劈
skills.des: The boss swings its weapon in an arc dealing moderate flame damage and staggering the target.

skills.name: 火焰觉醒
skills.des: When casting Cleave, three flaming AOEs are also released along the ground traveling outwards from the boss in the direction it is facing. Do not stand in front of the boss unless you are the tank.

skills.name: 地幔碎击
skills.des: A charged heavy attack that deals high physical damage, and should be blocked. Following that, a small volcano is summoned at the impact location. The volcano shoots lava balls at all players dealing high flame damage over time. To prevent this, the tank needs to stand on top of the volcano and block. Do note that it is preferable the tank do this as the damage taken while standing on the volcano is very high.

skills.name: 焦枯大地
skills.des: Galchobar charges up his weapon and throws it, dealing a high amount of damage to anyone on the island as indicated by a large expanding red circle. This attack is lethal on veteran mode. To avoid it, jump onto the rocks surrounding the island. Note that only one person should be on each rock, as multiple people standing on a rock will cause it to disappear faster causing all players on it to fall into the lava.

skills.name: 盖尔卓巴尔之焰
skills.des: After Scorched Earth is cast there will be a ring of lingering flames on the island edge. Wait for

skills.name: 熔融奈恩核心
skills.des: Falling into the lava surrounding the island will deal very high flame damage over time. Do not step onto the rocks unless avoiding a Lava Ball from a Fire Shalk or Scorched Earth from Galchobhar.
Throughout the fight, the boss summons Fire Shalks to attack the party. These should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

BOSS.name: 地血混合体
BOSS.des: Earthgore Amalgam is a massive iron atronach, and the final boss of Bloodroot Forge. It is formed into the same arena as Gheric Bullblood upon his death.

skills.name: 钝击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 裂砧者
skills.des: A charge heavy melee attack that deals very high physical damage. This has to be blocked by the tank or dodged if you are not.

skills.name: 撼地者
skills.des: At 80% health and below, the boss will stomp dealing high physical damage over time around itself. It will also cause additional Falling Debris around all players and the arena as indicated by red circles dealing high physical damage and knockdown. Players can choose to use the Stonefire crucible synergy to stun the boss while it is channeling this attack.

skills.name: 坠落残骸
skills.des: Throughout the fight, rocks will fall from the ceiling dealing high physical damage and knockdown as indicated by red circles. The frequency and amount of falling rocks will increase when Groundshaker is cast so be prepared to constantly move.

skills.name: 身陷火海
skills.des: The boss shoots out a lava ball that forms a lava pool at random locations around the arena. This deals high flame damage over time to players near the pool. This can be removed by using the Flameslake Cauldron synergy.

skills.name: 召唤克隆
skills.des: At 75% and 50% health respectively, the main boss sacrifices some of its health to summon a medium/small sized clone of itself with that much health. Do note that the health bar at the top represents the total health of all the clones. All clones have the same attacks the main boss has, and players should focus the small clone then medium clone, then original boss in that order. This is because the smaller clones have less health and the longer the clones are alive the more lava pools will appear, which will eventually cover the entire arena if the boss is not finished off fast enough.

achievement.name: 瑞驰号角探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入佛克瑞斯领地或血根熔炉。

achievement.name: 恐角样式大师
achievement.des: 学习恐角样式书的每一章，该样式书偶尔作为完成佛克瑞斯领地地下城的奖励出现。

achievement.name: 血根熔炉挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）血根熔炉的成就。

achievement.name: 血根熔炉征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）血根熔炉中，击败玛斯加梅因、凯拉奥菲、石心、盖尔卓巴尔、格里戈·牛血和他的侍从和地血混合体。

achievement.name: 焦土
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）血根熔炉中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败玛斯加梅因、凯拉奥菲、石心、盖尔卓巴尔、格里戈·牛血和他的侍从和地血混合体。

achievement.name: 直击问题根源
achievement.enName: Right to the Root of the Problem
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）血根熔炉中，在开启地下城后20分钟内击败玛斯加梅因、凯拉奥菲、石心、盖尔卓巴尔、格里戈·牛血和他的侍从和地血混合体。当玩家经过第一个恐角营地时开始计时。

achievement.name: 压抑的怒火
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）血根熔炉中，在召唤光辉战斗卷轴之后击败地血混合体。

achievement.name: 血根熔炉胜利者
achievement.des: 在血根熔炉中，击败玛斯加梅因、凯拉奥菲、石心、盖尔卓巴尔、格里戈·牛血和他的侍从和地血混合体。

achievement.name: 血、汗与火
achievement.des: 在血根熔炉中，使用石火熔炉眩晕5个目标，并用灭火大锅冷却5个熔岩池。

achievement.name: 瑞驰号角探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）佛克瑞斯领地和（老兵模式）血根熔炉。

achievement.name: 痛苦工匠
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）血根熔炉中，亲自使用石火熔炉和灭火大锅击败地血混合体。

achievement.name: 巨石跳跃者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）血根熔炉中，在没有任何小队成员受到盖尔卓巴尔的焦枯大地的影响以及盖尔卓巴尔之焰的攻击的情况下将他击败。

achievement.name: 给你的脚降降温
achievement.des: 在不受流经（老兵模式）血根熔炉的熔融奈恩核心伤害的情况下，击败玛斯加梅因、凯拉奥菲、石心、盖尔卓巴尔、格里戈·牛血和他的侍从和地血混合体。

achievement.name: 手工炮制的胜利
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）血根熔炉中，在没有任何小队成员激活石火熔炉或灭火大锅的情况下击败地血混合体。

achievement.name: 火热追击
achievement.des: 在没有任何小队成员被火焰沙克虫吐出的熔岩球命中的情况下完成（老兵模式）血根熔炉。

achievement.name: 熔岩粉碎者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）血根熔炉中，使用盖尔卓巴尔的地幔碎击攻击粉碎一个由火焰沙克虫发射的熔岩球。

achievement.name: 沙克虫抖落者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）血根熔炉中，在没有任何小队成员杀死火焰沙克虫的情况下将盖尔卓巴尔击败。

achievement.name: 恐角战士杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）血根熔炉中击败300个恐角执剑者、猎人者和氏族杀手。

achievement.name: 火皮杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）血根熔炉中击败50个恐角火皮。

achievement.name: 野生生物保护所
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）血根熔炉中，在不让任何奈恩血裔生物在凯拉奥菲的自然守护屏障内停留超过3秒的情况下将她击败。

name: 佛克瑞斯领地
location: Cyrodiil Gate Garrison, east of Elinhir
mystery: Since  drove out the Orcs in 2E 467 Falkreath has been back in the hands of the Nords. But now the weakened hold is menaced by another threat: the savage Reachmen of the Dreadhorn clan.
des:
Falkreath Hold is a group dungeon in Craglorn.
It's part of the Horns of the Reach dungeon pack DLC, along with Bloodroot Forge. It can be entered by cart from the Cyrodiil Gate Garrison, just east of Elinhir.
The dungeon takes place during the Dreadhorn Clan's siege of the city.

BOSS.name: 攻城猛犸象
BOSS.des:
The Siege Mammoth is a large mammoth owned by the Dreadhorn Clan. It can be found within Falkreath Hold, attempting to break down Falkreath's main gates. It serves as the dungeon's first boss.
During the fight, Dreadhorn reachmen will be stationed atop the rocks above and shoot projectiles at the ground near the mammoth, serving as an unkillable hazard.
It has a chance to drop a Minotaur Bezoar.

skills.name: 挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 充能
skills.des: The boss charges forwards dealing moderate physical damage and knocking targets down as indicated by a red rectangle. The tank should position the boss facing the wall to prevent this.

skills.name: 獠牙横扫
skills.des: A charged heavy melee attack that deals high physical damage. This must be blocked or dodged if possible. Do not stand in front of the boss if you are not the tank.

skills.name: 跺脚
skills.des: At 50%, the Reachmen will light the boss on fire, adding a new attack to the fight. Occasionally, the boss rears up and stomps, dealing very high flame damage around itself. This must be blocked by everyone when it occurs.

BOSS.name: 塞伦农
BOSS.des:
Cernunnon is a bone colossus encountered in Falkreath Hold. It is summoned after the trio of necromancers― Erbogar, Mochveda and Tuecille―are killed. It serves as the second boss of the dungeon.
It has a chance to drop a Minotaur Bezoar.

skills.name: 冰火爆轰
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor frost damage.

skills.name: 裂骨冲击
skills.des: A charged heavy melee attack that deals very high physical damage and knocking the target back. This must be blocked by the tank or dodged if you are not the tank.

skills.name: 凛冬之相
skills.des: The boss summons meteors that will land on top of all players dealing high frost damage around them. When the rune appears around you, move away from your group members and hold block. Avoid stacking on top of each other during this attack as the damage from multiple meteors can be overwhelming.

skills.name: 与死神擦肩而过
skills.des: The boss summons wraiths that will roam the arena, touching one will deal moderate frost damage and fear you momentarily. This will also summon some Ravenous Revenants to attack the group.

skills.name: 冥界拖拽
skills.des: When you enter the arena, you'll see a message declaring that the Void tugs at your soul. You will notice a barrier of swirling soul energy around the area. If you stand outside the designated area, you'll take high magical damage over time. To avoid this, stand in the eye of the soulstorm when this happens.

skills.name: 召唤仆从
skills.des: At 50% health, the boss disappears and resurrects the three necromancers from before. Kill them as you did earlier and the boss returns and the fight repeats.

BOSS.name: “血角”铎米豪斯
BOSS.des:
Domihaus the Bloody-Horned is a minotaur of the Dreadhorn Clan, and acts as the final boss of Falkreath Hold. He will arrive by bursting through the Jarl's Hall and landing on Jarl Skjoralmor, fatally crushing him. During the fight, he will summon four types of atronachs (Flame, Frost, Stone, Storm).
He has a chance to drop a Minotaur Bezoar.

skills.name: 火之霆击
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor flame damage.

skills.name: 烈焰爆轰
skills.des: A charged heavy ranged attack that deals very high flame damage. This must be blocked or dodged if possible if you are the dps.

skills.name: 火之环
skills.des: The boss summons flames on the ground behind the pillars dealing high flame damage over time. This forces players into the center of the arena.

skills.name: 奈恩之柱
skills.des: While Ring of Fire is active, the boss pulls all players towards him and snares them. Following that, nirncrux pillars will appear under each player's feet dealing moderate flame damage over time. Keep moving and do not overlap with other players to avoid the red AOEs.

skills.name: 支柱喷发
skills.des: After a brief moment, the pillars explode dealing moderate flame damage.

skills.name: 烈焰风暴
skills.des: The boss summons flames around him dealing high flame damage over time as indicated by a red circle. This forces players to stay behind the pillars on the edge of the arena.

skills.name: 燃烧余烬
skills.des: The boss pounds the ground causing fireballs to shoot out from itself traveling along the ground dealing moderately high flame damage. If the outer edge is safe, players can hide behind the pillars to avoid the fireballs.

skills.name: 召唤侍灵
skills.des: At 80, 60, 40 and 20% health, the boss becomes invulnerable and summons a flame, frost, stone, and storm atronach to attack the group. They should be killed quickly before the boss wakes up, as dealing with the boss and the adds at once can be overwhelming. Do note that as the boss's health depletes, he will become invulnerable for shorter amounts of time giving the group less time to deal with the adds.

skills.name: 荒芜咆哮
skills.des: This attack is denoted by an onscreen notification saying Domihaus is preparing to shout! At 70, 50, 30 and 10% health, the boss shouts dealing very high amounts of magical damage. This attack is lethal on veteran mode. To prevent this, all players should hide behind an unbroken pillar in the hall. However, any of the pillars hidden behind will break, so to maximize the amount of hiding spots you have make sure all four group members hide behind the same pillar.

skills.name: 盾牌
skills.des: Once below 20% health, he will alternate between using Shout of Desolation and summoning adds on a timer. Be sure to kill the boss before no pillars remain, in which case the next shout will wipe the whole group. In addition, on veteran hard mode once below 20% health, the boss will activate a damage shield that absorbs incoming damage. The group should save ultimates for the final phase to break his shield and burn him down quickly before the damage becomes overwhelming.

achievement.name: 瑞驰号角探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入佛克瑞斯领地或血根熔炉。

achievement.name: 血铸样式大师
achievement.des: 学习血铸样式书的每一章，该样式书偶尔作为完成血根熔炉地下城的奖励出现。

achievement.name: 佛克瑞斯领地挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）佛克瑞斯领地的成就。

achievement.name: 佛克瑞斯领地征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）佛克瑞斯领地中，击败莫丽格·牛血、攻城猛犸象、塞伦农、死亡领主巴尔弗鲁德·斯科阿尔莫和“血角”铎米豪斯。

achievement.name: 猛牛冲刺
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）佛克瑞斯领地中，在开启地下城后20分钟内击败莫丽格·牛血、攻城猛犸象、塞伦农、死亡领主巴尔弗鲁德·斯科阿尔莫和“血角”铎米豪斯。当玩家遭遇第一批恐角入侵者时开始计时。

achievement.name: 擒贼先擒王
achievement.enName: Taking the Bull by the Horns
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）佛克瑞斯领地中，在吹响领主大厅中的战争号角之后击败“血角”铎米豪斯。

achievement.name: 不断的战线
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）佛克瑞斯领地中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败莫丽格·牛血、攻城猛犸象、塞伦农、死亡领主巴尔弗鲁德·斯科阿尔莫和“血角”铎米豪斯。

achievement.name: 佛克瑞斯领地胜利者
achievement.des: 在佛克瑞斯领地中，击败莫丽格·牛血、攻城猛犸象、塞伦农、死亡领主巴尔弗鲁德·斯科阿尔莫和“血角”铎米豪斯。

achievement.name: 战争年代史编者
achievement.des: 发现佛克瑞斯领地内的紧急信件、给玛里卡的未写完的信、关于谣言的回信和巴尔弗鲁德·斯科阿尔莫的墓志铭。

achievement.name: 极致野蛮
achievement.des: 在佛克瑞斯领地中，在没有受到任何敌方眩晕、震慑或击退技能影响的情况下击败攻城猛犸象。

achievement.name: 瑞驰号角探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）佛克瑞斯领地和（老兵模式）血根熔炉。

achievement.name: 柱子看管者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）佛克瑞斯领地中，在至少2根柱子仍然矗立在领主大厅中的情况下击败“血角”铎米豪斯。

achievement.name: 闪避大师
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）佛克瑞斯领地中，在自身不被攻城火力以及莫丽格·牛血指挥的攻城器械击中的情况下击败每个Boss。

achievement.name: 忍受元素
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）佛克瑞斯领地中，在各种类型的侍灵至少还有一个活着的情况下击败“血角”铎米豪斯。

achievement.name: 史诗级殡葬服务
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）佛克瑞斯领地中，在与死亡领主巴尔弗鲁德·斯科阿尔莫战斗时，你的队伍在5秒内净化15具尸体。

achievement.name: 破誓者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）佛克瑞斯领地中，在塞伦农和他的誓言绑定召唤物的战斗中，驱逐所有三名幽灵大师的灵魂，每次驱逐之间相距不超过5秒。

achievement.name: 向荣耀的死者致敬
achievement.des: 在任意难度下，净化佛克瑞斯领地的亡者之厅里的1000具尸体。

achievement.name: 恐角法师杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）佛克瑞斯领地中击败150个恐角城镇破坏者、荒野驯服者和纵火者。

achievement.name: 牛头人践踏者杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）佛克瑞斯领地中击败60个恐角践踏者。

name: 獠牙巢穴
location: Northern Bangkorai, north of Troll's Toothpick
mystery: 在第一纪元被龙摧毁之前，阿肯萨姆兹·方矮人城可以与辉煌的杜马克王国相媲美。这种可怕生物的传说一直使旅行者对獠牙巢穴避之不及……直到现在。
des:
Fang Lair is a group dungeon in Bangkorai.
It is part of the Dragon Bones dungeon pack DLC, along with Scalecaller Peak. The entrance is located in northeastern Bangkorai. The dungeon itself is located in an ancient Dwemer ruin site, where necromancers are attempting to resurrect a once-living Dragon. Notes on the Dwemer ruin, written by Neramo, can be found near the entrance to the dungeon.

BOSS.des: The Cadaverous Menagerie consists of a Cadaverous Bear, Guar, and Senche-Tiger which have been reanimated and can be found within Fang Lair. They are the second boss of the dungeon.

BOSS.name: 卡鲁里昂
BOSS.des:
Caluurion is a Lich who serves as the third boss of Fang Lair. During the fight, he will activate the Wamasu, Serpent, Lurcher, Mammoth, and Shalk relics, which will give him varying boosts.
He has a chance to drop a sample of Dragon Bone.
He was originally an Altmer and one of the adventurers who slew the dragon Thurvokun in the First Era, along with Ulfnor and Sabina Cedus. In undeath he has been bound to serve the necromancer Orryn the Black. Once he is defeated, his spirit will be freed and can be spoken to in later stages of the dungeon.

skills.name: 死灵之矛
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that does minor magical damage, and can be blocked or dodged to reduce damage.

skills.name: 灵魂之笼
skills.des: The lich will summon three to five lich crystals from the ground around it, as indicated by white cracks on the ground. Standing near the crystals as indicated by the red circles will do moderate magical damage over time to the player. This attack is always followed by Soul Rupture. Stay at range when this spell is cast to avoid the lich crystals.

skills.name: 灵魂破裂
skills.des: After a short time, the crystals explode, dealing moderate magical damage to all players within the red circle. Getting hit by the exploding crystals will cause the player to be lifted above ground briefly; the player can break free from this.

skills.name: 死灵漫天
skills.des: The boss summons magical bolts that hit the ground around itself dealing moderate magical damage as indicated by red circles.
Activating the shalk relic will allow the boss to spray fire in a cone in front of him, dealing high flame damage over time.

skills.name: 风暴蜥蜴之怒
skills.des: Activating the wamasu relic will allow the boss to place lightning AOEs on top of all players, dealing moderate shock damage over time.

skills.name: 寒冰獠牙
skills.des: Activating the mammoth relic will allow the boss to place ice AOEs on the ground, dealing high frost damage over time.

skills.name: 掌握自然
skills.des: Activating the lurcher relic will allow the boss to spread root AOEs outwards from itself, immobilizing and dealing high physical damage to all players hit as indicated by red circles.

skills.name: 蝮蛇狠咬
skills.des: Activating the serpent relic will allow the boss to summon many smaller serpents to attack the party, each dealing moderate poison damage.

skills.name: 狂怒
skills.des: When around 20% health, the boss will activate all relics at once. Players should save ultimates to burn the boss down fast during this phase before damage from overlapping mechanics becomes overwhelming.

BOSS.name: 萨拜娜·塞杜斯
BOSS.des:
Sabina Cedus is a Ghost found in Fang Lair. She was originally an Imperial and one of the adventurers who slew the dragon Thurvokun in the First Era, along with Ulfnor and Caluurion. In undeath she has been bound to serve the necromancer Orryn the Black.
When the ghost version of her and skeleton version of Ulfnor are defeated, they will be freed from Orryn the Black's control. Her spirit will help you to kill Orryn the Black, and tell you of Thurvokun's death.

skills.name: 寒冰箭矢
skills.des: A basic range attack that does minor frost damage.

skills.name: 寒冷之触
skills.des: A short ranged spell that does moderate frost damage and slows the player down.

skills.name: 不散阴魂
skills.des: The ghost winds up and releases an apparition in the direction it is facing. Touching the apparition will do moderate frost damage, as well as fear the player, causing them to run around randomly for a few seconds. Avoiding the fear effect will net players an achievement.

skills.name: 幽灵锁链
skills.des: Sabina will fly to a side of the room, chain a player down and start dragging them towards her. If they reach her, Ulfnor will walk over slowly. Players have to kill Sabina to free the player before Ulfnor reaches them and stabs them for an instant kill.

BOSS.name: 乌黑者奥瑞恩
BOSS.des:
Orryn the Black is a Nord necromancer found in Fang Lair. He is the leader of the Blackmarrow Cult and is trying to reanimate the skeleton of the long-dead dragon Thurvokun. During the battle with Thurvokun, he will initially be summoning thralls and casting spells from the sidelines, but after Thurvokun's defeat he will merge with the dragon's bones and fight you.
Once defeated in his dragon form, Orryn is guaranteed to drop a sample of Dragon Bone. He drops more samples if defeated in Veteran Hard mode.

skills.name: 死灵之矛
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals moderate magical damage. Orryn will shoot at your party members periodically while Thurvokun still operates independently of him.

skills.name: 诅咒之地
skills.des: The boss summons lich crystals under the player's feet dealing moderate magical damage over time as indicated by red circles.

skills.name: 尸体爆弹
skills.des: If players attempt to resurrect a dead group member, the boss will summon an AOE on the body's location that deals high magical damage after a short moment as indicated by a red circle. Wait till it explodes to revive.

skills.name: 传送
skills.des: The boss teleports around to avoid your attacks.

At 85, 75, 65, and 55% health, Orryn will teleport around to the Animus Crystals around the room and cause Skeletons and Bones Colossi to be summoned by them if left undisturbed. The summoning will stop if the crystal is destroyed. Once Orryn merges with Thurvokun, all summoning circles are permanently reactivated and will summon skeletons periodically to attack the party.

skills.name: 死亡之触
skills.des: Starting at 45% health, Orryn will occasionally summon a wall of Wraith Thralls that advance from one side of the arena to another. The wraiths will deal lethal damage on veteran mode if you touch them. Hide behind the golden shields summoned by the friendly NPCs to avoid the ghosts. This repeats until Thurvokun is almost dead and Orryn merges with it, after which the wraiths will stop spawning.

skills.name: 死灵蜂拥
skills.des: During the Nord phase, the boss will occasionally teleport down and channel a spell that shoots a barrage of small skulls at all players dealing high magical damage over time. This spell should be interrupted as soon as possible.

On hard mode, a Bone Colossus will spawn immediately once the crystal is activated. Kill the colossus quickly and then destroy the crystal. A Bone Colossus will also spawn at 40, 30, 20 and 10% health (during the merged phase) and attack the party. These are priority targets and should be killed first before focusing the boss down.

skills.name: 死亡之触
skills.des: On hard mode, wraiths will spawn continuously once the boss merges with Thurovkun. The NPCs will not appear with the golden shields this time, but this time there are gaps in the ghost walls that can be used to avoid the ghosts.

achievement.name: 龙骨探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入獠牙巢穴或唤鳞者之巅。

achievement.name: 獠牙巢穴样式大师
achievement.des: 学习獠牙巢穴样式书的每一章，该样式书偶尔作为完成獠牙巢穴地下城的奖励出现。

achievement.name: 獠牙巢穴挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）獠牙巢穴的成就。

achievement.name: 獠牙巢穴征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）獠牙巢穴中，击败莉扎贝特·查尼斯、骸骨兽群、卡鲁里昂、乌尔夫诺尔和萨拜娜·塞杜斯和乌黑者奥瑞恩和图尔佛昆。

achievement.name: 拒绝成为死亡统计数字
achievement.des: Defeat Lizabet Charnis, the Cadaverous Menagerie, Caluurion, Ulfnor and Sabina Cedus, and Orryn the Black and Thurvokun and all of their minions in Veteran Fang Lair, without suffering a group member death.

achievement.name: 迅捷者大战亡灵
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）獠牙巢穴中，在30分钟内击败莉扎贝特·查尼斯、骸骨兽群、卡鲁里昂、乌尔夫诺尔和萨拜娜·塞杜斯、乌黑者奥瑞恩和图尔佛昆，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。在遭遇第一批乌髓死灵法师时开始计时。

achievement.name: 昨日之日不可追
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）獠牙巢穴中，在阅读了奥瑞恩笔记中的咒语之后击败乌黑者奥瑞恩和图尔佛昆。

achievement.name: 獠牙巢穴胜利者
achievement.des: 在獠牙巢穴中，击败莉扎贝特·查尼斯、骸骨兽群、卡鲁里昂、乌尔夫诺尔和萨拜娜·塞杜斯和乌黑者奥瑞恩和图尔佛昆。

achievement.name: 可怕的恶臭
achievement.des: 在獠牙巢穴中，在被图尔佛昆的瘟疫吐息命中时，处于伊萨蕾的生命结界的保护中，并同时与其他三名同样拥有伊萨蕾的生命结界的小队成员有直接接触。

achievement.name: 龙骨探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）獠牙巢穴和（老兵模式）唤鳞者之巅。

achievement.name: 片骨不留
achievement.des: 在困难模式（老兵模式）獠牙巢穴中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下在30分钟内击败莉扎贝特·查尼斯、骸骨兽群、卡鲁里昂、乌尔夫诺尔和萨拜娜·塞杜斯、乌黑者奥瑞恩和图尔佛昆，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 死灵法师杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）獠牙巢穴中击败350个乌髓死灵法师。

achievement.name: 骷髅杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）獠牙巢穴中击败500个骷髅。

achievement.name: 真菌免除
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）獠牙巢穴中，在没有任何小队成员受到暴烈真菌的伤害的情况下击败骸骨兽群。

achievement.name: 敌意最小化
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）獠牙巢穴中，在奥瑞恩于图尔佛昆合体之前至多只摧毁一个敌意水晶的情况下，击败乌黑者奥瑞恩和图尔佛昆。

achievement.name: 饥饿的甲虫
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）獠牙巢穴中，在没有任何小队成员被巨型甲虫的退化酸液命中的情况下击败乌黑者奥瑞恩和图尔佛昆。

achievement.name: 冷酷追击
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）獠牙巢穴中，在背诵了奥瑞恩笔记中的咒语之后，在没有任何小队成员被奥瑞恩的怨灵奴隶命中的情况下击败乌黑者奥瑞恩和图尔佛昆。

achievement.name: 基础解剖学
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）獠牙巢穴中，使用元素骨魔关闭卡鲁里昂的各个圣遗物。

achievement.name: 无计可施
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）獠牙巢穴中，在没有任何小队成员受到萨拜娜·塞杜斯的不散阴魂影响的情况下击败乌尔夫诺尔和萨拜娜·塞杜斯。

achievement.name: 服从性削减
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）獠牙巢穴中，在没有任何小队成员被森切虎的死亡之握杀死的情况下击败骸骨兽群。

name: 唤鳞者之巅
location: Northeastern Stormhaven, north of Wind Keep Wayshrine
mystery: 被龙大君遗弃的唤鳞者赞恩神庙空置了数个世纪之久。如今，异教徒接管了这座山，他们令人作呕的计划威胁着整个泰姆瑞尔。
des:
Scalecaller Peak is a group dungeon located in Stormhaven.
It's part of the Dragon Bones dungeon pack DLC, along with Fang Lair. It is located north of Wind Keep Wayshrine, in Stormhaven. Elk and foxes can be found on the slopes of the mountain.

BOSS.name: 恶臭的奥尔尊
BOSS.des:
Orzun the Foul-Smelling is an ogre found at Scalecaller Peak. Along with Rinaerus the Rancid, he serves as the first boss of the dungeon.
He and Rinaerus have a chance to collectively drop a sample of Infected Flesh.

skills.name: 撕碎打击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 腐臭之雾
skills.des: The boss empowers itself causing disease clouds to emit from in front of itself when Shredding Strike is cast dealing moderate disease damage as indicated by red circles.

skills.name: 破碎一击
skills.des: A charged heavy melee attack that deals high physical damage. This should be blocked or dodged if possible.

skills.name: 恶毒污染
skills.des: The boss has an aura that deals minor disease damage around itself (visible as green mist in image above). This damage will increase dramatically if the two bosses are brought together, so keep them separate.

skills.name: 寒霜之柱
skills.des: The boss summons frost pillars around the arena dealing moderate frost damage as indicated by red circles. There are some taller frost pillars that the group can hide behind to counter Vicious Shard cast by Rinaerus later. The group is advised to kill the two ogres at around the same time, as once Orzun dies Frost Pillars will not appear to shield the group from Vicious Shard.

skills.name: 冰颤追踪
skills.des: After Rinaerus casts Glacial Winds, smaller frost AoEs will remain. The group must freeze themselves in the AoEs to counter the Terrorizing Tremor AoEs that Orzun will summon, which deal high (lethal on vet) frost damage and are unavoidable.

BOSS.name: 首领阿尔蒂斯
BOSS.des:
Matriarch Aldis is a giantess found in a mountainous vale of Scalecaller Peak, acting as the second boss of the dungeon. She leads the giants found there and is infected with Nathan Mortieu's plague, making her much stronger. She is aided by Corrupted Leimenids who attempt to cause geyser eruptions throughout the fight. The water beneath the icesheet is infected with a deadly plague and causes damage when stood in.
The Corrupted Leimenid Corpse to the left of the door out of the area can be interacted with to obtain part of the cure for Jorvuld Davaux.
She has a chance to collectively drop a sample of Infected Flesh.

skills.name: 扫荡
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage and knocks the target back.

skills.name: 破裂
skills.des: The boss releases shockwaves in front of itself dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 冻结践踏
skills.des: The boss stomps dealing moderate physical damage around itself as indicated by a red circle.

skills.name: 碾碎连击
skills.des: The boss smashes its club in front of itself dealing very high physical damage as indicated by a red cone. Avoid this if possible.

skills.name: 冰冻之环
skills.des: The boss releases frost around itself dealing moderate frost damage as indicated by a large red circle. It can be hard to avoid this attack due to its large telegraph so be prepared to heal up once it occurs.

skills.name: 恫吓咆哮
skills.des: The boss shouts fearing all players momentarily. Break free to counter this.

skills.name: 冰冷水域
skills.des: The water around the arena will deal moderate frost damage over time to players standing in it. Stay on the islands to avoid this.

Every 10% health lost will cause the boss to summon a Leimenid to attack the party. They are priority targets and should be killed first. If group damage is good, it is possible to burn the boss before the damage from the Leimenids becomes overwhelming.

BOSS.name: 瘟疫调制者莫提乌
BOSS.des: Plague Concocter Mortieu is a Breton found in Scalecaller Peak. He was the leader of the Peryite Cult which created the plague within the caverns and woke up Zaan the Scalecaller, before she was given control. In combat, he is very proficient in unleashing his various afflictions to hinder his enemies. His full name, according to his journals is Nathien Mortieu.

skills.name: 迅捷射击
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 酸液喷射
skills.des: The boss fires poison arrows in a spray dealing moderate poison damage over time as indicated by a red cone.

skills.name: 释放火焰
skills.des: The boss throws a fireball at a target location that spreads out in four directions once it lands dealing moderate flame damage.

skills.name: 瘟疫井
skills.des: The grates around the arena will randomly activate shooting balls of poison at all players dealing moderate poison damage over time (this shows up as Spewing Plague). If unblocked, a larger poison ball (Plague Eruption) will trigger dealing high poison damage to the group. The tank should stand on the grates when they activate as indicated by a green circle to block the balls for the group.

skills.name: 脓疱瘟疫
skills.des: Throughout the fight the boss will use a random disease on the group. This deals moderate disease damage over time on top of its main effect. There are three main effects as listed below. Jorvuld Davaux can cure you though he needs your help to acquire the reagents for the cure. Decaying Infection Decaying Infection lowers the healing you receive. Your screen will glow red to indicate this. Wilting Infection Wilting Infection increases the cost of your Magicka abilities. Your screen will glow blue to indicate this. Degenerative Infection Degenerative Infection increases the cost of your Stamina abilities. Your screen will glow green to indicate this.

skills.name: 腐败感染
skills.des: Decaying Infection lowers the healing you receive. Your screen will glow red to indicate this.

skills.name: 枯萎感染
skills.des: Wilting Infection increases the cost of your Magicka abilities. Your screen will glow blue to indicate this.

skills.name: 退化感染
skills.des: Degenerative Infection increases the cost of your Stamina abilities. Your screen will glow green to indicate this.

After the disease is applied, imps, stranglers, and [[Online:|Online:]] will appear to attack the party. Jorvuld will call out for specific creatures to be killed to make the cure, but all of them should be killed to make the fight simpler.

skills.name: 瞄准目标
skills.des: The boss will attempt to snipe Jorvuld while he is preparing the antidote. Interrupt this attack to prevent the boss from stunning Jorvuld so you can cure yourself quicker.

skills.name: 解毒剂
skills.des: Jorvuld will throw the antidote on the ground when it is ready. Run over to the green circle to pick up the buff, which dispels the Blistering Plague and its effects. The boss will also get stunned at this point. In addition, players will gain large bonuses to damage done, ultimate generation, and resource recovery, so use this chance to deal massive damage to the boss.
When he gets stunned, he will summon a guard to help him. The guard deals high damage with its shield bash and should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

BOSS.name: 唤鳞者赞恩
BOSS.des:
Zaan the Scalecaller is a renegade Dragon Priest serving as the final boss of Scalecaller Peak. She formerly served the dragon Thurvokun, but after his departure she turned to worshiping Peryite and has been granted his artifact, the Spellbreaker. Following her death at the hands of her irritated followers, she has now been awakened by a cult of Peryite, who plan to unleash a terrible plague upon Tamriel.
Zaan drops a guaranteed sample of Infected Flesh, and on Veteran difficulty drops a random head piece from her associated set. She drops more samples if defeated in Veteran Hard mode.

skills.name: 寒意打击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does moderate physical damage. If taunted the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 致命寒冷
skills.des: Getting hit by Chilling Strike applies moderate frost damage over time to the player.

skills.name: 龙之怒
skills.des: Zaan will target one player with her fire breath. Zaan will stand in place and turn to face you as she exhales. Keep some distance and sidestep the fire waves as they come; the rest of the party should stand behind Zaan to avoid being hit.

skills.name: 破咒者的恶意
skills.des: Zaan will bash a target with her shield, dealing very high physical damage around her as indicated by a red circle. If taunted she will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 凛冬净化
skills.des: At 80%, 60%, 40% and 20%, Zaan will summon two Frozen Simulacrums (three on HM) that the group must destroy to progress the fight. The Simulacra themselves cannot attack the group, but while they are alive players will take moderately high frost damage over time that must be healed through. If they are not killed fast enough, the entire group will freeze to death after 10 or seconds. After this mechanic will be a special room wide version of Pestilent Breath.

skills.name: 极寒冲撞
skills.des: The boss slams her mace into the ground dealing high physical damage and knocking back all enemies near her as indicated by a red circle. While this usually occurs randomly, this attack is guaranteed to happen right after Pestilent Breath when Zaan picks up her shield. If you are standing near Spellbreaker when she picks it up, you will be badly hurt.

skills.name: 炼狱之握
skills.des: Zaan will knock back all enemies around herself as indicated by an expanding red circle, dealing moderate flame damage to all enemies near her. This stun can be broken free from. Following that, Zaan will lift one player into the air, preventing them from moving or using abilities. This stun cannot be broken and is part of the Jet of Flame mechanic.

skills.name: 火焰喷射
skills.des: A beam of fire will connect Zaan and the targeted player, dealing very high flame damage over time, with each consecutive hit dealing more damage. Another teammate must rush in front of the beam of fire connecting the affected player to Zaan and block the incoming damage to protect them. It is advised that the tank does, as most DPS players will not be able to withstand more than two or three hits from the beam even with blocking. Alternatively, players can take turns blocking the beam if needed to keep the overall damage on each player low. This attack is usually followed by Pestilent Breath, albeit with only one statue active.

skills.name: 疫病吐息
skills.des: Every now and then, one of the three statues dedicated to Peryite in the north corner of the room will spit poisonous fumes, dealing high poison damage on normal and flat-out one-shotting players on veteran difficulty. Each statue corresponds to the left, middle and right side of the arena respectively. Stand near the edges of these areas to be better able to avoid the poison. Standing nearer to the statues also reduces the amount of distance you need to travel to avoid the poison as the cones are thinner near the statues.  A special room wide version of this attack occurs right after Winter's Purge is complete and the Simulacrums are dead. Zaan will drop her shield and all three statues will glow while a massive AOE will fill the whole room. You must run to where Zaan drops her shield and stand in its protective aura in order to survive. On hard mode, only one person can use Zaan's shield as an avoidance mechanic. For more information, see the hardmode achievement for this fight.

achievement.name: 龙骨探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入獠牙巢穴或唤鳞者之巅。

achievement.name: 唤鳞者样式大师
achievement.des: 学习唤鳞者样式书的每一章，该样式书偶尔作为完成唤鳞者之巅地下城的奖励出现。

achievement.name: 唤鳞者之巅挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）唤鳞者之巅的成就。

achievement.name: 唤鳞者之巅征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）唤鳞者之巅中，击败腐臭的里纳埃鲁斯和恶臭的奥尔尊、“铁心”多来米什、首领阿尔蒂斯、瘟疫调制者莫提乌和唤鳞者赞恩。

achievement.name: 登顶
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）唤鳞者之巅中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败腐臭的里纳埃鲁斯和恶臭的奥尔尊、“铁心”多来米什、首领阿尔蒂斯、瘟疫调制者莫提乌和唤鳞者赞恩，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 巅峰表现
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）唤鳞者之巅中，在30分钟内击败腐臭的里纳埃鲁斯和恶臭的奥尔尊、“铁心”多来米什、首领阿尔蒂斯、瘟疫调制者莫提乌和唤鳞者赞恩，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。当玩家遭遇第一批唤鳞者生物时开始计时。

achievement.name: 咒语破除者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）唤鳞者之巅中，在阅读赞恩的仪式卷轴之后击败唤鳞者赞恩。

achievement.name: 唤鳞者之巅胜利者
achievement.des: 在唤鳞者之巅中，击败腐臭的里纳埃鲁斯和恶臭的奥尔尊、“铁心”多来米什、首领阿尔蒂斯、瘟疫调制者莫提乌和唤鳞者赞恩。

achievement.name: 唤鳞者救星
achievement.des: 收集两种必要原料，并为约尔沃德·德沃克斯治疗教派的瘟疫。

achievement.name: 坚守阵地
achievement.des: 在不被唤鳞者赞恩的护盾击退的情况下击败她。

achievement.name: 龙骨探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）獠牙巢穴和（老兵模式）唤鳞者之巅。

achievement.name: 山之神
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）唤鳞者之巅中，在阅读赞恩的仪式卷轴之后，在无小队成员死亡的情况下在30分钟内击败腐臭的里纳埃鲁斯和恶臭的奥尔尊、“铁心”多来米什、首领阿尔蒂斯、瘟疫调制者莫提乌和唤鳞者赞恩，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。
在（老兵模式）唤鳞者之巅中击败120名邪教徒。

achievement.name: 食人魔杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）唤鳞者之巅中击败50只食人魔。

achievement.name: 脓液问题
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）唤鳞者之巅中，在没有任何小队成员受到雪鼠的疫病脓液伤害的情况下，击败腐臭的里纳埃鲁斯和恶臭的奥尔尊、“铁心”多来米什、首领阿尔蒂斯、瘟疫调制者莫提乌和唤鳞者赞恩。

achievement.name: 石化情况
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）唤鳞者之巅中，在没有任何小队成员被石化凝视所石化的情况下击败“铁心”多来米什。

achievement.name: 魔族偏转者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）唤鳞者之巅中，在阅读赞恩的仪式卷轴之后，在不被唤鳞者赞恩的疫病吐息攻击所伤害且没有使用相同的闪避方法两次的情况下击败她。

achievement.name: 医嘱
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）唤鳞者之巅中，在有四名活着的小队成员全部同时感染了莫提乌的两种感染的请情况下，击败瘟疫调制者莫提乌。

achievement.name: 颤栗麻烦
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）唤鳞者之巅中，在没有任何小队成员被冰颤追踪击杀的情况下，击败恶臭的奥尔尊和腐臭的里纳埃鲁斯。

achievement.name: 小心脚下
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）唤鳞者之巅中，在与首领阿尔蒂斯战斗时没有任何小队成员受到她周围的水的伤害，并最终将她击败。

name: 献祭之境
location: The Hunting Grounds (entrance southwest of Serpent's Grotto)
mystery: 对于一个湮灭界域来说，海尔辛大人的狩猎场位面是一片由森林、草地和山脉组成的广袤荒野。那些闯入其中的泰姆瑞尔凡人几乎会对这里感到熟悉，但也只是几乎而已。
des:
The March of Sacrifices is a dungeon shaped around the theme of Hircine's Great Hunt.
It is part of the Wolfhunter DLC, along with Moon Hunter Keep.
The entrance can be found at a Hircine statue southwest of Serpent's Grotto in Greenshade. Spectral animals such as goats, herons and springboks can be found within.
The following item sets will drop in the dungeon: Hanu's Compassion, Blood Moon, Haven of Ursus, and Balorgh.

BOSS.name: 命运女巫兰吉芙
BOSS.des: Wyress Rangifer is a Breton wyress who hunts alongside her sisters, Strigidae and Ursus, in the March of Sacrifices. Before you engage in battle with her, you can observe her sacrificing Gaedil, turning his essence into a channeled green flame that empowers the Wyresses. Rangifer possesses healing abilities that allow her to aid Strigidae and Ursus as they engage you with bow and mace respectively. She represents Uricanbeg, the Great Dark Stag.

skills.name: Minor Wound
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor magical damage.

skills.name: 雄鹿光环
skills.des: The boss has a green aura around her (see image) that heals her allies slowly over time. Keep them separate to prevent this. When killed, she will spawn a ghostly stag that emanates the same aura. The stag cannot be killed and will move on its own accordingly.

skills.name: Focused Healing
skills.des: The enemy heals its allies over time as indicated by a yellow beam. Interrupt the boss to prevent this.

skills.name: 传颂仪式
skills.des: The enemy channels a spell healing itself and nearby allies for very large amounts in a large yellow circle. This ability is usually used when the enemy is on low health. This spell must be interrupted as soon as possible to make the fight shorter.

BOSS.name: 至日的阿格海德
BOSS.des: Aghaedh of the Solstice is a powerful spriggan encountered in the March of Sacrifices. Numerous Saplings of Seasons will spawn to aid her in battle.

skills.name: 撕裂
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 狂野射击
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor magical damage.

Four smaller spriggans will spawn at the edge of the arena, each with a corresponding colored aura: green (Spring Deluge), red (Summer Wildfire), orange (Autumn's Tempest) and blue (Winter Blizzard). All deal minor damage over time to any player standing inside it. Lurchers will be weakened if brought to the aura of the opposite season; spring vs autumn and summer vs winter. As an example, if the Frost Lurcher (winter) is brought to the red aura (summer), it will have its maximum health reduced and take much more damage. If it's brought to the matching aura, the blue aura, it will take less damage. This is important for the next mechanic.

skills.name: 召唤木傀儡
skills.des: Over time, the boss will summon an Autumn Lurcher, a Frost Lurcher, a Blaze Lurcher and a Budding Lurcher to attack the party. They should be killed quickly to simplify the fight. Once killed, use a synergy on the lurcher's corpse to pick up a protective aura. All four players must pick up an aura each if group damage is low. To weaken the lurchers and make killing them easier, the group can choose to bring them near a spriggan with the opposite colored aura as described above.

skills.name: 秋日风暴
skills.des: Used when Autumn Lurchers are up. Deals low magic damage over time.

skills.name: 山野风暴
skills.des: Some time after summoning the four lurchers, the boss will start to channel a spell that deals very high unavoidable magical damage that is lethal to the group. The only way to survive this is for each member to pick up a protective aura from the lurchers.

BOSS.name: “大块头”达格伦德
BOSS.des:
Dagrund the Bulky is a Nord who can be found in the March of Sacrifices. He is the leader of one of the groups competing in Hircine's Great Hunt and claims to be descended from werebears.
Later on in the Whispwood, Tarcyr will kill him and his fellow hunters, raising him as an undead thrall.

skills.name: 迅捷打击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 毁灭一击
skills.des: A charged heavy melee attack that deals very high physical damage. This must be blocked by the tank or dodged if you are not.

skills.name: 戕杀
skills.des: The boss jumps in the air and lands dealing moderate physical damage as indicated by a red circle.

skills.name: 大地变动
skills.des: After landing, the boss releases tremors that will chase all group members dealing moderate damage as indicated by red circles. Roll dodge or block the tremors to reduce the damage done.
When changing elements, the boss will summon two Bearfang Hunters to attack the group. Kill them first to simplify the fight.

skills.name: 炙烤
skills.des: Getting hit by Quick Strike will deal minor flame damage over time.

skills.name: 熔点
skills.des: The boss raises its sword and releases three flaming whirlwinds outwards dealing moderate flame damage over time as indicated by red circles. These AOEs will split up when they hit the wall of the arena so be aware of that.

skills.name: 惊骇打击
skills.des: The boss swings its sword in an arc dealing moderate flame damage in front of itself.

skills.name: 刺骨寒意
skills.des: Getting hit by Quick Strike will deal minor frost damage over time.

skills.name: 霜冻寒风
skills.des: Frost whirlwinds will roam the arena dealing moderate frost damage over time as indicated by red circles.

skills.name: 霜冻之塔
skills.des: The boss will summon icicles under the player's feet dealing moderate frost damage as indicated by red circles. Keep moving to avoid them.

skills.name: 致命激流
skills.des: Getting hit by Quick Strike will deal minor shock damage over time.

skills.name: 震荡轰鸣
skills.des: The boss causes lightning to strike all players, dealing unavoidable minor shock damage over time.

BOSS.name: 塔赛尔
BOSS.des: The Great Indrik Tarcyr is the hare of Hircine's latest Great Hunt in the March of Sacrifices. The hunters must slay Tarcyr and bring his heart to Daedric Prince for a boon. This is no easy task, as the creature sports abilities not typical of an Indrik, for it has been imbued with special powers from Hircine himself. Tarcyr is of the Pure-Snow Indrik breed.

skills.name: 头角暴击
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor frost damage.

skills.name: 头角震击
skills.des: A charged heavy attack that deals very high shock damage in an area around the target as indicated by a red circle. The tank must block this, and do not stand near the tank when this is cast. This attack can also be dodged.

skills.name: 寒流突袭
skills.des: Getting hit by Horn Blast will deal minor frost damage over time.

skills.name: 静态蓄力
skills.des: The boss channels a spell that causes lightning to strike dealing unavoidable moderate shock damage over time to all players. This can be interrupted.

skills.name: 迅捷寒霜
skills.des: The boss places a frost AoE around the tank that follows the target around dealing moderate frost damage over time as indicated by a red circle. This can only be mitigated through healing.

skills.name: 亢奋警觉
skills.des: The boss sends out ghostly versions of itself towards all players dealing moderate physical damage and stunning them. Keep some distance from the boss to easily avoid this, and break free quickly if you are stunned.

skills.name: 投影
skills.des: The boss sends out a projection of itself towards a single target dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 爆炎
skills.des: The boss runs around randomly leaving a trail of flame AoEs that deal moderate flame damage over time as indicated by red circles.
The boss occasionally summons two Bloodscent Butchers to attack the group. Kill them quickly to simplify the fight.

skills.name: 传送
skills.des: The boss will teleport around to avoid your attacks.

skills.name: 致命重击
skills.des: Ghostly versions of Tarcyr will run from wall to wall dealing moderate physical damage and stunning any player they touch. Avoid them.

skills.name: 霜冻之塔
skills.des: Icicles will appear under the player's feet as indicated by red circles, dealing moderate frost damage.

skills.name: 近感震击
skills.des: From the second hunt phase onward, two players will be marked and a shock ring will surround them. If the ring touches any other group member, both players will take damage and be teleported. Keep separate to prevent this.

skills.name: 烈焰之流
skills.des: At the third hunt phase, flaming AoEs will appear and roam the arena randomly. Touching them will deal moderate flame damage and teleport you.

BOSS.name: 巴洛格
BOSS.des:
Balorgh is an Orc werewolf behemoth who can be found in the March of Sacrifices. He is the leader of one of the groups that are competing in Hircine's Great Hunt. Strangely, he does not seem to hold the Daedric Prince in much esteem but he is willing to play along out of necessity. According to a letter, he was originally entrusted with a mission by Vykosa to infiltrate the Hunting Grounds but some of his fellow pack-members worry that Balorgh is now pursuing his own goals.
Balorgh will watch your progress throughout the various parts of the March. After Tarcyr is killed, he will ambush your group, killing Hanu to take the heart for himself. Hircine denies his request for the boon as he didn't kill Tarcyr, and Balorgh negotiates that killing your group will be enough to earn the boon. At the end of the Nightlands, he transforms into a Werewolf Behemoth and serves as the final boss. Burning the Moon Hunter Pack banner will activate hardmode.

skills.name: 挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 噬咬
skills.des: The boss bites its target dealing moderate physical damage, followed by minor physical damage over time.

skills.name: 屠戮打击
skills.des: The boss slashes at a target dealing very high physical damage. This must be blocked by the tank or dodged if you are not.

skills.name: 冰霜咆哮
skills.des: The boss shouts dealing high frost damage over time and rooting all targets hit in front of itself as indicated by a red cone.

skills.name: 烈焰冲锋
skills.des: The boss charges forward dealing high flame damage and knocking down all targets as indicated by a red rectangle.

skills.name: 火之轨迹
skills.des: The boss leaves behind a trail of fire when charging that deals moderate flame damage over time as indicated by red circles.

skills.name: 火焰喷发
skills.des: The boss stomps dealing very high flame damage around itself as indicated by a red circle. This must be avoided at all costs.

skills.name: 猛毒孢子
skills.des: After Thunder Stomp ends, the boss summons poisonous plants that will cover the three islands with poisonous AOEs dealing moderate poison damage as indicated by red circles. Stay off the islands to avoid this.

skills.name: 雷霆重踏
skills.des: After the plants disappear, the boss will stomp releasing lightning outwards from itself dealing moderate shock damage and staggering all players hit (Thundering Fissure). The water around the islands will also be electrified (Charged Water) dealing moderate shock damage over time. Stay on the islands to avoid this, while also moving to avoid the lightning strikes that occasionally spawn on top of the player as indicated by red circles (Thunder Storm).
The boss summons Dire Wolves to attack the party. They should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

skills.name: 屠戮打击
skills.des: The boss will target a specific player as indicated by a red target indicator under their feet. If the boss (or his clones on HM) reach their target, they will use a stronger version of the heavy attack from earlier that will deal lethal damage. This must be dodged if possible.

skills.name: 召唤扼杀者
skills.des: When Venomous Spore is cast, Stranglers will also appear in the water spitting poison at you. Kill them quickly. If you are grappled by one, break free immediately.

skills.name: 烈焰遗物
skills.des: On hard mode, Fiery Eruption will spawn four fireballs that shoot towards all group members after the stomp is cast dealing moderate flame damage, followed by moderate flame damage over time. Roll dodge to avoid this if possible.

skills.name: 召唤克隆
skills.des: When the Hunting Party phase starts, three additional copies of the boss will appear, and they will all have the Fiery Charge, Fiery Eruption and Fiery Remnant abilities. Venomous Spores andThunder Stomp will also be used, so be prepared to stay on or off the islands while luring the boss to the trap. It is advised all players stay together so healers can keep the group alive through the various incoming DOTs during the phase. The party will need to trap the boss a total of four times before the Hunting Party phase will end (one for each of his copies and one for the main boss).

achievement.name: 猎狼人探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入月狩要塞或献祭之境。

achievement.name: 狩猎者样式大师
achievement.des: 学习狩猎者样式书的每一章，该样式书偶尔作为完成献祭之境地下城的奖励出现。

achievement.name: 献祭之境挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）献祭之境的成就。

achievement.name: 献祭之境征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）献祭之境中，击败命运三姐妹、至日的阿格海德、“大块头”达格伦德、塔尔西尔和巴洛格。

achievement.name: 海尔辛的勇士
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）献祭之境中，在亵渎月狩狼群的旗帜并使巴洛格陷入杀意的狂怒后将他击败。

achievement.name: 适者生存
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）献祭之境中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败命运三姐妹、至日的阿格海德、“大块头”达格伦德、塔尔西尔和巴洛格，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 纯粹的直觉
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）献祭之境中，在30分钟内击败命运三姐妹、至日的阿格海德、“大块头”达格伦德、塔尔西尔和巴洛格，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。当玩家跳至或传送至血腥气息关口时开始计时。

achievement.name: 献祭之境胜利者
achievement.des: 在献祭之境中，击败命运三姐妹、至日的阿格海德、“大块头”达格伦德、塔尔西尔和巴洛格。

achievement.name: 大型夫诸狩猎
achievement.des: 在献祭之境中，完成所有三个金色夫诸狩猎并获得它们的恩赐。

achievement.name: 猎狼人探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）月狩要塞和（老兵模式）献祭之境。

achievement.name: 顶端捕食者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）献祭之境中，在亵渎月狩狼群的旗帜之后，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下于30分钟内击败命运三姐妹、至日的阿格海德、“大块头”达格伦德、塔尔西尔和巴洛格，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 脚步轻盈
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）献祭之境中，在总是闪避“大块头”达格伦德的大地变动技能的情况下将他击败。

achievement.name: 雾中行者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）献祭之境中，在夫诸塔尔西尔的浓雾笼罩技能没有传送任何小队成员的情况下将它击败。

achievement.name: 季节性击杀
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）献祭之境中，在首个季节内击败至日的阿格海德的所有木傀儡的情况下将她击败。

achievement.name: 诱陷
achievement.des: 在献祭之境中，引导巴洛格进入撒拉斯的陷阱10次。

achievement.name: 血腥气息杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）献祭之境中，击败300个血腥气息守护者、血腥气息弓箭手、血腥气息刺客和血腥气息雷锤手。

achievement.name: 幽魂之母杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）献祭之境中击败50个幽魂之母。

achievement.name: 牢固的姐妹情
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）献祭之境中，在阻止命运三姐妹用各自的光环来增强彼此的情况下将她们击败。

achievement.name: 意外元素
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）献祭之境中，在躲开了导电之水和有毒植物的情况下击败巴洛格。

achievement.name: 完美狩猎
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）献祭之境中，在亵渎月狩狼群的旗帜之后，在全程不被巴洛格的火焰遗物技能命中的情况下将他击败。

name: 月狩要塞
mystery: 月狩要塞！在收割者之境中还存在有银色黎明狼人猎手时，这个名字只会出现在他们的耳语之中。
des:
Moon Hunter Keep is a group dungeon located in Reaper's March, in a Colovian fort overrun by werewolves. It can be found north of Senalana, on the Cyrodiil side of the Strid River.
It is the headquarters of a group of werewolf hunters known as the Order of the Silver Dawn,  but has recently been invaded by the Werewolf Lord Vykosa and her Moon Hunter Pack, who has begun amassing a massive army of were-beasts. Along with the March of Sacrifices, it is part of the Wolfhunter DLC.
The following item sets will drop in Moon Hunter Keep: Moon Hunter, Savage Werewolf, Jailer's Tenacity, and Vykosa.

BOSS.name: 狱卒梅利图斯
BOSS.des: Jailer Melitus is an Imperial man-beast and the first boss of Moon Hunter Keep.

skills.name: 斩击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: Hemorrhage
skills.des: A minor physical damage over time applied by Slash.

skills.name: 血腥劈砍
skills.des: The boss swings its sword in an arc dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 血月慈悲
skills.des: The boss summons a burst of magic around itself dealing moderate magical damage as indicated by a red circle.

skills.name: 月下之怒
skills.des: Five smaller AOEs will be released outwards from the boss once Bloodmoon's Mercy triggers. These deal moderate magical damage and snare any target hit.

skills.name: 血腥喷涌
skills.des: The boss spawns blood geysers under each person in the group dealing moderate magical damage as indicated by red circles. Keep moving to avoid this.

skills.name: 血腥极刑
skills.des: The boss stuns one target and swings his sword at them after a short delay. This deals lethal damage on veteran mode. Interrupt the boss to prevent this.

skills.name: 召唤仆从
skills.des: Werewolf Bloodcallers and archers will spawn to attack the group. Kill them quickly to simplify the fight.

BOSS.name: 树篱迷宫守护者
BOSS.des: The Hedge Maze Guardian is a powerful lurcher that guards the exit to the Hedge Maze in Moon Hunter Keep.

skills.name: 尖爪
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 碾碎
skills.des: A melee shove that does moderate physical damage as well as staggering the player. This attack can be blocked to prevent the stagger.

skills.name: 折臂断足
skills.des: The lurcher slams its fist on the ground, doing very high physical damage as well as stunning the player. This must be blocked by the tank or dodged if you are not.

skills.name: 根须践踏
skills.des: The boss stomps sending out roots to all players. Getting rooted will deal moderate physical damage over time. Roll dodge to escape this, or to avoid the roots in the first place.

skills.name: 荆棘投掷
skills.des: The boss shoots out thorns dealing high poison damage as indicated by a red cone. The tank will want to face the boss towards the gate so the thorns don't hit players within in the maze.

At 75, 55 and 35% health, spriggans will be summoned. They will heal the Guardian making the boss invulnerable as long as they are alive. The spriggans can be located by the light beams they channel within the hedge maze surrounding the arena. The stranglers in the maze can be ignored in general, but if you are caught by a strangler, simply break free.

BOSS.name: 米伦尼·唤月者
BOSS.des: Mylenne Moon-Caller is a white werewolf and member of the Moon Hunter Pack, found in Moon Hunter Keep's Bailey. She has killed all that have challenged her, and only Vykosa holds more power. Mylenne remains utterly loyal to her mistress.

skills.name: 利爪斩击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 猩红之爪
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 血流不止
skills.des: Getting hit by Crimson Claw deals moderate physical damage over time.

skills.name: 撕碎
skills.des: A charged heavy melee attack that deals devastating physical damage. This must be blocked if possible.

skills.name: 闪电之怒
skills.des: The boss causes lightning to strike randomly around the group, dealing moderate shock damage as indicated by red circles. Keep moving to avoid this.

skills.name: 阿尔法跳跃
skills.des: The boss jumps on a random target, pinning them down and dealing moderate physical damage. This only affects one player.

skills.name: 蓄力跳跃
skills.des: The boss charges up and jumps on the pinned target, dealing lethal damage. Interrupt the boss to prevent this and free the pinned player.

skills.name: 狼群标记
skills.des: At 90, 70, 50, 30 and 10% health, Mylenne will call dire wolves to attack a specific group member. Whoever is marked will have a red aura around their head. The wolves should be killed quickly: the damage they deal adds up over time and their bite snares the target, slowing their movement speed and making it difficult for the target to avoid the onslaught.
At 80, 60, 40 and 20% health, two Shock Wardens will join the fight. This is indicated by an audio cue. They should be killed quickly.

skills.name: 刺激性电击
skills.des: When Mylenne is prodded by the Shock Wardens' lightning, she becomes enraged and starts glowing red. She must be pulled over to a residual pool of lightning left by a Shock Warden's death (known as Resonating Pools) in order to cleanse her rage. While enraged, the damage she deals is increased and the damage she takes is reduced.

BOSS.name: 档案保管者厄纳尔德
BOSS.des:
Archivist Ernarde is an Imperial member of the Moon hunter Pack and the penultimate boss of Moon Hunter Keep, who can be found in the keep's extensive library.
Originally, he was part of the Silver Dawn and served as their chief archivist. He came close to finding a cure for Lycanthropy, but Moon Hunter Keep was overrun and he was forcibly turned by Vykosa. He is now compelled to turn his talents towards the enhancement of werewolves, no matter how many of the pack die to horrific experimentation for Vykosa's vision of a werewolf army.
Archivist Ernarde reappears in spirit form during the hard mode fight against Vykosa once she reaches 30% health, where he cannot be targeted but will carry out his Symbol of Xarxes mechanic to add a layer of complexity to the fight.

skills.name: Shock
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor shock damage.

skills.name: 闪电冲击
skills.des: The boss channels a lightning beam on a random player dealing moderate shock damage over time.

skills.name: 电击脉冲
skills.des: The targeted player will explode after a moment, dealing moderate shock damage around themselves as indicated by a red circle. Keep away from group members if you are targeted.

skills.name: 内爆领域
skills.des: Archivist Ernarde will cast a Crushing Bubble around a random player. The bubble needs to be broken through damage, otherwise it will kill the target after a moment.

At 80, 60, 40 and 20% health, two Moon Hunter Cleavers or Strikers will accompany Ernarde. They are on a timer and will transform into Werewolf Behemoths if they are not burned down. Focus on the adds and kill them before they transform to simplify the fight. The adds will also enrage if they are brought near the boss, so keep them separate.

skills.name: 印记反射
skills.des: Standing outside the circles when Symbols of Xarxes is cast will deal minor magical damage over time to you.

skills.name: 扎克西斯标记
skills.des: The boss summons circles marked with colored Symbols of Xarxes around the room. The boss will then cycle through and select one color. Whichever color he eventually lands on will glow bright gold. When he picks a color, each group member must run to a circle which is glowing gold, as it will shield them from his spell. After a short moment the boss releases a huge burst of magic that deals very high (lethal on veteran) amounts of magical damage to anyone outside the safe spots. There are always four circles with this colored symbol hovering above them. Coordinate with group members to determine which direction each person will go to avoid overlapping circles with your group mates.

BOSS.name: 飞升的维科萨
BOSS.des: Vykosa the Ascendant is a Khajiit Werewolf Lord and the leader of Moon Hunter Pack, a group of werewolves who have infiltrated Moon Hunter Keep. She serves as the dungeon's final boss. During the fight Vykosa is assisted by her powerful Dire Wolf companions Ary and Zel.

skills.name: 火光
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals minor flame damage.

skills.name: 惊惧图腾
skills.des: Vykosa summons a totem with that incites fear in all players standing near it as indicated by a red circle. Break free to counter this.

skills.name: 汹涌狂风
skills.des: The boss swings her staff, sending out a gust of wind that deals high physical damage and staggers all targets as indicated by a red cone. This can be dodged or blocked. The tank can also face her towards the wall so that the cone does not hit players in the middle of the arena.

skills.name: 火焰符文
skills.des: The boss summons a fire rune that deals moderate flame damage over time as indicated by a red circle.

skills.name: 斩击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 劈裂斩击
skills.des: A charged heavy attack that deals high physical damage. This must be blocked.

skills.name: 野蛮突袭
skills.des: The boss leaps on far away targets, dealing moderate physical damage and snaring them.

skills.name: 蹂躏之爪
skills.des: Getting hit by Slash deals moderate disease damage over time.

skills.name: 刺耳嚎叫
skills.des: The boss howls, dealing moderate physical damage over time around herself as indicated by a red circle. This aura also buffs nearby werewolves causing them to deal more damage.

skills.name: 远古咆哮
skills.des: The boss shouts stunning all targets in front of her.

skills.name: 吞噬
skills.des: If one of the players in your group is killed during the fight, Vykosa can Devour the dead player's corpse and slowly regain health. This ability can be interrupted.
At 85, 65, 45 and 25% health, three more werewolves will be summoned.
At 70% health, stranglers will spawn at the edge of the arena, dealing minor poison damage to any players near them with a weak projectile.
At 50% health and below, Shock Wardens will spawn with the werewolves at the corresponding health percentages. They will enrage the boss just as in the earlier encounter and must be killed quickly.

At 30% health, the ghost of Archivist Ernarde will appear in the middle of the arena. He cannot be damaged. Instead, he will occasionally use Shock/Shock Blast/Shock Pulse on random targets. The Symbols of Xarxes mechanic from his encounter will also appear, stand in the gold circle to avoid lethal damage from it. Do note that when Symbols is cast, all other enemies will be stunned. Vykosa, Ary and Zel will be immune to damage, but the rest of the enemies can be killed.

achievement.name: 猎狼人探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入月狩要塞或献祭之境。

achievement.name: 银色黎明样式大师
achievement.des: 学习银色黎明样式书的每一章，该样式书偶尔作为完成月狩要塞地下城的奖励出现。

achievement.name: 月狩要塞挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）月狩要塞的成就。

achievement.name: 月狩要塞征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月狩要塞中，击败狱卒梅利图斯、树篱迷宫守护者、米伦尼·唤月者、档案保管者厄纳尔德和飞升的维科萨。

achievement.name: 头号捕食者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月狩要塞中，在阅读光辉战斗卷轴之后击败飞升的维科萨。

achievement.name: 与狼同行
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月狩要塞中，在30分钟内击败狱卒梅利图斯、树篱迷宫守护者、米伦尼·唤月者、档案保管者厄纳尔德和飞升的维科萨，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。当玩家遭遇第一批月狩敌人时开始计时。

achievement.name: 狼群首领
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月狩要塞中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败狱卒梅利图斯、树篱迷宫守护者、米伦尼·唤月者、档案保管者厄纳尔德和飞升的维科萨，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 月狩要塞胜利者
achievement.des: 在月狩要塞中，击败狱卒梅利图斯、树篱迷宫守护者、米伦尼·唤月者、档案保管者厄纳尔德和飞升的维科萨。

achievement.name: 巨大的盟友
achievement.des: 在月狩要塞中，在不击杀档案保管者厄纳尔德的首个巨型狼人友方的情况下击败他。

achievement.name: 书中的智慧
achievement.des: 在月狩要塞中，在没有小队成员受到扎克西斯标记伤害的情况下击败档案保管者。

achievement.name: 血腥狼藉
achievement.des: 在月狩要塞中，在没有受到血腥喷涌伤害的情况下击败狱卒梅利图斯。

achievement.name: 猎狼人探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）月狩要塞和（老兵模式）献祭之境。

achievement.name: 纯粹的疯狂
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月狩要塞中，在激活困难模式后30分钟内，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败狱卒梅利图斯、树篱迷宫守护者、米伦尼·唤月者、档案保管者厄纳尔德和飞升的维科萨，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 无尽狂怒
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月狩要塞中，在不净化米伦尼·唤月者的激怒技能的情况下击败她。

achievement.name: 拴狗绳不够长
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月狩要塞中，在没有任何小队成员受到飞升的维科萨被拴住的宠物狼伤害的情况下将她击败。

achievement.name: 扼杀怯懦
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月狩要塞中，阅读光辉战斗卷轴，击败7个扼杀者，并且从未使飞升的维科萨的宠物狼畏缩，最后击败飞升的维科萨。

achievement.name: 恐狼杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月狩要塞中击败200个恐狼或凶残恐狼。

achievement.name: 巨型狼人杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月狩要塞中击杀50个巨型狼人。

achievement.name: 躲避扼杀者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月狩要塞中，在没有任何小队成员被月狩要塞花园内的扼杀者陷阱捕获的情况下，击败树篱迷宫守护者。

achievement.name: 问题的根源
achievement.des: Defeat Hedge Maze Guardian while avoiding its Lurcher Roots attack in Veteran Moon Hunter Keep.

name: 马拉塔深渊
mystery: "The light that shone from the statue of Narilmor acted as both guide and protector to Ayleid ships crossing the , promising warmth and safe harbor in Garlas Malatar, until the city fell in the latter days of the ." -
des:
