Depths of Malatar is a group dungeon on the Gold Coast.
It's part of the Wrathstone dungeon pack DLC, along with Frostvault. It is located beneath the Ayleid ruin of Garlas Malatar, connected to the sunken ruins of Fort Mistwatch. The ruins are occupied by followers of Meridia who have devoted their very life and essence to keeping one half of the Wrathstone Tablet hidden deep within.
An unlikely partnership with the spirit of her treacherous ex-husband, Quintus Verres, leads the acclaimed relic hunter Tharayya to the wreckage of an Imperial fort built to plunder Ayleid ruins on the Gold Coast. Believed to be abandoned after its destruction in an unnamed calamity, Tharayya's search reveals a terrible secret—the Imperials never left. With your help, Tharayya hopes to overcome the unnatural guardians protecting the legendary artifact that brought the Imperials to Garlas Malatar, and to ruin.

BOSS.name: 拾荒饿鬼
BOSS.des:
The Scavenging Maw is a large and powerful hunger that serves as the first boss of the Depths of Malatar. It is encountered in Fort Mistwatch's storeroom, feasting on the purified soldiers.
During combat, it can summon regular hungers called Maulers, or its own shade to strike targets. Periodically it will vanish, and a notice will appear on screen saying that is lurking and waiting to strike.

skills.name: 斩击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 爪击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 穿刺之伤
skills.des: Getting hit by Rake deals minor physical damage over time.

skills.name: 反胃
skills.des: The boss spews poison dealing moderate poison damage over time as indicated by a red cone in front of it. Do not stand in front of the boss unless you are the tank. The tank should keep the boss as still as possible as the boss will turn when doing this attack.

skills.name: 胆汁呕吐
skills.des: Pools of poison will appear under whoever is hit by Retch dealing moderate poison damage over time.

skills.name: 饥饿难耐
skills.des: The boss disappears and summons shades to strike all players. Roll dodge or block to avoid this. If all players avoid this, it will net players an achievement.

skills.name: 狩猎长鼻
skills.des: The boss places AOEs on the ground that deal moderate physical damage when touched. Avoid them if possible. If no players are hit by this, it will net players an achievement.

skills.name: 吞噬
skills.des: Once found, the boss will grab the nearest player and start devouring them doing very high physical damage over time. Interrupt the boss quickly to prevent this.
On veteran mode, maulers will be summoned to attack the party periodically while the boss hides and should be killed quickly.

BOSS.name: 悲泣之女
BOSS.des:
The Weeping Woman is a nereid that serves as the second boss of the Depths of Malatar. Found in a room in the Ruins of Garlas Malatar, surrounded by the ice statues of Aurorans and other victims, she seeks to take the Wrathstone back from you. She may summon Frost Atronachs awaken the Stone Watchers present in the room to aid her during the fight. An unnatural permafrost blocks the passage out of the room, which will only melt after she has been killed.
Initially, the Weeping Woman is an Ayleid woman, lamenting the sacrifice of her people. She walks to the center of the room and shatters into chunks of ice, returning as a leimenid.

skills.name: 寒霜霆击
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals moderate frost damage.

skills.name: 战栗重击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor frost damage.

skills.name: 霜噬
skills.des: Getting hit by Shivering Swat or Frost Bolt will deal minor frost damage over time.

skills.name: 冰结法球
skills.des: A charged heavy ranged attack that deals very high frost damage as indicated by a red circle around the target. Block or dodge this if possible. This will also summon a Frost Atronach to attack the party, and it should be killed quickly to simplify the fight. Ensure the party has enough DPS to kill the atronach before the next is summoned.

skills.name: 冰蚀
skills.des: The boss summons a large frost AOE either in the center, middle, or outer portion of the room that deals high frost damage over time. Avoid this if possible. As the fight progresses, 2 of these areas will be covered in frost instead of 1.

At 75%, 55% and 35% health, the boss summons a Stone Watcher to attack the party, this should be killed quickly to simplify the fight. The message "A Stone Watcher has awoken!" appears to inform you of this.

BOSS.name: 黑暗法球
BOSS.des: The Dark Orb is a magical relic found in the Depths of Malatar. It serves as the third boss of the dungeon after King Narilmor traps you in the room with it while the dark orb summons invulnerable Aurorans and additional orbs. The Aurorans will only die after it is shattered, and opens up the doors to the Tabernacle of Light that it was guarding.

skills.des: The orb will begin by summoning a Radiant Auroran. This enemy has access to the following skills by default:

skills.name: 迅捷打击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 重击
skills.des: A charged heavy attack that deals moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 弧形闪电
skills.des: The mob shoots out lightning, dealing moderately high shock damage over time in a cone in front of it. This cannot be avoided, as the mob will move to face its target while doing this.

skills.name: 重击黎明
skills.des: The mob releases a burst of magic, dealing high magical damage and knocking down all players in front of it. This has almost no telegraphing, so be prepared to block or break free and heal up quickly.

skills.name: 美瑞蒂亚之护
skills.des: The mob summons a shield around itself that will deal moderate magical damage too all players around it when it is broken.

At 90%, the orb will summon a Radiant Orb at the side of the room. This is indicated by a message on screen saying "An orb is empowering Aurorans" While the Radiant Orb is alive, all Aurorans will gain the Aegis of Meridia attack. Destroy the orb quickly to weaken them, unless going for the achievement.
At 80%, the orb will summon a Radiant Auroran and a Blazing Auroran. The Blazing Auroran has access to the following skills by default:

skills.name: 迅捷打击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 重击
skills.des: A charged heavy attack that deals moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 弧形闪电
skills.des: The mob shoots out lightning, dealing moderately high shock damage over time in a cone in front of it. This cannot be avoided, as the mob will move to face its target while doing this.

skills.name: 重击黎明
skills.des: The mob releases a burst of magic, dealing high magical damage and knocking down all players in front of it. This has almost no telegraphing, so be prepared to block or break free and heal up quickly.

skills.name: 赤日喷薄
skills.des: The mob summons meteors that fall on all players, dealing moderate flame damage and knocking down all targets as indicated by red circles. This has a very fast cast time, so be prepared to quickly break free and heal.

At 70%, the orb will summon a Blazing Orb at the side of the room. This is indicated by a message on screen saying "An orb is empowering Aurorans" While the Blazing Orb is alive, all Aurorans will gain the Sunburst attack. Destroy the orb quickly to weaken them, unless going for the achievement.
At 60%, the orb will summon a Radiant Auroran, a Blazing Auroran and a Phosphorescent Auroran. The Phosphorescent Auroran has access to the following skills by default:

skills.name: 迅捷打击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 重击
skills.des: A charged heavy attack that deals moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 弧形闪电
skills.des: The mob shoots out lightning, dealing moderately high shock damage over time in a cone in front of it. This cannot be avoided, as the mob will move to face its target while doing this.

skills.name: 重击黎明
skills.des: The mob releases a burst of magic, dealing high magical damage and knocking down all players in front of it. This has almost no telegraphing, so be prepared to block or break free and heal up quickly.
The mob summons an ice pillar under a target, snaring and immobilizing them. The pillar can be easily destroyed, or simply avoided or dodged.

At 50%, the orb will summon a Phosphorescent Orb at the side of the room. This is indicated by a message on screen saying "An orb is empowering Aurorans" While the Phosphorescent Orb is alive, all Aurorans will gain the Ice Pillar attack. Destroy the orb quickly to weaken them, unless going for the achievement.
At 40%, the orb will summon a Radiant Auroran, a Blazing Auroran, a Phosphorescent Auroran and a Scintillating Auroran. The Scintillating Auroran has the following skills by default:

skills.name: 迅捷打击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 重击
skills.des: A charged heavy attack that deals moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 弧形闪电
skills.des: The mob shoots out lightning, dealing moderately high shock damage over time in a cone in front of it. This cannot be avoided, as the mob will move to face its target while doing this.

skills.name: 重击黎明
skills.des: The mob releases a burst of magic, dealing high magical damage and knocking down all players in front of it. This has almost no telegraphing, so be prepared to block or break free and heal up quickly.
The mob causes lightning to strike the ground around it, dealing high shock damage as indicated by red circles. Smaller bolts will also travel outwards from the point of impact (Arc Lightning).

At 30%, the orb will summon a Scintillating Orb at the side of the room. This is indicated by a message on screen saying "An orb is empowering Aurorans" While the Scintillating Orb is alive, all Aurorans will gain the Agonizing Bolts attack. Destroy the orb quickly to weaken them, unless going for the achievement.

BOSS.name: 纳里莫尔国王
BOSS.des:
King Narilmor is the ancient Ayleid king of Garlas Malatar who serves as the fourth boss of the Depths of Malatar. Purified with the blessings of immortality and loss of free will by Meridia herself, he stops at nothing to reacquire the right half of the Wrathstone from you, sabotaging your expedition and luring you into various traps along the way.
When he is fought in the Tabernacle of Light Unyielding, he will split himself into four various clones: flame (red), frost (blue), lightning (purple), and light (white/yellow), all having attacks based on their element. The spirit of Quintus Verres also escapes during the battle, complicating matters as you have the option of helping Tharayya capture him again. After Narilmor's defeat, his pact with Meridia transforms him into the Symphony of Blades, a vessel of her power fought in the final part of the dungeon.

BOSS.name: 利刃交响曲
BOSS.des:
The Symphony of Blades is the final boss of the Depths of Malatar. It is King Narilmor transformed into an avatar of Meridia's power, in the image of an Auroran suit of armor with four arms wielding blades. In Veteran mode, burning the Dictates of the Lady of Light will trigger hard mode, where it will now summon colored dark orbs.
During the fight, it can summon the four colors of Aurorans to aid itself, which will converge from each corner of the room to join it in the center and empower it. It will also summon the Auroran Phalanx, a formation of Aurorans that march with Meridia's Light at their side and will empower the Symphony of Blades if they cross paths.
After reaching around 10% of its health, the Symphony of Blades will transport you to the Colored Rooms, healing itself back up to 25% of its newly increased maximum health. It can also summon the Auroran Phalanx in the realm, spread up into various groups marching in different paths with three Aurorans in each group.

skills.name: 咏唱刀锋
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals high physical damage.

skills.name: 失调打击
skills.des: A charged heavy attack that deals very high physical damage. Block this as the tank or dodge this if you are not.

skills.name: 剑刃之舞
skills.des: The boss spins around, dealing very high physical damage around him as indicated by a red circle. The tank should stand still and absorb it if possible, while the rest of the group avoids it.

skills.name: 诅咒失效
skills.des: The boss stabs the ground and an AoE appears around a random target. The target will take moderate magic damage and get stunned in a few moments. This is unavoidable and should be healed through.

skills.name: 衰老
skills.des: The boss stabs the ground. After a few seconds, all players take 50% of their maximum health as Oblivion damage over 5 seconds. At the same time, all healing taken is nullified. Ensure the party is fully healed before this attack lands.

skills.name: 怯懦净化
skills.des: This ability will instantly kill any player that tries to exit the arena when they touch the barriers of light blocking the two exits.

A line or Aurorans appears on the edge of the arena, and walks slowly across the room. Behind them is a wall of light that will instantly kill anyone who touches it. Kill one of the Aurorans to open a gap in the wall to safely pass through.

skills.name: 美瑞蒂亚之光
skills.des: An instant-kill attack that accompanies the Auroran Phalanx, being triggered if you run into their barrier.

skills.name: 美瑞蒂亚毁灭
skills.des: This ability is similar to the Templar skill Radiant Destruction. The boss will shoot a beam of pure light from his hands at the tank. This ability is powered up if a golden Auroran shade reaches him.

skills.name: 赤日喷薄
skills.des: When empowered by a red Auroran shade, the boss will send fire AoEs spiraling everywhere. You should try to avoid these.

skills.name: Agonizing Bolts
skills.des: When empowered by a purple Auroran shade, the boss will call down lightning AoEs from the sky that deal more damage if you are hit in succession.
When empowered by a blue Auroran shade, the boss will summon ice pillars across the room.

achievement.name: 怒灵石探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入冰霜宝库或马拉塔深渊。

achievement.name: 美瑞蒂亚样式大师
achievement.des: 学习美瑞蒂亚样式书的每一章，该样式书偶尔作为完成马拉塔深渊地下城的奖励出现。

achievement.name: 马拉塔深渊挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）马拉塔深渊的成就。

achievement.name: 马拉塔深渊征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马拉塔深渊中，击败拾荒饿鬼、悲泣之女、黑暗法球、纳里莫尔国王和利刃交响曲。

achievement.name: 投下阴影
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马拉塔深渊中，在摧毁光明女神的指令之后击败利刃交响曲。

achievement.name: 光之速度
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马拉塔深渊中，在进入后30分钟内击败拾荒饿鬼、悲泣之女、黑暗法球、纳里莫尔国王和利刃交响曲。进入战斗时开始计时。

achievement.name: 净化完成
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马拉塔深渊中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败拾荒饿鬼、悲泣之女、黑暗法球、纳里莫尔国王和利刃交响曲。
完成普通模式的冰霜宝库和马拉塔深渊。

achievement.name: 马拉塔深渊胜利者
achievement.des: 在马拉塔深渊中，击败拾荒饿鬼、悲泣之女、黑暗法球、纳里莫尔国王和利刃交响曲。

achievement.name: 灵魂伴侣
achievement.des: 在马拉塔深渊中，在与纳里莫尔国王的战斗中阻止奎因图斯赢得他与莎莱雅之间的僵局。

achievement.name: 收割之虹
achievement.des: 在马拉塔深渊中，在与利刃交响曲的战斗中击败各种颜色的奥罗兰。

achievement.name: 怒灵石探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）冰霜宝库和马拉塔深渊。

achievement.name: 深渊蔑视者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马拉塔深渊中，在摧毁光明女神的指令之后，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下于30分钟内击败拾荒饿鬼、悲泣之女、黑暗法球、纳里莫尔国王和利刃交响曲。

achievement.name: 净化体杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马拉塔深渊中击败350个美瑞蒂亚的净化体。

achievement.name: 石头看守杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马拉塔深渊中击败150个石头守望者。

achievement.name: 捉迷藏
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马拉塔深渊中，不让拾荒饿鬼的任何狩猎长鼻被粉碎，并且不被他的任何暗影形态所命中。

achievement.name: 色盲
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马拉塔深渊中，在与黑暗法球的战斗中没有摧毁任何有颜色的法球。

achievement.name: 禁止进入方阵
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马拉塔深渊中，阻止利刃交响曲接触奥罗兰方阵以及被美瑞蒂亚之光所强化。

achievement.name: 破冰者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马拉塔深渊中，在与利刃交响曲的战斗期间用赤日喷薄的流星摧毁5个冰峰之柱。

achievement.name: 黯淡
achievement.des: Defeat the Symphony of Blades in Veteran Depths of Malatar after reading the Dictate to the Lady of Light and destroying all of the colored orbs during the encounter.

achievement.name: 溜冰
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马拉塔深渊中，在与悲泣之女战斗期间没有任何小队成员被冰蚀命中。

name: 冰霜宝库
mystery: " was known as one of the most gifted builders of architecture in , greatly expanding their underground kingdom with ingenious constructs until his disappearance on an expedition deep into Nord lands." —
des:
Frostvault is a group dungeon in northern Eastmarch.
It's part of the Wrathstone dungeon pack DLC, along with Depths of Malatar. It is a Dwarven vault buried deep in the mountains of Giant's Run, and one half of the Wrathstone Tablet has been sealed within.
Despite events in Volenfell, the scholar Tharayya refuses to be deterred from her quest for Dwarven relics. Tharayya's research leads her to a long-lost Dwarven ruin buried in a thawing glacier, where the Dwarves secreted away an object of immeasurable importance. Within the complex, a massive vault holds a piece of the legendary Wrathstone, a tablet carved with mysterious and arcane writing. With your help, she'll brave the Frostvault and seek the Wrathstone.

BOSS.name: 督军佐格文
BOSS.des:
Warlord Tzogvin is the Riekling chieftain of the Coldsnap Tribe that serves as the first boss of Frostvault. He has plundered the soul gem of the Dwemer Excavation Machine and must be killed so that it can be obtained. Landal attempts to negotiate with him, but as Tzogvin's tribe has just been slaughtered by your group, he responds to him only with contempt, and to you with violence.
At the start of the fight, he will use a dwarven warhammer to attack. At some point during the battle, he will throw it away and create a sword out of thin air and jump up, crashing back down and dealing damage. With his greatsword, he uses a variety of flame-based attacks. Later on, he will summon a battleaxe, which grants him access to frost-based attacks and cyclones. If at any point the group is wiped, he will sit back down on his makeshift dwemer throne.

skills.name: 敲击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 血肉撕裂
skills.des: Getting hit by Strike will deal minor physical damage over time.

skills.name: 巨像破击
skills.des: A charged heavy attack that deals very high physical damage and knocks the target back. Block this if you are the tank or dodge it if you're not.

skills.name: 鲁莽冲锋
skills.des: The boss will charge at far away targets dealing moderate physical damage. Block or dodge this, or stay near the boss to prevent this.

skills.name: 流星锤
skills.des: The boss throws a Bola Ball at a random player causing a tether to appear between them and another player. As long as the tether is active, both players will take high magical damage over time. Run away from each other to break the tether, or roll dodge the ball to prevent the tether from forming initially. As of patch 6.3.5, this mechanic appears to be removed, or is extremely rare.
Throughout the fight, other Coldsnap goblins may join the encounter. They should be chained in and cleaved down quickly to simplify the fight.

skills.name: Fire Pit
skills.des: The boss jumps leaving behind a pool of fire that deals moderate flame damage over time. Avoid this.

skills.name: 烈焰冲撞
skills.des: The boss lands on a random spot in the arena, dealing moderate flame damage and stunning all in his impact zone. There is no indication where he will land, so be ready to heal up.

skills.name: 炙热力场
skills.des: The boss summons a shield around himself and flame AOEs will appear under each player dealing moderate flame damage over time as indicated by red circles. This damage will increase over time, and thus players will need to break the damage shield before the damage wipes the group. Players must also avoid stacking the AOEs around each other to reduce the damage done.

skills.name: 火焰撕裂
skills.des: When holding the sword, all Reckless Charge moves will also cause fire lines to spread out from under the boss dealing moderate flame damage.

skills.name: 旋风
skills.des: The boss stands in the middle of the arena and summons an expanding frost AOE that deals very high frost damage over time. Simply stick to the edge of the arena to avoid it.

skills.name: 狂怒烈风
skills.des: The boss summons an ice tornado that chases a player around dealing high frost damage over time. Simply keep moving to avoid it. There will be an indication message on your screen to show that you are the one being targeted. Leading this tornado into the three banners on the edge of the arena will net players an achievement.

skills.name: Cyclone
skills.des: Smaller ice AOEs will appear along the edge of the arena when Whirlwind is used. Avoid these smaller AOEs while hiding from the larger central AOE by running along the edge of the arena.

BOSS.name: 宝库保卫者
BOSS.des: The Vault Protector is a Dwarven Centurion that serves as the second boss of Frostvault. It will encase itself in a glass prism and activate a searing ray trap, though the lazers can be avoided by hiding behind its shield. It can also summon other automatons, which should be killed before being allowed to charge up.

skills.name: 斧头
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 锤子
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals minor physical damage.

skills.name: 流血
skills.des: Getting hit by Axe or Hammer deals minor physical damage over time.

skills.name: Steel Cyclone
skills.des: The boss spins around, dealing moderate physical damage over time as indicated by a red circle.

skills.name: 蒸汽吐息
skills.des: The boss breaths out steam dealing moderate flame damage over time as indicated by a red cone in front of itself.

skills.name: 弹幕功效
skills.des: The boss shoots out shock balls, dealing moderate shock damage as indicated by red circles.

skills.enName: Summon Dwarven Spider and Dwarven Sphere
skills.des: A dwarven spider and sphere will spawn whenever Searing Ray is activated.

These rays deal very high flame damage to anyone touching it, this is lethal on veteran mode. To avoid the rays, simply jump over, roll through, or use the boss's shield to block them for you. The end of the beam with the red bloom effect is opposite to the emitter and is the side of the boss that you need to hide behind.

skills.name: 盾牌震击
skills.des: Standing inside the boss's shield will deal high shock damage. Avoid doing this.
Smaller rolling spheres will appear and travel slowly towards the opposite wall. Touching them will deal moderate shock damage and stun you.

BOSS.name: 瑞祖克·骨寒
BOSS.des: Rizzuk Bonechill is a Riekling frost mage of the Coldsnap Tribe that serves as the third boss of Frostvault. He is accompanied by a powerful Frost Atronach called Avalanche. After he is killed, his atronach will crumble as well.

skills.name: 寒霜霆击
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that deals moderate frost damage.

skills.name: 寒霜齐射
skills.des: The boss channels a spell that deals high frost damage over time to all players. This must be interrupted as soon as possible.

skills.name: 冰雹风暴
skills.des: The boss summons frost AOEs around the arena as indicated by blue circles. These deal very high frost damage over time and must be avoided if possible.

skills.name: 至深冻结
skills.des: The boss channels a spell that deals moderate unavoidable frost damage over time to all players. This is also telegraphed by a message on your screen.

skills.name: 破裂
skills.des: After Deep Freeze ends, all players will explode dealing moderate frost damage around themselves as indicated by red circles. Do not overlap or go near your teammates when Deep Freeze is occurring as during shatter, you will be stunned in place.

BOSS.name: 石之看守
BOSS.des:
The Stonekeeper is a Dwarven Colossus that serves as the final boss of Frostvault, guarding one half of the Wrathstone. Due to having a shield active, it cannot be damaged unless both its Flame Bellows Gauntlet and Rotary Blades Gauntlet are destroyed, creating a period of time where it can be attacked until it repairs its arms. The Dwemer took extraordinary measures to keep the Wrathstone from the Ayleids, and the Stonekeeper is the last line of defense.
Periodically, you and your group members will be tasked with controlling skeevatons to disable shock conveyors during the battle. Tharayya will provide helpful commentary during the battle to warn you of attacks.

skills.name: 剥离射线
skills.des: A basic attack that deals moderate flame damage.

skills.name: 烧蚀辐射
skills.des: Getting hit by Flensing Ray will deal moderate flame damage over time.

skills.name: 碾轧
skills.des: The boss uses its right arm to deal high physical damage over time in an area in front of itself. Do not stand in front of the boss unless you are the tank. Destroying the Rotary Blade Gauntlet will disable this attack.

skills.name: 引燃
skills.des: The boss will spew flame dealing moderate flame damage over time to all players in front of it. Do not stand in front of the boss unless you are the tank. Destroying the Flame Bellows Gauntlet will disable this attack.
When each arm is destroyed, a dwarven centurion will be summoned. It deals very high damage with its heavy attacks, and must be killed quickly to make the fight easier.

skills.name: 能量领域
skills.des: Small volatile spheres will appear and roll towards the boss in the middle as indicated by a red circle. Touching the sphere will stun the player and deal moderate shock damage.

skills.name: 分解故障保险
skills.des: The boss will shoot out fire from the holes where its arms used to be, and start rotating. Stay in front or behind the boss to avoid the flames. This attack is lethal on veteran.

skills.enName: Summon Dwarven Spider and Dwarven Arquebus
skills.des: Dwarven spiders will appear to attack the group. These are generally weak and can be easily cleaved down. Stronger dwarven arquebuses will spawn on the edge of the arena, and will charge a lethal snipe attack which must be interrupted. The easiest way to deal with these is to use a knockback ability to knock the spheres off the edge into the chasm or onto the hot metal near the entrance and exit, which will kill them instantly. Doing this 20 times will net players an achievement.

skills.name: 灭绝协议
skills.des: The boss will begin charging a lethal attack that fires within 10 seconds. Each player must get into a skeevaton located at the side of the arena to avoid this.

Spinning blades will now appear either on the inner track or outer track, dealing moderate physical damage over time to all players as indicated by red circles. Getting hit by the blade will apply Bleeding which is a moderate physical damage over time. Avoid them if possible by standing on the track without a blade on it.

skills.name: 剥离射线
skills.des: A basic attack that deals moderate flame damage.

skills.name: 烧蚀辐射
skills.des: Getting hit by Flensing Ray will deal moderate flame damage over time.

skills.name: 碾轧
skills.des: The boss uses its right arm to deal high physical damage over time in an area in front of itself. Do not stand in front of the boss unless you are the tank. Destroying the Rotary Blade Gauntlet will disable this attack.

skills.name: 引燃
skills.des: The boss will spew flame dealing moderate flame damage over time to all players in front of it. Do not stand in front of the boss unless you are the tank. Destroying the Flame Bellows Gauntlet will disable this attack.
When each arm is destroyed, a dwarven centurion will be summoned. It deals very high damage with its heavy attacks, and must be killed quickly to make the fight easier.

skills.name: 高压爆轰
skills.des: The boss releases steam that will knock players off the edge of the arena as indicated by a red cone. Block or dodge to prevent this.

skills.name: 分解故障保险
skills.des: The boss will shoot out fire from the holes where its arms used to be, and start rotating. Stay in front or behind the boss to avoid the flames. This attack is lethal on veteran.

skills.name: 衰弱恶臭
skills.des: The boss releases a mist that reduces healing received. This occurs occasionally.
During the execute phase, missiles will fire out from the boss dealing high damage as indicated by red circles.

skills.name: 破碎余烬
skills.des: The Ignite ability will cause Whirring Blades to start shooting fireballs at all players dealing moderate flame damage over time.

skills.enName: Summon Dwarven Spider and Dwarven Arquebus
skills.des: Dwarven spiders and dwarven arquebuses will spawn on the edge of the arena during execute phase.
An additional dwarven centurion will be summoned at 25% health.

achievement.name: 怒灵石探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入冰霜宝库或马拉塔深渊。

achievement.name: 冰袭样式大师
achievement.des: 学习冰袭样式书的每一章，该样式书偶尔作为完成冰霜宝库地下城的奖励出现。

achievement.name: 冰霜宝库挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）冰霜宝库的成就。

achievement.name: 冰霜宝库征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）冰霜宝库中，击败寒冰追猎者、督军佐格文、宝库守护者、瑞祖克·骨寒和石之看守。

achievement.name: 宝库攻破者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）冰霜宝库中，在按下真实性验证器之后击败石之看守。

achievement.name: 打砸抢掠
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）冰霜宝库中，在进入后30分钟内击败寒冰追猎者、督军佐格文、宝库守护者、瑞祖克·骨寒和石之看守，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。进入战斗时开始计时。

achievement.name: 安全保护
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）冰霜宝库中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败寒冰追猎者、督军佐格文、宝库守护者、瑞祖克·骨寒和石之看守，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。
完成普通模式的冰霜宝库和马拉塔深渊。

achievement.name: 冰霜宝库胜利者
achievement.des: 在冰霜宝库中，击败寒冰追猎者、督军佐格文、宝库守护者、瑞祖克·骨寒和石之看守。

achievement.name: 狂野殴打
achievement.des: 在冰霜宝库中，使得寒冰追猎者在疯狂打击期间升天击它的友方。

achievement.name: 身法灵敏
achievement.des: 在冰霜宝库中，总是闪避督军佐格文的鲁莽冲锋。

achievement.name: 晕头晕脑
achievement.des: 在冰霜宝库中，让督军佐格文狂怒烈风摧毁他的所有3个战旗。

achievement.name: 附带伤害
achievement.des: 在冰霜宝库中，通过引爆目标附近的暴烈球体消灭宝库守护者的20个构造体。

achievement.name: 掉落试验
achievement.des: 在冰霜宝库中，将20个敌人击下石之看守的平台。

achievement.name: 老鼠竞速
achievement.des: 在冰霜宝库中，在莎莱雅召唤机械鼠后的35秒内，使用机械鼠关闭石之看守的灭绝协议。在莎莱雅开始警告时开始计时。

achievement.name: 怒灵石探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）冰霜宝库和马拉塔深渊。

achievement.name: 无情的掠夺者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）冰霜宝库中，在使用真实性验证器之后，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下于30分钟内击败寒冰追猎者、督军佐格文、宝库守护者、瑞祖克·骨寒和石之看守，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 寒冰哥布林杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）冰霜宝库中击败200个寒冰哥布林。

achievement.name: 百夫长杀戮者（老兵）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）冰霜宝库中击败20个百夫长。

achievement.name: 冻成冰棍
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）冰霜宝库中，在每个小队成员至少在战斗中被雪崩的刺骨牢笼技能影响一次的情况下，击败瑞祖克和雪崩。

achievement.name: 各种各样的害人虫
achievement.des: 控制每种类型的自定义机械鼠。在（老兵模式）冰霜宝库中，自定义机械鼠将在真实性验证器被激活后的石之看守战斗的灭绝协议阶段可用。在该阶段结束时，你不能变成废金属或者死亡，否则将被判定失败。

name: 马塞洛克巢穴
location: Neighboring jungles of the Tenmar Forest
mystery: The fertile jungles of this mountain valley have long since swallowed up the Khajiit kingdom that once called it home. But a new, malignant growth is spreading here, and it threatens to consume far more than old ruins.
des:
The Lair of Maarselok is a group dungeon within the mountain valleys of Tenmar,  Grahtwood entered from a lake northeast of the Ossuary of Telacar.
It is part of the Scalebreaker dungeon pack DLC, along with the Moongrave Fane. The Azureblight, a deathly corruption originating from an abandoned Khajiiti temple within the Tenmar Mountain valley, threatens the Elden Tree. When Grahtwood's protectors tried and failed to destroy the Dragon Maarselok at the center of the blight, a second plan is hatched to enlist the help of the forest spirit Selene and her captor, the warlock Carindon. Together in an uneasy truce, and with your help, they must stop Maarselok and his blight before the corruption can spread further.

BOSS.enName: In Flight, sustaining a powerful Azureblight Lurcher
On his Perch, summoning a horde of Azureblighted creatures
In his Roost, on his own face to face

achievement.name: 断鳞者探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入月墓古庙或马塞洛克巢穴。

achievement.name: 祖恩雄鹿样式大师
achievement.des: 学习祖恩雄鹿样式书的每一章，该样式书出现在马塞洛克巢穴地下城中。

achievement.name: 马塞洛克巢穴挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）马塞洛克巢穴的成就。

achievement.name: 马塞洛克巢穴征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马塞洛克巢穴中，击败夕月、飞翔的马塞洛克、蔚蓝枯萎病原体、栖木上的马塞洛克和巢穴中的马塞洛克。

achievement.name: 夕月的救星
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马塞洛克巢穴中，在使用蔚蓝枯萎之种后击败巢穴中的马塞洛克。

achievement.name: 除草者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马塞洛克巢穴中，在进入后35分钟内击败夕月、飞翔的马塞洛克、蔚蓝枯萎病原体、栖木上的马塞洛克和巢穴中的马塞洛克，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。当遭遇第一批敌人时开始计时。

achievement.name: 不死的耐力
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马塞洛克巢穴中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败夕月、飞翔的马塞洛克、蔚蓝枯萎病原体、栖木上的马塞洛克和巢穴中的马塞洛克，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 断鳞者斥候
achievement.des: 完成普通模式的马塞洛克巢穴和月墓古庙。

achievement.name: 马塞洛克巢穴胜利者
achievement.des: 在马塞洛克巢穴中，击败夕月、飞翔的马塞洛克、蔚蓝枯萎病原体、栖木上的马塞洛克和巢穴中的马塞洛克。

achievement.name: 躲闪和迂回
achievement.des: 在马塞洛克巢穴中，在不受到夕月的剧毒闪电伤害的情况下将她击败。

achievement.name: 注意天空
achievement.des: Defeat Maarselok in flight without any member of your group being hit by his Blightbreath Strafe in Lair of Maarselok.

achievement.name: 作物轮作
achievement.des: 在马塞洛克巢穴中，用被每个小队成员拾取的净化过的腐蚀之种击败蔚蓝枯萎病原体。

achievement.name: 断鳞者探索者
achievement.des: Complete Veteran Moongrave Fane Conqueror and Veteran Lair of Maarselok.

achievement.name: 自然之怒
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马塞洛克巢穴中，在使用蔚蓝枯萎之种之后，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下于35分钟内击败夕月、飞翔的马塞洛克、蔚蓝枯萎病原体、栖木上的马塞洛克和巢穴中的马塞洛克，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 蔚蓝枯萎感染者杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马塞洛克巢穴中击败400个蔚蓝枯萎感染者。

achievement.name: 蔚蓝枯萎构造体杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马塞洛克巢穴中击败50个蔚蓝枯萎木傀儡或蔚蓝枯萎滋生体。

achievement.name: 园艺大师
achievement.des: Defeat the Azureblight Lurcher only while it is enraged by Maarselok's Blightbreath Strafe in Veteran Lair of Maarselok.

achievement.name: 沙迦的护盾
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马塞洛克巢穴中，在不让任何沙迦的宿主死亡的情况下，击败栖木上的马塞洛克。

achievement.name: 树木的朋友
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马塞洛克巢穴中，在不击败任何蔚蓝枯萎木傀儡的情况下，击败栖木上的马塞洛克。

achievement.name: 灾厄净化者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）马塞洛克巢穴中，在当前宿主没有激活夕月的净化结界的情况下，在净化了马塞洛克的所有所有灾厄之种后，击败巢穴中的马塞洛克。

achievement.name: 蓝手指植物学家
achievement.des: 在困难模式（老兵模式）马塞洛克巢穴中，在确保马塞洛克在每次猛扑时都获得振奋之雾的好处的情况下，击败马塞洛克。

name: 月墓古庙
location: West of the Valenwood Gate, downstream of the Darkarn River
mystery: "Just as the sixteen kingdoms were not always one, so too were the faiths of the Khajiit many-fold. In guiding Khajiit along his one true path of the moons, Riddle'Thar hid from us all the others. But if you are wise, you may catch glimpses of where the walkers of old have tread." — Tsramusa the Exile
des:
Moongrave Fane is a group dungeon in the ancient ruins of a forgotten Khajiiti faith.
It is part of the Scalebreaker dungeon pack DLC, along with the Lair of Maarselok. Deep within the ancient ruins, a former member of the Dragonguard and his fellow vampires of the Hollowfang Clan have felled and captured the dragon, Sahrotnax. However, they wish to do more than simply destroy the humbled beast, as the clan prepares a ritual to drain the dragon of its blood and gain its power.

BOSS.name: 崛起遗迹
BOSS.des: The Risen Ruins is a stone atronach created from pieces of the Moongrave Fane's foundations and animated by Nisaazda in a bid to stop you from entering the temple interior.

skills.name: 石之凝视
skills.des: A ranged attack where the Atronach shoots a stone projectile at a player, dealing a low amount of damage.

skills.name: 岩石滑坡
skills.des: The boss charges in a straight line as indicated by a red combat glow on the ground. This can be blocked on normal, but it is advised that whoever is within range simply gets out of the range of this attack instead of trying to weather the damage.

skills.name: 巨石
skills.des: The boss huddles, covering itself with its legs and gaining a damage shield. It throws out constant damage in the form of thrown boulders. Blocking can mitigate some of the damage from the stony shrapnel, but on Veteran, it can be difficult for your healer to heal through this for too long as a result of the incoming damage from this attack and the onslaught from the adds. One of your group members must hit it with a Hemo Helot in order to break its shield.

skills.name: 大地震
skills.des: The boss suspends its legs floating into the air and uses its body to perform a jackhammer like motion on the ground, reaching far but dealing more damage to those closest

skills.name: 巨石之盾
skills.des: The boss becomes invulnerable and casts Boulder. It must be hit with 1 Hemo Helot (or 2 in Veteran) in order to break its shield.

BOSS.name: 多罗扎卡
BOSS.des: Dro'zakar is a Pahmar-raht vampire from the Hollowfang Clan that serves as the second boss of Moongrave Fane.

skills.name: 横劈
skills.des: A basic melee attack.

skills.name: 鲜血迷雾
skills.des: Dro'zakar disappears and swirling blood fumes appear in his place and starts chasing players, indicated by a moving AoE, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: 血液汲取
skills.des: Targeted ability that leeches health from one player

skills.name: 桑依之盾
skills.des: After every Helot consumption phase, he gains a damage shield similar to Zhaj'hassa the Forgotten, where he deals continuous damage to the group as he shields himself. The group must dps his shield down as the healer keeps everyone alive.

skills.name: 吞噬鲜血魔球
skills.des: A group of Sacrificial Helots rush into the arena and sacrifice themselves to create an Hemo Helot. When Dro'zakar begins to feed on the Hemo Helot, one group member must destroy it to stop him from becoming empowered. This can be done easily with a heavy attack. If he manages to consume a hemo helot, Dro'zakar will deal massive damage to the group.

skills.name: 赤红吐息
skills.des: Dro'zakar sprays a blood breath attack in a cone in front of him, dealing high magic damage and stunning targets hit.
Other Hollowfang Clan enemies will rush into the arena to assist Dro'zakar during the boss fight.

BOSS.name: 库乔·科斯巴
BOSS.des: Kujo Kethba is a Khajiiti gargoyle that serves as the third boss of Moongrave Fane. It is awoken by Nisaazda as Chevalier Renald pursues her.

skills.name: 挥击
skills.des: A basic double-hitting melee attack. After the first time Fanning the Flames is used, Swipe gains a flame wave after-effect that adds fire damage.

skills.name: 粉碎
skills.des: Kujo Kethba smashes down with its fist, dealing higher damage than Swipe.

skills.name: 煽风点火
skills.des: Kujo Kethba flies up into the air and crashes back into the ground, and then continues smashing the ground where it landed, indicated by a small conal AoE in front of itself, dealing repeated damage. The pounding also creates volcanic geysers to appear in two of the four corners of the arena and begin launching homing molten projectiles at you. Sliding Stones present in the arena can be pushed over the geysers to stop them from spewing fireballs. During this ability, Kujo Kethba becomes immune to and reflects back all damage applied to it.

skills.name: 喷吐火焰
skills.des: After Fanning the Flames is used for the first time, Kujo Kethba gains this ability. It spits out a fireball at you, indicated by a circular AoE, which explode on contact with the ground, leaving a lingering pool of flames.
Hollowfang Clan enemies will enter the arena to assist Kujo Kethba throughout the fight.

BOSS.name: 格伦德伍尔夫
BOSS.des:
Grundwulf is a Nord member of the Dragonguard who can be found in Moongrave Fane. There, he allied with the Fane's denizens, the vampiric Hollowfang Clan, and plots to drink the blood of the dragon Sahrotnax. He hopes that doing so will result in him becoming Dragonborn, making him the rightful heir to the throne of Cyrodiil. Friend and fellow Dragonguard Chevalier Renald seeks to convince Grundwulf to turn away from the Hollowfang Clan.
He initially fights alongside the Hollowfang Clanmother, Nisaazda. He uses the Thu'um in battle, having been trained by the Greybeards in his youth. At the end of the battle, Nisaazda will die but Grundwulf survives, living for one more battle.
Following Nisaazda's death, Grundwulf is weakened in your first encounter, and he will descend towards the site of Sahrotnax's crash-landing. There, he will complete the ritual, draining the dragon and becoming empowered by its blood.

skills.name: 横劈
skills.des: A basic melee attack.
A basic melee attack.

skills.name: 高空粉碎
skills.des: Grundwulf winds up his greatsword and smashes down on you with it, dealing very high damage and knocking you down. This can be blocked.

skills.name: 不卸之力
skills.des: Grundwulf stands firmly and shouts at you, indicated by a long and wide rectangular AoE, dealing high damage and knocking you away.

skills.name: 召唤黏稠怪
skills.des: At the start of the fight, Grundwulf begins sapping energy from Sahrotnax, who reacts violently and spews fireballs all over the arena, with a Coagulant forming at the landing spot of every fireball.

After the Coagulants are destroyed, Hollowfang Clan members will appear in the arena throughout the fight to defend Grundwulf. After the first group is defeated, Moongrave Sentinels also start appearing with the next waves.

skills.name: 横劈
skills.des: A basic melee attack.
A basic melee attack.

skills.name: 高空粉碎
skills.des: Grundwulf winds up his greatsword and smashes down on you with it, dealing very high damage and knocking you down. This can be blocked.

Grundwulf still uses the same shout ability as earlier. However, now that he is engorged with Sahrotnax's blood, several lingering pools of swirling blood, indicated by circular AoEs, are created along the radius of the shout after the ability is over, dealing damage if stepped into.

skills.name: 传送
skills.des: With his newly-gained power, Grundwulf is now able to teleport away from you within the arena.

Grundwulf plants his greatsword into the ground, causing a calcified blood spike to erupt from the floor, creating a link between it and a player, causing a constant health drain effect and summon Coagulants into the arena. The affected player must walk into the green AoE around the spike to negate the health drain. The shackle cannot be destroyed and will go away on its own after a time.
Similar to Nisaazda earlier, Grundwulf can now summons Hemonculi to aid him.

skills.name: 垂死吐息
skills.des: Sahrotnax musters enough energy to rise his head up and spit fire, in an attempt to kill Grundwulf, who teleports behind a nearby Sliding Stone to protect himself. The fire is indicated by a long and wide rectangular AoE, and can harm you if you stand in the way of the flames. On the other hand, you can push the Sliding Stone away from Grundwulf to expose him to the fire, resulting in the fire damaging him.
If Grundwulf is near the Sliding Stone while Dying Breath isn't underway, he will express frustration at it being in his way and will teleport the stone away from him within the arena.

BOSS.name: 格伦德伍尔夫
BOSS.des:
Grundwulf is a Nord member of the Dragonguard who can be found in Moongrave Fane. There, he allied with the Fane's denizens, the vampiric Hollowfang Clan, and plots to drink the blood of the dragon Sahrotnax. He hopes that doing so will result in him becoming Dragonborn, making him the rightful heir to the throne of Cyrodiil. Friend and fellow Dragonguard Chevalier Renald seeks to convince Grundwulf to turn away from the Hollowfang Clan.
He initially fights alongside the Hollowfang Clanmother, Nisaazda. He uses the Thu'um in battle, having been trained by the Greybeards in his youth. At the end of the battle, Nisaazda will die but Grundwulf survives, living for one more battle.
Following Nisaazda's death, Grundwulf is weakened in your first encounter, and he will descend towards the site of Sahrotnax's crash-landing. There, he will complete the ritual, draining the dragon and becoming empowered by its blood.

skills.name: 横劈
skills.des: A basic melee attack.
A basic melee attack.

skills.name: 高空粉碎
skills.des: Grundwulf winds up his greatsword and smashes down on you with it, dealing very high damage and knocking you down. This can be blocked.

skills.name: 不卸之力
skills.des: Grundwulf stands firmly and shouts at you, indicated by a long and wide rectangular AoE, dealing high damage and knocking you away.

skills.name: 召唤黏稠怪
skills.des: At the start of the fight, Grundwulf begins sapping energy from Sahrotnax, who reacts violently and spews fireballs all over the arena, with a Coagulant forming at the landing spot of every fireball.

After the Coagulants are destroyed, Hollowfang Clan members will appear in the arena throughout the fight to defend Grundwulf. After the first group is defeated, Moongrave Sentinels also start appearing with the next waves.

skills.name: 横劈
skills.des: A basic melee attack.
A basic melee attack.

skills.name: 高空粉碎
skills.des: Grundwulf winds up his greatsword and smashes down on you with it, dealing very high damage and knocking you down. This can be blocked.

Grundwulf still uses the same shout ability as earlier. However, now that he is engorged with Sahrotnax's blood, several lingering pools of swirling blood, indicated by circular AoEs, are created along the radius of the shout after the ability is over, dealing damage if stepped into.

skills.name: 传送
skills.des: With his newly-gained power, Grundwulf is now able to teleport away from you within the arena.

Grundwulf plants his greatsword into the ground, causing a calcified blood spike to erupt from the floor, creating a link between it and a player, causing a constant health drain effect and summon Coagulants into the arena. The affected player must walk into the green AoE around the spike to negate the health drain. The shackle cannot be destroyed and will go away on its own after a time.
Similar to Nisaazda earlier, Grundwulf can now summons Hemonculi to aid him.

skills.name: 垂死吐息
skills.des: Sahrotnax musters enough energy to rise his head up and spit fire, in an attempt to kill Grundwulf, who teleports behind a nearby Sliding Stone to protect himself. The fire is indicated by a long and wide rectangular AoE, and can harm you if you stand in the way of the flames. On the other hand, you can push the Sliding Stone away from Grundwulf to expose him to the fire, resulting in the fire damaging him.
If Grundwulf is near the Sliding Stone while Dying Breath isn't underway, he will express frustration at it being in his way and will teleport the stone away from him within the arena.

achievement.name: 断鳞者探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入月墓古庙或马塞洛克巢穴。

achievement.name: 月墓样式大师
achievement.des: 学习月墓古庙样式书的每一章，该样式书出现在月墓古庙地下城中。

achievement.name: 月墓古庙挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）月墓古庙的成就。

achievement.name: 月墓古庙征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月墓古庙中，击败崛起遗迹、德罗扎卡、库乔·科斯巴、尼撒兹达和格伦德伍尔夫。

achievement.name: 醉于力量
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月墓古庙中，在使用桑依血魔球之后击败格伦德伍尔夫。

achievement.name: 血腥速通
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月墓古庙中，在进入后30分钟内击败崛起遗迹、德罗扎卡、库乔·科斯巴、尼撒兹达和格伦德伍尔夫，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。当玩家遭遇第一批敌人时开始计时。

achievement.name: 逃离坟墓
achievement.des: Defeat all encounters in addition to the Risen Ruins, Dro'zakar, the Kujo Kethba, Nisaazda, and Grundwulf within 30 minutes of entering Veteran Moongrave Fane without suffering a group member death.

achievement.name: 断鳞者斥候
achievement.des: 完成普通模式的马塞洛克巢穴和月墓古庙。

achievement.name: 月墓古庙胜利者
achievement.des: 在月墓古庙中，击败崛起遗迹、德罗扎卡、库乔·科斯巴、尼撒兹达和格伦德伍尔夫。

achievement.name: 鲜血打击者
achievement.des: 在月墓古庙中用血魔球命中150个敌人。

achievement.name: 血腥击杀
achievement.des: 在月墓古庙中，在粉碎一个德罗扎卡正在吸收的血魔球之后将他击败。

achievement.name: 断鳞者探索者
achievement.des: Complete Veteran Moongrave Fane Conqueror and Veteran Lair of Maarselok.

achievement.name: 拔除吞噬者之牙
achievement.des: Defeat all encounters in addition to the Risen Ruins, Dro'zakar, the Kujo Kethba, Nisaazda, and Grundwulf within 30 minutes of entering Veteran Moongrave Fane in under 30 minutes without suffering a group member death.

achievement.name: 空心牙氏族杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月墓古庙中击败200个空心牙氏族吸血鬼。空心牙恐怖之口和血豹不计算在此成就内。

achievement.name: 空心牙恐怖之口杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月墓古庙中击败25个空心牙恐怖之口。

achievement.name: 不见血的击杀
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月墓古庙中，在不使用桑依献祭协同技创造血魔球情况下击败崛起遗迹。

achievement.name: 消灭饥渴
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月墓古庙中，用一个血魔球对一个桑依的饥渴降下致命一击。

achievement.name: 失败的输血
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月墓古庙中，在不让尼撒兹达使用她的血之羁绊技能来平均她和格伦德伍尔夫的生命值的情况下，将他们击败。

achievement.name: 共享经验
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月墓古庙中，在每个小队成员移动滑石不超过一次的情况下击败格伦德伍尔夫。

achievement.name: 丢下方块
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月墓古庙中，在使用桑依血魔球之后，使用滑石压扁贪婪食脑虫。

achievement.name: 四四方方
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）月墓古庙中，击败库乔·科斯巴并格挡三次喷涌，每次格挡之间相距不超过3秒。

name: 冰境
location: Sea of Ghosts, accessed by boat near the Jehanna Docks
mystery: 隐藏在幽灵之海的滚滚海浪中，这座寒冷岛屿成了残忍冰境女巫团的权利场。如今凶猛的风暴在它周围盘旋，这到底是一种自然现象，还是某种更为邪恶事情的征兆呢？
des:
The Icereach is a group dungeon on an island in the Sea of Ghosts, accessed by boat from Wrothgar's northern shore.
The Icereach Coven, of which a sole member was responsible for the destruction of Direfrost Keep in Eastmarch, makes a return.
The boat used to travel to the island is parked just east of Jehanna Docks in Wrothgar. It is part of the Harrowstorm dungeon pack DLC, along with the Unhallowed Grave.
Fleshflies, rats and spiders are found in numbers within.

BOSS.name: 断牙者柯亚格
BOSS.des: Kjarg the Tuskscraper is a giant who is the "son" of Sister Gohlla of the Icereach Coven. He can be found in the Icereach Underkeep and serves as the first boss for the dungeon.

skills.des: Basic melee attack dealing high physical damage.

skills.name: 寒霜强袭
skills.des: Kjarg winds up his hammer before slamming it down on the ground with force. The initial blow deals very high physical damage, and it is followed by five ice shockwaves being sent out from the hit radius, dealing high frost damage and snaring you. This attack can be blocked but it is better to avoid it.
Kjarg swiftly rakes his hammer across the floor and sends out five ice shockwaves in a forward arc towards you, dealing very high ice damage and staggering you.

skills.name: 狂怒
skills.des: Kjarg will periodically become enraged and start to glow during the fight, greatly increasing his damage output. The only way to remove this effect is to lure him to a crystal pillar that Sister Gohlla will summon and make him use Frost Slam on it. The frost explosion from the shattered pillar will make him recoil and stip the enrage buff.

During the fight, Sister Gohlla will periodically summon a large ice tornado, indicated by a large circular AoE, that will swirl around the arena in your general direction, dealing continuous high frost damage while inside and snaring you.

BOSS.name: 女巫斯科嘉
BOSS.des: Sister Skelga is a hagraven associated with the Icereach Coven. She can be found outside after exiting the Icereach Underkeep and serves as the second boss for the dungeon.

skills.name: 寒冰霆击
skills.des: Basic ranged attack dealing high frost damage.

Sister Skelga summons a fire swirl that tracks your movement as it builds up, before erupting, dealing very high flame damage. After the eruption, a pool of flame will continue to follow your movement for a few more seconds, dealing continuous high flame damage that must be healed through.
Sister Skelga raises her hands in the air, causing ice to burst from her, releasing four ice tornadoes going outward from her position, dealing very high ice damage and snaring you.

skills.name: 黑暗光束
skills.des: Sister Skelga channels a beam of concentrated dark magic at you, dealing very high magical damage.

skills.name: 传送
skills.des: Sister Skelga teleports to any of the arena's far end to put distance between you and her.
Sister Skelga will periodically summon stranglers buffed with a large damage shield on the outskirts of the arena to pester you.

BOSS.name: 蹒跚者维洛格
BOSS.des: Vearogh the Shambler is a giant Flesh Atronach who is summoned by Sister Bani after you trespass in her laboratory in Icereach. This is the third boss fight of the dungeon.

skills.des: Basic melee attack dealing high physical damage and some flame damage over time.
Vearogh winds up his hammer hand and slams it down at you, dealing very high physical attack and knocking you down. This attack can be blocked.
Vearogh swiftly stomps the ground, causing a flame eruption to trigger beneath you, indicated by a quickly growing circular AoE, dealing very high flame damage.
Vearogh ignites his torch hand with his hammer hand to make it light stronger, before throwing a heavy handful of flame forward at you, dealing very high flame damage. This attack has no indicator.

skills.name: 焰爆
skills.des: Vearogh screams out into the arena, causing flames to burst out from his body, causing an initial hit of high flame damage. These flames then form into two tornadoes that quickly swirl around the arena for a long duration, dealing continuous high flame damage when touched by them.

skills.name: 召唤不死族
skills.des: Throughout the fight, Envervating Thralls will constantly appear in the arena to join the fight. At certain health intervals, necromantic runes will appear in the corner of the arena, releasing Rift Wraiths and Rift Zombies to also come in and assist.

BOSS.name: 冰铸亡魂
BOSS.des: The Stormborn Revenant is a champion of the Icereach Coven who was reanimated by Sister Maefyn after his recent death. He is found in the Icereach Bailey on the ramparts and is the fourth boss of the dungeon.

skills.des: Basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 升天击
skills.des: The Stormborn Revenant winds up his sword for a powerful melee strike, dealing very high physical damage and knocking you backwards. This attack can be blocked.

skills.name: 雪崩打击
skills.des: The Stormborn Revenant raises his sword to the sky before disappearing, reappearing a moment later dropping from the sky with force on top of you, dealing very high physical damage. This attack must be dodged and has no AoE indicator.

The Stormborn Revenant charges his sword with energy and swings it forward, calling forth fourteen lightning strikes to hit you, all chaining quickly one after the other as indicated by small circular AoEs, dealing high shock damage each.

Upon reaching 30% health, the Stormborn Revenant performs a last resort attack where he holds his swords horizontally in his hands towards the sky, summoning an arena-wide ice storm that deals continuous high frost damage. He cannot be interrupted and the damage must be healed through or he must be killed to end the fight before the damage becomes too much.

skills.name: 召唤侍灵
skills.des: The Stormborn Revenant will periodically summon a storm atronach in the arena. It has weak health however and can be killed quickly. Upon reaching the 40% health interval, three atronachs are summoned in the different corners of the arena instead of just one.

BOSS.des: The Icereach Coven serves as the final boss for the Icereach, it consists of Mother Ciannait and the surviving sisters on the island; Sister Bani, Gohlla, Hiti and Maefyn. They need to be stopped from completing their storm ritual.

achievement.name: 血疫风暴探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入冰境或亵渎坟墓。

achievement.name: 冰境女巫团样式大师
achievement.des: Learn every chapter in the Icereach Coven style book, occasionally found as rewards for completing the Icereach Coven dungeon.

achievement.name: 冰境挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）冰境的成就。

achievement.name: 冰境征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）冰境中，击败断牙者柯亚格、修女斯科嘉、蹒跚者维洛格、冰铸亡魂和冰境女巫团。

achievement.name: 冷血杀手
achievement.des: In Veteran Icereach, defeat the Icereach Coven after burning their sacred wicker totem.

achievement.name: 高魔法抗性
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）冰境中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败断牙者柯亚格、修女斯科嘉、蹒跚者维洛格、冰铸亡魂和冰境女巫团，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 封臣的速战速决
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）冰境中，在进入后30分钟内击败断牙者柯亚格、女巫斯科嘉、蹒跚者维洛格、冰铸亡魂和冰境女巫团。当你遭遇第一批敌人时开始计时。

achievement.name: 血疫风暴斥候
achievement.des: 完成普通模式的冰境和亵渎坟墓。

achievement.name: 冰境胜利者
achievement.des: 在冰境中，击败断牙者柯亚格、修女斯科嘉、蹒跚者维洛格、冰铸亡魂和冰境女巫团。

achievement.name: 迅捷消音者
achievement.des: 在法术开始后的5秒内打断所有四个女巫，从而冰境女巫团成功吟唱风暴涌动。

achievement.name: 灌丛火灾
achievement.des: 通过使用熔融湍流效果移除50个扼杀者的寒冰护甲，对它们造成火焰辐射伤害。

achievement.name: 血疫风暴探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）冰境和亵渎坟墓。

achievement.name: 邪恶者不得安息
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）冰境中，在烧毁女巫们的柳条图腾之后，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下于30分钟内击败断牙者柯亚格、修女斯科嘉、蹒跚者维洛格、冰铸亡魂和冰境女巫团，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。
Defeat 200 Reachman warriors in Veteran Icereach.

achievement.name: 开放调用
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）冰境中，在不击杀任何裂隙怨灵的情况下，击败蹒跚者维洛格。

achievement.name: 寒霜侍灵杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）冰境中击败45个寒霜侍灵。

achievement.name: 冰冻终结
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）冰境中，在至少有三个完全生成的寒霜侍灵存活的情况下，击败断牙者柯亚格。

achievement.name: 喷吐禁止
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）冰境中，在不允许扼杀者的寒冰喷吐投射物命中任何玩家的情况下，击败修女斯科嘉。

achievement.name: 闪电三连击
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）冰境中，在与冰铸亡魂战斗时，击败三个风暴侍灵，并且每次击杀之间相距不超过3秒。

achievement.name: 风暴之眼
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）冰境中，在一名小队成员受到所有女巫的标志性法术影响的情况下，击败冰境女巫团。

achievement.name: 奇妙的和解
achievement.des: 在困难模式（老兵模式）冰境中，在与冰境女巫团战斗时，让格拉的巨人对被激怒状态下的各个女巫造成致命一击。

name: 亵渎坟墓
mystery: 很久以前，班古莱要塞的士兵在这个被诅咒的洞穴里埋了一样东西——一个过于巨大以至于必须有人看守的邪物。如今几个世纪过去了，即使最英勇的红卫人探索者也知道要离这座坟茔远远的。
des:
The Unhallowed Grave is a tomb complex and group dungeon located in the desert wastes of Bangkorai.
It is part of the Harrowstorm dungeon pack DLC, along with Icereach. Unhallowed Grave is known to contain the remains of an unholy army called the Gray Host and according to Fennorian, the burial mound dates back to the First Era. The ancient fraternity of Pyre Watch keeps guard over the burial site but has recently been facing several attacks of Nord graverobbers who call themselves the Draugrkin. Shelaria, a Redguard guardian of the Pyre Watch, requests your assistance to investigate the site and drive off the troublemakers.
Beetles, scorpions and wasps are found in numbers within. Carts yielding Bone, Crawlers, Gnawed Bone, Guts and Worms are scattered throughout the dungeon. Hazards include: Bottomless Pits.

BOSS.name: 嚎叫者哈克格里姆
BOSS.des: Hakgrym the Howler is a Nord and a lieutenant of the Draugrkin. He acts as the first boss of Unhallowed Grave and is accompanied by two Skeletal Werewolves and flesh abominations at the beginning of battle. During the fight he will reveal himself to be a werewolf behemoth once the odds go against him.

skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing high physical damage.

skills.name: 裂骨切割
skills.des: Hakgrym the Howler twirls his blades together before striking, dealing massive physical damage. This attack can be blocked.

skills.name: 诅咒之地
skills.des: Hakgrym the Howler summons a lich-like spear from the ground, which then explodes, as indicated by a circular AoE, dealing high magical damage and snaring you.

skills.name: 召唤图腾
skills.des: Hakgrym the Howler sometimes throws a Woeful Totem into the arena, which will constantly release ice bursts around itself until destroyed, dealing moderate frost damage each and slowing you down.
Hakgrym the Howler summons Skeletal Werewolves periodically during the encounter.

At 70%, Hakgrym the Howler teleports to one of the chained Flesh Abomination in the arena and liberates it, which will then assist him in the fight. At 30%, he will do the same with the other remaining abomination.

skills.name: 拳击
skills.des: Basic melee attack dealing high physical damage.

skills.name: 狂击
skills.des: Hakgrym the Howler winds his arms before slamming you twice with them, dealing massive physical damage. This attack can be blocked.
Hakgrym the Howler charges his fists with undead magic and slams them into the ground, causing a large shockwave around him, indicated by a growing circular AoE, dealing high magical damage.

skills.name: 跺脚
skills.des: Hakgrym the Howler forcefully stomps his foot into the ground, sending out shockwaves in all directions from the impact point, indicated by circular AoEs, dealing high physical damage and staggering you.

Hakgrym the Howler screams before charging forward, trampling those in his path, indicated by a circular AoE under him, dealing high physical damage and knocking down. Skeletons crawl out of the ground in his wake. He can repeat this ability another time back to back.

BOSS.name: 炉窑守护者
BOSS.des: The Keeper of the Kiln is a massive Grave Guardian which defends the Kiln in the Unhallowed Grave. It is necessary to defeat the Keeper to open the doors to the deeper parts of the tomb. The construct acts as the second boss for the dungeon.

skills.des: Basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 升天击
skills.des: The Keeper of the Kiln winds her sword back then strikes with force, dealing massive physical damage and knocking you back. This attack can be blocked.

skills.name: 炽热之炉
skills.des: Flames start rising in the vents around the arena. Some party members will need to use the grappling points to reach the upper levels. Once there they will need to find the glowing sigil and activate it, the Keeper can then be kited to the corresponding sigil on the lower level to stop flames and heat. If the Fiery Vents are not stopped in time, they will cause continuous fire damage until the players are dead. The Keeper briefly becomes invulnerable to damage while she extinguishes the vents.
The Keeper of the Kiln will constantly summon fellow animated warriors to assist during the fight.

BOSS.name: 永恒盾灵
BOSS.des: The Eternal Aegis is a construct which can be found guarding the way to the deeper parts of the Unhallowed Grave. It is the third boss of the dungeon.

skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing high physical damage.
The Eternal Aegis shields itself with its swords, before striking out with all of them, dealing massive physical damage. This attack can be blocked.

The Eternal Aegis brings its swords in the air and they start to glow. It then throws them across the arena before they all come back, indicated by traveling circular AoEs, dealing high physical damage on the way to and from.

skills.name: 刀锋之环
skills.des: The Eternal Aegis rapidly spins his blades around itself, indicated by a ring AoE that covers the area at a medium distance, dealing continuous very high physical damage. This can block party members' attacks. Stick close or very far to the boss to remain safe.

skills.name: 召唤次级盾灵
skills.des: Throughout the fight, the Eternal Aegis will cast off pieces of itself to form Lesser Aegises. They have low health and can be cleaved quickly.

BOSS.name: 疯狂的昂达戈尔
BOSS.des:
Ondagore the Mad is a lich who can be found within the Halls of Banishment of the Unhallowed Grave. He was once a necromancer aspiring to lichdom who found his way into the Unhallowed Grave, only to become trapped during the First Era. Though he succeeded in his initial goal, the isolation damaged his psyche.
He acts as the fourth boss of the dungeon.

skills.des: In the first phase a green dome sphere will surround him and he will summon Skeletal Spellbinders on the surrounding platforms. At this point the players will need to escape to one these with a grappling bow. They then need to destroy the spectral Arcanists on each platform before Ondagore will stop releasing poison. Maladiction The poison damage ability, causes large amounts of damage which stack.
The poison damage ability, causes large amounts of damage which stack.

In the second phase, white wispy smoke will begin to surround him. The attack can be avoided by hiding behind a pillar. He will also summon ghostly Menders which will begin to heal him, they can be interrupted but be aware of your surroundings as you may be caught in the open and hit with Drain Soul. Drain Soul Once a player is caught, they will be unable to move until the damage kills them.

skills.name: Drain Soul
skills.des: Once a player is caught, they will be unable to move until the damage kills them.

skills.name: 召唤幽灵
skills.des: During the fight between phases, he can summon ghost adds.

BOSS.name: 卡尔纳尔·墓歌
BOSS.des:
Kjalnar Tombskald is the Nord leader of the Draugrkin who are looting the Unhallowed Grave of urns for their mysterious employer. However, he has his own personal goal within the tomb and must be stopped from achieving it.
He is the final boss of the dungeon and the hard mode fight can be initiated by destroying Kjalnar's Skull Totem.

skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.
Kjalnar Tombskald throws a magical bomb that creates a necromantic hand that grasps you from the floor, dealing high magical damage and snaring you.

Kjalnar Tombskald spins in place, striking with his dual blades for very high physical damage, indicated by a large circular AoE. During the spin, he throws out a handful of runes across the arena that will linger for an extended time. Stepping in one causes an explosion that deals high magical damage.

skills.name: 觉醒
skills.des: Upon reaching 50% health, Kjalnar Tombskald moves to the center of the arena to begin the ritual to awaken Tzirhalir, who will then join the fight. Kjalnar remains vulnerable to incoming damage for the entirety of the summoning. Tzirzhalir doesn't have a health bar itself and will perish when Kjalnar is dead.

skills.name: 召唤骷髅
skills.des: On Veteran, Kjalnar Tombskald summons Imbued Skeletons. They will travel to him from the outer edges of the arena before exploding near you, dealing very high magical damage.

achievement.name: 血疫风暴探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入冰境或亵渎坟墓。

achievement.name: 看火人样式大师
achievement.des: 学习看火人样式书的每一章，该样式书偶尔作为完成亵渎坟墓地下城的奖励出现。

achievement.name: 亵渎坟墓挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）亵渎坟墓的成就。

achievement.name: 亵渎坟墓征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）亵渎坟墓中，击败嚎叫者哈克格里姆、炉窑守护者、永恒的盾灵、疯狂的昂达戈尔和卡尔纳尔·墓歌。

achievement.name: 颅骨粉碎者
achievement.des: In Veteran Unhallowed Grave, defeat Kjalnar Tombskald after destroying Kjalnar's Skull Totem.

achievement.name: 无损坟墓
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）亵渎坟墓中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败嚎叫者哈克格里姆、炉窑守护者、永恒的盾灵、疯狂的昂达戈尔和卡尔纳尔·墓歌，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。无需进入沃瑞亚的圣所。

achievement.name: 盗墓者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）亵渎坟墓中，在进入后30分钟内击败嚎叫者哈克格里姆、炉窑守护者、永恒的盾灵、疯狂的昂达戈尔和卡尔纳尔·墓歌，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。当你遭遇第一批敌人时开始计时。无需进入沃瑞亚的圣所。

achievement.name: 血疫风暴斥候
achievement.des: 完成普通模式的冰境和亵渎坟墓。

achievement.name: 亵渎坟墓胜利者
achievement.des: 在亵渎坟墓中，击败嚎叫者哈克格里姆、炉窑守护者、永恒的盾灵、疯狂的昂达戈尔和卡尔纳尔·墓歌。

achievement.name: 不请自来
achievement.des: 进入亵渎坟墓中的沃瑞亚的圣所，并击败其中的野兽。

achievement.name: 制陶恐慌
achievement.des: 在没有揭开正确符号的情况下击败炉窑守护者。

achievement.name: 破碎之盾
achievement.des: 在不让利刃之环格挡任何小队成员攻击或者任何次级盾灵爆炸的情况下，击败永恒的盾灵。

achievement.name: 最后一秒的割裂
achievement.des: 在亵渎坟墓中，在与永恒的盾灵战斗时，在一个次级盾灵开始引导碎盾者技能之后并且在它爆炸之前，将该次级盾灵击败。

achievement.name: 骨骼停滞
achievement.des: 在不让任何灌注骷髅强化自身的情况下击败卡尔纳尔·墓歌。

achievement.name: 血疫风暴探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）冰境和亵渎坟墓。

achievement.name: 蔑视死亡
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）亵渎坟墓中，在摧毁卡尔纳尔的不洁图腾之后，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下于30分钟内击败嚎叫者哈克格里姆、炉窑守护者、永恒的盾灵、疯狂的昂达戈尔和卡尔纳尔·墓歌，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。无需进入沃瑞亚的圣所。

achievement.name: 尸鬼帮杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）亵渎坟墓中击败200个尸鬼帮战士。

achievement.name: 骸骨巨像杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）亵渎坟墓中击败10个骸骨巨像。

achievement.name: 无情的捕犬者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）亵渎坟墓中，在不击败嚎叫者哈克格里姆的任何血肉憎恶的情况下将他击败。

achievement.name: 修理者杀手
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）亵渎坟墓中，在与疯狂的昂达戈尔战斗时，击杀所有修理者，并且每次击杀之间相距不超过3秒。

achievement.name: 未加抑制的强化
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）亵渎坟墓中，在灌注骷髅到达强化之环之前不摧毁任何灌注骷髅的情况下，击败卡尔纳尔·墓歌。

name: 荆棘城堡
mystery: “尽管荆棘夫人有着神秘的过去，鸦卫从未觉得有必要直接和她打交道。她似乎很满足于躲在深山里，独自一人躲在她那可怕的城堡里。我想知道忽视她会不会是一个可怕的错误。”——安杜萨·达罗
des:
Castle Thorn is a group dungeon nestled in the Haafingar Mountains of Western Skyrim.
It is part of the Stonethorn dungeon pack DLC, along with Stone Garden.
The vampire lord, Lady Thorn, a High Elf who once pertained to Clan Direnni, then known as, Lady Ingerien, rules from here, commanding her Thorn Legion. Crows, fleshflies, rats and spiders can be found in numbers within the dungeon.

BOSS.name: 恐怖的汀杜拉
BOSS.des: Dread Tindulra is a giant death hound who can be found in Castle Thorn's courtyard. It is the first boss of the dungeon.

skills.name: 噬咬
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 残暴噬咬
skills.des: Dread Tindulra bites you with fiery jaws, dealing high flame damage. This can be blocked.

skills.name: 火之喷吐
skills.des: Dread Tindulra spits fire continuously, indicated by a wide red cone, dealing constant high flame damage. Dread Tindulra can move while performing this ability.

skills.name: 呕吐烈焰
skills.des: Dread Tindulra vomits fire all over the arena, indicated by several red circles, dealing high flame damage each on impact, and then flames linger, dealing continuous moderate flame damage. The flames linger long enough that two applications of the ability can cover the arena at once.

skills.name: 震动
skills.des: Towards the end of Flame Retch's lingering flames, Dread Tindulra jumps off the ground and back down to the ground, causing the previously affected areas to shatter, indicated by red circles and jagged rocks, dealing high physical damage and knocking targets back.
Dread Tindulra raises its head skyward and howls, summoning a swarm of Death Hound Broodlings from beneath the soil.

BOSS.name: 血腥影暮
BOSS.des: The Blood Twilight is a grievous twilight summoned by Talfyg after he steals some of Gwendis's essence. It appears in the Garden Conservatory of Castle Thorn, and serves as the second boss of the dungeon.

skills.name: 黑暗弹幕
skills.des: The Blood Twilight attacks one person by rapidly shooting purple bolts at them. The tank can get in front of the target and absorb the damage by blocking. Alternatively, the healer should go nuts to keep the target alive. However, the former is the more viable option. To best mitigate the damage without having the tank block in front of the target, the target should block, set up damage shields and make use of whatever heals they or the healer can throw at them. Attempting to survive without the help of a tank is not viable on Veteran difficulty.

skills.name: 阴影打击
skills.des: The Blood Twilight teleports and slams down upon its target, dealing devastating physical damage. This can be survived by blocking, warding and healing on normal, but on Veteran, the Twilight should be focused on the tank to prevent weaker group members from being killed in one shot.

Summons four Blood Channelers on all four sides of the room to empower the Blood Twilight. Kill them as soon as possible, they channel a beam into the Blood Twilight that causes it to deal more damage.

Blood mines are occasionally summoned after the Blood Channelers die. Stepping on these mines deals magic damage. Try to avoid them; they're very obvious, and look like little red lumps sitting on the ground.

skills.name: 翻滚之翼
skills.des: The Blood Twilight hits its target with its wings.

skills.name: 鲜血斩击
skills.des: The Blood Twilight slashes you with its claws, dealing major physical damage.

skills.name: 脓血
skills.des: Standing in the ichor applies a slowing debuff, and deals a lot of magic damage over time. Stay out of the ichor. If you get hit into the pool, there are stairwells that you can climb to get out of it. Mitigate the damage as best you can as you make your way back up. Shades: The Blood Twilight will summon red shades (identical copies of itself that cannot be hit) to try to push players into the center. If they manage to push you, they deal mild damage. Strategy for Avoiding Being Hit Into the Ichor: Try to hug the wall. Your group should pick a corner to huddle in together and burn the Reanimated Vampire down. Huddling in a corner makes the shades less likely to hit you into the center. When the shades show up, stay in the corner and move around. Do not stray too far from the corner, lest you get shoved into the center.
If there are any Blood Channelers alive during this phase, now would be a good time to take them out, as the Blood Twilight itself will not face you to deal any damage.

BOSS.name: 瓦杜罗斯
BOSS.des: Vaduroth is a Wraith-of-Crows who acts as the third boss of Castle Thorn. It is encountered in the Sanctuary of Lament, a room filled with corpses hanging on hooks from the ceiling and some strapped to tables around.

skills.name: 砍剁
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 暗影爆轰
skills.des: A basic ranged attack dealing moderate magical damage.

skills.name: Rend
skills.des: Vaduroth prepares for a vicious swing, raising its axe above its head then driving it down at its target, dealing very high physical damage and knocking them down. This can be blocked.

Vaduroth conjures a storm of ravenous crows that begins flying around the arena independtly, indicated by a large red circle, dealing continuous high physical damage. The swarm also throws projectiles at nearby targets outside of it, which deals moderate magical damage.

At 75%/50%/25% health, Vaduroth throws its sickle away from itself in the arena, which briefly animates on its own and pulls targets to it, who are stunned and flailing the entire way (with no way to interrupt). Once at the sickle, targets are imbued with shadowy energy, indicated by growing red circles, which combusts dealing moderate magical damage, and deals more damage if multiple targets remain close together. Defeating the animated sickle causes it to remain lodged into the ground temporarily, with a green circle around it.

While in the green circle, looking up to the ceiling at any of the hanging corpses shows a "Use" prompt, and making use of the prompt causes the sickle to be thrown at the highlighted body. This results in the body exploding and dropping Virulent Viscera into the arena that is allied against the boss.

skills.name: 收获
skills.des: Vaduroth teleports to one of the strapped corpses and brings them back to life as a Reanimated Vampire so that theycan assist in the fight. The reanimation process grants a small damage shield to Vaduroth and the reanimated vampire. This always occurs after "Discard".
Vaduroth flies up to the hanging corpses and slashes one, spawning a Virulent Viscera of its own to assist in the fight.

BOSS.name: 塔尔菲格
BOSS.des: Talfyg is a Nord vampire who can be found in Castle Thorn.

skills.name: 魔爪
skills.des: Basic melee attack that deals moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 十字挥击
skills.des: A powerful claws melee attack that deals very high physical damage and staggers. This can be blocked.

skills.name: 歼灭
skills.des: Talfyg raises his hand forward as a beam of concentrated blood magic shoots off at a target, indicated by a red circle, dealing continuous high magical damage. Once Talfyg is below 50% health, this ability becomes able to follow targets instead of remaining static at the iniital point of casting.

skills.name: 瓦解
skills.des: Once Talfyg is below 50% health, this ability becomes available. Talfyg conjures a storm of blood around himself, then slams the ground fiercely, shattering the storm leaving lingering residue behind, indicated by a very large red circle. The initial impact deals very high magical damage and the lingering residue deals continuous high magical damage.

skills.name: 召唤
skills.des: Talfyg can summon various adds. When he shouts, a Volatile Hound materializes in the arena nearby. He can also channel energy into the statues around the arena, which erupts them as a Seething Gargoyle for the smaller statues, and Frozen Gargoyles for the larger statues.

BOSS.name: 荆棘夫人
BOSS.des: Lady Thorn is a High Elf Vampire Lord who rules over Castle Thorn. She used to be known as Lady Ingerien of Clan Direnni.

skills.name: 魔爪
skills.des: Basic melee attack which causes moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 十字挥击
skills.des: A melee ability that deals high physical damage and staggers. This can be blocked.

skills.name: 极速反应
skills.des: Lady Thorn glows red and slashes a target with both her hands as she moves towards the target with unnatural speed, dealing moderate magic damage and knocking back.

skills.name: 扯裂
skills.des: Lady Thorn creates many small areas throughout the arena which explode after a delay, dealing moderate physical damage. When Lady Thorn is below 50% health, only one area now spawns, but it grows in size over time and deals higher damage, and Lady Thorn doesn't have to perform a casting animation to create them.
Lady Thorn creates similar areas as in "Rive", but pushes them outward instead of detonating them, dealing moderate magical damage.

skills.name: 入侵
skills.des: Lady Thorn approaches a target with alarming speed and drains some of their blood, dealing major physical damage.

skills.name: 散布
skills.des: At 70%/45% health, Lady Thorn disappears into a bloodthirsty swarm and becomes untargettable, as a large area appears under her last position and deals continuous moderate magic damage. Many smaller areas shoot out and travel outward from the larger mass in many directions, which deal continuous moderate physical damage. Also, Blood Crawlers rapidly spawn from the larger area.

skills.name: Batswarm
skills.des: At 90% health, Lady Thorn summons a swarm of bats that blankets the entire arena, dealing increasing continuous oblivion damage to those who stand in it. A single green AoE (reminiscent of Zaan the Scalecaller's shield throw) will appear in the thick of the swarm. Standing in that circle gives protection from the bats and leaves a safe area to battle Lady Thorn.

skills.name: 血腥俯冲
skills.des: During Batswarm, Lady Thorn periodically flies in a straight line in the arena, dealing moderate physical damage, knocking back and stunning targets hit. Blocking this attack prevents the crowd control.

achievement.name: 石与荆棘探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入石之花园或荆棘城堡。

achievement.name: 荆棘军团样式大师
achievement.des: 学习荆棘军团样式书的每一章，该样式书偶尔作为完成荆棘城堡地下城的奖励出现。

achievement.name: 荆棘城堡挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）荆棘城堡的成就。

achievement.name: 荆棘城堡征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）荆棘城堡中，击败恐怖的汀杜拉、血腥影暮、瓦杜罗斯、塔尔菲格和荆棘夫人。

achievement.name: 荆棘移除者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）荆棘城堡中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败荆棘夫人。

achievement.name: 不可撼动的猛攻
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）荆棘城堡中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败恐怖的汀杜拉、血腥影暮、瓦杜罗斯、塔尔菲格和荆棘夫人，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 拆家者
achievement.des: Defeat Dread Tindulra, the Blood Twilight, Vaduroth, Talfyg, and Lady Thorn within 30 minutes of entering Veteran Castle Thorn. Your timer starts when you engage the first group on enemies.

achievement.name: 石与荆棘斥候
achievement.des: 完成普通模式的荆棘城堡和石之花园。

achievement.name: 荆棘城堡胜利者
achievement.des: 在荆棘城堡中，击败恐怖的汀杜拉、血腥影暮、瓦杜罗斯、塔尔菲格和荆棘夫人。

achievement.name: 镰刀技巧
achievement.des: 在荆棘城堡中，使用任何瓦杜罗斯的镰刀爆轰70具尸体。

achievement.name: 石与荆棘探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）石之花园和荆棘城堡。

achievement.name: 荆棘的祸根
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）荆棘城堡中，在升起挑战旗帜之后，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下于30分钟内击败恐怖的汀杜拉、血腥影暮、瓦杜罗斯、塔尔菲格和荆棘夫人，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 荆棘军团森切战猫杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）荆棘城堡中击败50个荆棘军团森切战猫。

achievement.name: 荆棘军团杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）荆棘城堡中击败200个荆棘军团吸血鬼。包括荆棘军团血腥法师、迅捷剑客、神射手、重击者或复生吸血鬼。

achievement.name: 四乘四
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）荆棘城堡中，在每个小队成员用镰刀爆轰至少一具灌注悬尸的情况下，击败瓦杜罗斯。

achievement.name: 守护者存活
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）荆棘城堡中，在升起挑战旗帜后，在不击杀血液守护者的情况下击败荆棘夫人。

achievement.name: 猎犬重击
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）荆棘城堡中，距离恐怖的汀杜拉和她的孵化物至少15米远的情况下，击败她并击杀孵化物。

achievement.name: 让沉睡的石像鬼躺下
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）荆棘城堡中，在与塔尔菲格的战斗中不击杀任何大型冰冻石像鬼的情况下将他击败。

achievement.name: 轮流
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）荆棘城堡中，在完成两个蝙蝠群阶段之后，并且每个玩家在每个阶段至少使用一次血液搜刮者协同技的情况下，击败荆棘夫人。

name: 石之花园
location: West of the Vampire Feeding Grounds
mystery: “矮人管道不仅能输送蒸汽、水、油、空气，甚至还能输送熔化的岩石。这就是矮人设计的魅力所在。他们的设计具有多功能性，可以用于任何用途。不用天才也能看出来，但他们的设计很有帮助。” ——雷诺·瓦诺斯
des:
Stone Garden is a group dungeon found in the Greymoor Cavern section of Blackreach: Greymoor Caverns.
It is part of the Stonethorn dungeon pack DLC, along with Castle Thorn. The mad alchemist Arkasis operates from this location, now with increased security offered by his newly-acquired patronage from the Gray Host.
Various passive critters can be found in numbers inside, such as Shroom Beetles, Spiders, Rats, and Winter Moths. Hazards include: a Lava Pool.

BOSS.name: 克拉格伦总督
BOSS.des: Exarch Kraglen is a Nord werewolf behemoth and a high-ranking member of the Gray Host who can be found in the Stone Garden. He is the dungeon's first boss, where he guards the entrance to Arkasis's laboratory.

skills.name: 挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 屠戮
skills.des: Exarch Kraglen winds up and eviscerates his targets with his claws, hitting twice for major physical damage. This can be blocked. If not, it will one-shot most non-tanks.

skills.name: 充能
skills.des: Exarch Kraglen glows red and charges at a target, dealing major physical damage. This ability needs to be blocked, and is similar to Xal-Nur the Slaver's charge in the Ruins of Mazzatun in that regard.

skills.name: 血怒
skills.des: Exarch Kraglen roars loudly, knocking back anyone in melee range, and will then continue on, draining the affected target's resources until he is interrupted. Those fighting from a distance can use Crushing Shock or Venom Arrow to interrupt this ability to help out the tank. This the most crucial mechanic to pay attention to.

skills.name: 山崩地裂
skills.des: Exarch Kraglen fmashes the ground with his fists, indicated by a massive red circle, dealing very high physical damage and knocking down targets. Afterward, fissures crack open the ground in a winding line towards targets, indicated by additional smaller red circles, dealing moderate physical damage and stunning each.
