On Veteran, if you're in range when he stomps, it may be a one-shot ability.

skills.name: 断裂
skills.des: Small line AoEs that link between the fissures created by "Fault Line", which deal moderate physical damage.

BOSS.name: 石头巨兽
BOSS.des: The Stone Behemoth is a giant stone husk found in the Testing Chamber of Stone Garden. Arkasis will put it through its paces and you have no choice but to participate if you wish to survive. It serves as the second boss of the dungeon.

skills.name: 拳击
skills.des: The behemoth punches its target, dealing high physical damage.

skills.name: 升天击
skills.des: The behemoth punches upwards, dealing high physical damage.

skills.name: 破碎之地
skills.des: The behemoth removes its core and holds it up above its head, causing a blast of blue energy, indicated by a growing red circle, that deals very high magic damage and knocks down targets. Blocking negates the knockdown. Additional blasts fly around the behemoth afterward, dealing high damage and also knocking down, as indicated by red circles.

skills.name: 撼地震击
skills.des: The behemoth prepares briefly then punches the ground with one of its fists, indicated by a red circle, dealing very high physical damage and stunning, then does the same with its other fist.

While the room is attuned to ice, "Ground Pound" becomes "Ice Burst". The behemoth digs both hands into the floor, causing ice shards to erupt at targets, indicated by red circles, dealing very high frost damage. The shards then linger at the affected locations for some time, dealing continuous moderate frost damage.

skills.name: 破裂
skills.des: At the end of the "Ice Burst" lingering shards, the behemoth slams its fists together, causing the shards to burst, covering the entire arena with bright ice, dealing high frost damage and freezing targets (Break Free can be used). This removes the ice attunement from the behemoth.

skills.name: 焰爆
skills.des: While the room is attuned to fire, "Ground Pound" becomes "Flame Burst". The behemoth digs both hands into the floor, causing fire bouts to erupt underneath targets, indicated by red circles, dealing very high flame damage. Flames continue to linger at the affected locations for some time, dealing continuous moderate flame damage.

skills.name: 引爆
skills.des: At the end of the "Flame Burst" lingering flames, the behemoth slams its fists together, causing the fire to explode across the arena, dealing major flame damage. This removes the fire attunement from the behemoth.

skills.name: 雷电交加
skills.des: Arkasis aims at all targets in the arena with his machine, firing a bolt of electricity at all of them, indicated by small hollow red circles, which expand when the bolts strike. It deals high shock damage and stuns, and deals additional damage if targets overlap each other.

skills.name: Attunement
skills.des: Arkasis throws either an icy or molten concoction on the behemoth, which modifies its "Ground Pound" ability until the attunement is later removed.
Arkasis adjusts the room to an icy climate. During this period, ice bursts throughout the arena floor constantly, indicated by small red circles, dealing moderate frost damage each.
Arkasis adjusts the room to a hot climate. During this period, flame swirls appear throughout the arena floor constantly, indicated by small red circles, dealing moderate flame damage each.

Throughout the fight, stone husks that lay dormant on the sides of the arena will activate to assist the boss. These however will remain against the walls and only use the stone husk's "Feed" ability.

BOSS.name: 疯炼金术士阿卡西斯
BOSS.des:
Arkasis the Mad Alchemist is a Nord and a brilliant alchemist who has been causing trouble around Skyrim for decades with his experiments. His current abode is the Stone Garden, within Blackreach. Here, he performs research and experimentation on behalf of his new patron.
He serves as the final boss of the dungeon.

skills.name: 砍击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 砍剁
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 穿刺
skills.des: Arkasis thrusts his weapon with disciplined precision at a target, dealing moderate physical and afflicts the target with Major Breach for 15 seconds.

skills.name: 重攻击
skills.des: Arkasis deliviers a powerful sword strike, dealing very high physical damage and staggering. This can be blocked.

skills.name: 暴烈池
skills.des: Arkasis throws a potion that sets the targeted area alight and bounces once forward and creates a second flame area. The pools deal moderate flame damage over time to all players within the red circle.

skills.name: 炽热焦油
skills.des: Arkasis covers his weapon in flaming oil, causing Lop and Chop to become Blazing Lop and Blazing Chop.

skills.name: 炽热劈伐
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does moderate physical damage and additional fire damage over time.

skills.name: 炽热砍剁
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does minor physical damage and additional fire damage over time.

Arkasis points his weapon forward and sends out three fire storms forward, indicated by a red circle, which then snake around the general area where he is standing, dealing continuous high flame damage.

Arkasis throws a poisonous vial far away from him, which then releases poisonous swirls from it back towards him and his targets, indicated by small red circles, dealing high poison damage and stunning each. At the end, the vial detonates, indicated by a growing large red circle, dealing very high poison damage.

skills.name: 召唤
skills.des: During this phase, there will also be adds released, up to three at a time. These should be dealt with by the damage dealers quickly. These include; Alchemized Bristlebacks, Chaurus and Durzogs
Arkasis raises his hand up, then emits a forceful burst of electricity from it, indicated by a wide red cone, dealing very high shock damage and staggering. This can be interrupted.

Arkasis throws an orb of electricity away from him but still in the general area, indicated by a small red circle, at which point it starts traveling in the direction of nearby targets, dealing continuous high shock damage.

skills.name: 轰炸
skills.des: Arkasis chucks several orbs in the air, which come crashing back down, indicated by large red circles, dealing very high shock damage.

skills.name: 钳住
skills.des: Arkasis throws an electrified rod at a target, indicated by a small red circle around them, trapping the target to the ground and dealing quick and very high amounts of shock damage to them. Other allies must approach the trapped target and use the "Remove Bolt" synergy to free them.

achievement.name: 石与荆棘探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入石之花园或荆棘城堡。

achievement.name: 危险炼金术样式大师
achievement.des: 学习危险炼金术样式书的每一章，该样式书偶尔作为完成石之花园地下城的奖励出现。

achievement.name: 石之花园挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）石之花园的成就。

achievement.name: 石之花园征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）石之花园中，击败克拉格伦总督、石头巨兽和疯炼金术士阿卡西斯。

achievement.name: 三重保障
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）石之花园中，在升起与各个头目对应的挑战旗帜之后，击败克拉格伦总督、石头巨兽和疯炼金术士阿卡西斯。

achievement.name: 安全第一！
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）石之花园中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败克拉格伦总督、石头巨兽和疯炼金术士阿卡西斯，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。不需要进入赋活者控制室。

achievement.name: 迅捷的实验者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）石之花园中，在进入后25分钟内击败克拉格伦总督、石头巨兽和疯炼金术士阿卡西斯，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。当你遭遇第一批石之花园的保卫者时开始计时。不需要进入赋活者控制室。

achievement.name: 石与荆棘斥候
achievement.des: 完成普通模式的荆棘城堡和石之花园。

achievement.name: 石之花园胜利者
achievement.des: 在石之花园中，击败克拉格伦总督、石头巨兽和疯炼金术士阿卡西斯。

achievement.name: 大灰狼
achievement.des: 在石之花园中，作为狼人巨兽造成100000000点伤害。

achievement.name: 掘地三尺
achievement.des: 在石之花园中，在与疯炼金术士阿卡西斯战斗时，赶在50个雷电发射器爆炸之前将它们移位。

achievement.name: 有条不紊的调酒师
achievement.des: 在石之花园中，使用阿卡西斯的炼金术设备获得炼金强化超级力量、炼金强化超级活力和炼金强化超级韧性的好处，并使三项同时生效。

achievement.name: 真正的天才
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）石之花园中，在升起与各个头目对应的挑战旗帜之后，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下于25分钟内击败克拉格伦总督、石头巨兽和疯炼金术士阿卡西斯，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。不需要进入赋活者控制室。

achievement.name: 被遏制的猎犬
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）石之花园中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败克拉格伦总督。

achievement.name: 仍然需要工作
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）石之花园中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败石头巨兽。

achievement.name: 石僵傀杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）石之花园中击败50个石僵傀。

achievement.name: 信徒杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）石之花园中，击杀阿卡西斯的200个人形生物追随者。该成就包含任何石之花园传令兵、瞭望者、保护者、学徒、炼金术士或管理者。

achievement.name: 孢子践踏者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）石之花园中，在阻止石僵傀释放任何暴烈幽暗孢子之后，击败疯炼金术士阿卡西斯。

achievement.name: 老派做法
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）石之花园中，在整个过程中不关闭赋活之流控制或者通过使用阿卡西斯的炼金术设备获得好处的情况下，在升起挑战旗帜之后击败疯炼金术士阿卡西斯。

achievement.name: 闪电熔岩铸造者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）石之花园中，用阿卡西斯的雷电交加命中石头巨兽30次。

achievement.name: 最大怒火
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）石之花园中，在获得了3层或更多层数的血怒或破碎之后，击败克拉格伦总督。

name: 黑德雷克庄园
mystery: 长屋皇帝倒台后，除了偶来的寻宝者，这个宏伟的隐居之地几乎无人问津。杜科拉奇在泰姆瑞尔全境征战获得的大部分战利品都失踪了，后来才出现在黑市上。
des:
Black Drake Villa is a group dungeon on the Gold Coast.
It is included in the Flames of Ambition DLC alongside The Cauldron. The entrance is located along Varen's Wall northwest of Kvatch.
Badgers, nixads, rats and spiders are found in numbers within.

BOSS.name: 金拉斯·铁眼
BOSS.des:
Kinras Ironeye is a large minotaur found on the dilapidated grounds of Black Drake Villa. He is the leader of the Ironeye Tribe, which derives its name directly from him.
He serves as the first boss of the dungeon.

skills.des: Kinras throws three fire bombs at you back to back, causing lingering flames to appear on the ground, indicated by circular AoEs, dealing high flame damage on hit followed by moderate continuous flame damage.
Kinras quickly rakes his hammer across the floor, sending out three fire waves in a cone from his location, indicated by circular AoEs, dealing high flame damage.
Kinras winds up his hammer before striking you hard with it, dealing massive physical damage. This attack can be blocked.

Often during the fight, flames will erupt from a sewer grate in the walls of the arena, dealing very high flame damage if hit. Additionally, a Blazing Salamander will come out and come assist Kinras in the fight.
Coinciding with the Sewer Eruption, Kinras throws a Fiery Totem into the arena, buffing his outgoing damage and causing continuous moderate flame damage to any standing close to the totem.

skills.name: 火之霆击
skills.des: A basic ranged attack dealing high flame damage.

Kinras charges himself with fire and stomps the ground repeatedly, causing the ground to crack and erupt in flames, as indicated by a large amount of small circular AoEs, dealing high flame damage each.

Kinras raises his arms in the air before casting a spell, causing a large area in the arena to become engulfed in flames, as indicated by a very large circular AoE, dealing continuous very high flame damage while inside.
Kinras releases several fireballs that snake around the arena for a long duration, indicated by traveling circular AoEs, dealing high flame damage.
Upon reaching 40% health, Kinras returns to his initial phase, by means of stampeding over to his discarded hammer, dealing high physical damage and knocking you down if caught in his path.

Upon reaching 10% health, Kinras quickly switches back to this phase and starts glowing brightly, gaining a large boost to his overall damage output. Quickly finish him off before the damage becomes too much to deal with.

BOSS.name: 杰米诺斯队长
BOSS.des: Captain Geminus is an Imperial archer found in Black Drake Villa. She is a member of the True-Sworn. She acts as the second boss of the dungeon.

skills.des: A basic range attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 箭矢倾泻
skills.des: Captain Geminus takes aim and fires a wide spray of arrows at you, dealing very high physical damage, indicated by a large conal AoE in front of her. She will adjust her position for a time if you try to strafe around her to avoid the attack.
Captain Geminus shoots an arrow that explodes on impact, sending out three magical shockwaves outward from the explosion, dealing high magical damage. These don't have AoE indicators.

Captain Geminus assaults your very mind, as your screen becomes obscured and shadowy, causing continuous massive damage. You must head over to a small magical field that Captain Geminus throws at far away into the arena at the start of this ability to nullify the effect.
Captain Geminus slams the ground with force, sending out a massive shockwave, dealing high physical damage and knocking you down.

At 70% and 30% health, Captain Geminus summons a large air atronach into the arena to assist her. As long as the atronach is alive, Captain Geminus is shielded by a magical bubble, making her invulnerable to damage. Additionally, while you fight the atronach, she will fire out waves of fireballs out from all around her position, dealing high flame damage each. These don't have any indicators.

During the fight, Shades of Geminus will appear on the outer rim of the arena and shoot you with arrows. They have low health and should be killed quickly to simplify the fight. Starting after the first Elemental Onslaught phase, True-Sworn Flame Hounds will also start to get summoned.

BOSS.name: 派罗图格·恩克拉迪斯
BOSS.des:
Pyroturge Encratis is an Imperial member of the True-Sworn who can be encountered in Black Drake Villa. He is trying to burn down the estate.
He serves as the final boss of the dungeon, and you will encounter him several times throughout the villa before finally confronting him. His fight consists of two phases; he will break through a carved wall and escape to a secret lair halfway through the battle.

skills.name: 火球
skills.des: A basic range attack dealing moderate flame damage.
Pyroturge Encratis release a bout of flame from his hand, dealing continuous flame damage. He will adjust his positioning if you attempt to strafe to avoid the attack.

skills.name: 爆炸
skills.des: Pyroturge Encratis casts a spell that triggers a fiery explosion at your location, as indicated by a quickly growing circular AoE, dealing very high flame damage.

Pyroturge Encratis casts a spell that triggers a delayed explosion within you, indicated by a small circular AoE that tracks your movement. The culminating explosion deals very high flame damage. You must time your dodge with the explosion's timing.

Pyroturge Encratis creates a large flame swirl beneath his feet, indicated by a very large circular AoE, dealing continuous high flame damage over time. During the course of the swirl, several Burning Specters will appear to assist Pyroturge Encratis. They have relatively low health and should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

Similar to the above, Pyroturge Encratis summons an even larger flame swirl that covers almost the whole of the arena, leaving only a small circle in the middle where he is, forcing you close to him. During the swirl, this time a lone Fire Behemoth is summoned, which poses a larger threat.

skills.name: 脱逃
skills.des: Upon reaching 50% health, Pyroturge becomes invulnerable to damage and escapes the arena, crashing through a wall which creates Falling Rocks areas dealing moderate physical damage, leading to a secret lair. On the way, he regains health back up to 75%. He also gains access to some new abilities, on top of the previous ones.

Pyroturge Encratis summons several flame fields in front of himself, indicated by small circular AoEs. These are likely to overlap over each other, resulting in massive flame damage being applied if you stand in more than one at a time.

skills.name: 传送
skills.des: Pyroturge Encratis can teleport quickly to opposite ends of the lair. He often uses this to lead into his Infernal Summoning abilities.

If you fall into the large central pit in the secret lair, you will take continuous high flame damage, and Grotto Salamanders will come out of grates to attack you. You must use any of the nearby steam vents to propel yourself back onto the edge of the arena where Pyroturge Encratis is located.

BOSS.name: 哨兵阿克萨拉兹
BOSS.des:
Sentinel Aksalaz is a race? and the final secret boss of Black Drake Villa. The nature of the Sentinel is shrouded in mystery, one of the few details being his eternal duty to test and kill those who seek him, and that falling in battle to worthy opponents will finally grant him freedom.
To face him, your group must defeat the three other optional bosses, the Avatars of Zeal, Vigor, and Fortitude, in addition to the main three boss encounters.
Furthermore, each player must collect at least 25 Avatar Fragments, found throughout the dungeon. Each player can only see the fragments that only they can collect.
If your group fulfills these requirements, each player then needs to activate the Avatar Artifact found at the side of the Athenaeum, which will summon Sentinel Aksalaz in the central pit.
Throughout various points in the dungeon, you can temporarily take on the Sentinel's form by going to the marked pads and activating them, which will allow you to use his ice ability and freeze opponents in place. This is the effect of the Relic of the Sentinel tool.

skills.name: 斧头挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 升天击
skills.des: Sentinel Aksalaz rears his axe and strikes hard, dealing massive physical damage and knocking you back. This attack can be blocked.
Sentinel Aksalaz cleaves with his axe, sending out three small ice storms forward, indicated by small circular AoEs, dealing high frost damage and snaring you.

skills.name: 寒霜迸发
skills.des: Sentinel Aksalaz curls up into himself as he prepares to unleash a large explosion, as a circular AoE slowly fills almost the entirety of the arena, dealing massive frost damage and imprisoning all targets hit in a block of ice which stuns them.
Occasionally, Sentinel Aksalaz will summon ice storms that will circle the outer edge of the arena, indicated by circular AoEs, dealing high frost damage.

Sentinel Aksalaz plunges his battle-axe in the ground which creates areas of ice under targets feet every half second that deal continuous high frost damage and snares targets inside. You should keep moving while in this attack.
A large area under every player slowly fills. When filled everyone inside those zones are dealt high frost damage, knocked down and stunned. If blocked you don't get crowd control.
At 75%, Sentinel Aksalaz summons a weaker version of the Avatar of Zeal. At 55%, the same with the Avatar of Vigor. And finally at 30%, the Avatar of Fortitude.

skills.name: 召唤霜冻灾星
skills.des: Throughout the fight, weak Frostkin will appear in the arena to assist Sentinel Aksalaz.

achievement.name: 野心之火探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入黑德雷克庄园或大釜。

achievement.name: 真誓样式大师
achievement.des: 学习真誓样式书的每一章，该样式书可通过击败黑德雷克庄园的BOSS获得。

achievement.name: 黑德雷克庄园挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）黑德雷克庄园的成就。

achievement.name: 黑德雷克庄园征服者
achievement.des: Defeat Kinras Ironeye, Captain Geminus and Pyroturge Encratis in Veteran Black Drake Villa.

achievement.name: 熄灭
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）黑德雷克庄园中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败派罗图格·恩克拉迪斯。

achievement.name: 未被烧焦
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）黑德雷克庄园中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败金拉斯·铁眼、杰米诺斯队长和派罗图格·恩克拉迪斯，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 速读者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）黑德雷克庄园中，在进入后25分钟内击败金拉斯·铁眼、杰米诺斯队长和派罗图格·恩克拉迪斯，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。当你遭遇第一批敌人时开始计时。

achievement.name: 野心之火斥候
achievement.des: 完成普通模式的黑德雷克庄园和大釜。

achievement.name: 黑德雷克庄园胜利者
achievement.des: 在黑德雷克庄园中，击败金拉斯·铁眼、杰米诺斯队长和派罗图格·恩克拉迪斯。

achievement.name: 正中靶心！
achievement.des: Use a geyser to fire yourself into the eye of Pyroturge Encratis's Firestorm 5 times in Black Drake Villa.

achievement.name: 野心之火探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）黑德雷克庄园和大釜。

achievement.name: 狂热藏书家
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）黑德雷克庄园中，在升起与各个头目对应的挑战旗帜之后，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下于25分钟内击败金拉斯·铁眼、杰米诺斯队长和派罗图格·恩克拉迪斯，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 火焰野兽杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）黑德雷克庄园中击败65个烈焰蝾螈、火焰猎犬和火焰巨兽。

achievement.name: 真誓杀戮者
achievement.des: Defeat 200 True-Sworn Soldiers in Veteran  Black Drake Villa.

achievement.name: 两栖动物已被逮捕
achievement.des: Defeat Kinras Ironeye while preventing the Blazing Salamanders from casting their damage buff in Veteran Black Drake Villa.

achievement.name: 打破阵线
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）黑德雷克庄园中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败杰米诺斯队长。

achievement.name: 驱逐通知
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）黑德雷克庄园中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败金拉斯·铁眼。

achievement.name: 不痛不痒
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）黑德雷克庄园中，在没有任何小队成员在战斗期间被震地战栗命中的情况下，击败杰米诺斯队长。

achievement.name: 火蜥蜴接力
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）黑德雷克庄园中，在战斗中击杀至少10个洞穴蝾螈之后，击败派罗图格·恩克拉迪斯。

name: 大釜
mystery: 这座旧矿曾经是商人费利萨·文杜丰厚利润的来源，但在工人起义后，她放弃了这里。工人们坚持认为有声音从黑暗中传来。一阵低沉的吟诵声伴随着他们进入梦境，把他们中许多人逼疯了。从那以后，只有傻瓜才会进入这里。
des:
The Cauldron is a group dungeon in western Deshaan.
It is included in the Flames of Ambition DLC alongside Black Drake Villa. The entrance is located west of Narsis.
There is a small camp with two bedrolls, a backpack, a seasoning sack and a barrel located just northeast of the Cauldron, sitting against a large boulder. A copy of the lore book, Noxiphilic Sanguivoria, is sitting atop the barrel at this camp. A Dark Fissure spawns nearby.
Ash Hoppers, fetcherlies, fiendroths and rats are found in numbers within. Carts and Wheelbarrows yielding Bone, Crawlers, Gnawed Bone, Guts and Worms are scattered throughout the dungeon. Hazards include: Lava Pools, Taskmaster Snares

BOSS.name: 堕落的牛血
BOSS.des: Oxblood the Depraved is a giant armored Ogrim and the first boss of the Cauldron.

skills.name: 狠击
skills.des: Oxblood punches its target, dealing major physical damage.

skills.name: 屠夫
skills.des: Oxblood summons a chain shrouded in green mist from the ground every two seconds three consecutive times in a row. Each chain explodes to deal damage at the end of its lifespan. You'll take moderate physical damage if the chain is allowed to explode on you.

skills.name: 剧毒狂喷
skills.des: Oxblood belches clouds of green poison out in front of him, which fans out in five directions around him. If you stand in the poison, you'll take major poison damage.

skills.name: 钝击
skills.des: Oxblood takes two seconds to raise his meaty arms and pounds the ground in front of him, dealing devastating physical damage to anyone who stands within range of this attack.

skills.name: 呕吐
skills.des: Oxblood vomits, sending seven globs flying to the edge of the arena, which then animate. The green Bile Globs slowly crawl towards the boss, while the red Gore Globs spew projectiles at you.

skills.name: 异常消耗
skills.des: Oxblood runs over to the nearest Gore or Bile Glob and eats it, dealing moderate poison damage to you if you're nearby.. If he eats a Bile Glob, he'll restore some health. If he eats a Gore Glob, he becomes enraged, and his attacks deal more damage.

skills.name: 流血冲刺
skills.des: While Enraged, Oxblood may charge at you, dealing moderate physical damage.
In Veteran, Oxblood will occasionally point at a player before throwing an Iron Maiden over them, incapacitating them until the cage is destroyed by other party members.

BOSS.name: 使命之主维希娅
BOSS.des:
Taskmaster Viccia is a Xivilai found in the Howling Cavern section of the Cauldron. She serves as the second boss of the dungeon.
She wields a maul in combat. During the fight you will also need to avoid her traps.

skills.name: 迅捷打击
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 升天击
skills.des: Taskmaster Viccia winds up her hammer and strikes hard, dealing massive physical damage and knocking you back. This attack can be blocked to stagger Taskmaster Viccia instead.

skills.name: 鞭挞之链
skills.des: If you are far from her, Taskmaster Viccia pulls to her all players in the direction she is facing which deals moderate-high physical damage. This can be blocked to negate to pull.

skills.name: 释能
skills.des: Taskmaster Viccia rakes her hammer across the floor then slams it into the ground, causing a massive shockwave, dealing very high shock damage and knocking you back, indicated by a growing circular AoE. The area of the slam remains charged with electricity for a duration, dealing continuous high shock damage.

skills.name: 捕获
skills.des: Taskmaster Viccia raises her hammer to the sky, causing four (in normal mode) or six (in veteran mode) Taskmaster Snares to be applied in various spots of the arena, indicated by circular AoEs. Stepping in them causes an explosion that deals very high shock damage (Jolt). These can linger long enough that they will still exist when the next application occurs.

skills.name: 处决
skills.des: Taskmaster Viccia canalizes a lightning attack at a player that stuns them and cannot break free of it. If this isn't interrupted, the target is always dealt lethal shock damage.

BOSS.name: 熔火守护者
BOSS.des: The Molten Guardian is a large iron atronach that serves as the third boss of the Cauldron.

skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical and flame damage.

skills.name: 熔岩波
skills.des: The Molten Guardian rakes its hand into the lava and sends a wave of it towards you, indicated by a conal AoE, dealing high flame damage.

The Molten Guardian slams its hand into the ground at your location, indicated by a circular AoE around you, dealing very high physical damage. A lingering laval pool remains at the site of the impact for a duration, dealing moderate continuous flame damage.
The Molten Guardian opens up its core and fires a spree of fireballs into the arena, creating lingering flame fields, indicated by small circular AoEs, that deal continuous moderate flame damage.

The Molten Guardian's core begins to fume and he raises both hands into the air before slamming them down into the lava, causing a gigantic shockwave, dealing massive flame damage. The AoE of this attack is so large and grows so fast that dodging or blocking is the only viable option to negate the damage.

skills.name: 召唤侍灵
skills.des: During the encounter, the Molten Guardian will occasionally summon lesser Molten Fiends to assist.
The Molten Guardian plunges into the lava and repositions elsewhere around the edge of the arena, becoming invulnerable to damage for the duration.

BOSS.name: 佐德鲁斯男爵
BOSS.des: Baron Zaudrus is a Havocrel chieftain[1] summoned by the Order of the Waking Flame in the Cauldron and acts as the final boss for that dungeon. He seeks to consecrate the site with the blood of mortals.

skills.name: 敲击
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 重锤砸下
skills.des: Baron Zaudrus slams his hammer down on you swiftly, dealing high physical damage.

Baron Zaudrus cleaves you with his lightning-charged hammer, indicated by a conal AoE, dealing high shock damage. After the initial strike, a circular shock field is applied around you, dealing moderate continuous shock damage for a duration.

skills.name: 闪电一击
skills.des: Baron Zaudrus rakes his hammer into the ground before swinging it down at you fiercely, dealing very high physical damage. A Molten Pillar is then summoned from the impact point.

skills.name: 闪电爆裂
skills.des: If a Molten Pillar is left alive for long enough, Baron Zaudrus will walk over to it and shatter it with his hammer, sending out a shockwave from it, dealing very high flame damage, as well as leaving four lingering fire fields around where it used to be, indicated by circular AoEs, dealing moderate continuous flame damage.

skills.name: 瓦解
skills.des: Throughout the fight, bouts of flame will erupt at random throughout the arena, indicated by small and quickly growing circular AoEs, dealing high flame damage.

Baron Zaudrus plants his hammer into the ground and stomps on it, causing four lines of fire to burst from the central structure in the arena, and then start circling around the arena. You must move around with the boss to avoid being hit. Touching them inflicts very high flame damage.

skills.name: 召唤魔族
skills.des: Baron Zaudrus occasionally creates several portals from which watchlings come out from to assist him in the fight. Magma Daedroth will also appear if playing with Hard Mode enabled.

achievement.name: 野心之火探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入黑德雷克庄园或大釜。

achievement.name: 觉醒之焰样式大师
achievement.des: 学习觉醒之焰样式书的每一章，该样式书偶尔作为完成大釜地下城的奖励出现。

achievement.name: 大釜挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）大釜的成就。

achievement.name: 大釜征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）大釜中，击败堕落的牛血、使命之主维希娅、熔火守护者；解救丽兰斯；并击败佐德鲁斯男爵。

achievement.name: 挫败阴谋
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）大釜中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败佐德鲁斯男爵。

achievement.name: 不屈的正义
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）大釜中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，击败堕落的牛血、使命之主维希娅、熔火守护者，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人；解救丽兰斯；并击败佐德鲁斯男爵。

achievement.name: 心急火燎
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）大釜中，在进入后35分钟内，击败堕落的牛血、使命之主维希娅、熔火守护者，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人；解救丽兰斯；并击败佐德鲁斯男爵。当你遭遇第一批敌人时开始计时。

achievement.name: 野心之火斥候
achievement.des: 完成普通模式的黑德雷克庄园和大釜。

achievement.name: 大釜胜利者
achievement.des: 在大釜中，击败堕落的牛血、使命之主维希娅、熔火守护者；解救丽兰斯；并击败佐德鲁斯男爵。

achievement.name: 魔族破坏者
achievement.des: 在大釜中，组队状态下使用丽兰斯的冷焰灌注协同技摧毁100个熔火之柱。

achievement.name: 野心之火探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）黑德雷克庄园和大釜。

achievement.name: 地下粉碎者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）大釜中，在升起挑战旗帜之后以及没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在35分钟内击败堕落的牛血、使命之主维希娅、熔火守护者，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人；解救丽兰斯；并击败佐德鲁斯男爵。

achievement.name: 邪教徒杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）大釜中击败200个邪教徒。

achievement.name: 监视者杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）大釜中击败30个监视者。

achievement.name: 坚持到底
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）大釜中，在没有小队成员因灰烬口解体死亡的情况下，击败佐德鲁斯男爵。

achievement.name: 火幕
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）大釜中，在与熔火守护者战斗时，允许岩浆喷射连续喷射20秒不被打断。

achievement.name: 抓不住我！
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）大釜中，在队中无人触发陷阱的情况下击败使命之主维希娅。

achievement.name: 血球安全
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）大釜中，在不击杀任何血球的情况下，击败堕落的牛血。牛血不能使用异常消耗来消耗任何血球。

achievement.name: 杂乱大师
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）大釜中，在使用三个或以下数量的魔族催化液之后，解救丽兰斯。

name: 恐惧地牢
mystery: "There is no place in  I'd have rather seen that curdled, sump wizard, , condemned to than the Dread Cellar. While its hospitality might not be the equal to that of 's , it's a damnable pit I have visitation privileges to."—
des:
The Dread Cellar is a group dungeon in northern Blackwood.
It is one of two dungeons available with the Waking Flame DLC, the other being Red Petal Bastion.
The dungeon once served as a prison run by the Imperial Battlemages, but the facility was abandoned after the collapse of the Empire. It has recently been taken over by the Order of the Waking Flame and their Daedric allies, the Crimson Oath. Centipedes, dragonflies, fiendroth, rats and spiders are found in number within. Carts and Wheelbarrows yielding Bone, Crawlers, Gnawed Bone, Guts and Worms are scattered throughout the dungeon. Hazards include: Lava Pool, Dread Surges, maybe others

BOSS.name: 斯克里昂巢穴领主
BOSS.des:
The Scorion Broodlord is a Scorion found in the Dread Cellar. It acts as the first boss of the dungeon.
In Veteran mode, it has more frequent additional enemy spawns. You can stack up the boss along with the adds on top of the Agonymium Stone to make it easier, but be prepared for constant enemies and damage.

skills.name: 挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 碎击
skills.des: A charged melee attack that deals very high physical damage. This can be blocked, ideally by the tank.

skills.name: 动乱
skills.des: The Scorion Broodlord spews at its targets, indicated by a red cone, dealing continuous high poison damage. It can adjust where it spews on the go, so make sure the tank points the boss away and DPS/Healer are behind.

skills.name: 动乱洪流
skills.des: The Scorion Broodlord releases swirls of corrupted enemies from underneath itself, indicated by red circles, which shoot out in all directions, each dealing high magical damage. It can use this ability passively while performing other abilities.

skills.name: 剧痛咳喘
skills.des: The Scorion Broodlord pulls a target to itself using a red magical beam, and stuns them on the ground. Break Free cannot be used. From here, the boss savagely stabs at the trapped target with its pincers, dealing continuous high physical damage. The tank should be the one to deal with this. Prepare for this and save a defensive ultimate if needed.

skills.name: 苦难之石
skills.des: The Scorion Broodlord opens up a portal overhead and enters it, and re-emerges far away in the arena. Then, it conjures up an Agonymium Stone, from which it will draw energy from, granting itself a damage shield increasing in size until the stone is destroyed.

skills.name: 召唤
skills.des: Xivilai Ravagers and Xivilai Shockslayers are summoned in the arena throughout the fight.
Leaving the arena during the fight causes a pull effect, bringing everyone back in and severely damaging them.

BOSS.name: 克罗宁·阿尔特里安
BOSS.des:
Cyronin Artellian is an Imperial Waking Flame cultist that serves as the second boss of The Dread Cellar.
He is a disgraced Imperial Battlemage that was posted to the Cellar with Martus Tullius as an interrogator, and they both tortured many of the inmates to extract their memories. Unlike Martus, he enjoyed the work.
The Spire Council eventually abandoned the Cellar. Martus did not know what happened to Cyronin after he left, but tried to forget him. Cyronin stayed behind, and with the help of the Waking Flame, he is now overseeing the creation of the Antecedent Cataclyst.

skills.name: Shock
skills.des: A basic ranged attack dealing moderate shock damage.

skills.name: 挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing low physical damage.

skills.name: 法杖打击
skills.des: Cyronin Artellian performs a jumping attack with his staff, dealing high physical damage. This can be blocked.

skills.name: 闪电霆击
skills.des: Follow-up of "Staff Strike", regardless of if it landed or missed. A red circle appears on who was targeted previously, where a shocking bolt strikes down, dealing very high shock damage. Try to make it land away from other group members.

skills.name: 恐惧涌动
skills.des: Cyronin Artellian animates the Crystal Cathode on the arena's ceiling by shooting it with electrified orbs, which in turn causes waves of crimson energy to flow throughout the room. They navigate in quick successive waves, leaving only a short route to navigate around. Being touched by one deals massive magical damage. Counter by looking where Martus puts up a shield wall and lead the boss there.

skills.name: 灵魂风暴
skills.des: Cyronin Artellian raises his staff upwards, releasing large red skull projectiles from it at targets, each dealing massive magical damage. These must be dodged. Going further back will help with detection.

skills.name: 召唤闪电龙
skills.des: Cyronin Artellian summons a group of Boltwyrms nearby. These will tether to a specific target at random and need to be destroyed by whoever is tethered (even a tank) as they will take increasing damage and snares, which can make dodging "Dread Surge" harder.

skills.name: 召唤亡者
skills.des: Occasionally, Restless Dead will burrow out of the ground to harass the party.

skills.name: 召唤侍灵
skills.des: If the initial two Storm Atronachs have been slain, Cyronin Artellian will summon two more not long after.

BOSS.name: 岩浆化身
BOSS.des: The Magma Incarnate is a Ruinach that can be found in the Dread Cellar, acting as the final boss of the dungeon.

skills.name: Slice
skills.des: Basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.
A double-hitting basic ranged attack dealing moderate physical damage each.

skills.name: Frenzy
skills.des: The Magma Incarnate delivers two initial swings, dealing moderate physical damage each, and ends with a stronger cross swipe with all of its blades, dealing very high physical damage. The last strike can be blocked.

skills.name: 炼狱
skills.des: The Magma Incarnate infuses two of its blades, making them levitate in the air briefly, before slamming them down, conjuring two flaming tornadoes that then spin around for a duration, indicated by red circles, dealing continuous high flame damage each.

skills.name: Unstable Blitz
skills.des: The Magma Incarnate plants its blades into the ground and looks at targets, indicated by a deep tracking red rectangle. He then rakes the blades out, shooting a powerful flaming projectile from them which travels across the floor rapidly. The impact deal very high flame damage, and it applies a flame damage over time effect afterward. Dodge roll after roughly 3 seconds of the rectangle tracking to avoid it. The area where the Magma Incarnate is standing during this ability is also shrouded in a magma pool, indicated by a red circle, which deals continuous high flame damage if stood into.

skills.name: 不稳定脉冲
skills.des: The large machine in the center of the arena overloads, sending out a pulse of dark red energy, indicated by a massive growing red circle that covers half of the arena, dealing massive magical damage.

skills.name: 消耗
skills.des: Upon reaching 65% and 35% health, the Magma Incarnate covers itself in dark red energy and becomes invulnerable, while releasing crimson shockwaves that each deal very high magical damage. At the same time, Lucilla Caprenia calls out from the northern side of the arena, and opens up a portal that leads to the Agonymium Stone that is protecting the boss. Head inside to destroy it, but the stone will be guarded by enemies and hazards, which vary depending on which room the party is led into. Regardless of the room however, a Scorion Collector will appear inside to feed on the stone. If the stone isn't destroyed in time, when returning to the boss, the empowered Scorion Collector will follow along, making the fight more difficult.

skills.name: 召唤
skills.des: Scamps will pour into the arena during the fight to assist the boss.

skills.name: 永恒烈焰
skills.des: On Hard Mode, additional tornadoes, similar to "Inferno", will constantly rotate around the arena while all side by side and leaving only a small gap to navigate through. Getting hit by it deals continuous very high flame damage.

achievement.name: 觉醒之焰探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入红花堡或恐惧地牢。

achievement.name: 猩红誓言样式大师
achievement.des: 学习猩红誓言样式书的每一章，该样式书偶尔作为完成恐惧地牢地下城的奖励出现。

achievement.name: 恐惧地牢挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）恐惧地牢的成就。

achievement.name: 恐惧地牢征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐惧地牢击败斯克里昂巢穴领主、克罗宁·阿尔特里安和岩浆化身。

achievement.name: 毫不动摇
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐惧地牢放置挑战旗帜后击败岩浆化身。

achievement.name: 缓期行刑
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在（老兵模式）恐惧地牢击败斯克里昂巢穴领主、克罗宁·阿尔特里安、岩浆化身以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 恐怖猛冲
achievement.des: 在进入（老兵模式）恐惧地牢后的25分钟内，击败斯克里昂巢穴领主、克罗宁·阿尔特里安、岩浆化身以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。计时将从你遇到第一批敌人开始。

achievement.name: 觉醒之焰斥候
achievement.des: 完成普通模式的红花堡和恐惧地牢。

achievement.name: 恐惧地牢胜利者
achievement.des: 在恐惧地牢击败斯克里昂巢穴领主、克罗宁·阿尔特里安和岩浆化身。

achievement.name: 奥术分析师
achievement.des: 完成红花堡和恐惧地牢中的可选内容。

achievement.name: 炼狱已净化
achievement.des: 在恐惧地牢的战斗中击败炼狱者，获得召唤它的技能。

achievement.name: 致命殡葬
achievement.des: 在恐惧地牢的战斗中击败送葬者，获得召唤它的技能。

achievement.name: 守望者已受亡
achievement.des: 在恐惧地牢的战斗中击败冷酷守望者，获得召唤它的技能。

achievement.name: 破碎安息
achievement.des: 在恐惧地牢与克罗宁·阿尔特里安交战时，组队共同消灭200个不肯安息的亡者。

achievement.name: 觉醒之焰探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）红花堡和恐惧地牢。

achievement.name: 战场尖塔最强者
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在进入（老兵模式）恐惧地牢后的25分钟内放置挑战旗帜，然后击败斯克里昂巢穴领主、克罗宁·阿尔特里安、岩浆化身以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 魔人杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐惧地牢击败200个魔人。

achievement.name: 斯克里昂杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐惧地牢击败50个斯克里昂和创痛之石。

achievement.name: 甘心吃苦
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐惧地牢放置挑战旗帜后，击败斯克里昂巢穴领主。

achievement.name: 折磨折磨者
achievement.des: Defeat the Cyronin Artellian after placing the challenge banner in Veteran Dread Cellar.

achievement.name: 荒谬的优先级
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐惧地牢的每一块石头都被击碎且没有希维莱活着的情况下，破坏4块创痛之石，然后击败斯克里昂巢穴领主。

achievement.name: 解决纷争
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐惧地牢放置挑战旗帜后，让斯克里昂被岩浆化身的不稳定闪击击中10次。

achievement.name: 无畏奔行者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐惧地牢中不被恐惧涌动打到的情况下击败克罗宁·阿尔特里安。

achievement.name: 围烬起舞
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐惧地牢中，穿越岩浆化身的永恒之火而不被击中15秒，获得15层烈焰舞者。

achievement.name: 减轻痛苦
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐惧地牢至少摧毁一次被岩浆化身吸引的所有创痛之石。

name: 红花堡
mystery: 红花堡不是银玫瑰骑士团第一个权力中心，却是作为最后一个被建造出来的。其拥有一个王国的国库可以购买到的所有防御设施，有了堡垒，骑士团在歼灭魔族的大小征战中所获的战利品，就能安全地留在他们手中。
des:
Red Petal Bastion is a group dungeon in northeast Glenumbra.
It is one of two dungeons available with the Waking Flame DLC, the other being the Dread Cellar.
It is inhabited by the Knights of the Silver Rose, an order dedicated to ridding the world of Daedric corruption. They have amassed a vast collection of Daedric artifacts, which have corrupted the knights. Now, the order's strongest warriors wield the relics they once sought to lock away.
Beetles, Centipedes and Rats are found in numbers within.

BOSS.name: 狡猾的洛格兰
BOSS.des: Rogerain the Sly is an insane Breton found in the Red Petal Bastion. He acts as the first boss of Red Petal Bastion.

skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage. Rogerain the Sly can change weapons on the fly during combat.
A basic melee attack dealing high physical damage. Rogerain the Sly can change weapons on the fly during combat.
A basic ranged attack dealing moderate poison damage. Rogerain the Sly can change weapons on the fly during combat.

Rogerain the Sly leaps into the air and slams his greatsword into the ground, creating four swirls of chaotic magic to fly outward from the impact site, dealing high magical damage. These don't have AoE indicators.

skills.name: 难言之虚无
skills.des: Rogerain the Sly creates a dark portal into the floor of the arena, indicated by a large circular AoE. Standing in the portal deals continuous moderate magical damage. The portal itself will constantly spew out purple magical orbs in all directions, indicated by smaller circular AoEs, dealing high magical damage. Every once in a while, a golden Sweetroll will also get tossed into the arena, which is required for the Belly Buster ability.

skills.name: 破肚者
skills.des: Rogerain the Sly grabs hold of you, rendering you immobile, then turns you into a goat, making you unable to perform attacks. To return to human form, you must eat ten sweetrolls. Each sweetroll eaten reduces your movement speed while in goat form. If there are any sweetrolls left while out of goat form, they can be used before they disappear to regain health.
Rogerain activates a Gate of Chaos, which summons random enemies into the arena to assist in the fight. These can include Chaos Spiders, death hoppers and watchers.

BOSS.name: 神器承器者
BOSS.des: The Artifact Bearers are members of Knights of the Silver Rose who have been chosen by Prior Thierric Sarazen to wield the daedric artifacts Duplici Gladio, Groundsplitters, and the Opal Charm. They serve as the second boss in Red Petal Bastion each one having their own skills an abilities. After they are defeated, Prior Thierric will loot the artifacts from their bodies, declaring his subordinates unworthy of them.

BOSS.name: 骑士长谢里克·沙拉赞
BOSS.des:
Prior Thierric Sarazen is a Breton found in the Red Petal Bastion. He is the knight-commander of the Knights of the Silver Rose, and acts as the final boss of the dungeon.
His abilities are based on the artifacts he has equipped: The Duplici Gladio, Groundsplitters, and the Opal Charm.

skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 横劈
skills.des: The Prior performs a wide sword cleave, indicated by a large conical AoE, dealing high physical attack.

skills.name: 凶恶飞踢
skills.des: A melee heavy attack where the boss will kick whoever holds aggro. If taunted this should just be the tank. He shares this ability with Eliam Merick.

skills.name: 幻影穿刺
skills.des: The boss will teleport to one of the four corners of the room and target a random player (indicated by a red target under their feet) with a channeled attack, if he is not interrupted he will kill that player with an opal sword though them.

skills.name: 兵刃投影
skills.des: He will slam his sword into the ground and each player will gain a kite as blades will follow them around the room. These blades will likely kill a non-tank in hard mode.

The Prior has an augmented version of Eliam Meric's Golden Stomp ability. He performs it in the same way, but his version includes four magical shield walls that travel across the arena after he has performed the charge, dealing very high magical damage and staggering you.

The Prior becomes rooted in place and swings his greatsword around, as dark red magic appears beneath him, indicated by a circular AoE, dealing high magical damage. The more the spin goes on, more similar dark red swirls propagate throughout the arena, and will linger for an extended duration after the Prior is done swinging his sword.
The Prior periodically summons allies into the arena to assist him. They are comprised of Silver Rose Realmshapers and Relic Fiends.

achievement.name: 觉醒之焰探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入红花堡或恐惧地牢。

achievement.name: 银玫瑰样式大师
achievement.des: 学习银玫瑰样式书的每一章，该样式书偶尔作为完成红花堡地下城的奖励出现。

achievement.name: 红花堡挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）红花堡的成就。

achievement.name: 红花堡征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）红花堡击败狡猾的洛格兰、神器承器者和骑士长谢里克·沙拉赞。

achievement.name: 骑士长进攻
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）红花堡放置挑战旗帜后，击败骑士长谢里克·沙拉赞。

achievement.name: 毫发未损的胜利
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在（老兵模式）红花堡击败狡猾的洛格兰、神器承器者、骑士长谢里克·沙拉赞以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 世上最短攻城战
achievement.des: 在进入（老兵模式）红花堡后的25分钟内，击败狡猾的洛格兰、神器承器者、骑士长谢里克·沙拉赞以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。计时将从你遇到第一批敌人开始。

achievement.name: 觉醒之焰斥候
achievement.des: 完成普通模式的红花堡和恐惧地牢。

achievement.name: 红花堡胜利者
achievement.des: 在红花堡击败狡猾的洛格兰、神器承器者和骑士长谢里克·沙拉赞。

achievement.name: 奥术分析师
achievement.des: 完成红花堡和恐惧地牢中的可选内容。

achievement.name: 智慧回响
achievement.des: 进入并从红花堡的戈瑟利·莫拉比诺那里获得水晶灵魂阿格亚。

achievement.name: 生命回响
achievement.des: 进入并从红花堡的戈瑟利·莫拉比诺那里获得水晶灵魂安雅。

achievement.name: 死亡回响
achievement.des: 进入并从红花堡的戈瑟利·莫拉比诺那里获得水晶灵魂纳迦亚。

achievement.name: 觉醒之焰探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）红花堡和恐惧地牢。

achievement.name: 棱堡破坏者
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在进入（老兵模式）红花堡后的25分钟内放置挑战旗帜，然后击败狡猾的洛格兰、神器承器者、骑士长谢里克·沙拉赞以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 塑域者杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）红花堡打败50个银玫瑰塑域者。

achievement.name: 银玫瑰杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）红花堡打败200个银玫瑰骑士和圣遗物魔鬼。
在（老兵模式）红花堡放置挑战旗帜后，击败狡猾的洛格兰。

achievement.name: 花瓣、茎梗与荆棘
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）红花堡放置挑战旗帜后，击败于连·梅里克、伊胡迪尔和里拉门德雷尔。
Have a member of your group acquire 25 stacks of Buck Wild while fighting Rogerain the Sly in Veteran Red Petal Bastion.

achievement.name: 不羁步法
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）红花堡中，在与神器承器者的单次遭遇战中触发至少40个陷阱。

achievement.name: 致命重击步舞
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）红花堡避开骑士长谢里克·沙拉赞复制品的所有岩崩突击。

name: 珊瑚鹫巢
location: North of Summerset, accessed by boat north of Veyond Wyte Wayshrine
mystery: “这座远离夏暮岛海岸的宁静小岛有着高高的悬崖和深邃的潮池，那里是各种海洋生物、候鸟甚至大型捕食者的繁殖地。我建议所有的自然观察都要在安全的船上进行。”——马瑞萨船长
des:
Coral Aerie is an islet located off the northern coast of Summerset, accessed by taking a boat on the beach north of the Veyond Wyte Wayshrine.
The Ascendant Order has established a cell there, where they are training and bolstering their ranks with gryphons in secret.
It is included in the Ascending Tide DLC alongside Shipwright's Regret.
An Alinor Ringtail, dragonflies, fleshflies, frogs, herons, lizards, a Tangerine Dragon Frog and torchbugs are found in numbers within. Hazards include: Slaughterfish

BOSS.name: 马里伽利格
BOSS.des: Maligalig is a Yaghra Monstrosity that serves as the first boss of Coral Aerie.

skills.name: 利爪打击
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 双重打击
skills.des: Maligalig spreads its pincers apart from its chest, then plunges them down at you, one after the other, dealing very high physical damage with each hit. This attack can be blocked.
Maligalig slams its shell into the ground, creating a powerful shockwave, dealing high physical damage. This attack has no AoE indicator.

skills.name: 风暴前线
skills.des: Maligalig raises both of its claws in the air, which summons a storm that follows your movement, indicated by a large circular AoE, dealing continuous high shock damage. The only way to dispel the storm is to move into another AoE that spawns nearby, in the shape of a larger circle with an empty spot in the middle.

skills.name: 漩涡
skills.des: At 70% and 40% health, Maligalig rushes over to the center of the arena and floods the arena with turbulent water, which sweeps you away while inside. You must use the "Surging Waters" synergy to launch yourself to all three sides of the arena and defeat the Yaghra there, which every group is led by a singular Ripple of Maligalig. Once all are dead, the ability ceases and Maligalig becomes open to attacks once more. Being in the turbulent water doesn't inflict damage.
Yaghra Larvae and Yaghra Larva Poppers will spawn from several whirlpools in the arena all throughout the fight to assist Maligalig.

BOSS.name: 萨利迪尔
BOSS.des: Sarydil is a High Elf member of the Ascendant Order. She is second in command for the group that can be found in the Coral Aerie. She serves as the second boss of the dungeon.

skills.name: 敲击
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 传送打击
skills.des: Sarydil teleports to your location and strikes you with her daggers, dealing high physical damage.
Sarydil puts her daggers in front of herself, before fanning them out at you, dealing very high physical damage and knocking you down. This attack can be blocked.

skills.name: 猛冲
skills.des: Sarydil begins to glow with pink mist, before she dashes away from you in the arena, throwing magical daggers on her way there, leaving lingering pools of magic where they land, indicated by a large amount of lingering circular AoEs, dealing continuous high magical damage. This attack is always followed by Dagger Throw.
Sarydil empties her arsenal daggers at you throwing a large amount back to back, dealing high physical damage each. This attack can be interrupted.
An alternate version of the above ability. Instead of throwing the daggers directly at you, she throws them near your location, creating similar lingering magical fields as in the Dash ability.

skills.name: 火焰爆弹
skills.des: Sarydil lobs a fire bomb at you. The explosion is indicated by a large circular AoE and deals very high flame damage. After the explosion, four smaller circular AoEs appear, marking lingering fire fields around the blast radius, dealing continuous high flame damage.

An alternate version of the above ability. Instead of throwing the fire bomb directly at you, Sarydil jumps into the air and spins around as she throws several smaller fire bombs all over the arena, creating similar lingering fire fields as in the regular Fire Bomb ability. This attack is always followed by Flame Wave.

skills.name: 火焰冲波
skills.des: Sarydil winds up her dagger before planting it into the ground, causing a massive wave of fire to erupt from it, indicated by a quickly growing very large circular AoE, dealing very high flame damage.

skills.name: 翻滚闪避
skills.des: Sarydil can perform a dodge to avoid a singular attack.

skills.name: 后撤
skills.des: At 75% and 45% health, Sarydil retreats to the upper level of the arena and calls in Ascendant reinforcements to come down and fight you in her stead. During this time, she will continue to use the Magic Dagger Throw ability while she is up above. The second wave at 45% is led by an Ascendant Bulwark.

skills.name: 暗影腾跃
skills.des: After the reinforcements are defeated, Sarydil returns to the arena, in the form of a leap preceded by shadow pools appearing all over the arena before exploding, indicated by growing and overlapping circular AoEs, dealing high magical damage each.

A new ability gained after the 75% threshold. Sarydil splits into around a dozen clones spaced out all along the edge of the arena, who then proceed to use the Dagger Throw ability all at the same time against you. While they are all displayed with the same amount of health and same rank as the boss, the clones will die in one hit. Any remaining clones are dispelled if the real Sarydil is hit.

BOSS.name: 瓦拉利昂
BOSS.des: Varallion is a High Elf and leader of the Ascendant Order cell that can be found on Coral Aerie. He is also a former member of the Veiled Heritance who would attack ships in Altmeri waters with his trained gryphons, Iliata, Kargaeda, Mafremare and Ofallo.

skills.name: 抹杀
skills.des: Varallion will heavy attack whoever has taunt. This attack must be blocked; if dodge rolled, all players will be knocked off their feet and take damage from the resulting blast.

skills.name: 聚结阴影
skills.des: Varallion will summon shadows under the players' feet that follow them around. On normal or veteran, only one player will be affected at a time; on Hard Mode, all players will be affected. The shadows do damage over time over several seconds, and after the timer has run out, will deposit a swirling pool of shadow on the ground. This pool of shadow will do damage to anyone who steps in it until it vanishes after a certain amount of time has passed. Standing on the pool of shadow will also give the player a debuff which will cause their damage taken from the pools to increase until they have avoided standing in them for 15 seconds.

Varallion summons waves (one on normal/veteran, two on Hard Mode) in a random pattern across the floor. This will happen three times per activation of this ability. These waves are telegraphed and anyone in their AOE must step out of them, or they will be instantly killed when the wave spawns.

skills.name: 海洋魔球
skills.des: Varallion will summon a sea orb from the lagoon which will target a random player who is not holding taunt on him. The orb will begin to float in their direction more rapidly over time and, if not destroyed, will explode on the targeted player, damaging them and anyone else within a certain radius.

skills.name: 意识链结
skills.des: On Hard Mode, Varallion will periodically link two random players together with a purple tether that lasts for around 30 seconds. This tether causes a small amount of damage over time to both players effected by it. If the link is broken in any way, both tethered players will die. This will happen if either tethered player dies or if any other player touches the tether, in which case it will explode, killing both linked players and whatever player touched the tether instantly.

skills.name: 食人鱼攻击
skills.des: If you stray from the island in the middle of the lagoon you will be attacked by Slaughterfish.

At around 95%, 80%, and 60%, Varallion will summon a random gryphon, either Mafremare, Ofallo, or Iliata. The gryphon will land at a random spot on the edge of the arena. Gryphons can overlap if the boss is burned too quickly.

skills.name: 持续涌动
skills.des: Ofallo will periodically apply an electrical current to whoever currently holds its taunt. The current applies a heal absorption effect to its target and reduces healing done by the target by 90%. Once the target has been healed enough, the lingering current will break.

skills.name: 旋风
skills.des: Once landed, Mafremare will summon two whirlwinds which circle around its body. Any player standing in the whirlwind will take a large amount of damage from it, therefore it is best to stand away from Mafremare or close enough to it that the whirlwind passes behind the player. These whirlwinds are dispelled upon Mafremare's death.

skills.name: 闪电风暴
skills.des: Once landed, Iliata will summon a large circular moving ground AOE that will follow one player at a time around the arena. Any player who stands in this lightning storm will take a rapidly increasing amount of damage over time until their death. This storm will disappear upon Iliata's death, or if enough time has passed, after which Iliata will summon another.

skills.name: 旋风电火花
skills.des: Iliata summons blasts of lightning on each player that must be kited; otherwise the lightning blasts will do rapidly increasing damage on the player. Cyclonic Spark is only active when Lightning Storm is currently present on the floor and stops upon Iliata's death.

skills.name: 卡尔盖达
skills.des: On Hard Mode, at 30%, Varallion summons his final gryphon, Kargaeda. Varallion then becomes invulnerable until Kargaeda has been killed. Kargaeda summons a cyclone in the middle of the room, spawning lines of lightning that rotate around the arena similar to Molag Kena's fight in White Gold Tower. Unlike the other gryphons' mechanics, once Kargaeda is killed, this storm remains throughout execute.

achievement.name: 潮起探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入珊瑚鹫巢或船工之憾地牢。

achievement.name: 飞升教团样式大师
achievement.des: 学习飞升教团样式书的每一章，该样式书通过击败珊瑚鹫巢的最终BOSS获得。

achievement.name: 珊瑚鹫巢挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）珊瑚鹫巢的成就。

achievement.name: 珊瑚鹫巢征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）珊瑚鹫巢击败马里伽利格、萨利迪尔和瓦拉利昂。

achievement.name: 上乘血统
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）珊瑚鹫巢放置挑战旗帜后，击败瓦拉利昂。

achievement.name: 硬汉
achievement.des: Defeat all encounters in addition to Maligalig, Sarydil, and Varallion in Veteran Coral Aerie without suffering a party member death.

achievement.name: 鹫巢滑翔者
achievement.des: Defeat all encounters in addition to Maligalig, Sarydil, and Varallion within 25 minutes of entering Veteran Coral Aerie. Your timer starts upon engaging first group of enemies.

achievement.name: 潮起斥候
achievement.des: 完成普通模式的珊瑚鹫巢和船工之憾地牢。

achievement.name: 海上侦探
achievement.des: 完成珊瑚鹫巢和船工之憾地牢的可选内容。

achievement.name: 珊瑚鹫巢胜利者
achievement.des: 在珊瑚鹫巢击败马里伽利格、萨利迪尔和瓦拉利昂。

achievement.name: 绕啊绕啊绕
achievement.des: 在珊瑚鹫巢与马里伽利格的战斗中，利用漩涡前行两公里。

achievement.name: 珊瑚合约
achievement.des: 收集鹫巢珊瑚中所有能获取的盟约

achievement.name: 潮起探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）珊瑚鹫巢和船工之憾地牢。

achievement.name: 单刀制胜
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）珊瑚鹫巢放置挑战旗帜后，击败马里伽利格、萨利迪尔和瓦拉利昂，且未获得任何取自于盟约的助力。

achievement.name: 陆地、空中与海洋霸权
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在进入（老兵模式）珊瑚鹫巢后的25分钟内放置挑战旗帜，然后击败马里伽利格、萨利迪尔、瓦拉利昂以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。计时将从你遇到第一批敌人开始。

achievement.name: 狮鹫杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）珊瑚鹫巢击败50只狮鹫。

achievement.name: 深海怪杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）珊瑚鹫巢击败200只深海怪。

achievement.name: 压制前线
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）珊瑚鹫巢的战斗中击败马里伽利格，同时不让风暴前线持续超过5秒。

achievement.name: 夏暮岛保护协会
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）珊瑚鹫巢击败萨利迪尔，同时不让她打碎房间内的任何石柱。

achievement.name: 至高飞溅斗士
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）珊瑚鹫巢与瓦拉利昂战斗期间，5秒内摧毁两个及以上的海洋魔球。

achievement.name: 触手碎肉锤
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）珊瑚鹫巢中，组队共同用触手打击敌人250次。

achievement.name: 球体吞噬器
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）珊瑚鹫巢收集30个炼金珠。

achievement.name: 甲壳动物开壳者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）珊瑚鹫巢放置挑战旗帜后，击败马里伽利格。

achievement.name: 不够机灵
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）珊瑚鹫巢放置挑战旗帜后击败萨利迪尔

achievement.name: 刑期已满
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）难度下的珊瑚鹫巢深处找到囚犯并将其释放。

name: 船工之憾地牢
mystery: 据说，本杜·奥洛男爵上将为了与蛞蝓人开战，不惜一切代价去准备他的混杂舰队。一些学者声称，他雇佣了泰姆瑞尔足足四分之三的造船工人，同时还配备了全旗海军，以应对瑟拉斯周围的危险水域。
des:
Shipwright's Regret is a shipyard located in eastern Rivenspire, east of Fell's Run. During the time of the Thrassian Plague, it became one of the shipyards responsible for building ships for the nascent All Flags Navy. At some point afterwards, it was abandoned and now it is a dismal, haunted place. It is included in the Ascending Tide DLC alongside Coral Aerie.
Centipedes, frogs, rats, spiders and torchbugs are found in numbers within. Hazards include Slaughterfish.

BOSS.name: 布拉迪干工头
BOSS.des: Foreman Bradiggan is a spectral wraith who can be found at the lumber yard of Shipwright's Regret. He acts as the first boss of the dungeon.

skills.des: A basic range attack dealing high magical damage.
Foreman Bradiggan forms an orb of soul magic and tosses it at you, exploding on impact, dealing massive magical damage. This attack can be blocked.

Foreman Bradiggan lurches forward before dashing ahead at full speed, indicated by a long rectangular AoE, dealing very high physical damage. Harrowing Haunters and Skeletal Flame Shapers are summoned in its wake.

Foreman Bradiggan overloads itself with soul magic before releasing it in the form of four magical tornadoes going outward from his position, indicated by large traveling AoEs, dealing very high magical damage and staggering you.

skills.name: 附身
skills.des: At 60%/30% health, Foreman Bradiggan teleports away, summons a powerful flesh colossus and enters its body to hide from you. You must slay the colossus in order to make Foreman Bradiggan vulnerable to damage again.

BOSS.name: 娜扎莱
BOSS.des:
Nazaray is a spriggan that serves as the second boss of Shipwright's Regret, found at the Reclaimed Logging Camp. During the fight, two different add monsters will spawn: the Giant Body Snatcher Wasp and the Kindred Spirit.
It is also the namesake of the Nazaray set and the basis of a trophy, bust, and style; however, it does not drop any of them, as they are instead obtained from killing the final boss Captain Numirril.

skills.name: 法杖打击
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing high physical damage.
Nazaray twirls her staff in hands before slamming down on you hard with it, dealing massive physical damage. This attack can be blocked.

skills.name: 虫群之雨
skills.des: Nazaray beckons to the sky as large poison clusters begin to fall all over the arena, indicated by growing AoEs, dealing high poison damage each.

skills.name: 无拘荒魂
skills.des: Nazaray casts a spell that produces trails of red magic across the floor, culminating in the summoning of three Kindred Spirits at each opposite ends of the arena. They will follow by performing attacks that cover most of the arena with conal AoEs, dealing very high magical damage until they are killed.

skills.name: 烧尽
skills.des: Upon reaching 60% health, Nazaray briefly becomes engulfed with dark energy, causing large pools of corrupted magic to be applied on the arena floor as she moves, as well as smaller magical bursts to shoot out to the sides, indicated by large static and small moving AoEs respectively, dealing high magical damage each. This effect lasts until she is slain.
Nazaray periodically summons Giant Body Snatcher Wasps to assist her.

skills.name: 召唤木傀儡
skills.des: Nazaray periodically summons Luchhers to assist her.

skills.name: 无拘荒魂
skills.des: Nazaray casts a spell that produces trails of red magic across the floor, culminating in the summoning of Four Kindred Spirits in a square pattern in the arena. They will follow by performing attacks that cover most of the arena with conal AoEs, dealing very high magical damage until they are killed.

BOSS.name: 队长努米利尔
BOSS.des:
Captain Numirril is a Maormer pirate and a captain of the Dreadsails. He is a powerful water magic user. You will encounter him in the Derelict Shipyard section of Shipwright's Regret, where he acts as the final boss of the dungeon.
He has a rare chance to drop the antiquity lead for the Rune-scribed Braces mythic item fragment for Syrabane's Ward.

skills.name: 迅捷打击
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.
Captain Numirril rises up on a water spout, then comes swinging down on you with his sword, dealing massive physical damage. This attack can be blocked.

skills.name: 喷射
skills.des: Captain Numirril suddenly dashes across the screen while riding a water spout, indicated by a circular AoE beneath him, dealing high physical damage and staggering you. This often leads into Spout.
Captain Numirril swats his hand in front of himself, summoning a wave of water in a wide area before him, indicated by a wide conal AoE, dealing high physical damage.

skills.name: 水柱
skills.des: Captain Numirril summons numerous large water spouts back to back close to each other, tracking close behind your movement, indicated by circular AoEs, dealing high physical damage each.

skills.name: 飞溅
skills.des: Upon reaching 80%/40%, Captain Numirril dashes outside of the arena and rests on a tall water spout, overlooking the arena, becoming invulnerable to incoming damage. He then summons large roiling water waves across the arena, indicated by massive circular AoEs, dealing very high physical damage and knocking you back if hit.

While still outside of the arena, Captain Numirril summons a horde of drowned enemies, comprising of Drowned Hulks, the main threat, along with Drowned Corpses and Drowned Fiends. Captain Numirril will eventually return to the arena even if the adds aren't all killed. The drowned zombies will spew bile all over the arena.

skills.name: 胆汁爆裂
skills.des: Captain Numirril causes the lingering bile applied onto the arena from the drowned in the previous summoning to explode in succession, indicated by large growing circular AoEs, dealing high poison damage each.

skills.name: 溺毙
skills.des: A column of water will lift the player with aggro up unless blocked or dodged. It cannot be broken free from.

achievement.name: 潮起探险家
achievement.des: 首次进入珊瑚鹫巢或船工之憾地牢。

achievement.name: 恐帆样式大师
achievement.des: 学习恐帆样式书的每一章，该样式书通过击败船工之憾的最终BOSS获得。

achievement.name: 船工之憾挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）船工之憾的成就。

achievement.name: 船工之憾征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）船工之憾地牢中击败布拉迪干工头、娜扎莱和队长努米利尔。

achievement.name: 驶离
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）船工之憾地牢放置挑战旗帜后，击败努米利尔队长。

achievement.name: 井然有序
achievement.des: Defeat all encounters in addition to Foreman Bradiggan, Nazaray, and Captain Numirril without suffering a party member death in Veteran Shipwright's Regret.

achievement.name: 船坞冲刺
achievement.des: Defeat all encounters in addition to Foreman Bradiggan, Nazaray, and Captain Numirril within 25 minutes of entering Shipwright's Regret. Your timer starts upon engaging the first group of enemies.

achievement.name: 潮起斥候
achievement.des: 完成普通模式的珊瑚鹫巢和船工之憾地牢。

achievement.name: 海上侦探
achievement.des: 完成珊瑚鹫巢和船工之憾地牢的可选内容。

achievement.name: 船工之憾胜利者
achievement.des: 在船工之憾地牢中击败布拉迪干工头、娜扎莱和队长努米利尔。

achievement.name: 最后的道别
achievement.des: 在船工之憾地牢中获得安抚全部3个受难灵魂的助益。

achievement.name: 潮起探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）珊瑚鹫巢和船工之憾地牢。

achievement.name: 无灵以助
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）船工之憾地牢放置挑战旗帜后，击败布拉迪干工头、娜扎莱和努米利尔队长，且未通过平息受折磨的灵魂而获得助力。

achievement.name: 无悔
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在进入（老兵模式）船工之憾后的25分钟内放置挑战旗帜，然后击败布拉迪干工头、娜扎莱、努米利尔队长以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。计时将从你遇到第一批敌人开始。

achievement.name: 海精灵杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）船工之憾地牢中击败200个海精灵。
在（老兵模式）船工之憾地牢中击败50个木傀儡。

achievement.name: 集体击打
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）船工之憾地牢放置挑战旗帜后，击败布拉迪干工头。

achievement.name: 猫抓柱后事
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）船工之憾地牢放置挑战旗帜后击败娜扎莱。

achievement.name: 短途
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）船工之憾地牢中，竞技场每个角落的墓碑附近杀死一个鬼魂，然后再击败布拉迪干工头。

achievement.name: 风雨无阻野营家
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）船工之憾地牢中，避免受到虫群之雨和清算的伤害，然后再击败娜扎莱。

achievement.name: 浑身湿透
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）船工之憾地牢与队长努米利尔的战斗中，在一次遭遇战中被淋湿3次。

achievement.name: 安全港
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）船工之憾地牢的竞技场中使用不超过10个胆池来击败队长努米利尔。

name: 地根飞地
location: East of the Colossus, South of Spire of the Crimson CoinEntrance between Castle Navire Wayshrine and Coral Road Wayshrine
mystery: “地根飞地欢迎所有希望能够与石、根和气的灵体交流的德鲁伊。来吧，重新与耶弗尔连通，获得宁静。”——大德鲁伊索内蕾
des:
Earthen Root Enclave is an islet located off the southeast coast of High Isle, reached from a ship west of the Coral Road Wayshrine. It is a meeting place for druids from all three Circles in the Systres Archipelago, and several nature spirits reside there. It is included in the Lost Depths DLC alongside Graven Deep.
Found in numbers are Butterflies, rabbits, squirrels and torchbugs in the outside areas and cave jellies and shroom bettles in the cave section.

BOSS.name: 腐化之石
BOSS.des: The Corruption of Stone (originally the Spirit of Stone) is nature spirt that resides in the Earthen Root Enclave on the Dais of Stonesight. It has been corrupted by the Firesong Druids lead by Archdruid Devyric. Its appearance resembles a Storm Atronach that lacks any lightning.

BOSS.name: 腐化之根
BOSS.des:
The Corruption of Root (originally the Spirit of Root) is a nature spirit who takes a form resembling a Druidic Wispmother. She is found at the Dais of Rootspeak within the Deeproot at the of the Earthen Root Enclave. This spirit was corrupted by the invading Firesong Druids who are lead by Archdruid Devyric.
The Corruption of Root serves as the second boss of this dungeon.

skills.des: At roughly 66% and 33% of her health, the spirit will retreat into the ground and summon three Distributary doppelgängers. They will take her place and must be defeated before you can fight her again.

skills.name: 根须感染
skills.des: When a Distributary is killed, green orbs are launched towards all players and apply a stack of "Root Infection". Root Infection deals moderate flame damage over 10 seconds and each stack increases the damage. Getting a stack refreshes the duration.
The Corruption of Root summons Fauns during the fight.

BOSS.name: 大德鲁伊德维里克
BOSS.des: Archdruid Devyric is a Breton archdruid of the Firesong Circle. He has the ability to shapeshift into an Ursauk at will. Devyric came to Earthen Root Enclave to steal the Stonelore Circle's sacred seed. You must chase him into the Deeproot and all the way to the Path of the Salt Wind, where he will absorb the island's Spirit of Air and attack. He serves as the dungeon's final boss.

achievement.name: 失落深渊探险家
achievement.des: 初次进入地根飞地或铭深岛。

achievement.name: 耶弗尔的意志样式大师
achievement.des: Learn every chapter in the Y'ffre's Will style book, acquired by defeating the final boss in Earthen Root Enclave.

achievement.name: 地根飞地挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）地根飞地的成就。

achievement.name: 地根飞地征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）地根飞地中，击败腐化之石、腐化之根和大德鲁伊德维里克。

achievement.name: 地根复仇者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）地根飞地中放置挑战旗帜后，击败大德鲁伊德维里克。

achievement.name: 迅猛反击
achievement.des: 在进入（老兵模式）难度地根飞地的25分钟内，击败腐化之石、腐化之根、大德鲁伊德维里克以及其他所有遇到的敌人。计时将从你遇到第一批敌人开始。

achievement.name: 顽强英雄
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在（老兵模式）地根飞地中，击败腐化之石、腐化之根、大德鲁伊德维里克以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 地根飞地勇士
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）地根飞地的成就。

achievement.name: 焱歌德鲁伊杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）地根飞地中，击败200个焱歌德鲁伊。

achievement.name: 木傀儡和移植生物杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）地根飞地中，击败50个木傀儡和移植生物。

achievement.name: 生动活泼的战士
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）地根飞地中，击败腐化之石，且没有玩家被石化。

achievement.name: 大师级石匠
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）难度的地根飞地中，摧毁在与腐化之石战斗的每个阶段中出现的所有的石头侍灵，之后击败腐化之石。

achievement.name: 感染已控制
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）地根飞地中，击败腐化之根，且在任一玩家被根须感染击中后的1秒内，没有其他玩家被根须感染击中。

achievement.name: 破坏性拆除
achievement.des: During the Archdruid Devyric encounter, make sure he destroys at least 3 Earth Pillars during a single Malicious Mauling charge while you are his target in Veteran Earthen Root Enclave.

achievement.name: 失落深渊斥候
achievement.des: 完成普通模式的铭深岛和地根飞地。

achievement.name: 失落深渊之光
achievement.des: 完成地根飞地和铭深岛的可选内容。

achievement.name: 地根飞地胜利者
achievement.des: 在地根飞地中，击败腐化之石、腐化之根和大德鲁伊德维里克。

achievement.name: 地根探险家
achievement.des: 完成地根飞地的可选内容，找到并击败全部三个可选Boss。

achievement.name: 激进的树艺家
achievement.des: 在地根飞地中，小队共同摧毁50个被鹿人控制的根须节点。

achievement.name: 失落深渊探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）铭深岛和地根飞地。

achievement.name: 凿除腐败
achievement.des: Defeat Corruption of Stone after placing the challenge banner in Veteran Earthen Root Enclave.

achievement.name: 拔除腐败
achievement.des: Defeat Corruption of Root after placing the challenge banner in Veteran Earthen Root Enclave.

achievement.name: 入侵者的克星
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在进入（老兵模式）地根飞地后的25分钟内升起挑战旗帜，击败腐化之石、腐化之根、大德鲁伊德维里克以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 大德鲁伊德维里克的天灾
achievement.des: Defeat Archdruid Devyric after placing the Challenge Banner and without gaining any benefits from completing optional content in Veteran Earthen Root Enclave.

name: 铭深岛
location: South of Port NavireEntrance in Amenos Station docks
mystery: “是的，是的。萨马利听到了你关于神秘的铭深岛的呓语。萨马利一个字都不信。他有一批来自阿里克尔的香料要运送，一群懦弱的水手不会让他放慢脚步。”——来自蓝魂号船长萨马利最后的文字记录
des:
Graven Deep is a region located off the southwest coast of High Isle, accessed by ship from Amenos Station.
It is connected to a Dwarven observatory located on the seabed, containing a machine capable of manipulating the weather. Dragonflies, frogs, hermit crabs, monkeys and torchbugs are found in numbers within.
It is included in the Lost Depths DLC alongside Earthen Root Enclave.

BOSS.name: 透光守门者
BOSS.des: The Euphotic Gatekeeper is a red Hadolid found on the Uncharted Island at Graven Deep. He serves as the first boss and guards the Dwarven Hatch leading into the Dwarven Station section of the dungeon.

skills.name: 斩击
skills.des: The boss deals moderate physical damage with its sword.

skills.name: 鬃毛倒钩
skills.des: The boss throws a glob of poison at one person which deals moderate poison damage. It will explode after a short time unless the afflicted uses the synergy to fling the poison to the ground at their feet. The boss usually afflicts someone with poison after a Pangrit Den appears. In order to smother the den and keep Pangrits from entering the field, the afflicted must run to the Pangrit Den and throw the poison down on top of it. The den will disappear, and any Pangrits caught in the AoE will die. The poison should ideally be flung away from the group.

skills.name: 鬃毛投掷
skills.des: The poison AoE left behind when someone afflicted with Bristlebarb throws the poison down or the barb explodes. This deals massive continuous damage to targets standing inside.
The boss stops, targets one party member, and assaults them with a barrage of poison globs. This deals major damage.

BOSS.name: 瓦祖隆
BOSS.des: Varzunon is a bone colossus found in Graven Deep.

BOSS.name: 无息泽尔拉克
BOSS.des:
Zelvraak the Unbreathing is a lich and former member of the Druids of Galen. He serves as the final boss of Graven Deep and can be found in the central core of the Tempest Observatory section.
In life, his name was Saer. He was a practitioner of necromancy, but ascended to lichdom within the ruin's depths, entombing his fellow druids that accompanied him within. He is responsible for the disappearances of sailors around Graven Deep, utilizing the Dwarven weather machine to draw ships to their doom for his dark purposes.

skills.des: The center of the room is always cursed and deals continuous high (?) damage.[verification needed]

skills.name: 斩击
skills.des: Basic melee attack dealing very high physical damage and applies "Necrotic Revenant".

skills.name: 死灵之矛
skills.des: Basic ranged attack dealing very high frost damage and applies "Necrotic Revenant".
Deals high magic damage over (?) seconds.

skills.name: Necrotic Wave
skills.des: Zelvraak's charged heavy attack dealing massive magic damage in a cone. The tank must absolutely turn Zelvraak away from the group and block this attack.
At the start of the fight and after the "Banished" phase ends, a Flesh Abomination is summoned.

skills.name: 惊慌
skills.des: Zelvraak canalizes a massive fear spell dealing moderate frost damage over time which covers the whole room. You must turn away from him when it unleashes it, otherwise you are feared.

skills.name: 溺死水域
skills.des: At probably 90% health and after the "Banished" phase ends, Zelvraak casts a spell which appears like whirlpools on the ceiling of the room and each one creates a Sea Orb. In Normal difficulty there is only one, in veteran there are two and in veteran hard mode there are four. The sea orbs appear at the ceiling and slowly fall. If one of them reaches the ground, all players are killed by lethal frost damage. They cannot be destroyed but any hit will send them right to the ceiling. You must constantly check them in order to survive.

When Zelvraak reaches 50% Health, he becomes invicible, untargetable and stops all mechanics. All players will have their screen darknened, their character appearing ghostly and they cannot see each other. Fractured Souls slowly fly towards Zelvraak at the center of the room and you must destroy them. You are dealt continuous moderate frost damage but yellow-glowing ghosts are seen wandering the room, if you touch them, you are healed over 4 seconds and get a stack of "Soul Infusion"/"Speed Increase" for 10 seconds, each stack giving +25% movement speed. After enough time has passed, the fight with Zelvraak resumes.

skills.name: 炼狱
skills.des: Deals moderate-high flame damage. Must be interrupted

skills.name: 拆分
skills.des: Zelvraak splits into four Illusory Specters. You must interrupt all of them and block the subsequent attack if any remain uninterrupted, otherwise each one deals immense magic damage in a cone. Upon being interrupted they disappear then (?).

skills.name: 致残抓握
skills.des: Deals moderate-high magic damage

skills.name: 凛冬
skills.des: Deals moderate frost damage
Deal minor frost damage over time.

skills.name: 虹吸灵魂
skills.des: Deals moderate magic damage over time.

skills.name: 幻影弹幕
skills.des: Deals high frost damage.

achievement.name: 失落深渊探险家
achievement.des: 初次进入地根飞地或铭深岛。

achievement.name: 溺亡水兵样式大师
achievement.des: Learn every chapter in the Drowned Mariner style book, acquired by defeating the final boss in Graven Deep.

achievement.name: 铭深岛挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）铭深岛的成就。

achievement.name: 铭深岛征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）铭深岛中，击败透光守门者、瓦祖隆和无息泽尔拉克。

achievement.name: 无呼吸的
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）铭深岛中放置挑战旗帜后，击败无息泽尔拉克。

achievement.name: 突袭海滩
achievement.des: Defeat all encounters in addition to the Euphotic Gatekeeper, Varzunon, and Zelvraak the Unbreathing within 25 minutes of entering Veteran Graven Deep. Your timer starts when you engage the first group of enemies.

achievement.name: 生于不死之中
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在（老兵模式）铭深岛中，击败透光守门者、瓦祖隆、无息泽尔拉克以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 铭深岛勇士
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）铭深岛的成就。

achievement.name: 溺亡水手杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）铭深岛中，击败200个溺亡水手。包括溺亡寒霜法师、溺亡刺客和溺亡破坏者。

achievement.name: 不死族巨人杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）铭深岛中，击败50个不死族巨人。包括骸骨巨像、怨灵、血肉憎恶和瓦祖隆。

achievement.name: 保护野生动物
achievement.des: 在进入（老兵模式）铭深岛中，击败透光守门者，且没有破坏任何的潘格瑞坑。只有在透光守门者从岩石上跳下后被破坏的潘格瑞坑才会计入此成就。

achievement.name: 尊重死者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）铭深岛中，击败瓦祖隆，且没有杀死任何一个献祭骷髅。

achievement.name: 平均分担
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）铭深岛中，击败无息泽尔拉克，且没有任何玩家连续击中同一个海洋魔球两次。

achievement.name: 贪心于鬼
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）铭深岛中，在与无息泽尔拉克的单次遭遇战中，获取所有的黄金鬼魂，之后再将其击败。

achievement.name: 失落深渊斥候
achievement.des: 完成普通模式的铭深岛和地根飞地。

achievement.name: 失落深渊之光
achievement.des: 完成地根飞地和铭深岛的可选内容。

achievement.name: 铭深岛胜利者
achievement.des: 在铭深岛中，击败透光守门者、瓦祖隆和无息泽尔拉克。

achievement.name: 机械考古学
achievement.des: 完成铭深岛的可选内容，找到并击败全部三个可选Boss。

achievement.name: 鸡蛋里挑骨头
achievement.des: 在铭深岛与瓦祖隆战斗时，见证骸骨巨像的最终进化。

achievement.name: 回归安眠
achievement.des: 在任何难度的铭深岛中，与无息泽尔拉克战斗时，杀死300个破碎灵魂。

achievement.name: 失落深渊探索者
achievement.des: 完成（老兵模式）铭深岛和地根飞地。

achievement.name: 破门者
achievement.des: Defeat Euphotic Gatekeeper after placing the challenge banner in Veteran Graven Deep.

achievement.name: 噼啪，喀嚓，嘎吱
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）铭深岛中放置挑战旗帜后，击败瓦祖隆。

achievement.name: 塔瓦之拳
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在进入（老兵模式）铭深岛后的25分钟内升起挑战旗帜，击败透光守门者、瓦祖隆、无息泽尔拉克以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。计时将从你遇到第一批敌人开始。

achievement.name: 深层高压
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）铭深岛中，在升起挑战旗帜，且没有从完成可选内容中获得任何增益的情况下击败无息泽尔拉克。

name: 书吏大厅
location: West of the Smokefrost Peaks Dolmen
mystery: "It's easy to get lost in this maze of bookshelves and side rooms warped by contact with the unstable rifts into Oblivion. But the Scribes of Mora manage to find their way around due to their eons of cartographic experience."
des:
Scrivener's Hall is a group dungeon in the Rift. It is a Nedic library occupied by the Scribes of Mora, an organization associated with Hermaeus Mora who document all observable things for the Daedric Prince's perusal.
This dungeon is included in the Scribes of Fate DLC alongside Bal Sunnar. The entrance is located west of the Smokefrost Peaks Dolmen.
Broodlings, Centipedes, deadlands scorpions, nixads, rats, scorpions and spiders are found in numbers within. Hazards include: Bottomless Pits and Fires

BOSS.name: 裂隙御侍纳克里
BOSS.des: Riftmaster Naqri is an Imperial member of the Scribes of Mora who has sided with Valinna in her takeover of the organization. He is the first boss of Scrivener's Hall.

skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.
Riftmaster Naqri winds up his sword, before performing a spinning strike dealing very high physical damage. This attack can be blocked.

skills.name: 飓风寒霜
skills.des: Riftmaster Naqri summons a cyclone of books that send out ice bolts causing high area-of-effect frost damage.

skills.name: 不稳定文献
skills.des: Riftmaster Naqri summons a storm of books in the center of the arena. The storm itself deals very high magical damage. The storm also sends out flying pages close together outwards as it spins, which deal moderate magical damage each. At the same time, similar storms begin traveling all over the arena, dealing lesser damage than the static storm.
Riftmaster Naqri conjures a rune that tracks your movement before exploding, indicated by a growing circular AoE. You must time your dodge to avoid the damage.
Throughout the fight, Battlescribe Archers and Fire Mages will come into the room to assist Riftmaster Naqri.

Riftmaster Naqri creates a large magical book (out of three possible options) in the center of the arena, which summons an illusion of himself to perform special attacks.
