The only way to remove the book is to chase down its source in one of the plentiful bookshelves in the arena. The book in the center will shoot out magical orbs that hint at the source's direction:

At 65%/50%/40%/25%, Riftmaster Naqri dashes to any far ends of the arena and summons a large glowing green book before him. He then proceeds to charge it with power before unleashing it at you, dealing massive magical damage. You must hurry and get close to the book and block to mitigate the damage.

BOSS.name: 炼狱奥泽赞
BOSS.des: Ozezan the Inferno is an Infernium which can be found through the Deadlands rift in the Scrivener's Hall. You will need to defeat it to retrieve a particular staff. Ozezan acts as the second boss of this dungeon.

skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing high physical damage.
Ozezan the Inferno lunges forward and clamps all of its teeth down around you, dealing massive physical damage. This attack can be blocked.

skills.name: 火焰光束
skills.des: Ozezan climbs on its hind legs and creates a beam of fire from its mouth firing towards you, indicated by a moving circular AoE, which slowly follows your movement. It deals very high flame damage if you are hit.
Ozezan the Inferno spews poison all over you, indicated by a wide conal AoE, dealing continuous high poison damage. It will adjust its position if you try to strafe.

Ozezan the Inferno prepares to crawl underground. When it does so, its starting position, as well as exiting location, both become engulfed in lava, dealing continuous high flame damage. The lava lingers for an extended duration after this ability.
Ozezan the Inferno starts shaking around, as several eggs are tossed from its body onto the arena. After some time, they hatch into Evolved Broodlings that come to assist the boss.

skills.name: 火之风暴
skills.des: At 75%/45%/10% health, Ozezan the Inferno tunnels to the center of the arena, creating a large explosion that deals high flame damage and knocks you back and becomes protected by a ring of fire, dealing massive flame damage if attempting to cross it. It leaves the same lava fields as Infernal Tunneling when doing so. Once in position, it starts inhaling air and creates a tornado that pulls you towards itself and towards the deadly ring of fire. You must break free before you touch the ring.

BOSS.name: 莱米哈
BOSS.des: Lamikhai is a giant Daedric spider and the third boss of Scrivener's Hall.

skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing high physical damage.
Lamikhai climbs on its hind legs before crashing down with all its weight on you, dealing massive physical damage. This attack can be blocked.

skills.name: 火焰之雨
skills.des: Valinna summons a rain of fire at a location in the arena, indicated by a large circular AoE, dealing continuous high flame damage.

skills.name: 召唤蜘蛛
skills.des: Lamikhai will ocassionally summon weaker spiders from the ceiling to come assist in the fight.

skills.name: 狂怒
skills.des: At 75% health, Lamikhai starts glowing red and greatly increases its damage output. You must lure Lamikhai to a ring of ice that Mazandi summons in the arena to freeze Lamikhai and remove this effect and give you an attack window while Lamikhai remains frozen solid.

skills.name: 脱逃
skills.des: At 50% health, Lamikhai escapes its arena. It will only appear later during the fight against Valinna when she also reaches 50% health, at which point both bosses join forces against you.
In the second arena, Lamikhai periodically summons an Ensnaring Spider.

BOSS.name: 瓦琳娜
BOSS.des:
Valinna is a Wood Elf and member of the Scribes of Mora who can be found in the Scrivener's Hall. She was the protégée of the Magnastylus Keshargo but after an incident in Apocrypha, she began to question the Scribes' role in the world. Valinna eventually found a new patron and initiated a coup to overthrow Keshargo and become the new Magnastylus of their order, seeking to redub it the "Scribes of Mephala".
Alongside Lamikhai, Valinna is the final boss of the Scrivener's Hall dungeon.

skills.name: 火焰之雨
skills.des: Valinna will target one player (on veteran) or all players (on hard mode) with a red target above their head. After the target expires, an AoE will grow beneath their feet and rain fire permanently onto that area. This AoE can be stacked with other players to save space in the arena.

skills.name: 高温辐射
skills.des: Valinna targets whoever has aggro on her with a cone of fire. On hard mode, this leaves AoEs behind and should be kited to avoid too much damage on the tank. This cone has a long range and can begin even if the player with aggro is not nearby.

skills.name: 献祭陷阱
skills.des: Valinna will target two players (on veteran) or three players (on hard mode) with a growing trap around their feet. This mechanic prioritizes non-tanks but will hit the tank if there are not enough other players living to receive it. Once fully grown, the players will be surrounded by a gold circle. Crossing this gold circle will cause the trap to be triggered, instantly killing the player inside and doing massive damage in an area around them. This mechanic can be stacked safely.

skills.name: 引燃
skills.des: When ignite is cast, all players will receive a DoT that grows in damage the closer they are to each other. It is therefore advisable to spread out during ignite so that the DoT is more manageable by the healer.

skills.name: 流星
skills.des: In the third arena, Valinna will drop a meteor that builds for a while before exploding (Luminous Eruption). The meteor can be safely ignored as long as all players block its explosion; otherwise they will be flung through the air and likely knocked off of the platform.

skills.name: 狡诈坠落
skills.des: This attack will instantly kill you if Valinna manages to knock you off the platform.

skills.name: 火焰喷发
skills.des: A massive AoE attack. Valinna will cast this at certain health thresholds for Lamikhai. This ability will oneshot you if you stay in the area, so you will need to flee through an passage to the next area.

BOSS.name: 盗猎魔之王
BOSS.des: The Cartoqueen is a hidden scamp boss found in Scrivener's Hall.

skills.name: 利爪挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 火之霆击
skills.des: A basic range attack dealing moderate flame damage.
The Cartoqueen charges a spell then releases three waves of fire going outward from her position, dealing high flame damage. This attack has no indicator.

The Cartoqueen fires out fireballs in all directions from her position, indicated by circular AoEs, six in total, dealing high flame damage. Fire lingers at the explosion site for an extended duration, dealing moderate continuous flame damage.
The Cartoqueen summons several portals around the arena that create large volcanic boulders, that then tumble down into the arena. If hit, they deal high physical damage and knock you down.

skills.name: 轰鸣
skills.des: The Cartoqueen causes the ceiling to rumble, triggering several stalagtites to fall onto the arena floor, as indicated by circular AoEs, dealing high physical damage and knocking you down.
The Cartoqueen summons a wall of Molten Pillars around itself for protection against attacks.

skills.name: 传送
skills.des: The Cartoqueen teleports to any of the far ends of the arena.

skills.name: 召唤图腾
skills.des: The Cartoqueen occasionally summons a Fiery Totem that will continuously shoot fireballs at you until it is destroyed, dealing moderate flame damage each.

achievement.name: 莫拉书吏团样式大师
achievement.des: 学习莫拉书吏团样式书的每一章，该样式书可通过打败书吏大厅的最终BOSS获得。

achievement.name: 书吏大厅挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）书吏大厅的成就。

achievement.name: 书吏大厅征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）书吏大厅中击败裂隙御侍纳克里、炼狱奥泽赞和瓦琳娜。

achievement.name: 爆燃
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）书吏大厅中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败瓦琳娜。

achievement.name: 速读者
achievement.des: 在进入（老兵模式）书吏大厅后，在25分钟内击败裂隙御侍纳克里，炼狱奥泽赞和瓦琳娜，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。计时从你遇到第一批敌人开始。

achievement.name: 不辍的羽毛笔
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，击败（老兵模式）书吏大厅中的裂隙御侍纳克里，炼狱奥泽赞和瓦琳娜，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 书吏大厅勇士
achievement.des: 完成列出的书吏大厅成就。

achievement.name: 战斗书吏杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）书吏大厅中击败200名战斗书吏。

achievement.name: 魔宠杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）书吏大厅中击败50个魔宠。包括虚空护甲哨兵，虚空护甲决斗者，岩浆熊和风暴侍灵。

achievement.name: 害虫防治
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）书吏大厅中压爆500只幼虫。

achievement.name: 批判性评论
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）书吏大厅中毁坏20个裂隙御侍纳克里的抄本。

achievement.name: 苛刻的编辑
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）书吏大厅中，在放置挑战旗帜并烧毁裂隙御侍纳克里的回忆录后击败他。

achievement.name: 心急如焚
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）书吏大厅中，在没有小队成员被火焰风暴所伤的情况下击败炼狱奥泽赞。

achievement.name: 冰封的敌人
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）书吏大厅中，使用玛赞迪的冰冻法阵冰冻住60个敌对生物。

achievement.name: 不焚步法
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）书吏大厅中，在没有小队成员发动献祭陷阱的情况下击败瓦琳娜和莱米哈。

achievement.name: 命运书写师斥候
achievement.des: Complete both Bal Sunnar and Scrivener's Hall in Normal.

achievement.name: 命运的奥秘
achievement.des: 完成巴尔桑纳和书吏大厅中的可选内容。

achievement.name: 书吏大厅胜利者
achievement.des: 在书吏大厅中击败裂隙御侍纳克里、炼狱奥泽赞和瓦琳娜。

achievement.name: 瑞因佛的英雄
achievement.des: 通过找到并击败10个盗猎魔、在书吏大厅密室中搜刮10个宝箱以及获取瑞因佛遗失的盗猎魔地图，完成书吏大厅的可选内容。

achievement.name: 已找回遗失的地图
achievement.des: 在裂谷找到并挖掘出书吏的宝藏。

achievement.name: 宝库守护者
achievement.des: 帮助瑞因佛保护密室免遭潜伏于其中的危险侵害。

achievement.name: 学识斗士
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）书吏大厅中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败裂隙御侍纳克里。

achievement.name: 灭火除虫专家
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）书吏大厅中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败炼狱奥泽赞。

achievement.name: 掌书使之道
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在进入（老兵模式）书吏大厅后的25分钟内升起挑战旗帜，击败裂隙御侍纳克里、炼狱奥泽赞和瓦琳娜，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。计时从你遇到第一批敌人开始。

achievement.name: 钥匙守护者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）书吏大厅中收集10个密室钥匙。

name: 巴尔桑纳
mystery: “他们曾经为我们而来，我相信他们仍会归来。没有人能说清楚什么时候——他们总是不期而至。我们的掳掠者称他们为‘祸患’，但我们视其为救世主。”——巴尔桑纳的仆从，拜乌尔姆
des:
Bal Sunnar is a group dungeon in Stonefalls. It is a remote Telvanni settlement found in the mountains south of Senie and was established several centuries prior to the Second Era by Matriarch Lladi Telvanni. However the area is subject to a temporal anomaly causing multiple eras of Bal Sunnar to be accessible.
It is included in the Scribes of Fate DLC alongside Scrivener's Hall.
In numbers are found Ash Hoppers and wasps in the present, centipedes, shroom beetles and wormmouths in the past, fiendroths, fleshflies and rats in the future. Hazards include: Bottomless Pits, Meteorites, Pus Pools and Pus Sacks.

BOSS.name: 科万·吉里恩
BOSS.des: Kovan Giryon is a member of House Telvanni and the first boss of Bal Sunnar.

skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 心灵爆轰
skills.des: Kovan Giryon casts a spell that assaults your mind, dealing high magical damage. This attack must be dodged at the right time.

Kovan Giryon casts a spell that inflicts torment upon your mind for a duration, indicated by a circular AoE that tracks your movement, dealing moderate continuous magical damage that cannot be avoided.

skills.name: 猛冲
skills.des: Kovan Giryon dashes to the outer edge of the arena, hitting those in his way for high magical damage, indicated by a circular AoE around him. He uses this before and after Chaotic Ray.

Kovan Giryon casts a spell for a brief moment, releasing a long beam of yellow energy that courses across the arena, indicated by a long rectangular AoE, dealing very high magical damage. The beam lingers for an extended duration. After the first summoning phase, Kovan Giryon's clones in the room will assist him in this abilities, casting rays of their own, making the arena harder to traverse.

Kovan Giryon teleports to the center of the arena and slams into the ground, causing a magical explosion, indicated by a large growing circular AoE, dealing very high magical damage. Following the first summon phase, a clone of Kovan Giryon that floats in the center of the arena will take over for him in using this ability, freeing Kovan Giryon to do other things.

skills.name: 汇聚
skills.des: Occasionally, Kovan Giryon will cause one of his clones resting dormant in the room to come rushing towards him, hitting anyone in its path, ad indicated by a circular AoE, dealing high magical damage. An explosion occurs when the clone reaches Kovan Giryon, which also deals high magical damage.

At 70%, Kovan Giryon floats into the air in the center of the arena and becomes invulnerable to damage. The screen becomes darker and creatures from the past are summoned into the arena. These include Primitive Nix-Ox as the most dangerous opponent, accompanied by Primitive Kwama and Primitive Nix-Hounds. The creatures must all be slain to make Kovan Giryon come down and become vulnerable to damage again. At 45% health, the enemies are comprised of an Iron Atronach, accompanied by Fire Shalks and Flame Salamanders. At 20%, all of the enemies in both enemy pools appear together.

BOSS.name: 乌尔维·德斯
BOSS.des: Urvel Drath is a Dark Elf member of House Telvanni found in Bal Sunnar, where he serves as an optional boss.

skills.des: A basic ranged attack dealing moderate flame damage.

skills.name: 火焰之鞭
skills.des: Urvel Drath forms a whip of fire with his staff and strikes you with it, dealing high flame damage. This attack has no indicator.

skills.name: 焦枯大地
skills.des: Urvel Drath spins his staff around for a brief moment before slamming the ground with it, causing a flaming shockwave to shoot forward, indicated by a fast moving circular AoE, dealing high flame damage and staggering you. Following the slam, several columns of basalt rock erupt from the floor to form obstacles. After a few seconds, the rocks shatter, creating small flaming wisps that hone in on you and explode, dealing moderate flame damage each.

Urvel Drath summons similar basalt stones to surround him for protection, accompanied by a fiery explosion, indicated by a growing circular AoE around him, dealing high flame damage. The same shattering as Scorched Earth occurs with these stones.
Urvel Drath often teleports to the outer edge of the arena in a burst of lightning, dealing moderate shock damage if standing close to him.

BOSS.name: 扭曲者洛科萨
BOSS.des:
Roksa the Warped is a Primitive Nix-Ox that you will face within the Excavation Chamber in Bal Sunnar. It is Matriarch Lladi Telvanni's favored pet, pulled from the distant past and seemingly warped by the power of the temporal knot.
It acts as the third boss of the dungeon.

skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing high physical damage.

skills.name: 恶毒噬咬
skills.des: Roksa the Warped rears back before lunging forward to bite you, dealing massive physical damage. This attack can be blocked.

Roksa the Warped jumps up, causing three magical projectiles to be flung from the portal above its head down at you, indicated by circular AoEs, dealing high magical damage. The explosions leave fire fields that linger for an extended time, which deal continuous moderate flame damage.

skills.name: Frenzy
skills.des: Roksa the Warped starts shaking and spinning in circle around its position while spewing green flames all over, forming several lingering fire fields all around itself, indicated by circular AoEs, dealing high flame damage on impact followed by moderate continuous flame damage.

Roksa the Warped howls as corrupted energy appears around her. A Darklight Orb is summoned at the opposite end of the arena and begins sucking your health away, dealing high continuous magical damage until it's destroyed.

At 85%/65%/45% health, Roksa the Warped leaps across the arena to any of the opposite ends. The arena becomes shrouded in darkness, except where Roksa the Warped is as well as a small haven formed by Saresea. Standing in the darkness deals very high continuous magical damage.

At 70%/40% health, Roksa the Warped becomes invulnerable to damage as it scurries over to the dark portal in the air in the center of the arena, then jumps into it and disappear. In its absence, Nix-Oxen and Larval Nix-Oxen appear. They must all be killed in time before Roksa the Warped fires her Annihilation Beam ability, otherwise you won't be shielded by Saresea to avoid the one-hit kill.

After a set duration away from Portal Rush, Roksa the Warped reappears on a platform outside of the arena and fires a beam of intense green magic at you. If you are not shielded by Saresea, you will be one-shotted by this ability. After this ability is blocked, Roksa the Warped leaps back into the arena to resume the fight.

skills.name: 黑暗中的怨灵
skills.des: When the arena is shrouded in darkness, a wraith will appear and attack you before disappearing. To avoid it, stand in Saresea's light.

BOSS.name: 女族长雷拉蒂·泰尔瓦尼
BOSS.des:
Matriarch Lladi Telvanni is a Dark Elf member of House Telvanni and founder of the settlement of Bal Sunnar in Stonefalls a few thousand years ago. She formed a group called the Blessed Inheritors and came to the area to locate and obtain what she referred to as "Their Inheritance".
You unwittingly become her enemy when you become drawn into the time anomaly, which leads her to go to more extreme lengths to defeat you. She also functions as the final boss of this dungeon.

skills.des: A basic ranged attack dealing moderate poison damage.
Matriarch Lladi Telvanni slams her staff into the water, causing poisoned water to bubble over and explode at your location, indicated by a growing circular AoE, dealing high poison damage.

skills.name: 瘟疫炸弹
skills.des: Matriarch Lladi Telvanni charges her staff before throwing an orb of concentrated poison at you which explodes on impact, dealing massive poison damage. This attack can be blocked.

Matriarch Lladi Telvanni rears back before starting to belch large amounts of toxic vomit in front of her, indicated by a wide conal AoE, dealing very high poison damage. She will adjust her positioning if you attempt to strafe.

Matriarch Lladi Telvanni dashes forward to one of the far ends of the arena, leaving lingering plague clouds in her wake, all indicated by circular AoEs, dealing high physical damage on impact and high poison damage if standing in the affected areas.
Occasionally, Matriarch Lladi Telvanni throws a blob of slime down into the arena, which forms into a Peryite's Glory that comes in to assist her.

At 75%/40% health, Matriarch Lladi Telvanni dashes to the center of the arena, becomes invulnerable to damage, and summons and arena-wide storm of toxic gas, dealing continuous moderate poison damage. During the storm, Peryite's Blessed will appear to attack you. The only way to make the storm cease is to collect three Shards of Time that appear in various separate locations within the arena by using the "​ Freeze Time" synergy.

achievement.name: 福佑继承者样式大师
achievement.des: 学习福佑继承者样式书的每一章，该样式书可通过击败巴尔桑纳的最终BOSS获得。

achievement.name: 巴尔桑纳挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）巴尔桑纳的成就。

achievement.name: 巴尔桑纳征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）巴尔桑纳中击败科万·吉里恩、扭曲者洛科萨和女族长雷拉蒂·泰尔瓦尼。

achievement.name: 泰尔瓦尼折磨者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）巴尔桑纳地下城中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败女族长雷拉蒂·泰尔瓦尼。

achievement.name: 时间之箭
achievement.des: 在进入（老兵模式）巴尔桑纳地下城后，在25分钟内击败科万·吉里恩、扭曲者洛科萨和女族长雷拉蒂·泰尔瓦尼，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。从第一批敌人交战后开始计时。

achievement.name: 命运主宰者
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，击败（老兵模式）巴尔桑纳地下城中的科万·吉里恩、扭曲者洛科萨和女族长雷拉蒂·泰尔瓦尼，以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 巴尔桑纳勇士
achievement.des: 完成列出的巴尔桑纳成就。

achievement.name: 尼克斯生物杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）巴尔桑纳地下城中击败200只尼克斯生物，这包括尼克斯犬虫和尼克斯牛虫。

achievement.name: 疫病仆从杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）巴尔桑纳地下城中击败50个疫病仆从，这包括佩伊特的荣光和佩伊特的容器。

achievement.name: 完美回忆
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）巴尔桑纳中，在与科万·吉里恩的单次遭遇战中击败50名从时空中撕扯出来的仆从。

achievement.name: 雨露均沾
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）巴尔桑纳中，在每个玩家打断自身的暗光射线而不死亡的情况下击败扭曲者洛科萨。

achievement.name: 感染的信念
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）巴尔桑纳中击败女族长雷拉蒂·泰尔瓦尼之前，使得四名小队成员遭受传染性呕吐的影响。

achievement.name: 严格隔离
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）巴尔桑纳中，击败女族长雷拉蒂·泰尔瓦尼，且没有玩家受到脓液袋的伤害。

achievement.name: 命运书写师斥候
achievement.des: Complete both Bal Sunnar and Scrivener's Hall in Normal.

achievement.name: 命运的奥秘
achievement.des: 完成巴尔桑纳和书吏大厅中的可选内容。

achievement.name: 巴尔桑纳胜利者
achievement.des: 在巴尔桑纳击败科万·吉里恩、扭曲者洛科萨和女族长雷拉蒂·泰尔瓦尼。

achievement.name: 救赎传奇
achievement.des: 通过解开转经轮谜题、击败乌尔维·德斯和解开魔族光束谜题，完成巴尔桑纳中的可选内容。

achievement.name: 时间中止
achievement.des: 在巴尔桑纳与女族长雷拉蒂·泰尔瓦尼战斗时，使用时间碎片冻住40个怪物。

achievement.name: 预言的解放者
achievement.des: 在过去和现在的巴尔桑纳，从泰尔瓦尼掳掠者手中解救54名劳工。

achievement.name: 掷火的天气
achievement.des: 在巴尔桑纳的未来部分中，全部玩家免受落石伤害。

achievement.name: 祸患之拳
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）巴尔桑纳地下城中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败科万·吉里恩。

achievement.name: 尼克斯终结者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）巴尔桑纳地下城中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败扭曲者洛科萨。

achievement.name: 争分夺秒
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）巴尔桑纳中，在升起挑战旗帜，且没有从完成可选内容中获得任何增益的情况下击败科万·吉里恩、扭曲者洛科萨和女族长雷拉蒂·泰尔瓦尼。

achievement.name: 时空风暴
achievement.des: Defeat all encounters in addition to Kovan Giryon, Roksa the Warped, and Matriarch Lladi Telvanni after raising the Challenge Banner in Veteran Bal Sunnar within 25 minutes without suffering a group member death. Your timer starts when you engage the first hostile.

name: 癫狂之幕
mystery: 癫狂之幕是法·努特·汉用来存放战利品的陈列室，里面充斥着各种强力武器与远近闻名的物品。能够获准进入此处的勇士寥寥无几，而极少数获得参观资格幸运儿则将它形容为一座武器装备的宝库。
des:
Bedlam Veil is a demiplane and group dungeon accessed from a portal in Wrothgar.
It is part of the realm of Maelstrom and is where Fa-Nuit-Hen keeps their trophies. A cult known as the Blind Path have invaded and are searching for something. The entrance is located northeast of Siege Road Wayshrine, along the walls of Old Orsinium.
A Chub Loon, daedrats, fetcherflies, frogs, scorpions, shroom beetles and skein spiders are found in numbers within. Hazards include: Bottomless Pits, Frigid Waters, Lava Pool, Volatile Poison
It is included in the Scions of Ithelia DLC alongside Oathsworn Pit.

BOSS.name: 破碎勇士
BOSS.des: The Shattered Champion is a Crystal Atronach that is summoned by the Blind in Bedlam Veil. It acts as the first boss of this dungeon.

skills.name: 开裂
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 碎击碎片
skills.des: The atronach punches at a target's location dealing very high physical damage and staggering. This can be blocked.

The atronach stomps the ground, causing glass shards to erupt at targets' locations, indicated by red circle tracking them, dealing moderate physical damage, and more if targets overlap. The shards then linger, and deal continuous low physical damage.

skills.name: 剃刀琉璃
skills.des: Once the atronach reaches 70% health, it summons a ring of sharp glass along the outer edge of the arena, and at 50%, it summons one in a circular shape in the center of the arena. Touching the glass deals continuous moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 伤口迸裂
skills.des: Additional damage over time effect applied when touched by "Shard Glass" and "Razor Glass".
After every 10% health lost, the atronach summons a Glass Fragment.
At 80%/60%/40% health, the atronach summons two Blind Path Glaziers, which can make the boss and its summons go invulnerable by channeling their spell.

BOSS.name: 暗黑碎片
BOSS.des: Darkshard is a Shardborn mind terror that serves as the second boss of Bedlam Veil.

skills.name: 挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 威吓打击
skills.des: Darkshard winds up a heavy strike, with a deceiving time before the animation and the strike, dealing very high physical damage and staggering. This can be blocked.

skills.name: 盛宴魔球
skills.des: Darkshard shrieks loudly, indicated by a wide red cone, dealing high physical damage and snaring affected targets.

skills.name: 紧握尖啸
skills.des: Darkshard shoots dark projectiles at nearby targets, dealing low magical damage and stunning them. If Break Free is not used, stunned targets are pulled to Darkshard, who then summons a negate field, indicated by a large red circle, dealing continuous high magical damage.

At certain health threshold, Darkshard vanishes from the arena and summons bosses from Maelstrom Arena to fight in its stead. At the 80% threshold, Maxus the Many is summoned. At 60%, the Champion of Atrocity and at 40%, the Argonian Behemoth (along with Argonian Venomcallers in Hard Mode).

skills.name: 暗影召唤
skills.des: After "Terrorizing Strike" and "Scream", a shadowy version of Darkshard spawns at a faraway target and performs those abilities again.

BOSS.name: 盲眼邪神
BOSS.des: The Blind is a Dremora and the leader of the Blind Path cult. She has lead her cult to Bedlam Veil to steal the so-called Echonir from the Skyvaults and Fa-Nuit-Hen

skills.name: 拍击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that cleaves, in different directions indicated by red cones, dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 谴责
skills.des: The Blind levitates into the air and crashes back down, indicated by a large growing red circle, dealing very high physical damage. This attack can be interrupted with Catatonic Disruptor synergy, if it's unlocked by solving third Fa-Nuit-Hen's puzzle.

skills.name: 残破琉璃
skills.des: The Blind channels a spell with her hand, causing glass shards to burst at targets' locations as indicated by growing red circles around them, dealing high physical damage and more if multiple targets overlap. The shards linger afterward, dealing continuous moderate physical damage if stepped into.

skills.name: 碎片转移
skills.des: At 80%/60%/40%/20% health, the Blind teleports at the edge of the arena and becomes untargettable. At 80%, she summons four Blind Shards, four massive untargettable glass skeletons, at the southern end of arena which will continuously cast their abilities until the end of the battle.

skills.name: 闪耀喷涌
skills.des: Starting from 80% of the Blind's health, Blind Shards will cast area-of-effect waves of glass, slowly rolling across the arena. Under 20% of the Blind's health, the intensity of this ability increases, leaving only a winding, one lane wide corridor free of glass waves. This ability can be negated by using Zephyrus Obscuris synergy, if it's unlocked by solving first Fa-Nuit-Hen's puzzle.

skills.name: 穿刺光束
skills.des: Starting from 60% of the Blind's health, Blind Shards may cast beams that cover the entire arena lane in front of them, dealing continuous high physical damage.

skills.name: 召唤
skills.des: Starting at 90% health, Mirrorplasms are summnoned to help The Blind. Starting at 60% health, Glass Remnants are summoned as well.

achievement.name: 盲径信徒样式大师
achievement.des: 学习盲径信徒样式书的每一章，该样式书可通过击败癫狂之幕的最终BOSS获得。

achievement.name: 癫狂之幕挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）癫狂之幕成就。

achievement.name: 癫狂之幕征服者
achievement.des: Defeat Shattered Champion, Darkshard, and The Blind in Veteran Bedlam Veil.

achievement.name: 机敏又聪慧
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）癫狂之幕放置挑战旗帜后，击败盲眼邪神。

achievement.name: 择路而行
achievement.des: 在进入（老兵模式）癫狂之幕的25分钟内击败破碎勇士、暗黑碎片、盲眼邪神以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。计时将从你遇到第一批敌人开始。

achievement.name: 半魔神的喜悦
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在（老兵模式）癫狂之幕击败破碎勇士、暗黑碎片、盲眼邪神以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 癫狂之幕勇士
achievement.des: 在癫狂之幕完成列出的成就。

achievement.name: 盲径杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）癫狂之幕中击败150个盲径信徒。

achievement.name: 空洞哨兵杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）癫狂之幕中击败60个空洞哨兵。

achievement.name: 蜘蛛癖
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）癫狂之幕对战暗黑碎片时发现15次嗡鸣神器。

achievement.name: 破碎攻击者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）癫狂之幕的盲眼邪神遭遇战中，在攻城阶段结束后击杀10个琉璃遗物。

achievement.name: 饰品收藏家
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）癫狂之幕使用5次曲光退散术。

achievement.name: 目标明确
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）癫狂之幕中，组队使用神智扰乱术击飞盲眼邪神3次。

achievement.name: 伊瑟利娅的后裔之斥候
achievement.des: 通关誓约者深渊与癫狂之幕。

achievement.name: 惩罚将至
achievement.des: 完成誓约者深渊与癫狂之幕的可选内容。

achievement.name: 癫狂之幕胜利者
achievement.des: Defeat the Shattered Champion, Darkshard and the Blind in Bedlam Veil.

achievement.name: 漩涡开锁器
achievement.des: 找到并解开癫狂之幕中的所有谜题。

achievement.name: 开锁行动
achievement.des: 在癫狂之幕中，全队成员分别在30秒内解开所有3个谜题。

achievement.name: 蒙面历史学家
achievement.des: 在癫狂之幕的男爵殿堂找到并阅读所有歌颂“如是之步”男爵团的匾额。

achievement.name: 遮掩与抹去
achievement.des: 组队并使用西风混沌，在战场的一个区域清除5次范围攻击。

achievement.name: 勇士克星
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）癫狂之幕放置挑战旗帜后，击败破碎勇士。

achievement.name: 光明使者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）癫狂之幕放置挑战旗帜后，击败暗黑碎片。

achievement.name: 坚定热情
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在进入（老兵模式）癫狂之幕的25分钟内放置挑战旗帜，然后击败破碎勇士、暗黑碎片、盲眼邪神以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 武力馈赠
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）癫狂之幕中放置挑战旗帜后击败盲眼邪神，且没有完成任何可选内容，也没有获得相应增益的帮助。

name: 誓约者深渊
location: Northeast of the Deep Folk Crossing
mystery: 誓约者是玛拉卡斯的信徒，也是泰姆瑞尔令人闻风丧胆的战士。他们娴熟掌握多种战斗方式，用他们神圣家园的炽热之心点燃熔炉。
des:
Oathsworn Pit is a group dungeon in the northern mountains of The Reach.
It is included in the Scions of Ithelia DLC alongside Bedlam Veil. The entrance is located east of the Deep Folk Crossing.
Butterflies, centipedes, elks, foxes, rabbits and torchbugs are found in numbers within. Hazards include: Bottomless Pits, Kindlepitch Barrels and Poison Barrels

BOSS.name: 族群大师雷赛罗斯
BOSS.des: Packmaster Rethelros is a Wood Elf and a member of the Recollection. You will face him within Malacath's Crown at the Oathsworn Pit, where he acts as the first boss, alongside alongside his wolf companion, Malthil.

skills.name: 迅捷射击
skills.des: A basic ranged ability that deals moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 诱捕箭矢
skills.des: While Malthil is using "Scent", "Quick Shot" becomes "Ensnaring Bolt" instead. A basic melee attack that deals moderate physical damage and snares targets, making them easier to get caught by his wolf.

skills.name: 定向齐射
skills.des: Packmaster Rethelros fires a rain of arrows at a specific target, indicated by several back to back red circles, dealing continuous high physical damage.

skills.name: 捕熊陷阱
skills.des: Packmaster Rethelros lays six bear traps down in the arena, indicated by red circles. Standing in one deals high physical damage, immobilizes you and deals low bleed damage over time.

skills.name: 灰烬击
skills.des: Rethelros picks a target and lines up a shot which fires straight, indicated by a thin but very long red rectangle, dealing high flame damage. He can adjust his trajectory while channeling.

skills.name: 篝火
skills.des: hits a lot of times for litle flame damage each

skills.name: Totem Cast
skills.des: Packmaster Rethelros blows a hunting horn, and summons a Protective Totem, which tethers itself to both bosses with a blue beam. They'll take less damage while this totem is up: destroy it to maximize your group's damage output. Having the tank drag the wolf to the totem may be a worthy endeavor if the Packmaster Rethelros isn't too close to it.

skills.name: 血之羁绊
skills.des: Packmaster Rethelros and Malthil must be kept away from each other, or else they'll empower each other's strikes. This is indicated by massive red circles around both of them that appear when they are close enough to activate this effect. The tank should pull the wolf away while the group deals with the archer.

skills.name: 湮灭术
skills.des: Packmaster Rethelros can teleport away or closer to targets, or his wolf, using vanishing powder.

BOSS.name: 安塞尔莫
BOSS.des: Anthelmir is a Wood Elf member of the Recollection that serves as the second boss of Oathsworn Pit, along with her Construct. Maerolor is her boyfriend.

skills.name: 毁灭火光
skills.des: A basic ranged attack dealing moderate flame damage.

skills.name: 炽热打击
skills.des: Basic melee attack dealing moderate-high flame damage

skills.name: 焦热之锤
skills.des: Charged melee attack dealing very high flame damage.

skills.name: 热爆
skills.des: Anthelmir slams her staff on the ground, causing a massive explosion around her, indicated by a very large red circle. The initial blast deals very high flame damage and flames linger on for a while after, dealing continuous low flame damage. While Anthelmir is in the lingering flames, she gains a ward that makes her invulnerable in the form of a damage shield (Blast Furnace).
While in her ward, she performs this ability. She points her staff forward, blasting targets with repeated fireballs, dealing moderate flame damage each.

skills.name: 焚毁
skills.des: Anthelmir teleports from her current position, causing a detonation at both her starting and next positions, indicated by red circles, dealing moderate flame damage. She will often teleport near barrels to detonate them.

Kindlepitch barrels are scattered around the arena, which explode if fire from enemies makes contact with them. The resulting explosion deals immediate high flame damage, indicated by a red circle around them, and causes flames to linger for the rest of the fight, dealing continuous low flame damage.

skills.name: 构造体变形
skills.des: When the construct reaches 70% health, both it and Anthelmir rush to the center of the arena and the construct plants one of its hands into the ground, causing the arena to shake. Shortly after, the head of a Malacath statue falls on top of the construct, causing the construct to fall over, landing on Anthelmir and killing her instantly. Afterward, the construct gets up, fortifies the statue head with vines, and gains new abilities.

BOSS.name: 苏醒者亚拉德罗斯
BOSS.des: Aradros the Awakened is a Wood Elf pyromaster and member of the Recollection who serves as the last boss of Oathsworn Pit.

skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage and physical damage over time.

skills.name: 高昂一击
skills.des: Aradros the Awakened performs a powerful strike with his dual swords, dealing very high physical damage and staggering. This can be blocked.

skills.name: 双生之火
skills.des: Adraros holds his swords in front of him briefly, as a wide red cone fills up, and performs a fanning strike, sending a fiery shockwave forward, dealing high flame damage and knocking targets back.

skills.name: 熔岩喷发
skills.des: Aradros the Awakened channels a spell that causes a pillar of flame to erupt at a target's location, indicated by a slowly growing red circle, dealing high flame damage.

skills.name: 碎裂打击
skills.des: Aradros points one of his swords up, causing a flaming boulder to fall at somewhere in the arena, indicated by a red circle, either at a target's location or nearby trying to catch them moving and avoiding the flaming tiles, dealing extreme flame damage.

skills.name: 野火
skills.des: massive numbers of low flame damage ticks, not often on the tank

skills.name: 熔炉
skills.des: When Aradros the Awakened reaches 65% health, the floor grate in the center of the arena erupts. Standing on the grate during the initial blast deals massive flame damage. This occurs again when resuming the fight after defeating the mini-boss following "Firestep".

skills.name: 熔火地块
skills.des: After effect of "Magma Eruption" and "Furnace". For "Magma Eruption", floor tiles of the arena covered by the flame pillar now glow red-hot, dealing continuous high flame damage if stood on, for some time. For "Furnace" the same principle occurs, but this time a lot more tiles are affected, and it can be any of them, in increasing amounts over time, until only some tiles are left unscorched. In Hard Mode, the tiles are scorched permanently.

skills.name: 硫磺
skills.des: At any given moment, a "Molten Tile" can detonate, as indicated by a "+" shaped AoE, dealing massive flame damage to affected targets.

skills.name: 火焰阶梯
skills.des: When Aradros the Awakened reaches 50% health, he teleports to the center of the arena and engulfes himself in flames, rendering himself invulnerable. A gate opens on the side of the arena, leading to either Faenalir, Maerolor, or Nilborwen (or all three at the same time on Hard Mode) who must be defeated to progress the fight.

skills.name: 觉醒之火
skills.des: Occasionally during the fight, flaming Nixad named Awakened Fires will enter the arena to assist Aradros the Awakened.

skills.name: 火焰怯懦
skills.des: Flames appear at the base of the walls of the main arena. If a player touches them, they are instantly dealt lethal oblivion damage.

achievement.name: 追忆军团样式大师
achievement.des: 学习追忆军团样式书的每一章，该样式书可通过击败誓约者深渊的最终Boss获得。

achievement.name: 誓约者深渊挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）誓约者深渊成就。

achievement.name: 誓约者深渊征服者
achievement.des: Defeat Packmaster Rethelros, Anthelmir and Anthelmir's Construct, and Aradros the Awakened in Veteran Oathsworn Pit.

achievement.name: 浴火逃生
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）誓约者深渊中放置挑战旗帜后，击败苏醒者亚拉德罗斯。

achievement.name: 玛拉卡斯的闪电复仇
achievement.des: 在进入（老兵模式）誓约者深渊后的25分钟内，击败族群大师雷赛罗斯、安塞尔莫与安塞尔莫的构造体、苏醒者亚拉德罗斯以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。计时将从你遇到第一名追忆军团成员开始。

achievement.name: 持久惩罚
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在（老兵模式）誓约者深渊击败族群大师雷赛罗斯、安塞尔莫与安塞尔莫的构造体、苏醒者亚拉德罗斯以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 誓约者深渊勇士
achievement.des: Complete the listed achievements in Oathsworn Pit.

achievement.name: 追忆军团杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）誓约者深渊击败300名追忆军团成员。

achievement.name: 强壮怪物杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）誓约者深渊击败100个熊、木傀儡或铁侍灵。

achievement.name: 遭受背叛者的卫士
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）誓约者深渊对战族群大师雷赛罗斯，同时要保证所有誓约者勇士存活。

achievement.name: 以火攻火
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）誓约者深渊的玛拉卡斯之眼引爆所有的可燃沥青桶后，击败安塞尔莫与安塞尔莫的构造体。

achievement.name: 格拉波杜萨格的祝福
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）誓约者深渊利用战士面甲效果击败苏醒者亚拉德罗斯。

achievement.name: 锻匠
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）誓约者深渊与苏醒者亚拉德罗斯作战并锻造冶炼炉。

achievement.name: 以斧之名
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）誓约者深渊与安塞尔莫和安塞尔莫的构造体作战，并以不到5米的间距投放全部4枚斧头。

achievement.name: 伊瑟利娅的后裔之斥候
achievement.des: 通关誓约者深渊与癫狂之幕。

achievement.name: 惩罚将至
achievement.des: 完成誓约者深渊与癫狂之幕的可选内容。

achievement.name: 誓约者深渊胜利者
achievement.des: 在誓约者深渊击败族群大师雷赛罗斯、安塞尔莫与安塞尔莫的构造体，以及苏醒者亚拉德罗斯。

achievement.name: 求得首肯
achievement.des: 找到并完成试炼场领袖的试炼，以完成誓约者深渊的可选内容。

achievement.name: 蓄势出击！
achievement.des: 进入誓约者深渊，将四名追忆军团成员打入深渊之地。

achievement.name: 族群猎手
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）誓约者深渊中放置挑战旗帜后，击败族群大师雷赛罗斯。

achievement.name: 头痛欲裂
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）誓约者深渊中放置挑战旗帜后，击败安塞尔莫与安塞尔莫的构造体。

achievement.name: 点亮余烬
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在进入（老兵模式）誓约者深渊的25分钟内放置挑战旗帜，然后击败族群大师雷赛罗斯、安塞尔莫与安塞尔莫的构造体、苏醒者亚拉德罗斯以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。计时将从你遇到第一批敌人开始。

achievement.name: 顽固复仇者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）誓约者深渊中放置挑战旗帜后，击败苏醒者亚拉德罗斯，但不能完成任何可选内容。

name: 流亡哨站
mystery: "This is our fortress. This is where the dreams lost to death will be realized and forces that seem immutable will crumble. This exile may be of our own making, but it is through isolation that we change the course of a war." —Cato Albus, Patriarch
des:
Exiled Redoubt is a group dungeon in the northern mountains of the West Weald. It is included in the Fallen Banners DLC alongside Lep Seclusa. The entrance is located north of Skingrad.
Beetles, cockroaches, fleshflies, frogs, rats, spiders and torchbugs are found in numbers within.

BOSS.name: 行刑者耶伦希
BOSS.des: Executioner Jerensi is a race executioner of House Albus serving as the first boss of Exiled Redoubt.

BOSS.name: 首席术士范多拉伦
BOSS.des: Prime Sorcerer Vandorallen is an Imperial battlemage of House Albus who serves as the second boss of Exiled Redoubt. He is the nephew of Cato Albus.

skills.name: 黑脊诅咒
skills.des: Vandorallen targets a player with a debuff that applies a healing absorption effect.

skills.name: 钢铁冲锋
skills.des: Vandorallen becomes immune to damage and mounts his horse, knocking down any player in his path. He will also summon Iron Atronach Spiders around the arena. Lucilla will summon an ice shield that will stun any spiders that come into contact.

skills.name: 风驰炎掣
skills.des: Vandorallen will summon flames that spread in a circle around him.

BOSS.name: 惩罚之飑
BOSS.des: The Squall of Retribution is an air atronach summoned by Cato Albus in Exiled Redoubt, where it serves as the final boss.

skills.name: 协调斩击
skills.des: Causes Hindered, Rattled, and Seethe debuffs

skills.name: Vortex
skills.des: Now deals "Hot Foot" damage

skills.name: 六剑奇袭
skills.des: Now casts Engulfing Flame as well

skills.name: Vortex
skills.des: Now casts Shocking Beam as well

skills.name: 六剑奇袭
skills.des: Now casts Shocking Discharge as well

achievement.name: 流放者复仇样式大师
achievement.des: 学习流放者复仇样式书的每一章，该样式书可通过击败流亡哨站的最终Boss获得。

achievement.name: 流亡哨站挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）流亡哨站的成就。

achievement.name: 流亡哨站征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）流亡哨站击败行刑者耶伦希、首席术士范多拉伦和惩罚之飑。

achievement.name: 飑之默杀者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）流亡哨站中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败惩罚之飑。

achievement.name: 斩草除根
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在（老兵模式）流亡哨站击败行刑者耶伦希、首席术士范多拉伦、惩罚之飑以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 雷厉判官
achievement.des: 在进入（老兵模式）流亡哨站的25分钟内击败行刑者耶伦希、首席术士范多拉伦和惩罚之飑以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。计时将从你遇到第一批敌人开始。

achievement.name: 流亡哨站勇士
achievement.des: 在流亡哨站完成列出的成就。

achievement.name: 犬科杀戮者
achievement.des: Defeat 300 Wolves and Bog Dogs in Veteran Exiled Redoubt.

achievement.name: 阿不思杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）流亡哨站击败200个阿不思战士。

achievement.name: 逃脱处决
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）流亡哨站中，击败行刑者耶伦希，同时不被她的尖刺陷阱击中。

achievement.name: 震击反弹
achievement.des: 在老兵模式的流亡哨站中，使用首席术士范多拉伦的风暴之矛对敌人造成250000伤害。

achievement.name: 元素暴露
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）流亡哨站中，由4名玩家组成的完整队伍升起挑战旗帜，且当队伍成员集齐了每一种颜色的元素法球之后，击败惩罚之飑。

achievement.name: 落旗斥候
achievement.des: 在普通模式下，完成流亡哨站和秀跃隐修院。

achievement.name: 流亡哨站胜利者
achievement.des: 在流亡哨站击败行刑者耶伦希、首席术士范多拉伦和惩罚之飑。

achievement.name: 幽魂探求者
achievement.des: 击败守卫队队长帕拉迪乌斯、讲解员多米提斯和埃莉安娜·阿不思，完成流亡哨站的可选内容。

achievement.name: 锈蚀怪物
achievement.des: 在流亡哨站内与首席术士范多拉伦交战时，冰冻或缴械25只铁侍灵蜘蛛，然后将其杀死。

achievement.name: 回归宁静
achievement.des: 在进入流亡哨站的一次探险中，击败守卫队队长帕拉迪乌斯、讲解员多米提斯和埃莉安娜·阿不思，然后再击败惩罚之飑。

achievement.name: 防微杜渐
achievement.des: During the battle with the Squall of Retribution pick up a Fire, Ice or Shock Orb before they develop into Fiery Eruption, Freezing Shard, or Lightning Blast and defeat the Squall of Retribution in Exiled Redoubt.

achievement.name: 落旗探索者
achievement.des: 在老兵模式下，完成流亡哨站和秀跃隐修院。

achievement.name: 强制赦免
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）流亡哨站中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败行刑者耶伦希。

achievement.name: 傲慢的克星
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）流亡哨站中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败首席术士范多拉伦。

achievement.name: 复仇破坏者
achievement.des: Defeat all encounters in addition to Executioner Jerensi, Prime Sorcerer Vandorallen, and the Squall of Retribution after placing the Challenge Banners in Veteran Exiled Redoubt within 25 minutes without suffering a group member death. Your timer starts when you engage the first group of enemies.

achievement.name: 生活属于生者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）流亡哨站中，在升起挑战旗帜，且没有从完成可选内容中获得增益的情况下击败行刑者耶伦希、首席术士范多拉伦和惩罚之飑。

name: 秀跃隐修院
location: Island west of No Shira Citadel in Hew's BayEntrance at boat in the middle of Abah's Landing docks
mystery: “谨慎？这就是你的建议？那个小岛上面全是瞎眼祭司和修道院武士，他们只想着隐匿躲藏，甚至活了这么久都没跟任何人打过架。他们能给我们造成多大的麻烦？”——战术家奥腓翁
des: Lep Seclusa is a group dungeon hidden on an island in the bay of Hew's Bane. It is included in the Fallen Banners DLC alongside Exiled Redoubt. The entrance is located at a boat in the middle of Abah's Landing docks in Hew's Bane. Centipedes, fleshflies, hermit crabs, herons, rats, scorpions, snakes and torchbugs are found in numbers within.

BOSS.name: 追踪者加文
BOSS.des: Garvin the Tracker is a Breton soldier who tracked down the island of Lep Seclusa and led Orpheon's army to it. He serves as the first boss of the dungeon.

BOSS.name: 诺丽纹
BOSS.des: Noriwen the Gryphon Tamer is an Altmer warrior and gryphon trainer in Orpheon's army. She serves as the second main boss in Lep Seclusa, accompanied by her massive gryphon Alcunar. She has participated in Orpheon's previous sieges, where her pet gryphons killed many of their enemies.

skills.name: 斩击
skills.des: Light attack

skills.name: 烙印
skills.des: Heavy attack

BOSS.name: 战术家奥腓翁
BOSS.des:
Orpheon the Tactician is an Imperial[verification needed — Possible Dark Elf] commander who once served as a battlefield Emperor of Cyrodiil. Orpheon broke his allegiance to his previous alliance and recruited despondent deserters into a fearsome army. He has tracked down and laid siege to the hidden island of Lep Seclusa in search of an Elder Scroll that he believes has the power to end the Three Banners War. According to Noriwen's findings, he has Dragonblood in his ancestry.
He is fought as the final boss of the dungeon.Add how to activate Hardmode

skills.name: 迅捷打击
skills.des: Light attack (AOE)

skills.name: 现实破碎
skills.des: Heavy attack, summons a small Watchling above him

skills.name: 深渊召唤
skills.des: Summons Abyssal Tendrils

skills.name: 奥术位面融合
skills.des: Opens Apocryphal Gate, summons Arcane Hulks and Arcane Wraiths (which both cast Arcane Void), Arcane Rippers, Hounds, and Hoppers

skills.name: 召唤阿尔库纳
skills.des: The massive gryphon Alcunar will join Orpheon the Tactician in battle

skills.name: Wing Gust
skills.des: In Veteran, touching these will cause an AoE to appear around you

achievement.name: 武装修道士样式大师
achievement.des: 学习武装修道士样式书的每一章，该样式书可通过击败秀跃隐修院的最终Boss获得。

achievement.name: 秀跃隐修院挑战者
achievement.des: 完成列出的（老兵模式）秀跃隐修院的成就。

achievement.name: 秀跃隐修院征服者
achievement.des: Defeat Garvin the Tracker, Noriwen, and the Orpheon the Tactician in Veteran Lep Seclusa.

achievement.name: 二度废黜
achievement.des: Defeat the Orpheon the Tactician after raising the Challenge Banner in Veteran Lep Seclusa.

achievement.name: 精准打击
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）秀跃隐修院中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败追踪者加文、诺丽纹和战术家奥腓翁。

achievement.name: 速战速决
achievement.des: 在进入（老兵模式）秀跃隐修院的30分钟内击败追踪者加文、诺丽纹、战术家奥腓翁以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。计时将从你遇到第一批敌人开始。

achievement.name: 秀跃隐修院勇士
achievement.des: 在秀跃隐修院完成列出的成就。

achievement.name: 变节者杀手
achievement.des: 在老兵模式的秀跃隐修院中，击败300个变节者。

achievement.name: 战兽杀戮者
achievement.des: 在老兵模式的秀跃隐修院中，击败300头战兽。

achievement.name: 扼杀于摇篮
achievement.des: 在老兵模式的秀跃隐修院中，击败追踪者加文，同时不给他机会放置任何陷阱。

achievement.name: 毫发无损
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）秀跃隐修院中，在无一玩家遭狮鹫投弹手的火线爆轰命中的情况下，击败诺丽纹。

achievement.name: 对抗黑暗
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）秀跃隐修院中，让战术家奥腓翁在一次移动阶段内被他的黑暗魔法遮蔽3次，且无一玩家经历死亡。

achievement.name: 持盾暴动
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）秀跃隐修院中，击败战术家奥腓翁，且无一玩家被未格挡的奥术虚无攻击命中。

achievement.name: 缓慢前进
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）秀跃隐修院中，在受到减速下降影响且资源减少至25%或更少的情况下，击败战术家奥腓翁。

achievement.name: 落旗斥候
achievement.des: 在普通模式下，完成流亡哨站和秀跃隐修院。

achievement.name: 秀跃隐修院胜利者
achievement.des: Defeat Garvin the Tracker, Noriwen, and the Orpheon the Tactician in Lep Seclusa.

achievement.name: 沙丘开膛者杀手
achievement.des: 在秀跃隐修院中与追踪者加文交战时，使用剧毒巨石杀死5个骇人沙丘开膛者。

achievement.name: 围攻幸存者
achievement.des: 在秀跃隐修院遭受围攻期间，击败诺丽纹。

achievement.name: 战术性鲁莽
achievement.des: 在没有遭受围攻的前提下通关秀跃隐修院，同时让攻城大师玛尔索拉斯存活。

achievement.name: 双重打击
achievement.des: 在秀跃隐修院内与列文·弗雷对战中，在受到汲能管路效果影响的同时，被充能打击击中。

achievement.name: 反攻城专家
achievement.des: 在秀跃隐修院中，摧毁10个攻城大师玛尔索拉斯的攻城器械。

achievement.name: 安然避火
achievement.des: 在秀跃隐修院中，击败火焰舞者艾吉-雷，同时没有小队成员被熔身烈焰引燃。

achievement.name: 全面拯救者
achievement.des: 在秀跃隐修院找到所有幸存的赫尔那图人并与之交谈，之后再打败战术家奥腓翁。

achievement.name: 落旗探索者
achievement.des: 在老兵模式下，完成流亡哨站和秀跃隐修院。

achievement.name: 消踪匿迹
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）秀跃隐修院中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败追踪者加文。

achievement.name: 脚踏实地
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）秀跃隐修院中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败诺丽纹。

achievement.name: 天道好还
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）秀跃隐修院中，升起挑战旗帜之后，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，于30分钟内击败追踪者加文、诺丽纹和战术家奥腓翁以及除此之外遭遇的所有敌人。
